Inambe gusu ne yakun, araige kuni aesanniyo utara nei no, Kamui auak ne iyotta okese ta Apostoro ne chi utara un are nisa ruwe ne sekoro ku yainu ruwe ne: moshiri gusu ne yakka, hauturumbe gusu ne yakka, utara gusu ne yakka, chi utara anak ne shibai un utara nepkoro ne akan na.

Kiristo rengap gusu chi utara anak ne ramu-isambe chi ne, koroka, echi utara anak ne Kiristo otta wayashnu utara echi ne; chi utara anak ne katchakbe ne koroka, echi utara anak ne okirashnup ne; echi utara aeoripakbe ne, chi utara anak ne a shomo eyaikatunup chi ne ruwe ne.
Tane an pakihi pakno poka chi utara ibe-rusui hemhem ki, iku-rusui hemhem ki, atusa hemhem okai, akoshirikik wa okai,
samata, uni sak no okai ruwe ne; monraige wa yaikota koro teke ani ikichi; aiyoitakushi chiki, nunuke ash, aepokba chiki, eyaishiporore ash; iyohaigekara chiki,
koramkoro ash; tane pakno poka moshiri temmon korachi, obitta no okaibe gusu an turu korachi, a un kara wa an na.
Echi yainikoroshmare kuni gusu tap okaibe shomo ku nuye, koroka, ku goro omap an poho utara pakashnu gusu ne na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kiristo oshiketa ichi man nin ue epakashnu utara echi koro yakka, inne no okai michihi shomo echi kon ruwe ne: Kiristo Yesu oshiketa pirika shongo ani kuani echi shikore nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, echi en ikoisamba kuni gusu kuani echi onishnishi ash ruwe ne.

Tapan ikkewehe gusu. Utarapa oshiketa an ku omap ikipniukesh poho Timoteos echi orun ku omande nisa ruwe ne; neita ne yakka okai pishno an karisia otta ku epakashnu korachi poka, shinuma anak ne Kiristo oshiketa ku an wa iki buri echi eshkarunde kusu ne.
Echi orun shomo ku ek kusu ne korachi sereke utara pittarane okai ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, Utarapa ramuoshma chiki, naa pon no shiran ko kuani echi orota ek kushki; aige, nei pittarane utara koro itak shomo ne, koroka, nei kiroro ku eraman kushki na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui moshiri anak ne itak gusu an ambe shomo ne,

koroka, kiroro gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne. Nepi echi kon rusui ya? Kuwa ku koro wa echi orun ku ek ambe echi kon rusui hene ya? Ramu-shiroma keutum koro hine omap ki wa ku ek ambe echi kon rusui ruwe he an?
Echi tumugeta hoiyo an sekorʼambe anu no assuru aashte wa an na; Oya uirup tumta shomo aye pakno an hoiyop ne, echi shiueu anak ue koro michi koro machi koro ambe ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, tan okaibe iki guru anak ne echi tumuge wano auk kuni ne shomo echi yaituwashkarap a koroka, echi pittarane hine okai.
Son no newa, kuani anak ne netobake gusu isam a koroka, ramat gusu an wa, echi tura no okai korachi, tap okaibe ikichi guru koipishi okere ruwe ne;
chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu kon reihei ankushkeraipo echi utara newa ku kon ramat anak ne chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu koro kiroro tura
uwekarapa wa Utarapa ne Yesu koro toho ta nei guru kon ramat kashichiobiuki kuni ne koro kam aisamka gusu nei no an guru Satan otta ekoshi yan.
Echi yaiomonnure ambe anak ne pirikap shomo ne. Pon no an pandane anak ne nei ramne taku shipushkere ambe shomo echi eraman ya?
Pandane sak no poka echi okai korachi, ashiri takuhu echi akara kuni gusu, nei fushko pandane oashinge yan. Inambe gusu ne yakun, chikoro kamakushbe ne Kiristo ne yakka ayange nisa ruwe ne:
tambe gusu, nei marapto kiro, fushko pandane koro shomoki, samata, wenbe newa wen-katcham oma pandane ka koro shomoki, koroka, turu-sak an sonep ne pandane sak pan koro hine kiro.
Iteki hoiyo utara tura no echi ko-okai kuni ne kambi kata ku nuye nisa;

oara tan moshirʼun hoiyo utara tura hene yaikoshipuinere newa niwen no ikichi utara tura hene, potoki ko-ongami utara tura hene iteki ko-okai yan; yakun, moshiri wano echi paye kunip ne ruwe ne na: koroka, tane, iriwak ari aporose guru anak ne hoiyo hene ki,

yaikoshipuinere hene ki, potoki ko-ongami hene ki, kosakayokara hene ki, ihoshki hene ki, niwen no ikichi hene ki yakun, iteki shinuma tura no ko-okai kuni ku nuye; ibe gusu poka iteki nei no an guru tura no okai yan.
Soita okai utara koipishi gusu nep irenga ku goro ya? Echi utara anak ne onnaigeta okai utara shomo koipishi ruwe he an?
Aige, Kamui anak ne soita okai utara koipishi ruwe ne. Echi tumuge wano nei wen guru emaka wa en kore yan.
Echi tumugeta aun guru epeka no aeiyonnupbap an chiki, ashkanne utara shomo ne no okai oupekasak utara kotchake un tak wa koipishi pakno an wenrametokbe koro guru an a?

Samata, ashkanne utara anak ne moshiri koipishi kusu ne ambe shomo echi eraman ya? Orowa, moshiri anak ne echi orowa no akoipishi chiki, iyotta saure ambe gusu koipishi kuni echi oupak shomoki ruwe he an?
Chi utara anak ne Kamui hauturumbe koipishi kusu ne ambe echi erampeutek ruwe he an? Yakun, naa hemanda pakno tane an ishu-i gusu an ambe gusu shomoki ya?
Tambe gusu, tane an ishu ambe gusu an orushpe echi koipishi kunip ne a yakun, karisia orowa no nepka aramu shomo ne okai utara koipishi kuni ne echi ashte ruwe he an?
Echi yainikoroshmare gusu tambe ku ye ruwe ne.
Koro iriwak uturu esanniyo eashkai shine wayashnu guru anukara eaikap gusu eishokoro shomoki utara kotchake un echi paye wa koipishire poka pakno echi ki ya?

Ruwe un, utashpa atak wa ukoipishire ambe anak ne tane ne yakka echi utara gusu ara eikohaye ambe ne ruwe ne. Hemanda gusu nei iki ambe shirihine aeyaiwendere shomoki ya? Hemanda gusu nei ambe shirihi ne korobe akoukte shomoki ruwe he an?
Ruwe un, koroka, echi utara yaikota wen no iki wa koro iriwak utara korope kouk ruwe ne.

Samata, oupeka sak utara Kamui moshiri shomo eikeshkoro kusu ne ambe echi erampeutek ruwe he an? Iteki yaikokandama yan: hoiyo utara hene, potoki ko-ongami utara hene, omoinu ikichi utara hene, kuroma buri ki utara hene, okkai turu wen-buri iki utara hene,
ikka utara hene, yaikoshipuinere utara hene, ihoshki utara hene, kosakayokara utara hene, ehekem utara hene, Kamui moshiri eikeshkoro shomoki kusu ne na.

Echi sereke utara anak ne deeda nei no okai utara echi ne a koroka, tane echi ayashke okere, koroka, echi aashkannere an na, koroka, chikoro Kamui kon Ramat newa Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo kon reihei otta echi utara aoupekare nisa ruwe ne na.

Nep okaibe ne yakka en gusu ikashpaotte kopakeat ruwe ne, koroka, obitta no okaibe en gusu pirika kunip shomo ne. Nep okaibe ne yakka en gusu ikashpaotte kopakeat; koroka, nep okaibe koro mondum ne yakka kuani en esapanere ash shomoki kusu ne na.

Honihi gusu aep, aep gusu honihi; koroka, Kamui anak ne netobake ne yakka nei okaibe ne yakka isamka kusu ne. Koroka, netobake anak ne hoiyo gusu an ambe shomo ne, koroka, Utarapa gusu an ambe ne; orowa, Utarapa ne yakka netobake gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne:
awa, Kamui anak ne Utarapa hetopo-shiknure nisa ruwe ne, samata, Shinuma koro kiroro ani un hetopo-shiknure kusu ne na.

Echi kon netobake anak ne Kiristo koro awehe ne sekorʼambe echi erampeutek ruwe he an? yakun, kuani anak ne Kiristo koro awehe ku uk wa hoiyo ki shiwentep koro awehe ne kara kusu ne ya? Oara shomo ruwe ne.
Samata, hoiyo ki shiwentep otta koan gurʼanak ne shine netobake ne sekorʼambe echi erampeutek ruwe he an? Inambe gusu ne yakun,—Nei tun anak ne shine kam ne, ari Shinuma itak nisa ruwe ne na.
Koroka, Utarapa otta koan gurʼanak ne shine ramat ne ruwe ne.
Hoiyo wano shaot yan. Ainu iki obitta no okai chikokatpak auak ne netobake soige an; koroka, hoiyo ki guru anak ne yaikota kon netobake epeka chikokatpak ki ruwe ne.
Orosama, echi kon netobake anak ne Kamui orowa no akore echi onnaigeta an Ashkanne Ramat kora kenru ne ari an ambe echi erampeutek ruwe he an? Aige, echi utara anak ne yaikota yaikorobe shomo ne;
oro ani echi ahok okere ruwe ne gusu ne na: tambe gusu echi kon netobake otta an Kamui ko-oripak yan.
Tane, gusu echi nuye okere orushpe: Okkai-ainu anak ne mat-ainu shomo tomooshma ambe anak pirika ruwe ne:
koroka, hoiyop an gusu ainu pishno koro machi yaikota koro yan, shui, shiwentep pishno koro hoku yaikota koro yan.
Akore kuni ambe hoku anak ne koro machi otta kore yan: shui, machi ne yakka koro hoku otta shem korachi ki yan.
Machi anak ne yaikota kon netobake gusu mondum shomo koro, koroka, koro hoku kon ruwe ne: shui, hoku anak shem korachi yaikota kon netobake gusu mondum shomo koro, koroka, koro machi kon ruwe ne.
Ouse iruka an pakihi gusu inonno-itak gusu moshima iteki utashpa uwe ehunara yan, orowa, echi yai-yaishik-kashima eaikapbe gusu Satan anak ne iteki echi koramnukara gusu kanna-shui ukotura koan yan.
Koroka, tambe anak ku ikashpaotte wa aye-hi shomo ne, koroka, akoramuoshma gusu ku ye ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, obitta no okai ainu utara en korachi poka an kuni ku kon rusui. Yakka, ainu pishno Kamui orowa no an aikrap koro, Shinen nei no an ambe koro Shinen tapne an amire kon ruwe ne.
Koroka, umurek guru ne a shomo ne utara newa shiyompiyara shiwentep otta tap ku ye, nei utara en korachi okai ambe anak ne nei utara gusu pirika ruwe ne.
Koroka, yaishikkashima eaikap chiki, umurek ne akara yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, paraparase kasu no an ambe anak ne uahupkara chiki pirika ruwe ne.
Koroka, uahupkara an utara otta ikashpaotte ku ki, ku ikip shomo ne, koroka, Utarapa ikip ne.

Machi anak ne iteki koro hoku osurupa yan, (koroka, osurupa chiki, iteki kanna-shui hoku ahupkara, shomo ne yakun, koro hoku tura irenga usaraye wa okai yan), shui, hoku anak ne iteki koro machi osurupa yan.
Koroka, moshimap gusu kuani yaikota ku ye, Utarapa shomo: Nep iriwak ne yakka shomo eishokoro machi koro chiki, aige, nei shiwentep

shinuma tura no oshiroma kuni ambe konoburu yakun, nei ainu iteki shinuma osurupa yan. Shui, shiwentep anak ne shomo eishokoro hoku koro chiki, aige, nei ainu shinuma tura no oshiroma kuni ambe konoburu yakun, nei shiwentep iteki shinuma osurupa yan.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, shomo eishokoro hoku anak ne koro machi gusu aashkannere, orowa, shomo eishokoro machi anak ne nei iriwak gusu aashkannere ruwe ne: shomo ne chiki echi koro poho utara turu-ushbe ne, koroka, tane ashkanne utara ne ruwe ne.

Yakka, shomo eishokoro guru paye chiki, paye yak pirika: nei ainu-iriwak ne yakka mat-iriwak ne yakka nei no okaibe gusu ausshiunere ambe shomo ne: koroka, Kamui anak ne itomo an gusu un hotuyekara nisa ruwe ne na.
Machihi, eani anak ne e koro hoku kashiobiuki kusu ne ya nekon a e eraman ya? Shui, hokuhu, eani anak ne e koro machi kashiobiuki kusu ne ya nekon a e eraman ruwe he an?
Ouse, Utarapa anak ne pishno an ainu otta eimek nei no, Kamui anak ne pishno an guru hotuyekara nei no, ene koracki apkash yan. Obitta no okai karisia gusu nei no ku ipawetenge ruwe ne.

Okarituye-buri akbe an no nenka ahotuyekara nisa ruwe he an? Yakun, iteki nei okarituye-buri ani shomo okarituye-buri ne kara yan. Okarituye-buri akire shomo ne an no nenka ahotuyekara ya? Yakun, iteki okarituye-buri akire yan.
Okarituye-buri anak ne nepka shomo ne, shui, shomo okarituye-buri akire-hi ne yakka nep ka shomo ne; koroka, Kamui ikashpaotte shikkashima ambe anak ne nepka ne ruwe ne.
Ani ahotuyekara an ap otta ainu pishno an yan.
Ausshiune an guru an rapoketa e ahotuyekara an ruwe he an? Yakun, nei ambe nep ne ka shomo aramu yan: koroka, aehonnere eashkai chiki,

nei ambe eiwange yan. Inambe gusu ne yakun, ausshiunere wa an, aine, Utarapa gusu ahotuyekara gurʼanak ne, Utarapa koro ahonnere wa an gunʼne: nei no korachi, ahonnere wa an, aine, ahotuyekara gurʼanak ne Kiristo koro usshiune guru ne ruwe ne.
Oro an no echi utara ahok nisa; iteki moshima an guru gusu aeyausshiunere nei no akara yan.
Iriwak utara, otta aehotuyekara pishno an gurʼanak ne nei ambe otta oshiroma yan.

Tane, umurek guru shomo ne utara gusu Utarapa orowa no an ikashpaotte shomo ku kon ruwe ne: koroka, ikipniukeshbe ne kuni gusu Utarapa orowa no akore rampoken koro guru korachi aesanniyop ku sange na.
Tane an shirikirap gusu ainu anak ne tane an korachi an kuni ambe shinuma gusu pirika ruwe ne sekoro ku yainu ruwe ne.
Machi gusu eani ahekote ya? Yakun, iteki ahonnere kuni hunara. Machi gusu e ahonnere an a? Yakun, iteki machi hunara yan.

Koroka, mat e ahupkara yakka chikokatpak isam; shui, shiwentep hoku ahupkara yakka chikokatpak isam ruwe ne na Yakka, nei no okai utara anak ne kam gusu aeramchuptekka kusu ne; orowa, kuani echi shihopinupka ash ruwe ne.
Koroka, tambe ku ye, iriwak utara, pakihi anak ne ataknere wa an, tambe gusu, tewa no machi koro utara anak ne mat sak korachi ne;
orowa, chish utara anak ne shomo chish korachi ne; nupetne utara anak shomo nupetne korachi ne;
hok utara shomo koro korachi ne; orowa, moshiri eiwange mashkin korachi ne kuni gusu an ap ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, tan moshiri katuhu auak ne isam kusu ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, echi utara gusu aenishomap ambe isam kuni ku kon rusui. Mat sak guru anak
ne Utarapa nupetnere kuni ne Utarapa korope gusu nishomap ruwe ne, mat koro guru anak ne kon machi nupetnere kuni ne tan moshirʼunbe gusu nishomap ruwe ne.

Shui, hoku koro shiwentep newa hoku sak shiwentep uturu uwechutko no an ushike an. Hoku sak shiwentep anak ne netobake gusu ne yakka ramat gusu ne yakka ashkanne kuni ne Utarapa korope gusu nishomap ruwe ne: koroka, hoku koro guru anak ne koro hoku nupetnere kuni ne tan moshirʼunbe gusu nishomap ruwe ne.

Orowa, echi aeyaiepirikare kuni ne tambe ku ye; echi utara kata tupep ku omare gusu shomo ne, koroka, echi aeoripak kuni, echi akokurusere keutum isam no Utarapa otta pirika no yaishieiwangere kuni gusu, ku iki ruwe ne na.

Koroka, ainu anak ne koro matnep epeka oupeka ambe shomo ki korʼan ari yainu chiki, aige, nei matnep paha epa okere yakun, samata, koro shomoki chiki wen yakun, shinuma keutum rengaine ki yak pirika; chikokatpak isam; ahupkara yak pirika ruwe ne.

Koroka, koro kuni ika isam wa gusu koro keutum atte hine, yaikota koro rengaine an mondum gusu kiroro koro wa koro matnep shikkashima kusu ne ari an ambe koro sambe ta oshitchiu yakun, pirika ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, aahupkara kuni gusu koro matnep kore gurʼanak ne pirikap ki; orowa, aahupkara kuni ne shomo kore gurʼanak ne naa kasu no pirikap ki ruwe ne na.
Koro hoku shiknu wa an pakno machihi anak ne ahekote an na; koroka, koro hoku rai chiki, rengaine shui hoku ahupkara yak pirika; ouse Utarapa oshiketa korachi ruwe ne.
Koroka, an korachi an yakun naa irammakaka an kusu ne ari ku esanniyo; aine, kuani ne yakka Kamui Ramat kon ruwe ne ari ku yainu.
Tane potoki otta ayangep gusu, chi utara obitta eramush ruwe ne ari chi eraman.
Eramushbe anak ne pittarannere, koroka, omap ambe anak ne ashte ruwe ne. Nenka nepka eraman ari yainu guru an chiki shinuma anak ne eraman kuni kusu ne ap korachi naa erampeutek ruwe ne;
koroka nenka Kamui ko-omap chiki, Shinuma orowa no aeamkire ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, potoki otta ayangep ibe ambe gusu, potoki anak ne moshirʼotta nep ne ka aramu shomoki kuni ambe ne, orowa, Shine Kamui moshima Kamui isama ari chi eraman ruwe ne.
Orowa, kando otta ne yakka moshirʼotta ne yakka Kamui ari an reihei ani areikorep inne ne a yakka,

Kamui inne Utarapa inne ne korachi; yakka, chi utara gusu anak, Shine Kamui an, Shinuma Michi ne, Shinuma gusu obitta no okaibe okai, orowa chi utara anak ne Shinuma oshiketa okai ruwe ne; samata, Shine Utarapa an, Yesu Kiristo ne ruwe ne, Shinuma ankushkerai nep ne yakka okai, orowa chi utara anak ne Shinuma ankushkerai okai ruwe ne.

Yakka obitta no okai utara otta nei no an eramush-i isam: koroka, arage okai utara anak ne tane pakno potoki koro gusu, potoki otta ayange ambe nei no ibe; aige, koro keutum katchakbe ne gusu turu-aushte ruwe ne.
Koroka, kam gusu chi utara anak ne Kamui tek-samata shomo roshki ash: shui, shomo ibe yakka aewende shomoki: shui, ibe yakka aepirikare shomoki ruwe ne na.
Koroka, tapan echi koro rengaine an mondum anak ne iteki katchak wa okai utara gusu ae ureepetchiurep ne akara kuni ne yaitubare yan.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, eramushbe e koro wa potoki chisei ta a hine ibe korʼan ambe nenka nukara guru an chiki, shinuma katchakbe ne yakun, koro keutum arametokte wa potoki otta ayange ambe ibe shomoki kusu ne ruwe he an?
E ki eramushbe gusu nei a katchak guru, gusu Kiristo rai akoro iriwak ne guru, aisamka ruwe ne.
Orowa, tambe nei no iriwak ne utara epeka katpak echi ki wa katchak wa an rapoketa nei utara koro keutum echi piriore gusu Kiristo epeka katpak echi ki ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, aep anak ne ku iriwak ureepetchiure yakun, iteki ku iriwak ku epetchiure kuni ne, ramma pakno kam shomo ku ibe kusu ne na.
Rengaine an ambe shomo ku ne ruwe he an? Apostoro shomo ku ne ya? Chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu shomo ku nukan nisa ruwe he an? Utarapa oshiketa ku ki ikip shomo echi ne ruwe he an?
Moshima okai utara epeka apostoro shomo ku ne a yakka, echi utara gusu poka nei no ku an ruwe ne: samata, Utarapa oshiketa ku ki Apostoro kunip gusu an han echi ne ruwe ne.
En koipishi utara otta ku ki yaikikkara itak tambe ne ruwe ne.
Ibe hene ki iku hene ki kuni rengaine an mondum shomo chikon ruwe he an?

Samata, moshima okai apostoro utara iki korachi, Utarapa koro iriwak utara iki korachi, shui Kepas iki korachi eishokoro wa okai machihi ekeshne ani wa apkash kuni rengaine an mondum shomo chikon ruwe he an?
Shui, ouse kuani newa Barnabas patek shomo monraige kuni rengaine an mondum shomo kon ruwe he an?
Pumma uk shomoki tumi-koro guru inan guru ne ruwe? Hat-toi etoita wa orowa hetuku ibehe shomo e guru inan guru ne ruwe? Samata, chikoikip reshpa wa nei tope shomo ibe guru inan guru ne ruwe he an?
Ainu ye-hi korachi tapan okaibe ku ye ya?

Tuitak ne yakka ukorachi shomo itak ruwe he an? Inambe gusu ne yakun, Mose sange tuitak kata ene chieshinnuye wa an,—Mungi ibehe aoshinge beko otta iteki para-saranip unu yan. Nei beko esanniyo gusu Kamui anak ne ene ye ya?

Chi utara gusu ene aye ya? Buwe un, chi utara gusu chieshinnuye wa an na: inambe gusu ne yakun, toi-pushu guru anak ne chipachipa wa pushu kunip ne, samata, ibehe aoshinge guru anak ne koro kuni chipachipa wa iki kunip ne ruwe ne.
Echi utara gusu ramat unbe chi etoita chiki anak ne echi koro kam unbe chi nange yak porobe ne ruwe he an?

Moshima okai utara anak ne auk kunip ne okaibe an gusu echi korobe uina chiki, chi utara naa kasu no ruwe ne. Yakka nei iki kunip ne a an mondum eiwange ash shomoki nisa ruwe ne; koroka, Kiristo koro pirika shongo iteki shinneatush kuni ne nep ne yakka chi utara yaishiporore ruwe ne.

Ashkannep otta yaishieiwangere utara anak ne Kamui kora kenru ta okaibe ibe ruwe ne, orowa, yange set otta yaishieiwangere utara anak yange set ta okai aeimekbe uina ruwe ne sekorʼambe shomo echi eraman ya?
Tap korachi pirika shongo eupaskuma ki utara ne yakka pirika shongo gusu an okaibe gusu shiknu kusu ne-hi Utarapa esanniyo nisa ruwe ne na Koroka,

tap okaibe pon no ka ku eiwange shomoki nisa ruwe ne: orowa, en gusu nei no aki kuni ne tap okaibe shomo ku nuye ruwe ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, nenka ku ki yaiomonnure ambe raka-sakte kasu no ku rai yakne pirika ruwe ne.
Pirika shongo ku eupaskuma chiki, yaiomonnure ushike isam; ene akari ka isam no an wa a en kire an ruwe ne gusu ne na; aige, pirika shongo ku eupaskuma shomoki yakun, ku yaisambepokash humi?
Inambe gusu ne yakun, kuani ku rengaine tambe iki yakun, iwayehe ku goro: koroka, ku rengaine shomo ne no ku ki yakun, otta aeyaishieiwangere kunip a en shikkashimare an na.
Yakun, ku uk iwayehe nepta? Pirika shongo ku eupaskuma ita oro isam no nei pirika shongo ku ki kuni ambe ne, okese pakno pirika shongo gusu an ku atarimaye shomo ku eiwange kuni gusu ne ruwe ne na.
Obitta no okai utara gusu kuani ahonnere wa an a yakka, naa ku eyaiepirikare kuni gusu, obitta no okai utara gusu ku yaiusshiunere nisa ruwe ne.

Yudea un utara ku epirika gusu, Yudea un guru ne kuni ku yaikan nisa; orowa, tuitak choropoketa okai utara gusu, yaikota tuitak choropoketa shomo ku an a yakka, tuitak choropoketa nepkoro ne, nei tuitak choropoketa okai utara ku epirika kuni nep ne ruwe ne;
tuitak sak utara gusu, Kamui epeka tuitak sak no shomo ku an a koroka, Kiristo gusu tuitak an, yakka, tuitak sakno okai utara ku epirika kuni gusu, tuitak sakno korachi nep.
Katchak utara ku epirika gusu katchakbe nepkoro ku ne: nekon a ka arage an utara ku kaobiukire kuni gusu, inan guru gusu ne yakka nep ne yakka korachi ku yaikan nisa.
Orowa, pirika shongo gusu nep ne yakka ku ki, nei ambe uweukouk kuni gusu ne na.
Hoyuppa uwetushmak ushiketa hoyuppa utara anak ne obitta hoyuppa, koroka, ouse Shinen aungeraitere ari an ambe shomo echi eraman ya? Echi utara eungeraitep aukte kuni ne hoyuppa yan.

Uwetushmak wa iki gurʼanak ne nep nep ne yakka gusu yaishikashima ruwe ne. Onnere yan, nei utara anak ne munin kuni sapa-umbe eungerai gusu ki ruwe ne, chi utara anak shomo muninbe eungerai gusu ki ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu, kuani anak ne noratchitara korachi, shomo ku hoyupu; rera shirikik korachi shomo ku koiki: koroka, ku netobake ku shirikik wa nei ambe usshiunere:
ikineipeka moshima utara otta eupaskuma ku ki orowa no shomo kuani yaikota aemakap ne kuni gusu ne na.
Iriwak utara, chikoro shinrit utara anak ne obitta nishkuru choropoketa okai, obitta atui tumu kush wa paye; atui otta ne yakka nishkuru otta ne yakka obitta Mose orun baptisma akore;
obitta une no an ramat oma aep ibe;
obitta une no an ramat oma iku ambe iku sekorʼambe echi erampeutek kuni ku kopan:
nei utara anak koro oshi paye ramat oma Watara otta iku nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na, nei Watara anak Kiristo ne ruwe ne.
Yakka, nei utara poro sereke Kamui aenupetne shomoki; awa, nup otta aisamka nisa ruwe ne.
Tap okaibe anak ne nei utara iki nei no chi utara iteki wenbe iki rusui kuni ne un gusu hetuku kochihi ne ruwe ne.
Utara anak ne ibe gusu hene iku gusu hene rok, orowa shinot gusu hopumba nisa ruwe ne, sekoro chieshinnuye wa an korachi, iteki potoki kon no okai yan.
Shui, nei utara tumugeta okai utara hoiyo iki wa shine to ta ni man nin ne utara ikashima san sen nin ne utara ekot: nei utara iki korachi iteki hoiyo ki yanro.
Shui, Utarapa koramnukara wa gusu okokko ani aronnu utara nei no, iteki Utarapa koramnukara yanro.
Orowa shui, oromam wa isamka kunip ani aisamka utara nei no iteki echi oromam yan.
Tap okaibe nei utara otta hetukup anak ne kochihi nei no an ambe ne: orowa, otta moshiri okese-hi an chi utara gusu, un epakashnu kuni gusu chieshinnuye wa okai ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, ash korʼan sekoro yainu guru, iteki hachiri kuni ne yaitubare yan.

Ainu sei eaikap ikoramnukara-hi echi utara gusu isama; koroka, Kamui anak ne sonep ne, echi yaishiporore eashkai kasu no echi utara akoramnukara kuni ramuoshma shomoki kusu ne: koroka, echi yaishiporore eashkai kuni ne nei koramnukara-hi tura ohaitare kuni ushi kan ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, ku omap utara potoki emaka yan.
Wayashnu utara otta korachi ku ye ruwe ne; ku ye itak esanniyo yan.

Chi nunuke ash shinnunuke an itangi anak ne Kiristo koro kemihi gusu an ukotura ikichi ambe shomo ne ruwe he an? Chi meshpa ash pantak anak ne Kiristo kon netobake gusu an ukotura ikichi ambe shomo ne ruwe he an?
Chi utara inne a yakka, shine pantak ne, shine netobake ne ruwe ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, chi utara obitta shine pantak eimek wa ibe ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Kam gusu an Israeru un utara ingarʼan: ayangep ibe utara anak ne yange-set tura ikichi utara shomo ne ruwe he an?
Yakun, nekon a ku ye ya? Potoki otta ayangep anak ne nep ka ne aramu? Samata, potoki anak ne nep ka ne aramu ya?
Koroka, Oya uirup yange yangep gusu ne chiki, Kamui otta ayange ambe shomo ne, nitne kamui otta ayangep ne: aige, echi utara anak ne nitne kamui tura ukokicbi ambe ku kopan ruwe ne.
Utarapa koro itangi newa nitnep koro itangi tup ne kane echi iku eaikap: Utarapa koro set unbe newa nitnep koro set unbe tup ne kane echi ibe eaikap ruwe ne.
Shui, Utarapa eyaitunnapte chi ki mwe he an? Shinuma kasu no chi utara anak ne okirashnu ruwe he an?
Nep ne yakka an okaibe ikashpaotte kopakeat a yakka, obitta no okaibe auina gusu pirika shomo ne. Nep ne yakka an okaibe ikashpaotte kopakeat a koroka, obitta utara roshkire shomo ki ruwe ne.
Inan guru ne yakka yaiepirikare gusu iteki esanniyo yan,
koroka, aota an guru esanniyo yan. Nep ne yakka kam eiyok ushita eiyokbe ibe yan, aine, koro keutum gusu iteki nei ambe gusu uwepekennu;
inambe gusu ne yakun, toitoi newa otta okai aeshikbe obitta Utarapa korope ne.
Eishokoro shomoki no an guru anak ne ibe gusu echi eahunge, aige, echi oman chiki, nep ne yakka echi kotchaketa aandep ibe yan,
orowa, keutum gusu iteki uwepekennu yan. Koroka, tambe anak ne ayange okerep ne, ari nenka e otta ye chiki, nei ambe e nure guru gusu hemhem, keutum gusu hemhem iteki nei ambe ibe yan:
keutura gusu ku ye, awa, e korobe gusu shomo ne, koroka, nei guru gusu ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, Hemanda gusu moshima guru koro keutum ani ku ahonnere an ambe akoipishi ruwe he an?
Kuani anak ne irenga ku goro gusu ibe chiki, gusu ku yaiiraige ki ambe ankushtapne hemanda gusu a en ohaigekara an ruwe he an?
Tambe gusu echi ibe hene ki iku hene ki nep ne yakka echi ki a yakka, obitta no Kamui
nupeki gusu ikichi yan. Yudea un utara gusu ne yakka Herenes un utara gusu ne yakka Kamui koro karisia gusu ne yakka iteki ureepetchiure ambe ande yan:

Kuani anak ne nep ne yakka gusu obitta no okai utara nupetnere korachi nep, aine, utara kashiaobiuki gusu inne no okai utara epirikare kuni esanniyo wa yaikota eyaiepirikare ambe shomo yainu korachi ne ruwe ne na.
Kuani anak ne Kiristo ikoisamba korachi echi utara ne yakka en ikoisamba yan.
Echi utara anak ne nep ne yakka an a yakka en eshkarun gusu, samata, otta echi kore ash nei no nei oina echi shikkashima gusu ku iramye ash na.
Koroka, pishno an guru koro esapanep anak ne Kiristo ne sekoro echi eraman kuni ku kon rusui; mat-ainu esapanep anak ne okkai ainu ne; Kiristo esapanep anak ne Kamui ne ruwe ne.
Inan guru ne yakka inonno-itak hene ki uweingara hene ki ita sapa akamure chiki, koro sapa otta shomo yaikatanu ki ruwe ne.

Koroka, inan mat-ainu ne yakka sapa akamure shomoki no inonno-itak hene ki uweingara hene ki chiki koro sapa otta shomo yaikatanu ki: inambe gusu ne yakun, nei no an wa iki chiki, otop amemke ukorachi ne ruwe ue na.
Mat-ainu anak ne sapa kamure shomoki yakun, otop aocha yak pirika: koroka, mat-ainu otop aocha hene amemke hene aeyainikoroshma ambe ne chiki, sapa kamure yak pirika ruwe ne.
Ainu anak ne Kamui noka newa arakuru ne ruwe ne gusu, koro sapa akamure kunip shomo ne ruwe ne: koroka, mat-ainu anak okkai-ainu koro arakuru ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Okkai ainu anak ne mat-ainu orowa no an ap shomo ne;
koroka, mat-ainu anak ne okkai-ainu orowa no an ap ne: shui, okkai-ainu anak ne mat-ainu gusu akarape shomo ne; koroka, mat ainu anak ne okkai-ainu gusu akan nisa ruwe ne:
tambe gusu, Kamui hauturumbe an gusu, mat-ainu anak ne sapa kashike
mondum akore kunip ne ruwe ne. Yakka, Utarapa oshiketa mat-ainu anak ne okkai-ainu sak no an ambe shomo ne, shui, okkai-ainu anak ne mat-ainu sak no an ambe shomo ne ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, mat-ainu anak ne okkai-ainu orowa no an ambe ne korachi, okkai-ainu anak ne mat-ainu ankushkerai an ambe ne; koroka, obitta no okaibe Kamui orowa no an ap ne ruwe ne.
Echi utara yaitumta esanniyo yan: mat-ainu anak ne sapa akamure shomoki no Kamui otta inonno-itak ki ambe anak pirika ruwe he an?
Okkai-ainu anak ne tanne otop koro yakun, gusu ayainikoshma-hi rengaine echi aeramande shomoki ruwe he an?
Koroka, mat-ainu anak ne tanne otop koro yakun, gusu arakuru ne ruwe ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, shinuma akamure gusu otta akorep ne ruwe ne na.
Koroka, nenka upaukoiki konoburu kuni anukara chiki, chi utara hene Kamui karisia hene nei no an buri shomo kon ruwe ne.
Koroka, tap ambe ani ikashpaotte ku ki wa echi ramye ash shomoki ruwe ne, pirikap gusu shomo ne no wenbe gusu echi uwekarapa mwe ne gusu ne na.
Hoshiki no, karisia otta echi uwekarapa ita, echi tumugeta eukopi an sekoro ku nu: orowa, kuani pon no nei ambe ku eishokon ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, echi tumugeta auwande wa okai utara anukara kuni ne echi tumugeta Kamui orushpe ohoge yainu ambe ne yakka an a ambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, echi uwekarapa ita, Utarapa onumanibehe aki eaikapbe ne:
inambe gusu ne yakun, echi ihe gusu yaikota koro kunne-ibe pishno echi e; orowa, Shinen anak ne sambe-chinoiba, moshima guru anak ihoshki ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Hemanda? otta echi ibe kuni echi iku kuni chisei echi sak ruwe he an? Samata, Kamui karisia etunne wa nep ka sak utara yainikoroshmare ruwe he an? Echi otta hemanda ku ye kusu ne ya? Tap okaibe gusu echi ramye ash kusu ne ya?
Shomo echi ramye ash na. Inambe gusu ne yakun, echi nure ash okaibe ka Utarapa orowa a en korep ne,—Utarapa ne Yesu anak ne aekoshi anchikara ta pan uk;
orowa, yaiiraige ki okere chiki, meshpa, aige, ene itak-hi:—Tambe anak echi utara gusu an ku netobake ne, En eshkarun gusu tap korachi echi ki yan, ani itak.
Nei no korachi ibe okere chiki tuki ne yakka koro wa ene itak-hi:—Tan tuki anak ne ashiri aeuitaknup gusu an ku kem ne: hembara ne yakka echi ku ita En eshkarun gusu tambe ki yan, ani itak.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, hembara ne yakka tan pan echi ibe henhem ki, tuki echi iku hemhem ki chiki, Utarapa ek pakno Shinuma rai ambe echi assuru ashte ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, nen ne yakka oripak shomoki no nei pan ibe hene ki, Utarapa koro tuki iku hene ki guru anak ne, Utarapa kon netobake newa koro kem gusu katpak ki ruwe ne.
Koroka, ainu anak ne yaikota eyaiuwande, orowa no nei pan ibe hemhem ki, nei tuki iku hemhem ki yan.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, ibe hemhem ki, iku hemhem ki guru anak ne nei netobake esanniyo shomoki chiki, yaikota gusu akokatpakte an ambe ibe hene ki, iku hene ki ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tap ambe gusu, echi tumugeta okai inne utara turasak wa tashum ki, orowa, mokoro utara shomo moyo ruwe ne.
Koroka, chi utara anak ne yaikota yaiesanniyo chiki shomo akoipishi ruwe ne.
Koroka, akoipishi ita moshiri tura no iteki akokatpakte kuni ne Utarapa orowa no apakashnu ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, ku iriwak utara, ibe gusu echi uwekarapa ita, uweuntere yan.
Echi uwekarapa ambe anak ne iteki akokatpakte an kuni ne sambe-chinoiba guru an chiki koro chisei taibe yan. Shui, moshimap anak ne ku ek ita ku oupekare kusu ne na.
Iriwak utara, ramat unbe gusu, echi utara eramushkare-i ku kopan.
Echi utara Oya utara echi ne a rapoketa, echi rengaine atura korachi, shomo itak potoki otta echi atura nisa ruwe ne sekoro echi eraman.

Tambe gusu, nen ne yakka Ramat chiitakte gusu Yesu ANATEMA ne sekoro ye guru isama ari an ambe echi nure ash ruwe ne; shui, Ashkanne ramat chiitakte gusu shomoki yakne,—Yesu Utarapa ne sekoro nen ne yakka ye eaikap ruwe ne na.
Aeikrap anak ne usaine okai koroka, une no an Ramat ne.
Yaishieiwangere ambe anak ne usaine okai, koroka, une no an Utarapa ne.
Iki ikip ki kuni-hi anak ne usaine okai, koroka, obitta no okaibe oshiketa nep ne yakka iki Kamui anak, une no an Kamui ne ruwe ne.
Koroka, utara pishno otta ani aeyaiepirikare kuni gusu Ramat asange wa akoropare nisa ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Shinen otta wayashnu itak Ramat ani akore; moshima guru otta une no an Ramat orowa eramush itak akoropare:
Shinen otta une no an Ramat gusu eishokoro kuni ambe an; moshima guru otta nei shine Ramat iwangere kuni an aeikrap akoropare; Shinen anak ne kiroro un ikip akire;
moshima guru auweingare; orowa shinen anak ne ramat uwandere: moshima guru anak oya moshirʼun itak ani ayere; shui, moshima guru anak ne oya moshirʼun itak itasare;
koroka, shine Ramat, une no an ramat rengaine utara otta pishno shinep range obitta tap okaibe eimek ruwe ne na.
Netobake anak ne shinep ne wa inne awehe koro, orowa, netobake koro obitta no okai awehe innep ne wa shine netobake ne korachi; tapne nei no Kiristo ne yakka an ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, Yudea un guru ne yakka Herenes un guru ne yakka, ausshiunere guru ne yakka, rengaine an guru ne yakka shine Ramat ani chi utara obitta shine netobake otta baptisma akore nisa ruwe ne; aine, shine Ramat aikure nisa ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, netobake anak ne shine awehe patek shomo ne,
koroka innep ne ruwe ne. Chikiri anak ne, Kuani anak teke shomo ku ne gusu netobake unbe shomo ku ne ruwe ne ari itak chiki, tambe gusu, netobake unbe shomo ne ruwe he an?
Shui, kisaraha anak ne, Kuani anak shikihi shomo ku ne gusu netobake unbe shomo ku ne ruwe ne ari itak chiki, tambe gusu, netobake unbe shomo ne ruwe he an?
E koro ramne netobake anak ne shiki patek ne chiki, inu mondum neita an ruwe he an? E koro ramne netobake anak ne inu mondum patek ne chiki hura-nu mondum neita an ruwe he an?
Koroka, Kamui anak ne tane rengaine pishno an awehe nei netobake otta ande nisa ruwe ne.
Aige, nei ambe anak ne ouse shine awehe ne chiki, nei netoba neita an ruwe he an?
Koroka, tane chi utara anak ne inne awehe ne a koroka, shine netobake chi ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, shikihi anak ne teke otta, kuani e erannak ruwe ne ari itak eaikap: shui, sapa anak ne teke otta, kuani e erannak na ari ye eaikap ruwe ne.
Ara shomo, koroka, netobake ta okai iyotta kiroro sak awehe anak kasu no okai kunip ne ruwe ne:
orowa, pokashnu aeoripak kuni ari ayainu awehe gusu, nei okaibe kasu no eoripak ruwe ne; aige, anukara kuni ipokashbe chitomtere ruwe ne; koroka, shiretokbe anak chitomtere kunip shomo ne na:
Kamui anak ne nei netobake uweunu nisa, aine, eikohayep otta kasu no eoripakte nisa ruwe ne;
tambe anak ne netobake otta utumkushbe isam ruwe ne gusu ne na; samata, nei awehe anak ne utashpa uwe-eyam kuni gusu ne ruwe ne.
Shui, shine awehe ramushitne yakun, obitta no okai awehe tura no ramushitne ruwe ne; orowa, shine awehe airamye yakun, obitta no okai awehe tura no nupetne ruwe ne.
Echi utara anak ne Kiristo kon netobake ne, orowa, okai kuni gusu an ushike kotuk awehe echi ne ruwe ne.

Orowa, Kamui anak ne koro karisia oshiketa utara are okere, hoshiki no anak ne Apostoro utara ne, tu-otutanup anak ne uweingara utara ne, re ikinne an ap anak ne epakashnu utara ne, orowa, kiroro unbe okai, orowa, utara iwangere gusu an irenga okai, ikashiube okai, esapane utara okai, usa okai itak kutchama eraman utara okai ruwe ne.
Obitta no okai utara anak ne Apostoro utara ne ruwe? Obitta no okai utara anak epakashnu utara ne ruwe?
Obitta no okai utara kiroro unbe iki ya? Obitta no okai utara anak ne iwangere kuni irenga koro ya? Obitta no okai utara anak oya moshirʼun itak ani itak ya?
Obitta no okai utara itak itasare ya? Koroka, shiarikiki no iyotta pase eikra-irenga oshkoro yan. Shui, naa pirika ruhu kuani echi nukare ash na.
Usa okai ainu itak ani hene Kamui hauturumbe itak ani hene ku itak yakka, omap ambe ku sak chiki, humi ash shiunin kani hene, iyenenumba nyohachi hene korachi ku ne ruwe ne.

Orowa, uweingara ku ki, nep ne yakka okai mukkep newa aeramu kuni ambe ku eraman yakka; shui, nupuri moimoyegere pakno an obitta no okai eishokor-i ku goro yakka, omap ambe ku sak chiki, raka isambe ku ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, utara ibere gusu obitta no okai ku korobe ku sange hene ki, auhuyeka gusu ku netobake kore hene ki yakka, omap ambe ku sak chiki, en epirikare shomoki ruwe ne.
Omap ambe anak ne ramushiporore wa ramuhaugep ne; omap ambe anak ne shomo eyaitunnap ki; omap ambe anak ne shomo shiokunnere,
shomo pittarane, shomo-yaikatanu ambe shomo ki,
yaikota korobe shomo hunara, shomo irushka, wenbe shomo esanniyo, oupeka-sakbe gusu shomo nupetne,
koroka, son no ambe tura enupetne ruwe ne; nep ne yakka kamure, nep ne yakka eishokoro, nep ne yakka echipachipa, nep ne yakka yaishiporore ruwe ne.
Omap ambe anak ne ramma pakno shomo aokere: koroka, uweingara ki ambe an chiki aisamka kusu ne; usa itak ani ye ambe an chiki aokere; aeramushbe an chiki aisamka kusu ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, nimara ani chi eraman, nimara ani uweingara chi ki,
koroka, aeramushinne okaibe ek chiki, nei nimara ani an okaibe anak ne aisamka kusu ne.

Kuani anak ne pon guru ku an ita, pon guru korachi ku ye, pon guru korachi yainu, pon guru korachi ku esanniyo nisa ruwe ne: rupne guru pakno ku shukup an ita, pon guru okaibe oyak ta ku ande nisa ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, tane anak ne homanno yaikunnukarabe ani chi nukara; koroka, nei ita anak ne uwenitomom no nukan kusu ne ruwe ne: tane anak ne nimara ani ku eraman; koroka, nei ta anak kuani ka ara a en aeraman korachi, ara ku eraman kusu ne.
Orowa, tane anak eishokor-i hemhem, chipachipa-ambe hemhem, omap-ambe hemhem an, tan re okaibe an; koroka, tap otta iyotta pasep anak ne omap ambe ne ruwe ne na.
Omap ambe keseamba yan; yakka, makangane uweingara ki eashkai kuni ne ramuosshi wano ramat unbe kon rusui no okai yan.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, oya un itak ani ye gurʼanak ne ainu utara otta itak shomoki, koroka, Kamui otta itak ruwe ne, ainu anak ne itak inu shomoki ruwe ne, koroka, ramat ani mukkep ye ruwe ne.
Uweingara ki guru anak ne aroshikire gusu hemhem, aomaoma gusu hemhem, onishnishi gusu hemhem ki ruwe ne.
Oya un itak ani ye gurʼanak ne yairoshkire ruwe ne, koroka, uweingara ki guru anak ne karisia roshkire ruwe ne.

Echi utara obitta oya un itak ani ye yak pirika, koroka, makangane echi uweingara kuni ku kon rusui ruwe ne: aine, karisia aroshikire kuni ne itak itasare shomoki yakun uweingara ki guru anak ne oya un itak ani ye guru kasu no pirika ruwe ne.

Koroka, tane iriwak utara, ku ek ita oya un itak ani ye, aige, anukarape gusu hene, eramushbe gusu hene, uweingarape gusu hene, epakashnu ambe gusu hene ku iki shomoki yakun hemanda echi epirikare ash kusu ne ya?
Inotu sak no an okaibe poka, fuyetop yakka, koto yakka, humi aashte ita, uweshinnai no rek shomoki chiki, hemanda ani aashte hawe arekte hawe araman an a?
Inambe gusu ne yakun, nei rappa anak ne utomutne hawe asange yakun, tumi gusu yaishipini guru nen ne ruwe he an?
Tambe nei no echi utara poka, aeramu kuni isaika an itak ani itak ye shomoki chiki, aye orushpe hunna eraman kusu ne ya? kiyannakun, rera otta aye-hi nep koro an na.
Moshiri otta inne no okai uweshinnai no an hawe an, aige, ikkewe sak no an hawe isam nangoro.
Tambe gusu itak hawe ikkeu ku erampeutek chiki; itak sange guru gusu oya kotan un guru korachi ku nu, orowa, itak sange guru ne yakka en gusu oya kotan un guru korachi ne nangoro.
Tambe nei no echi utara ne yakka ramat unbe gusu seisek keutum koro wa gusu, echi iki hine karisia ashte kuni ne hunara yan.
Tambe gusu, oya un itak ani ye guru anak ne nei itak itasare kuni ne inonno itak akirero.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, oya un itak ani ku inonno itak chiki, ku ramat inonno-itak ruwe ne, a koroka, ku eraman mondum anak ibehe sak ruwe ne na.
Yakun, nekon ne ya? Kuani anak ne ramat ani ne yakka, eraman mondum ne yakka, inonno-itak ku ki kusu ne; ramat ani ne yakka, eraman mondum ani ne yakka, shinotcha ku ki kusu ne na.
Ramat ani e nunuke chiki, eram-sak nepkoro an guru e ye itak ikkeu erampeutek gusu, nekon a iki wa e koyaiiraige ita shinuma anak ne Amen ari itak ya?
Eani anak ne pirika no yaiiraige ki a koroka, moshima an guru anak ne aashte shomoki ruwe ne.
Echi utara obitta kasu no inne no okai oya un itak ani ku itak gusu Kamui ku koyaiiraige ash na:
yakka, karisia tumta nei chiki Oya un itak ani shine ichi man itak ani aye-hi kasu no, ani moshima utaia epakashnu gusu ashikne aeraman no an itak ani ku ye kuni ku konoburu ruwe ne.
Iriwak utara, keutum gusu iteki pon utara ramkoro yan: yakka wenbe gusu aiai korachi okai, koroka,

keutum gusu rupne utara nei no okai yan. Tuitak kata ene chieshinnuye wa an na:—Oya un itak koro utara ani, Oya un utara koro papush ani, kuani tan uirup otta ku itak kusu ne; aige, nei no iki yakka i en nu shomoki kusu ne, sekoro Utarapa ye ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, Oya un itak ani aye-hi anak ne shirosh-i ne ruwe ne, eishokoro okere utara gusu shomo ne, koroka, eishokoro shomoki utara gusu an ap ne.

Tambe gusu karisia un utara obitta uwekarapa wa okai ita, aige, obitta oya un itak ani ye yakun, aine, eram-sak guru hene eishokoro shomoki guru hene ahup chiki, echi utara chiitasare ruwe ne, ari nei utara ye shomoki ruwe he an?
Koroka, utara obitta uweingara chiki, aine, eishokoro shomoki guru hene, eram-sak guru hene, ahun yakun, shinuma obitta no okai utara gusu akokatpakte, obitta no okai utara gusu akoipishi ruwe ne;
keutum ta aeshinap anak ne asarare an; aige, nei guru nanu shirikamu wa Kamui koongami hine nei Kamui echi tumugeta an kunak ye kusu ne na.
Yakun, nekon a iriwak utara? Echi utara uwekarapa ita pishno pishno iyohaiochish an, epakashi an, aeramandep an, oya itak an, itak itasare ambe an. Nep ne yakka utara ashte gusu aki kuni kara yan.
Nenka oya itak ani ye guru an chiki, tun hene, iyotta inne ne yakun, ren hene uwokari no kire yan:
samata, Shinen itak itasarare yan: koroka, itak itasare guru isam chiki, nei karisia tumta shinuma mo no an kuni ki yan; samata, yaiotta hene Kamui otta hene itakte yan.
Orowa, uweingara utara tun ren range itakte, aige, moshima okai utara nei itak uwandere yan.
Koroka nei samaketa a guru otta aeramandep an chiki, hoshiki no an guru mo no an yak pirika.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, echi utara obitta shinen shinen ne uweingara ki eashkai, aige, obitta no okai utara aepashnu wa aonishnishi kuni gusu ne na,
orowa, uweingara kuni gusu an ramat anak ne uweingara utara aitaknure ruwe ne;
inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui anak ne achatchari ambe koro Kamui shomo ne, itomo koro Kamui ne, ashkanne utara ne obitta no okai karisia otta an korachi nep ne ruwe ne.
Karisia onnaigeta shiwentep anak ne mo no an yak pirika: nei utara ye kuni shomo aeramuoshma, koroka, tuitak ta aye-hi korachi, nei utara aitaknurere yan ari an ambe an ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, nei utara nepka nu rusui chiki, koro uni ta koro hoku otta uwepekennu yak pirika: inambe gusu ne yakun, karisia oshiketa shiwentep ye-hi anak ne yainikoroshma ambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Hemanda? Kamui itak anak ne echi utara orowa no san ambe ne ruwe he an? Shui, echi utara orun patek nei ambe ek nisa ruwe he an?
Koroka, nenka uweingara guru hene ne, ramat un guru hene ne kuni yaiyainu guru an chiki, echi orun ku nuye okaibe anak Utarapa ikashpaotte ne sekoro eraman no an yak pirika.
Koroka, nenka erampeutek guru an chiki erampeutek no an yan.
Tambe gusu, ku iriwak utara, uweingara kuni ambe shiarikiki no hunara yan, aige, oya un itak ani ye ambe iteki hattoki.
Koroka, nep ne yakka irammakaka ikiri an no aki kuni iki yan.
Orowa, iriwak utara, echi otta eupaskuma ki a pirika shongo echi eramande ash na, nei ambe echi koro;
otta echi roshki, gusu ka echi kashiaobiuki ruwe ne, nekon a itak ani echi otta nei ambe eupaskuma ku ki-hi ani, raka isam no echi eishokoro shomoki no nei ap echi shikkashima chiki echi nure ash na.
Echi utara otta iyotta hoshiki no ku sangep anak, Kamui kambi-sosh kata chieshinnuye wa an korachi, Kiristo anak ne chikoro katpak gusu rai wa iyurui orota aomare;
orowa shui, Kamui kambi-sosh kata anuye wa an korachi rereko an ita hetopo-a-shiknure;
awa, Kepas otta yainukara; okaketa, nei tu niu ikashima wa niu otta hemhem;
orowa, ashikne ik ikashima an iriwak utara arashuianda yainukara, nei utara poro sereke tane pakno okai, koroka, nei utara tumugeta okai sereke mokonnoye ruwe ne;
nei okaketa Yakob otta yainukara; okaketa, obitta no okai Apostoro otta yainukara;
orowa, iyotta okaketa, epa kuni an ita hetuku an korachi en otta ne yakka yainukara nisa ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, kuani anak ne Apostoro un utara iyotta ponbe ne. Apostoro ani a en ye kuni ka eikohaye guru ku ne ruwe ne, Kamui koro karisia epokba nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Koroka, Kamui irenga gusu kuani ku an korachi okaibe ku ne ruwe ne; orowa, a en koropare Shinuma koro irenga anak ne seenne raka isam no a en koropare ruwe ne sekoro anukara; koroka, obitta no okai nei utara kasu no kuani naa poron no ku monraige nisa ruwe ne na: yakka, kuani shomo ne, koroka, a en koropare Kamui irenga iki ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, nei ambe kuani ne a yakka, nei utara ne a yakka, nei no upaskuma chiki, orowa, nei no echi eishokon nisa ruwe ne na.
Aige, Kiristo anak ne rai orowa no hetopo-ashiknure okere ari an ambe aeupaskuma chiki, nekon a echi tumugeta an sereke utara anak ne rai orowa no hetopo-shiknu ambe isam ari itak ya?
Koroka, rai orowa no hetopo-shiknu ambe isam chiki Kiristo anak ne shomo hetopo-a-shiknure na:
orowa, Kiristo shomo hetopo-a-shiknure chiki, chi eupaskuma ambe anak ne raka isam, samata, aeishokor-i ne yakka raka isam ruwe ne.

Ruwe un, chi utara anak ne Kamui gusu shunge paweteshu utara ne kuni anukara ruwe ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui anak ne Kiristo hetopo-shiknure nisa ruwe ne sekorʼorushpe gusu Kamui koro paweteshu utara chi ne: aige, rai utara hetopo-a-shiknure shomoki chiki, Shinuma anak shomo Kiristo hetopo-shiknure nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, rai utara shomo hetopo-a-shiknure chiki, Kiristo ne yakka shomo hetopo-a-shiknure ruwe ne:
orowa, Kiristo anak no shomo hetopo-a-shiknure yakun echi koro eishokor-i anak raka-sakbe ne; echi chikokatpak oshiketa tane poka echi okai ruwe ne na.
Orosama, Kiristo oshiketa mokoro utara aisamka okere ruwe ne.
Aige, tane an ishu-i rapoke patek Kiristo gusu chipachipa chiki, obitta no okai moshima utara kasu no shi no eyaisambepokash utara chi ne ruwe ne na.
Koroka, tane Kiristo anak ne rai orowa no hetopo-a-shiknure, mokoro wa okai utara koro atpake an aro-ibehe ne ruwe ne.
Ainu gusu rai ambe an korachi, ainu gusu rai guru hetopo-a-shiknure ambe ne yakka an ruwe ne.
Adam gusu utara obitta rai korachi, Kiristo gusu utara obitta ashiknure kusu ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, utara ebitta nei ikiri an korachi ne: hoshiki no Kiristo; orowa no, Shinuma ek ita,

Kiristo koro utara ne ruwe ne. Orowa no shiokere-i an, nei ita Shinuma Michi ne Kamui otta moshiri koropare kusu ne, nei ita Shinuma obitta no okai esapane-i hene obitta no okai mondum hene kiroro hene isamka kusu ne a an na.
Orowa, Shinuma epokba obitta no okai utara ani koro chikiri choropoketa aande pakno esapane kusu ne gusu ne na.
Iyotta okaketa aisamka kuni epokbap anak ne rai-ambe ne ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, obitta no okaibe itaknure wa koro chikiri choropoketa ande kusu ne gusu ne na. Koroka, obitta no okaibe itaknure ari an itak ani ye chiki, Shinuma orowa no obitta no okaibe itaknurere guru anak ne umoshma no a an ruwe ne sekorʼambe aeramu ambe ne ruwe tapan na.

Orowa, obitta no okaibe Shinuma orowa no aitaknure chiki, nei ita Poho anak obitta no okaibe itaknurere guru otta yaikota yai-itakanure kusu ne, Kamui anak ne obitta no okaibe otta esapanep ne kuni gusu ne na.
Shomo ne chiki, rai-guru gusu baptisma akore utara anak ne nekon a ki kusu ne ya? Rai-guru hetopo-a-shiknure shomoki yakun, hemanda nei utara gusu baptisma akore ruwe he an?
Nep gusu ramma ayaikikipi otta chi utara ne yakka okai ya?
Iriwak utara, Chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo otta echi utara rengap ani ku yaikopuntek gusu, kesto ku rai ruwe ne,

ani an ambe ani ku ye ruwe ne. Ainu korachi Epesos kotan ta chikoikip tura ku koiki yakka, nep a en epirikarep an a? Rai-guru hetopo-ashiknure shomoki chiki, hetak, nishatta rai ash kusu ne gusu ibe hemhem ki iku hemhem ki yanro.
Iteki aeyaikokandama yan; wen utara tura ukookai ambe anak ne pirika buri wendep ne ruwe ne.
Oupeka an no mosh wa iteki katpak ki: an utara anak ne Kamui eramushkare ruwe ne gusu ne na: echi utara ayainikoroshmare kuni gusu tambe ku ye ruwe ne.
Koroka, rai-guru hembara hetopo-a-shiknure ya? Orowa, nekon a netobake koro wa araki ya? ani ye guru an nangoro.
Ramusak guru, aokai yaikota e etoitap anak ne rai shomoki chiki ashiknure shomoki ruwe ne.
Orowa, e etoitap anak ne okaketa an kusu ne a netobake shomo ne, ouse atusa piyehe num ne, mungi hene moshima okaibe hene ne ruwe ne; koroka,
Kamui rengaine nei ambe otta netobake kore, pishno an piye num otta kon netobake koropare ruwe tapan na.
Obitta ne okai kam anak ne ukorachi an kam shomo ne; koroka, ainu kam an, moshima chikoikip kam ka an, chiri kam ka an, chep korobe ne yakka an ruwe ne.
Kando un netobake ka okai, toi kata an netobake okai; koroka, kando umbe koro nupeki anak ne shinep ne, toi kata an okaibe koro nupeki moshimap ne ruwe ne.
Tokap chup nupeki an, moshima okai kunne chup nupeki an, shui, nochiu nupeki an ruwe ne; nupeki gusu nochiu anak ne uweshinnai ruwe ne.
Rai-guru hetopo-a-shiknure-i ne yakka nei no an ruwe ne.
Munin kunip ne wa aetoita; shomo munin kunip hetopo-a-shiknure: akoatcha an no aetoita; nupeki an no hetopo-a-shiknure:

katchak an no aetoita; kiroro an no hetopo-a-shiknure: rengaine an nepkoro netobake ne aetoita; ramat umbe ne hetopo-ashiknure. Rengaine an nepkoro netobake an chiki, ramat un netobake ne yakka an ruwe ne.
Ene anuye wa an korachi:—Hoshike no an Ainu ne Adam anak ne shiknu ramat ne. Iyoshi no an Adam anak shiknure ramat ne ruwe ne.
Koroka, Ramat umbe anak ne hoshiki no an ap shomo ne; nei rengaine an nepkoro an ap hoshiki no an ambe ne ruwe ne; orowa no,
Ramat umbe an ruwe ne. Hoshiki no an ainu anak ne toi orowa no an wa toi-ushbe ne; tutanu an ainu kando orowa no an ambe ne.
Toi-ushbe an korachi, moshima okai toi-ushbe ne yakka ene ani ne; orowa, nei kando umbe an korachi, moshima okai kando umbe shem korachi ne.
Orowa, toi-ush guru koro nokaha chi koro wa sei korachi, kando un guru koro nokaha ne yakka a sei kusu ne na.
Iriwak utara, tambe ku ye:—Kam newa kem anak ne Kamui moshiri eikeshkoro eaikap ruwe ne; samata, munin kunip anak ne shomo muninbe eikeshkoro shomoki ruwe ne.

Ingara yan, mukke an ap echi nure ash na:—Obitta no okai chi utara anak ne mokoro shomoki kusu ne, koroka, ekushkonna, shine shik inraprapu otta, okaketa rappa hau aashte ita anak ne, chi utara aitasare no akara kusu ne;
inambe gusu ne yakun, nei rappa humi aashte wa rai utara anak iteki munin kuni-hi otta hetopo-a-shiknure,
orowa, chi utara aitasare kusu ne gusu ne na. Tan munin kuni an ambe anak ne shomo munin kunip utomchiure, tan rai kuni ambe anak shomo rai-ambe kunip utomchiure etokush ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Koroka, tan munin kuni okaibe anak ne shomo muninbe ani mire, orowa tan rai kuni ambe shomo rai-ambe utomchiure chiki, nei ita:—Rai-i aannokara wa aisamka sekorʼan itak auweomare kusu ne gusu ne a ambe ne ruwe ne.
Aa rai-ambe, E koro annokara kuni mondum neita an ruwe?
Aa rai-ambe, e koro ai nei ita an ruwe he an? Rai-ambe koro ai anak ne katpak ne;
katpak koro kiroro anak tuitak ne: koroka, chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo gusu un annokare Kamui otta koyaiiraige na.

Tambe gusu, ku omap an iriwak ne utara, kiroro atte wa moimoyege shomoki no okai yan, ramma Utarapa gusu ki kuni ikip kara yan; Utarapa gusu ki kuni ikip shomo raka-sakbe ne sekoro ku eraman ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tane, ashkanne utara gusu eungeraitep umomare ambe gusu, Garatea un karisia utara otta ku ikashpaotte korachi,
nei no echi iki yan. Kuani ku ek ita eungeraitep iteki umomare kuni ne, echi utara pishno aeyaiepirikare an nei no mawari atpake an toho ta eumashnu yan.
Orowa, ku ek ita, kambi ani echi numge utara, nei utara Yerusarem kotan orun echi sange eungeraitep koro wa paye kuni ku payere kusu ne:
orowa, kuani ne yakka oman kuni oupak ne chiki, en tura no paye kusu ne na.
Koroka, Makedonia moshiri akush okere chiki echi orota ku ek kushki;
Makedonia moshiri ku kush kusu ne gusu ne na: koroka, echi tura no ku reushi hene, mata riya hene poka ku ki ya aerampeutek a yakka ku oman ushike echi en omande kuni gusu nep ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, ouse payekai rapoke patek echi nukara ash rusui shomoki, koroka, Utarapa ramuoshma chiki, irukai echi tura no an kuni ku chipachipa ruwe ne.
Koroka, Pentekoste pakno Epesos kotan ta ku riya kusu ne;
inambe gusu ne yakun, en gusu poro newa iki kuni eashkai apa asarare wa an, samata, epokba utara inne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Temoteos ek chiki, shinuma ishitoma shomoki no an kuni kara yan; inambe gusu ne yakun, kuani poka iki korachi, shinuma ne yakka Utarapa moni iki ruwe ne:

tambe gusu inan guru ne yakka shomo shinuma epange yak pirika. Koroka, shinuma en orun ek eashkai kuni ne, itomo an no payekaire wa en kore yan: iriwak utara tura shinuma an kuni ku chipachipa ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Koroka, iriwak ne Aporros gusu anak, utara tura no echi orun shinuma ek kuni shiarikiki no ku onishnishi nisa ruwe ne: a koroka, tane ek kuni ambe anak ne aeaikapbe ne; yakka, eashkai ita ek kusu ne na.
Shiruwande yan, eishokor-i atte wa nishuwamne no roshki yan, okkaiyo ramkoro yan, yaitumashnure yan.
Nep ne yakka echi ikichi ambe anak ne omap ki gusu ikichi yan.
Iriwak utara, (Stepanas chisei un utara anak ne Akaya moshiri un aro-ibehe ne, orosama, nei utara anak ne ashkanne utara gusu yaishieiwangere kuni gusu yaiatte nisa ruwe ne sekorʼambe echi eraman,)
nei no okai utara otta hene, tap ikip gusu iki wa monraige pishno an guru otta hene echi itaknu kuni kuani echi onishnishi ash ruwe ne.
Orowa, Stepanas newa Portunatos newa Akaikos hene araki an gusu ku yaikopuntek ruwe ne: inambe gusu echi utara gusu an eikohayep anak ne nei utara sange nisa ruwe ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, nei utara anak ne ku ramat ne yakka echi kon ramat ne yakka sambe shiturire nisa: tambe gusu nei no okai utara orun ramuoshma yan.
Asia un karisia utara echi ekap na. Akiras newa Priska anak ne koro chisei ta an karisia tura poron no echi ekap na.
Obitta no okai iriwak utara echi ekap. Ashkanne chopsekara ambe ani utashpa uwekap yan.
Kuani ne Pauros anak ne yaikota koro teke ani echi ekap na.
Utarapa shomo ko-omap guru an chiki, aiyoitakushi an na.
Utarapa ek. Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo korʼirenga echi tura no an kuni ku koramkoro.
Kiristo Yesu oshiketa echi utara obitta orun ku omap-i an na. Amen.

Kamui irenga ankushkerai Kiristo Yesu koro Apostoro ne Pauros, akoro iriwak ne guru Timoteos tura Korintos kotan ta an Kamui karisia otta hene Akaya moshirʼebitta ta okai ashkanne utara otta hene kambi omande na:
chikoro Michi ne Kamui newa Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo orowa no irenga newa itomo echi gusu an na.
Chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo koro Kamui newa Michi, rampoken newa obitta no okai omaoma ambe koro Michihi airamye an na;
ani chi utara Kamui orowa no aomaoma an nunuke ambe ari, nep aeramchuptek utara chi omaoma eashkai kuni ne, nep aeramchuptekbe chi ki a yakka Shinuma un omaoma ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kiristo ki aeyairamshitnere ambe un gusu nuye an no an korachi, tambe nei no chi ki omaoma ambe poka Kiristo gusu nuye an no an ruwe ne gusu na.

Koroka, chi utara anak ne aeramchuptekka chiki echi aomaoma kuni gusu hene echi kashiaobiuki kuni gusu hene an ambe ne; shui, chi utara aomaoma an chiki, nei ambe anak chi utara poka iki ukorachi an aeramchuptekbe echi ramu-shiroma no eyaishipororere kuni gusu an omaoma ambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na:
echi utara gusu chi iki chipachipa ambe anak ne tumashnu ne; echi utara utura aeyairamchuptekka an korachi aomaoma kusu ne sekorʼambe eraman ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, iriwak utara, Asia moshiri ta iki aeramchuptekbe gusu an orushpe echi erampeutek-hi chi utara kopan ruwe ne; eshiporore kiroro isam pakno yupke no a un shirikirapte an, tane rai kushki sekoro yainu pakno an ambe ne:
ruwe un, chi utara yaikota yai-oshiketa rai kuni aesanniyo-hi an a an, tambe anak chi utara yaiotta yaiekopashte shomoki no, rai guru hetopo-shiknure Kamui eyaikopashte ash kuni gusu ne ambe ne:
Shinuma anak ne ene poro rai ambe orowa no un ohaitare nisa, shui ohaitare kusu ne na: Shinuma naa un kaobiuki kuni ne, gusu chi utara echipachipa shiriki okai ash;
echi utara ne yakka, koramkoro ki hine utura ikashiu ruwe ne; tambe anak, inne utara ankushkerai aikrap a un koropare an gusu, chi utara gusu inne utara yaiiraige ki kuni gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne na.

Chi ki yaiomonnure ika anak ne chikoro keutum iki paweteshu ambe ne, Kamui orowa no an ashkanne ambe newa sonep gusu, kam oma wayashnu-hi ani shomo ne, koroka, Kamui irenga ani moshirʼotta ikip iki, makangane echi utara otta ikichi nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Awa, echi utara orooitak hemhem eraman hemhem moshima nep ne yakka echi gusu shomo chi nuye ruwe ne; aige, okese pakno echi utara nei ambe eraman kuni ku chipachipa ruwe ne:
aine, Utarapa ne Yesu toho ta echi utara gusu chi utara yaiomonnure korachi chi utara ne yakka echi utara gusu yaiomonnure kuni ne, echi utara poka sereke gusu en eraman ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, tap ku eishokoro wa echi utara naa shine irenga akore kuni ne nei etokota echi orun ku oman kuni ku ramu nisa:
aige, echi koro kotan akush chiki Makedonia moshiri ta arapa, orowa shui, Makedonia wano arapa yakun echi orun ek hine Yudea moshiri orun oman gusu a en payekaire kuni gusu ne na.

Tambe gusu, nei no ku ramu ita anak ne koshne keutum ku sange nisa ruwe he an? Ku ramuoshitchiu chiki, en otta “ruwe un,” “ruwe un,” “shomo,” “shomo,” ani an ambe an gusu kam esanniyo wa ku ramuoshitchiu ruwe he an?
Koroka, Kamui anak ne sonep ne gusu echi orun chi ye itak anak ne, “ruwe un,” newa “shomo,” ari an itak ambe shomo ne ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, echi utara tumugeta kuani newa Siruanos newa Timoteos ne chi utara orowa no aeupaskuma Kamui koro Poho Yesu Kiristo anak ne, “ruwe un” newa “shomo” ari an itak ani an ambe shomo ne, koroka, Shinuma gusu “ruwe un” ari an ambe ani ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui eitakamkire ambe anak ne nei oro pakno inne ne a yakka, Shinuma oshiketa nei ambe anak “ruwe un” ne ruwe ne gusu ne na: tambe gusu chi utara gusu Kamui arakuru ankushkerai, Shinuma gusu ne yakka “Amen” ari an ambe an ruwe ne na.
Orosama, echi utara tura no Kiristo gusu un roshkire hemhem ki, un kashiota hemhem ki guru anak ne Kamui ne ruwe ne;
Shinuma anak ne un otta han omare, aine, chikoro sambe oshiketa Ramat emkoso kore nisa ruwe ne.
Koroka, kuani anak ne Korintos orun shomo ek ambe anak ne echi eramu-hauge ash gusu an ambe ne sekoro ku keutum kata Kamui ku konishuk wa ipaweteshure ruwe ne.
Chi utara anak ne echi eishokoro amde enishpane shomoki, koroka, echi nupetne kuni ikashui utara chi ne: eishokor-i an gusu echi roshki ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, shui kuani oknatara wa echi otta shomo ek kuni ambe yaioshiketa ku esanniyo okere.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, kuani echi ramusarakka ash chiki, ku ramusarakka ash utara moshima, en nupetnere guru inan guru ne ruwe he an?

Aige, tap an ambe ku nuye nisa, ikineipeka ku ek ita, gusu ku enupetne kuni utara ankushkerai a en oknatarare ruwe ne kusu ne na; aine, echi utara obitta gusu ku nupetne kusu ne sekoro ku eishokon ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, poron no ku shirikirap hine sambe-ikoni an gusu poron no an nupe tura ku nuye nisa; tambe anak echi ramusarakka gusu shomo ne, koroka, echi gusu ku ki nuye an no an omap ambe echi eraman kuni gusu ne na.
Koroka, ramusarakka guru an chiki, shinuma en ramusarakka shomoki, koroka, (yupke kashpa shomo ku ki gusu) sereke ne yakun, obitta no okai echi utara ramusarakka nisa ruwe ne na.
Nei no an guru anak ne inne utara ankushkerai apanakte ruwe ne gusu, pakno ne ruwe ne;
tambe gusu, echi utara anak ne shinnai-kane nei guru tusare wa omaoma yak pirika, ikineipeka ika nei no an guru ramusarak kashpa wa okere na.
Tapne ne wa gusu, kuani anak ne echi utara nei guru epeka no an omap ambe tumashnure ash
ruwe ne. Tan ikkeu an gusu poka kambi ku nuye nisa, nei ambe anak echi utara obitta no okaibe gusu itaknu ruwe he an ari an ambe shirosh ku eraman kuni gusu ne na.

Koroka, gusu echi utara anak ne okaibe tusare guru, kuani ne yakka tusare ruwe ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, ku tusare okere okaibe anak, atusare ambe an yakun, Kiristo ankushkerai echi rengap gusu ku tusare nisa ruwe ne; tambe anak ne Satan iteki un annokara kuni gusu nep ne:
inambe gusu ne yakun, chi utara anak ne shinuma oshkep gusu erampeutekbe shomo chi ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Kiristo pirika shongo gusu Troas otta ku ek ita, shui, Utarapa oshiketa en gusu apa asarare wa an ita anak ne,
ku iriwak ne Titus shomo anukara gusu ku ramat shiturire eaikap nisa ruwe ne: aige, uwetut-kopak wa Makedonia moshiri orun ku oman nisa ruwe ne.
Koroka, ramma Kiristo oshiketa un ani wa un annokare hemhem ki, obitta no okai ushiketa chi utara ankushkerai koro eramushbe hura assuru ashte hemhem ki Kamui otta koyaiiraige an na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, kashichiobiuki shiri an utara otta ne yakka, aisamka shiri an utara otta ne yakka chi utara anak ne Kamui orota Kiristo koro pirika hura ushbe chi ne ruwe ne;
oatteke an utara gusu rai wano rai otta an hura ne; oatteke an utara otta inotu wano inotu otta an hura ne ruwe ne gusu ne na. Aige, tapan okaibe gusu upakno an guru inan guru ne ruwe he an?

Chi utara anak ne Kamui itak eoyap kopoye shiriki inne utara nepkoro shomo chi ne: koroka, an korachi nepkoro ki utara, Kamui orowa no an korachi; Kamui tek-samata an korachi, Kiristo oshiketa chi ye ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Chi utara anak ne kanna-shui yaieamkirire heashi ya? Shui, an utara korachi, echi otta hene echi orowa no hene a un eamkirire kambi un gusu an kuni ambe ne ruwe he an?
Echi utara, anak ne chikoro keutum ta anuye wa an, obitta no okai utara orowa no aorooitak an,

chikoro kambi echi ne ruwe ne; echi utara anak ne Kiristo koro kambi ne sekoro anukarabe ne, un orowa no aeiyaishieiwangere utara echi ne, sumi ani anuye ambe shomo ne, koroka, ishu Kamui kon ramat ani anuye utara echi ne; shuma ita kata shomo ne, koroka, kam oma ita kata chieshinnuyep ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, Kiristo gusu Kamui orun nei no an
eishokor-i atte keutum chikon ruwe ne: chi utara orowa no nep ka an sekoro aeyaiesanniyo upakbe shomo chi ne, koroka, chikoro upak no an ambe anak ne Kamui orowa no an ap ne:

Shinuma ka nei ashiri uitaknup gusu upak no an yaishieiwangere utara ne kuni un kara nisa ruwe ne; anuye ikiri gusu shomo ne, koroka, nei ramat gusu ne ruwe ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, anuye ikiri anak ne raige ruwe ne, koroka, ramat anak ne shiknure ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Koroka, anuye wa an, shuma kata shinnuye wa an rai-hi gusu aeiwangere ambe anak ne, koro nanuhu nupeki an gusu Israeru un utara anak Mose koro sancha orun ingara eaikap pakno, aisamka gusu an nupeki ek yakun,
nekon a ramat gusu aeiwangere ambe naa kasu no nupeki-ushbe shomo ne ruwe he an?
Inambe gusu ne yakun, katpak kore gusu an aeiwangere ambe anak ne nupeki ne chiki, oupekare gusu an aeiwangere ambe anak nupeki gusu kasu no nuye an no nupeki-ushbe ne ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, son no newa, eikaunu an no an nupeki an gusu, anupekte an ambe anak ne ene nei no shomo anupekte nisa ruwe ne.
Okere wa isambe anak ne nupeki-ushbe ne chiki, kasu no isam shomoki ambe anak nupek otta an ambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tap korachi an chipachipa ambe chi koro gusu, shiri rametok koro itak chi eiwange ruwe ne;
aige, okere kusu ne shiri an okaibe okese Israeru un utara kashioingara shomoki kuni ne nankamup ani koro nanu seshke Mose ukorachi shomo chi ne ruwe ne.

Koroka, nei utara koro keutum anishtere an: inambe gusu ne yakun, tane an etohogeta pakno fushko aeuitaknu kambi oroaoitak ita, nei nankamup auk shomoki no an ruwe ne; awa, Kiristo oshiketa nei ambe aisamka nisa ruwe ne na.
Koroka, tanto pakno, hembara ne yakka Mose oroaoitak an ita anak ne nei utara koro keutum kata nankamup an wa an ruwe ne.
Koroka, hembara ne yakka shinuma anak Utarapa orun hosari yakun, nei nankamup auk ruwe ne.
Utarapa anak ne nei Ramat ne ruwe ne: aige, Utarapa kon Ramat an ushiketa rengaine an ambe an ruwe ne.

Koroka, obitta no okai chi utara anak ne nankamup isam no yaikunnu-karape otta an nei no Utarapa koro nupeki nukara hine Ramat ne Utarapa orowa no an korachi poka nupeki wano nupeki otta nei shinep ne an noka nepkoro a un ekarakara an ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu, chi utara anak ne tan yaishieiwangere gusu an kunip koro wa okai gusu, aerampokiwen wa akore korachi shomo ramurai ruwe ne:

koroka, anuina wa okai gusu yainikoroshma kuni ambe chi emaka wa, irarabe gusu apkash shomoki, samata, Kamui itak shunge no eiwange shomoki ruwe ne; koroka, sonep nukare gusu Kamui tek-samata obitta no okai utara koro keutum otta yaikota yaiashte ruwe ne.
Koroka, chi ye pirika shongo akamure chiki, aisamka korʼan utara gusu akamure ruwe ne:

tan moshiri gusu an Kamui anak ne eumbipka utara koro keutum shiknakte nisa ruwe ne; Kamui nokaha ne Kiristo koro nupeki otta an pirika shongo oma pekere anak naa shomo nei utara orun hetuku kuni gusu ne na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, chi utara anak ne yaieupas-kuma shomoki, koroka, Kiristo Yesu anak Utarapa ne korachi an orushpe eupaskuma ki, samata, Yesu korʼirenga gusu chi utara anak echi koro uitek utara chi ne sekorʼambe eupaskuma ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Yesu Kiristo koro nanuhu otta Kamui nupeki gusu an eramanbe oma pekere koropare kuni gusu chikoro keutum ta pekere kotomka Kamui anak ne kunne-i wano pekere at kusu ne, ari an itak ani ye Kamui ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, nei shiri poro kiroro anak ne un orowa no shomo ne, Kamui orowa no an kuni gusu, toitoi op oshiketa chi utara tan ikoro kon ruwe ne;
hunak peka wano ne yakka aeurarapa an a yakka, shomo yairamkoiki ruwe ne; keutum chiutumashbare an a yakka, shomo ramu-nin; aekeseamba an a yakka, shomo akohoppa an;
ahachire an a yakka, shomo aisamka an na;
Yesu koro inotu poka chikon netobake oshiketa anukara kuni ne, ramma kane akon netobake otta Yesu araige ambe sei shiri an ruwe ne.
Yesu koro inotu poka chikoro rai kuni kam oshiketa anukara kuni ne, ishu wa okai chi utara anak ne ramma kane Yesu rengap gusu rai-i orota aekoshi shiriki an ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu rai ambe anak ne un onnaigeta iki ruwe ne, koroka, inotu anak ne echi onnaigeta iki shiriki.

Koroka, ukorachi an eishokor-i oma ramat chikoro hine ene ene chieshinnuye wa an korachi,—Ku eishokon nisa, tambe gusu ku ye ruwe ne; chi utara ne yakka eishokoro, tambe gusu itak ne yakka ki ruwe ne;
Utarapa ne Yesu hetopo-shiknurep anak ne Yesu tura un hetopo-shiknure poka ki hine echi tura no un yange kushki ambe chi eraman shiriki okai ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, obitta no okaibe anak ne echi rengap gusu an ambe ne, tambe anak nei irenga inne utara gusu naa nuye an no akara wa Kamui arakuru ankushkerai koyaiiraige ambe aporore kuni gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu chi utara shomo ramu-rai; koroka, chikoro soige an ainu anak ne munin koran a yakka, onnaigeta an ainu anak ne to pishno ashirikara an ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, irukai patek an kushki chikoro koshne aeramchuptekbe anak ne chi utara gusu naa kasu no kasu no an aokere shomoki pase arakuru kan ruwe ne;

aine, chi utara anak ne anukara okaibe orun ingara shomoki, koroka, shomo anukara okaibe orun ingan ruwe ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, anukara okaibe anak ne aokere kunip ne; koroka, anukara shomoki okaibe anak aokere shomoki kusu ne na.
Chikoro kash ne toitoi oma chisei isam yakun, isam shomoki kando oshiketa Kamui orowa no akarape an, teke ani shomo akarape chisei an ari an ambe chi eraman ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, son no newa chi utara oromande hine kando orowa no an chisei ani aeyaitomchiure kuni eyaikatekara ruwe ne:
aine, aeyaitomchiure chiki atusa korachi shomo anukan na.

Son no poka tan kash oshiketa okai chi utara anak ne pase no ashikere wa oromande; tambe anak ashirarayere rusuibe gusu shomo ne, koroka, kashi chiutomchiure rusuibe gusu ne, aige, rai kuni ambe anak ne inotu ani aruki kuni gusu ne na.
Tap an ambe gusu un kara guru anak ne Kamui ne ruwe ne, aige, Shinuma anak Ramat emkoso un kore nisa ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu ramma rametok koro, aige, koro uni ne netobake ta okai rapoketa, Utarapa wa eoyake an ari an ambe chi eraman (inambe gusu ne yakun,
chi utara anak ne nukarabe gusu shomo ne koroka eishokor-i gusu apkash ash ruwe ne); chi utara rametok koro ari ku ye,
aige, netobake ande wa Utarapa tura unita an rusui ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, unita ne yakka, oyakta an yakka Shinuma nupetnere kuni ne iki rusui ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, chi utara anak ne netobake ani chi kichi okaibe gusu, pirikap hene wenbe hene, nei okaibe gusu a un koropare kunip uina kuni ne, pishno pishno Kiristo koro koipishi gusu an amset kotchaketa anukara kusu ne gusu ne na.

Tambe gusu, Utarapa ashitoma ambe eraman gusu, chi utara anak ne ainu utara onishnishi ruwe ne a koroka, Kamui otta aeyainukare an na; aine, echi koro keutum ta ne yakka a un aeyainukare kuni ambe ku chipachipa ruwe ne.
Chi utara anak ne kanna-shui echi otta yaieamkire shiri shomo ki, koroka, soige wa yaiomonnure wa keutum ta iki shomoki utara orun ese itak echi ki eashkai kuni ne,
echi utara yaiomonnure ika akore ruwe ne. Chi utara chiitasare yakun, nei ambe anak Kamui gusu an ambe ne; shui, yaieashirikara yakun, echi utara gusu ne ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kiristo koro omap ambe anak ne un ekarire ruwe ne; Shinen anak ne obitta no okai utara gusu rai nisa, tambe gusu obitta no okai utara rai okere ruwe ne ari chi esanniyo ash ruwe ne;

awa, shiknu wa okai utara anak ne tewa no yaikota gusu ishu shomoki, koroka, nei utara kotchane rai wa hetopo-shiknu guru gusu ishu kuni ne Shinuma anak obitta no okai utara kotchane rai nisa ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, tewa no poka, chi utara anak ne kam gusu an ainu eamkiri shomoki: aige, kam gusu an Kiristo chi eamkiri nisa a yakka, tane anak ne nei no chi eamkiri shomoki ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, inan ne yakka Kiristo oshiketa an chiki, shinuma anak ashiripe ne: fushko okaibe paye wa isama; ingarʼan, ashiripe ne akan nisa ruwe ne.
Koroka, obitta no okaibe Kamui orowa no an ambe ne, awa, Shinuma anak ne Kiristo gusu yaikota epeka un eramuritenka, aige, nei aeramuritenka koeyaishi-eiwangere-hi un kore nisa ruwe ne na;

nei ambe anak ene an ambe ne,—Kamui anak Kiristo oshiketa an wa yai otta moshiri eramuritenka shiriki an, awa, moshiri koro ohaita buri shomo esanniyo; aige, ramuritenka gusu an itak un shikkashimare nisa ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, chi utara anak ne Kiristo gusu ateshkara utara chi ne, Kamui chi utara ani onishnishi shiriki korachi nep.
Chikokatpak eramushkare guru anak ne chi utara gusu akokatpakbe ne akara; tambe anak ne chi utara shinuma oshiketa Kamui oupeka ambe ne akara kuni gusu ne na.
Orowa, ukomonraige wa iteki raka isam no Kamui irenga echi akore kuni ne ne yakka koramkoro ash ruwe ne.
(Anu kuni pirika ita echi otta ku inu nisa,)
Orowa, kashiobiuki kuni toho ta kuani echi ikashui nisa ruwe ne,
ani an itak ani Shinuma ye nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na; (ingarʼan, tane anak auk kuni pakihi ne; ingarʼan,
tane anak ne kashiobiuki kuni toho ne ruwe ne): otta chi utara yaishieiwangere ambe anak ne iteki achipayere kuni gusu, nep ne yakka gusu ureechiure kuni ika iteki koropare na;
koroka, nep ne yakka otta Kamui gusu yaishieiwangere utara chi ne korachi yaikota yairamatte no okai anro; poron no an yaiyupupu ambe otta hene, aeramchuptekbe otta hene,

aeishiramne-hi otta hene, yairamkoiki ambe otta hene, shirikik ambe otta hene, ipakashnu chisei otta aomare ambe otta hene, sakayo otta hene, moni otta hene, shiure ambe otta hene, shomo ramnu ki ambe otta hene; turu-sakbe otta hene,
eramatu ambe otta hene, ramushiporore otta hene, ramuhauge-hi otta hene, Ashkanne Ramat otta hene,
shunge sak no an omap ambe otta hene, son no an itak otta hene, Kamui kiroro otta hene; shimontek samata ne yakka hariki-tek samata ne yakka oupeka ne hayokbe ani,
aeoripakbe ani ne yakka ayainikoroshmarep ani ne yakka, areika assuru ani ne yakka, wen assuru ani ne yakka; kokandama ki utara korachi ne a yakka,
son no ambe ne; shomo aeamkiri utara korachi ne a yakka, pirika no aeamkiri; rai utara korachi ne a yakka, ingarʼan, shiknu ash ruwe ne;
apakashnu yakka, shomo aronnu; oknatara korachi ne a yakka, ramma nupetne, oteksak korachi ne a yakka, inne utara oteknure; nep ne yakka sak no an korachi ne a yakka, obitta no okaibe kon ruwe ne na.
Korintos un utara echi utara gusu chikoro paroho maka wa an,
chikoro sambe aporore wa an na. Echi utara anak ne chi utara gusu yairamkoiki shomoki, koroka, yaikota echi koro keutum gusu yairamkoiki ruwe ne.
Aige, gusu ukorachi an iwayehe epeka (nokan utara otta aye-hi korachi nep) echi utara ne yakka aporore wa an yan.

Shomo eishokoro utara tura iteki aouhaita no userekotukka yan; ikashpaotte otereke ambe anak oupeka ambe gusu nep tura no ikichi kuni ambe an a? Orowa, nekon a pekere anak ne kunne-i tura ikoan ruwe he an?
Shui, Kiristo anak ne Beriaru gusu nep irenga an a? Samata, eishokoro guru anak ne shomo eishokoro guru tura nepi ushike kon ruwe he an?

Orowa, Kamui kora kenru anak ne potoki-noka tura nepi uweramuoshmap an a? Inambe gusu ne yakun, chi utara anak ne ishu Kamui kora kenru chi ne; Kamui ene ye-hi poka korachi ne,—Kuani anak ne nei utara oshiketa Ku oshiroma, oshiketa Ku apkash kusu ne; aige, kuani nei utara koro Kamui ku ne kusu ne, orowa,
nei utara ku goro uirup ne kusu ne. Tambe gusu, Nei utara tumuge wano araki wa nei oyake okai yan, ari Utarapa itak,
Samata turu-ushbe iteki tomooshma yan;
Yakun, Kuani echi uina kusu ne,
Aine, echi utara gusu Michihi Ku ne kusu ne,
Echi utara anak ne Ku okkai poho Ku matne poho echi ne kusu ne na,
ari nep ne yakka ki eashkai Utarapa ye nisa ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, iriwak utara, tan eitakamkire ambe chikoro wa okai gusu, kam newa ramat otta an obitta no okai turu gusu yaituru-sakte yanro, aine, Kamui koishitoma wa ashkanne ambe eramushinnere ki.
Un gusu echi koro sambe sarare yan; chi utara anak ne inan guru ne yakka shomo wende, inan guru ne yakka shomo koisamka, inan guru ne yakka kokandama gusu yaiepirikare ambe shomo chi ki ruwe ne.
Tap ambe ku ye-hi anak ne echi akokatpakte gusu shomo ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, teeda ku ye-hi korachi, utura rai utura shiknu kuni gusu, echi utara anak ne chikoro keutum ta okai ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Echi epeka ku ye itak anak ne shiri rametokkorobe ne, echi ankushkerai ku yaiomonnure ambe anak ne poro ruwe ne: aomaoma ambe ani kuani aeshikte wa an, obitta no okai chi ikichi eramchuptekbe tumta nupetnep eika ruwe ne na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, chi utara anak ne Makedonia orota araki wa okai yakka chikoro kam gusu shini ushike isam a koroka nei i wa ne yakka eramchuptekka ambe an; soigeta ukoiki an, onnaigeta ishitomap an ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Yakka, yaieoripakka utara omaoma Kamui anak ne, Titus ek-hi ani un omaoma ruwe ne;

ouse shinuma ek ambe ani patek shomo ne, koroka, ari shinuma echi ankushkerai aomaoma ambe, echi ki eyaikatekara ambe, echi yaituwashkarap ambe, en gusu echi seisek mau keutum koro ambe un nure shiriki ambe gusu ne yakka ne; nei ambe gusu naa mashkin ku nupetne ruwe ne.

Ku omande kambi gusu kuani echi oknatare ash, awa, teeda ku eyaikopash a yakka tane shomo ruwe ne; nei kambi anak echi oknatare nisa sekorʼambe ku nukara, koroka, ouse an pakihi uturu patek ne ruwe ne na.

Echi utara anak ne aoknatare gusu ku nupetne shomoki koroka echi ayaikokatpakte pakno echi aoknatare ambe ku enupetne ruwe ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, un gusu nep ne yakka shomo echi akoisamka kuni ne, Kamui kooripak korachi echi aoknatare an.

Kamui kooripak an oknatara ambe anak ne kashiaobiuki kuni gusu an yaikokatpakbe hetukure, aige, nei ambe gusu yaikopash ushike isam ruwe ne: koroka, moshiri gusu an oknatara ambe anak ne rai ambe hetukure ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, tapne an ambe ingarʼan, Kamui kooripak nei no echi aoknatare gusu anak ne, echi tumugeta nep yuptek no echi iki humi! ruwe un, nep kikikara ambe! ruwe un, nep kinrakara ambe! ruwe un, nep ishitoma ambe! ruwe un, nep eyaikatekara ambe! ruwe un, nep seisek mau keutum! ruwe un, nep ikemnu ambe humi! nep ne yakka nei orushpe gusu echi utara anak ne turu-sakbe ne sekoro echi yaiashte nisa ruwe ne.

Tambe gusu kuani anak ne echi orun kambi ku omande nisa a yakka, wenbe iki guru gusu hene, akoiwende guru gusu hene shomo ku nuye, koroka, un gusu yuptek no echi ikichi ambe anak ne Kamui shik-samata echi orun anukara kuni gusu nep ne.

Tambe gusu, chi utara anak ne aomaoma okere: aige, aomaoma shiriki rapoketa Titus iki nupetne ambe gusu, chi utara naa shiri nupetne ash nisa ruwe ne, obitta no okai echi utara gusu Shinuma kon ramat shiturire nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Nep ne yakka epeka echi utara gusu shinuma ankushkerai ku yaiomonnure yakun shomo a en yainikoroshmare nisa ruwe ne; koroka, sonep ani obitta no okaibe echi otta chi ye korachi, Titus kotchaketa ku ki yaiomonnure ambe ne yakka sonep ne anukan nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa shinuma onnaigeta an omap ambe anak ne echi utara gusu naa nuye an no an; aige, echi utara anak ne hemanda ishitoma wa tusushke hine shinuma uk, aine, echi obitta no iki koitaknu ambe eshkarun ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Nep ne yakka gusu echi ankushtapne ku ramuritetke gusu ku nupetne ruwe ne na.
Nei samaketa, iriwak utara, Makedonia moshiri ta okai karisia utara otta akore okere Kamui irenga echi nure ash nisa;
awa, nei utara poron no aeramchuptekka gusu auwande rapoketa shi no nupetne, aige, nei utara son no irapokkari ne a yakka nuye an no aeoteknup gusu ne a an na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, tambe epaweteshu ku ki-hi;—Nei utara kiroro an pakno, ruwe un, kiroro eikaun pakno rengaine iki nisa,
kurukashike tap irenga gusu hemhem, utura ashkanne utara otta yaishieiwangere kuni gusu hemhem poron no un koramkon nisa ruwe ne:
aine, nei no iki wa chi utara chipachipa ash korachi shomo ne, koroka, hoshike no yaikota Utarapa otta yaikoropare, orowa no Kamui irenga gusu un otta yaikoropare nisa ruwe ne na.
Etoko wano Titus anak ne eatpake ki korachi shinuma echi oshiketa tan irenga ne yakka eramushinnere kuni ne chi utara shinuma onishnishi pakno ne ruwe ne.

Koroka, eishokor-i gusu hemhem, itak gusu hemhem, eramushbe gusu hemhem, yuptek no iki ambe gusu hemhem, un omap kuni ambe gusu hemhem, orowa nep ne yakka gusu hemhem echi nuye an no okai ruwe ne korachi, tambe nei no tan irenga gusu ne yakka nuye an no okai kuni ki wa en kore.
Ipawetenge nepkoro an no shomo ku itak, koroka, moshima okai utara yuptek no iki ambe ankushkerai echi koro omap-hi sonep ne yakka ku sonnere ruwe ne.

Chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo koro irenga echi eraman ruwe ne gusu ne na; Shinuma anak ne oteknu ruwe ne a yakka, echi utara gusu oteksakbe ne akara, tambe anak ne Shinuma ki oteksak-hi ankushkeraipo echi utara aeoteknure kuni gusu ne na.
Tata otta esanniyop ku sange na: shine pa etokota hoshiki no heashire echi utara anak ne ouse iki ambe gusu patek shomo ne, koroka, keutum atte ambe gusu ne yakka, echi ki kunip ne ruwe ne.
Koroka, tane nei iki kuni ambe eramushinnere yan; keutum atte wa iki rusui sambe an nei no, echi ki kat an korachi, nei no eramushinnere kuni gusu ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun iki rusui sambe an yakun, ainu koro korachi aesanniyo ruwe ne, shomo koro nei no aesanniyo shomo ki ruwe ne.
Koroka, moshima okai utara asbinire wa echi eyairamchuptekka gusu nep shomo ne: koroka, uwreerepak no an ambe ne gusu an ap ne ruwe ne;

tane an echi koro nuye an no an ambe anak ne nei utara eikohayep upakte ruwe ne, nei utara koro nuye an no an ambe ne yakka echi eikohayep upakte ruwe ne; uweerepak no an ambe an kuni gusu ne ruwe ne na:
ene chieshinnuye wa an korachi an na:—Poron no eumashnu guru anak ekashimap pon no ka shomo koro, orowa, pon no eumashnu guru gusu eikohayep isam ruwe ne.
Koroka, nei ukorachi an echi utara gusu seisek no iki rusui keutum Titus koro sambe ta omare Kamui otta koyaiiraige an na.
Shinuma son no poka chi ki onishnishi-hi inu, koroka, shi no seisek keutum koro wa an gusu, yaikota rengaine echi orun oman nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, obitta no okai karisia tumta pirika shongo gusu iramye assuru-hu koro iriwak shinuma tura omande ash okere ruwe ne;

nei ambe patek shomo ne, koroka, Utarapa koro araguru gusu otta chi utara yaishieiwangere ash tan irenga ankushtapne un tura no payekai wa chi ki rusuibe echi nure kuni ne karisia utara orowa no ne yakka anuye nisa ruwe ne:
samata, inan guru ne yakka otta chi yaishieiwangere ash nuye an no ambe gusu iteki un kokatpakte kuni iki koro an:
inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui shik-sam patek shomo ne, koroka, utara shik-samta ne yakka pirika okaibe eyaikoshiramshuiba ash ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Shui, inne okaibe gusu kanna-kanna seisek keutum koro kunak echi uwande chikoro iriwak nei utara tura no payere ash ruwe ne, aige, tane shinuma anak ne naa shi no seisek keutum koro, echi utara gusu shiri poron no eishokor-i atte wa an ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Titus gusu uwepekennu guru an chiki, shinuma anak echi utara gusu en tura no iki wa monraige korʼan ruwe ne; chikoro iriwak utara gusu echi uwepekennu chiki, nei utara anak karisia utara koro apostoro utara ne, Kiristo koro araguru ne ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, karisia utara kotchaketa nei utara otta echi ikichi omap ambe hemhem, echi utara gusu chi ki yaiomonnure ambe ika hemhem nukare wa en kore yan.
Ashkanne utara otta yaishieiwangere ambe gusu ku nuye katu anak ne echi utara gusu ikashima an ambe ne ruwe ne:
