inambe gusu ne yakun, echi ki rusui kat ku eraman, aige, echi utara gusu Makedonia kotan un utara otta ku yaiomonnure ki, awa, Akaya kotan anak shine pa etoko wano etokooiki pakno ne; samata, echi koro seisek no iki keutum anak ne nei utara tumta okai inne utara paraparasere nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Koroka, tapne ambe gusu ech utara ankushtapne an chi ki yaiomonnure ambe anak ne ika raka asakte kuni ne echi orun iriwak utara ku arapare nisa ruwe ne; tambe anak, ku ye-hi korachi, echi utara etokooiki an okere kuni gusu an ambe ne:

ikineipeka nekon a, Makedonia moshiri wano en tura no araki utara oka wa, shomo echi etokooiki an ambe anukara chiki, chi utara anak ne (echi utara, shomo chi ye na) tap an ikkewe gusu shomo aeyainikoroshmare kuni ruwe ne.

Tambe gusu, onishnishi ku ki wa, iriwak utara anak ne etokota echi orun paye hine etoko wano echi eitakamkire eikrap hoshiki no akare kuni ambe anak ku ki kunip ne sekoro ku esanniyo nisa; nei ambe anak ne aetokooiki wa an korarape ne-hi aeyaikoshipuinere an ambe nei no an ambe shomo nep kuni gusu ne na.
Koroka, tambe ku ye-hi:—Shihopinupka wa etoita gurʼanak ne shihopinupka no nange kusu ne, eikanno etoita gurʼanak ne eikanno nange kusu ne na.
Echi utara yaikota yaikota koro keutum ta esanniyo korachi ki yan; sambe oknatara shomo ne no, asangere gusu shomo ne no ki yan, Kamui auak ne nupetne no koropare guru omap ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Orowa, Kamui anak ne obitta no okai irenga echi utara gusu nuye an no kara eashkai; tambe anak, nep ne yakka gusu ramma-kane echi ara yaiyainuwere hine obitta no okai pirika ikip otta nuye an no iki kuni gusu ne ruwe ne:
Ene chieshinnuye wa an korachi ne:—
Shinuma anak ne chieshitchari otek-sak guru orota koropare nisa ruwe ne;
Shinuma koro oupeka ambe anak ramma pakno an kusu ne na.
Orowa, etoita guru otta piyehe sange, ibe kuni gusu aep sange gurʼanak ne aetoita gusu echi koro piyehe porore wa kore hemhem ki, echi ki oupeka an ibehe innere hemhem ki kusu ne na:
echi utara nep ne yakka gusu ara eikaunno aepirikare an na, tambe anak un gusu Kamui koyaiiraigere ikip ne ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, tap an moni gusu yaishieiwangere ambe anak ne ashkanne utara eishiramne-i umomare patek shomo ne, koroka, Kamui otta inne no okai koyaiiraige ambe hetukure poka ki ruwe ne:

nei utara anak ne tap an aeyaishieiwangere-hi uwande ankushkerai, Kiristo koro Pirika shongo gusu an eyaipushi-hi ekoitaknu ambe gusu hemhem, nei utara otta ne yakka obitta no okai utara otta ne yakka nuye an no tura no echi ikichi gusu hemhem Kamui koiramye shiriki okai an ruwe ne;
aige, nei utara yaikota ne yakka, echi utara gusu inonno itak ki hine, echi onnaigeta an Kamui poro irenga gusu echi eyaikatekara shiri okai ruwe ne na.
Koro ye eaikap pakno an eikrap gusu Kamui koyaiiraige an na.
Echi tumugeta an ita yaieoripakka, koroka, tane oyakta an wa echi epeka rametokkoro Pauros ne kuani anak ne, Kiristo gusu an ramushiroma ambe newa rotcha ambe gusu echi onishnishi ash na:

ruwe un, kara nei no apkash korachi utara chi ne sekoro esanniyo an utara epeka echi tura no ku an ita rametokkorobe ku epukitara kuni ku esanniyo, atte keutum gusu an rametokkorobe shomo ku sange kuni ne ku koramkon na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, chi utara anak ne kam oshiketa an wa apkash yakka,
kam iki nei no shomo tumichikon ruwe ne (tumi gusu an chi koro eshipopkep anak ne kam orowa no an ambe shomo ne, koroka, kiroroashnu ambe hokushte gusu Kamui tek-samata okirashnup ne ruwe ne);
aesanniyo ambe newa nep ne yakka Kamui eramushbe epokba ariknare an ri ambe obitta hokushte, samata, obitta no okai yainu-hi Kiristo otta koitaknure kuni ne usshiunere ruwe ne;
orowa, echi ikichi itaknu ambe auweomare chiki, obitta no okai itakkashi ambe koikemnu gusu etokooiki an ambe ne ruwe ne na.

Echi utara anak ne echi nan kotpoketa orun ingara shiriki. Kiristo korobe ne sekoro yaioshiketa eishokoro inan guru ne yakka an chiki, yai-tura kanna-shui tambe yaikoshiramshuibarero; shinuma anak ne Kiristo korobe ne-hi korachi, chi utara ne yakka ene ani ne ruwe ne.
(Echi hokushte gusu shomo ne a koroka echi roshkire ash kuni gusu Utarapa koropare) chi koro mondum gusu nekon a pon no poro no ku yaiomonnure yakka shomo kuani echi yainikoroshmare ash kusu ne:
tambe anak ku omande kambi ani echi ishitomare noine an ambe shomo a en esanniyo kuni gusu nep ne ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, shinuma ette kambi anak ne pase newa yupkep ne: koroka, koro tumama kat anak katchakbe ne, koro itak nep ne aramu kunip shomo ne ruwe ne, ani nei utara ye ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Nei no shiriki an gurʼanak ne, chi utara oyakta an wa kambi kata anuye wa an itak an nei no, echi tura okai ita ne yakka nei no ikichi utara chi ne ruwe ne sekoro esanniyorero.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, chi utara anak ne yaikota yaiashte sereke an utara tura ukonukara hene tura no okai wa aesanniyo kuni hene ki rusui kashpa utara shomo chi ne: koroka, nei utara yaihekota anak ne utashpa yaikota yaiuwepakari hemhem ki, yai tura yaiuweukonukara hemhem ki hine eramsakbe ne ruwe ne.
Chi utara anak ne yaiomonnure kashpa shomo chi ki kusu ne, koroka, echi orun poka epa kuni pakno Kamui un gusu koimek wa kore aepakari nei no an ikiri korachi ki kusu ne gusu ne na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, chi utara anak ne echi oro pakno shomo epa nei no, mashkin no yaituriri kashpa korachi shomo ne ruwe ne: echi oro pakno poka Kiristo koro pirika shongo oshiketa hoshiki araki ash nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na:

moshima utara iki ikip gusu eetasa poron no yaiomonnure shomoki; koroka, echi eishokor-i attep shukup korachi, chi utara ikichi ikiri nei no naa nuye an no an ambe hetukure, gusu echi tumta a un porore kuni chipachipa ash ruwe ne;

tambe anak ne echi eikushketa okai ushike ta pirika shongo eupaskuma ash hine moshima utara iki ikiri chi teksamata etokooiki ambe gusu shomo yaiomonnure kuni gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne. Koroka, yaiomonnure guru an chiki,
Utarapa gusu yaiomonnurero.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, yaihekota yaiashte gurʼanak ne auwande wa iramye kunip shomo ne, koroka, Utarapa ashtep anak ne airamye an ua.
Ku ramat-sakbe gusu pon no echi eyaishiporore kuni ku kon rusui: son no poka en eyaishiporore echi ki nisa ruwe ne.

Kamui san ikoitupa ambe ani echi utara gusu ku ikoitupa ruwe ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, shine hoku ne guru otta kuani echi kore okere, turu-sak-mat nei no Kiristo otta kuani echi yange ash kuni gusu ne na.
Koroka, ikineipeka nekon a ka, okokko irara wa Hefa kokandama korachi, echi koro keutum anak Kiristo epeka kuni gusu an sonep newa turu-sakbe gusu awende kuni ku ishitoma ruwe ne.

Hemanda gusu ne yakun, ek kushki guru anak ne shomo chi utara eupaskuma ash moshima an Yesu eupaskuma hene ki yakun, shui, teeda echi akore ramat moshima an ramat echi uk hene ki yakun, samata, shomo echi uk okere moshima an pirika shongo echi uina hene echi ki yakun,
eyaishiporore yak pirika Kuani anak ne nei iyotta pase Apostoro utara gusu pon no ka pokashnu guru shomo ku ne ruwe ne ari ku yainu ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, itak gusu ramat-sakbe ku ne a yakka, eramushbe gusu ramat-sakbe shomo ku ne; son no newa, echi utara gusu obitta no okai utara tumugeta nep ne yakka sarare ash nisa ruwe ne.
Samata, echi utara ariknare kuni ne kuani yaieoripakka hine oro sak no Kamui pirika shongo ku eupaskuma gusu katpak ku ki nisa mwe he an?
Kuani anak ne echi utara gusu yaishieiwangere kuni ne, moshima okai karisia orowa no pummaha ko-uk hine ko-ikka nisa ruwe ne;

orowa, echi tura no ku an wa eishiramnep an ita anak ne, inan guru ne yakka shomo ku iramu-ikurukurure nisa; iriwak utara Makedonia kotan orowa no araki ita ku eishiramnep eramushinnere nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na; orowa, nep ne yakka gusu iteki echi iramu-ikurukuru kuni ne ku yaishikkashima nisa ruwe ne; shui nei no ku an kuni ku yaishikkashima kusu ne na.
Kiristo koro sonep anak ne en onnaigeta an ne-hi korachi, Akaya moshiri ta tapan yaiomonnure ambe gusu inan guru ne yakka en onnere shomoki nangon na.
Hemanda gusu? Kuani shomo echi omap ash ruwe ne gusu ne ya?

Kamui eraman. Koroka, iki ika kon rusui utara gusu an ikkeu ku isamka kuni ne ku ki korʼan okaibe ikichi kushki na, otta nei utara yaiomonnure gusu, chi utara korachi nei utara anukara kuni gusu ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, nei no okai utara anak ne chinore apostoro ne, kokandama ikichi utara ne, Kiristo koro Apostoro nep kuni ne yaikota yainere utara ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe anak iyokunnure kuni ambe shomo ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, Satan poka yakota Kamui koro nupeki an hauturumbe nep kuni ne yainere ruwe ne.

Tambe gusu, shinuma otta yaishieiwangere utara ne yakka oupeka ambe otta yaishieiwangere kuni nep yainere chiki poro ambe shomo ne; nei utara gusu an okake an ambe anak ne koro ikichi ikip nei no an ambe ne ruwe ne.
Shui ku ye, inan guru ne yakka kuani anak ramat-sakbe ne sekoro iteki yainu yan; koroka, nei no aeyainu yakun, pon no ka ku yaiomonnure kuni ne, ramat-sakbe nei no en uk wa en kore.
Ku ye itak anak ne Utarapa orowa no an ambe nei no shomo ku ye, koroka, ramat-sakbe korachi nep, tapan yaiomonnure an asamaha an no iki ruwe ne.
Inne utara kam gusu yaiomonnure gusu, kuani ne yakka yaiomonnure ruwe ne.
Echi utara wayashnu gusu yaikopuntek no wayasap utara eyaishiporore ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, nen ka echi usshiune kara, echi ruki, echi tekepashte, yaikota yairiknare, echi koro nanuhu kokik chiki, echi utara nei guru eyaishiporore ruwe ne.
Chi utara anak ne katchakbe ne korachi yainikoroshmarep ku ye na. Yakka, nen ne yakka nep otta ka rametokkoro chiki (wayasap no ku ye), kuani ne yakka rametok kon ruwe ne.
Nei utara anak ne Hebrai un utara ne ruwe? Kuani ne yakka ene ani ne. Israeru un utara ne ya? Kuani ne yakka ene ani ne.

Abraham sanikiri ne ya? Kuani ne yakka ene ani ne. Kiristo otta yaishieiwangere utara ne ya? (ramu-isam guru korachi ku ye) Kuani naa kasu no ne ruwe ne: nei utara kasu no poron no ku iki; nei utara kasu no poron no upakashnu chisei ta ku an; poron no a en shirikik mashkin, kanna-kanna rai otta ku an ruwe ne na.
Ashikne shuine Yudea un utara orowa no tu hotne shirikik otta shinep ehaita no a en kik an.
Re shuine kuwa ani a en kik an, arashuine shuma ari a en piyekara an, re shuine ku mimam-awende ruwe ne, shine kunne-to shine tokap-to ututta oohoi otta ku an;

kanna-kanna payekai an, pet gusu ayaikikipi an, ikka utara gusu ayaikikipi an, ku goro moshirʼun ukorachi an ainu gusu ayaikikipi an, oya moshirʼun utara gusu ayaikikipi an, machiya otta ayaikikipi an, nup otta ayaikikipi an, atui otta ayaikikipi an,
shunge iriwak utara tumugeta ayaikikipi an, imontabire wa nuwap; kanna-kanna shiruwande ki, ibe rusui iku rusui, kanna-kanna shomo-ramnu ki, meraige newa atusa ruwe ne.
Tap ku ye moshima kesto-kesto a en seire obitta no okai karisia gusu nishomap ambe an ruwe ne.
Nen ka katchak wa kuani ne yakka shomo katchak ne ya?
Nen ka aurechiure wa ku keutum shomo seisek ruwe he an? Kuani yaiomonnure ki gusu ne ap chiki, ku katchakbe gusu ku yaiomonnure kusu ne na.
Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo koro otusashuishiri pakno anunuke an Michi ne Kamui anak ne, shomo shunge ku ki na sekorʼambe eraman.
Damaskos kotan ta Moshiri shikkashima guru ne Aretas pokta an sapane guru anak ne en kishima kuni ne Damaskos un utara koro machiya shiruwande nisa ruwe ne:
awa, puyara kari tumama samta saranip oshike un a en orange wa shinuma koro teke ku ohaitare nisa ruwe ne na.
Aepirikare kunip shomo ne a yakka, nekon a ka ku yaiomonnure ruwe ne; koroka, Utarapa orowa no an anukarape tane ku ye.

Kiristo oshiketa shine ainu ku eamkiri, ine pa ikashima wan pa etoko (netobake oshiketa an hene ne ya ku eramushkare; netobake soigeta an hene ne ya ku eramushkare; Kamui eraman), nei a an guru anak ne re ikinne an kando orun auk nisa ruwe ne.
Awa, nei no an ainu ku eamkiri (netobake oshiketa an hene ne ya, netobake sak no an hene ne ya ku eramushkare; Kamui eraman),
nei guru anak ne Paradaisos orun auk wa ainu ye koro ikashpaotte oterekep ne ari an ye eaikap an itak nu nisa ruwe ne.
Nei a an guru ankushkerai ku yaiomonnure kusu ne: koroka, ku katchakbe gusu moshima yaikota gusu shomo ku yaiomonnure kusu ne na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, ku yaiomonnure rusui yakka, haita guru shomo ku ne; son no ambe ku ye kusu ne gusu ne na: koroka, nei no shomo ku ki ruwe ne, a en nukara wa an ambe hene en orowa no nu ambe kasu no hene, ikineipeka ika nenka en esanniyo kuni gusu ne na.

Orowa, nei anukarabe shiri porobe an ikkeu ne gusu—tambe gusu, iteki mashkin no a en aeyairiknare kuni ne, en shirikik gusu kam oshiketa nit ai, Satan koro auitekbe, a en kore nisa, tambe anak iteki mashkin no ku yairiknare kuni gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne.
Tap ambe anak en orowa no oyakta aomande kuni ue re shuine Utarapa ku koramkon nisa.

Aige;—Ku sange irenga aokai gusu upak no an ambe ne: Ku kiroro anak ne katchakbe oshiketa aeramushinnere ruwe ne gusu ne na, ari an itak ani Shinuma en orun ye nisa ruwe ne. Tambe gusu, Kiristo koro kiroro en kashike apiraspare kuni ne, shi no yaikopuntek no ku katchakbe gusu ku yaiomonnure kushki na.

Tambe gusu, Kiristo korʼirenga ankushtapne kuani katchakbe gusu, aeiwendep gusu, aeishiramnep gusu, aepokbap gusu, yairamkoiki ambe gusu ku enupetne ruwe ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, katchak no ku an ita, nei ita anak ku kiroroashnu ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Ramat-sakbe ku ne okere: nei no ku an kuni ne echi ikichi okai; echi utara orowa no a en aashte kunip ku ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, kuani nep ka aeramu kunip shomo ku ne a yakka, iyotta pase apostoro utara pokashnu an ambe shomo ku ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Son no newa shirosh ani hemhem, iyokunnurep ani hemhem, kiroro ani hemhem, Apostoro gusu an shirosh anak ne obitta no an yaiyupupu aoma wa echi tumugeta aki nisa ruwe ne.

Kuani yaikota echi tumugeta an wa shomo echi iramu-ikurukurure moshima an ika gusu, nep ika an gusu moshima okai karisia pokta echi pokashnu ruwe he an? Tap an wenbe gusu ramuhauge no irenga usaraye wa en kore yan.

Ingaraʼan, tambe anak ne kuani echi orun ku ek kuni re ikinne an etokooiki okere an ambe ne ruwe ne; awa, shomo echi iramu-ikurukurure ash kusu ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, echi korobe shomo ku ehunara, koroka, echi ku ehunara shiriki ruwe ne: poho utara anak ne eshikop utara gusu okaibe eumashnu kuni ambe shomo ne, koroka, eshikop anak poho utara gusu eumashnu kunip ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, echi koro keutum gusu kuani ara yaikopuntek no ku eiwange hemhem ki, a en eiwangere kuni hemhem ku ki kusu ne. Naa eikaun no kuani echi omap ash yakun, naa pokashnu no a en omap an ruwe he an?
Koroka, nei no an yan, kuani yaikota ani echi shike pasere shomoki nisa; koroka, ki-kat-korobe ku ne ruwe ne gusu, imokbe ani echi uina ash nisa ruwe ne na.
Echi orun ku payere utara tumuge un nen ka an guru ankushtapne kuani echi kokandama wa yaiepirikare nisa ruwe he an?

Titus ku onishnishi nisa, orowa, shinuma tura nei iriwak ne guru ku omande Titus anak ne echi kokandama wa eyaiepirikare nisa ruwe he an? Ukorachi an Ramat otta shomo chi apkash ash ya? Ukorachi an kochihi otta shomo apkash ash ruwe he an?

Chi utara tap ramma-kane echi utara gusu yaiyapapu ash ruwe ne ari echi ramu. Kamui teksamata okai wa Kiristo oshiketa chi ye ruwe ne. Koroka, aeomap utara, obitta no okaibe anak echi aroshikire ash gusu nep ruwe ne.

Ikineipeka ku ek ita anak ne nekon a ka shomo ku kon rusui nei no echi anukara, samata, shomo echi kon rusui nei no a en nukara kuni ambe ku ishitoma ruwe ne; ikineipeka nekon a ka ika upaore ambe hene, eyaitunnap hene, kinrakarape hene, sakayo hene, ohaigekara ambe hene, pinu no itakbe hene, pittarane ambe hene, achatchari ambe hene an na;

ikineipeka ika kanna echi otta ku ek ita, ku goro Kamui anak ne echi shik-samata en yainikoroshmare hine, tap etokota katpak ki wa ikichi turu ushbe newa hoiyop newa ramupekere ambe newa eyaikokatpak shomo ki nei utara tumuge un inne no okai utara gusu ku yaituwashkarap gusu ne na.
Tambe anak echi orota ku ek kuni re ikinne an ambe ne ruwe ne. Obitta no okai itak anak ne pishno tu paweteshu utara gusu hene re paweteshu utara gusu hene asonnere kusu ne.

Teeda ku ye okere, shui hoshiki no ku ye, tu ikinne an ita korachi, tane poka isam yakka, tap etokota katpak ki utara newa obitta no okai moshima utara otta ne yakka ku ye, kanna-shui ku ek chiki echi moshima no ku an shomoki kusu ne; en oshiketa itak sange Kiristo koro shirosh echi hunara;
Shinuma anak ne echi epeka no katchakbe shomo ne, koroka, echi onnaigeta kiroroashnup ne ruwe ne: inambe gusu ne yakun,

Shinuma katchakbe ankushtapne utasa-chikuni otta akungi-kokikkik yakka Kamui kiroro ankushtapne Shinuma ishu ruwe ne. Chi utara ne yakka Shinuma tura katchakbe ne, koroka, echi epeka no an Kamui kiroro ankushkeraipo Shinuma tura no ishu kusu ne gusu ne na.

Echi utara eishokor-i ta okai ruwe he an, shomo ruwe he an, yaikota yaikoramnukara yan, yaikota yai-uwande yan. Yesu Kiristo anak ne echi onnaigeta an sekoro yaikota gusu echi erampeutek ruwe he an? Shomo ne chiki echi utara aemakbap ne nangora.
Koroka, aemakbap shomo chi ne sekoro echi eraman kuni ku chipachipa ruwe ne.

Nep wen-buri ne yakka shomo echi iki kuni Kamui otta tane chi inonno-itak ash; chi utara anak ne auwande okere kunak anukara kuni gusu shomo ne, koroka, aemakbap korachi chi ne a yakka, echi utara anak pirikap iki kuni gusu an ambe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, chi utara anak ne nei sonep epokba eaikap, koroka, nei ambe gusu iki eashkaibe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Echi utara anak ne tumashnu wa chi utara katchakbe ne ita, nupetne ash ruwe ne: aige, echi utara aeramushinnere kuni ambe, tap ambe gusu poka inonno-itak ash na.
Tambe gusu ku isam rapoketa tap an okaibe ku nuye, echi tura no an ita, hachirepa gusu shomo ne, koroka, roshkire gusu Utarapa en kore mondum ani an korachi, shomo niwen no ku iki kuni gusu ne na.
Orowa, ku iriwak utara, sarampa. Aeramushinne no okai yan, aomaoma no okai yan; shine keutum koro yan; itomo an no okai yan; aine, omap ambe newa itomo koro Kamui echi tura no an kusu ne.
Turu-sak no an chopsekara ambe ani ukouwekap yan.
Obitta no okai ashkanne utara anak ne echi uwekap an na.
Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo korʼirenga hemhem Kamui omap-i hemhem, Ashkanne Ramat ukopoyege-i hemhem obitta no okai echi utara tura no an kuni akoramkon na.
(UTARA orowa no shomo ne, ainu ani shomo ne, koroka, Yesu Kiristo newa Shinuma rai-i orowa
no hetopo-shiknure Michi ne Kamui ani) Apostoro ne akara Pauros newa en tura no an obitta no okai iriwak utara Garatea un karisia utara otta kambi omande na:
Chikoro Michi ne Kamui korʼirenga nei no tane okai wen ikiri orowa no un ohaitare kuni ne,
chikoro katpak gusu yaikota yaiyange chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo newa Michi ne Kamui orowa no irenga newa itomo echi utara gusu anro:
Shinuma otta shashuishiri wano shashuishiri pakno arakuru an a an. Amen.
Kiristo korʼirenga otta echi hotuyekara Kamui orowa no tap korachi chashnu no echi utara shinnai no an pirika shongo gusu echi yaiatupte-i ku enushkari ruwe ne;
nei ambe anak ne moshima an ap shomo ne; koroka, echi keutura chiukopoyere wa Kiristo koro shongo itasare utara okai ruwe ne.
Koroka, chi utara ne yakka, kando orowa no an hauturumbe ne yakka, echi orun chi eupaskuma okere pirika shongo moshima, nei moshima an pirika shongo eupaskuma chiki, nei guru aiyoitakushi an na.
Teeda chi ye korachi, tane shui ku ye, echi uk okere moshima an pirika shongo echi orun eupaskuma ki guru an chiki, shinuma anak aiyoitakushi an na.

Tane kuani anak ne utara onishnishi ruwe he an? Kamui onishnishi ruwe he an? Shui, utara nupetnere kuni ambe ku hunara ya? Tane poka utara nupetnere ku ki chiki, Kamui usshiune guru shomo ku ne ruwe ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, ku iriwak utara, en orowa no aeupaskuma pirika shongo gusu echi nure ash na, nei ambe anak ainu orowa no hetukup shomo ne ruwe ne.
Ainu orowa no shomo nei ambe ku uk, shui, shomo nei ambe ani a en epakashnu, koroka, Yesu Kiristo en eramande gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne.
Teeda Yudea un epakashi gusu ku ki buri echi nu nisa, kuani Kamui karisia epokba mashkin wa wende ruwe ne; orowa,
ekashi koro oina gusu ku keutura shi no seisek wa gusu, nei rapoke ku goro kotan un utara kasu no naa Yudea un epakashi otta ku aeyairamushinnere nisa ruwe ne.
Koroka, Kamui rengaine ku goro habo honihi wano en usa ande wa, oya utara tumugeta eupaskuma kuni ne en oshiketa koro poho nukare hine koro irenga ani en tak ita anak ne,
nani kuani kam newa kem tura ukoramkoro shomoki;
shui, Yerusarem kotan ta okai en etokota Apostoro ne utara otta shomo ku hemesu ruwe ne; koroka, Arabia moshiri orota ku arapa; orowa shui, Damaskos kotan ta ku hoshipi nisa ruwe ne na.
Orowa, re pa okaketa Kepas hotanukara gusu Yerusarem kotan ta ku hemesu wa ashikne to ikashima wan to uturu shinuma tura ku riya nisa ruwe ne.
Koroka, Utarapa koro iriwak ne Yakob moshima ne chiki, moshima okai Apostoro shomo ku nukan nisa ruwe tapan na.
Tane ku nuye wa echi otta omande orushpe gusu, ingarʼan, Kamui teksamata, shomo shunge ku ki na.
Nei okaketa Suria newa Kirikia kotan ta ku ek.
Awa, Kiristo otta an Yudea moshirʼun karisia utara orowa no nei rapoketa shomo ku nanuhu aeamkiri an na:
koroka, teeda un epokba guru anak ne etokota wende aeishokoro orushpe tane eupaskuma korʼan,
sekorʼan assuru nu nisa ruwe ne; aige, en gusu nei utara Kamui ramye nisa ruwe tapan na.
Orowa, ine pa ikashima wan pa okaketa kuani Titus ne yakka ani wa Barnabas tura shui Yerusarem kotan orun ku hemesu nisa ruwe ne.

Awa, ku oraan-i anak ne a en nukare gusu ku oman nisa ruwe ne; aige, Oya utara tumugeta ku eupaskuma pirika shongo nei utara otta ku nure, koroka, pase ne aesanniyo utara otta arorokishne no ku nure, ikineipeka tambe anak kuani raka sak no shomo hoyupu korʼan hene ki, raka sak no shomo hoyupu okere hene ki gusu ne na.
Koroka, en tura no an Titus anak Herenes un guru ne a yakka okarituye buri akire kuni shomo aki ruwe ne:

nei ambe anak nuina no aahupte shunge iriwak utara gusu an ambe ne; nei utara un usshiune utara ne akara kuni ne, Kiristo Yesu otta chikoro rengaine an nrondum nukara kuni gusu arorokishne no ahup nisa ruwe ne:
pirika shongo oma sonep echi otta an kuni ne, nei utara otta shine pakihi pakno ka shomo chi utara koitaknu nisa ruwe ne.

Koroka, pase ne aesanniyo utara orowa (nei utara anak nekon a ambe ne a yakka, en gusu isam korachi ne: Kamui anak ainu ne nep koro shomo uk ruwe ne); nei pase ne aesanniyo utara anak nep ne yakka en kore shomoki ruwe ne,

sekoro, ku ye: koroka, shinnai kane, Petros otta okarituye buri akire utara gusu pirika shongo ashikkashimare korachi, shomo okarituye buri akire utara gusu nei pirika shongo a en shikkashimare ne sekoro nei utara nukara chiki (inambe gusu ne yakun,
okarituye buri akire utara gusu Petros otta iki Apostoro ne kara Kamui anak ne, Oya utara gusu en otta iki wa en kara nisa ruwe ne na);

orowa, en orun koropare an irenga nei utara nukara chiki, ikushpe ne aesanniyo wa an Yakob newa Kepas newa Yoannes anak ne iriwak ne kuni shimon tekehe en otta newa Barnabas otta koropare nisa ruwe ne, tambe anak nei utara okarituye buri akire utara otta paye, orowa, chi utara anak ne Oya utara otta paye ash kuni gusu an ambe ne:
ouse chi utara otek-sak utara eshkarun kuni ne nei utara kon rusui ruwe ne; nei no ku ki-hi anak kuani son no yuptek no ku iki ambe ne ruwe tapan na.
Koroka, Kepas anak ne Antiok kotan ta ek ita, shinuma akokatpakte kuni guru ne wa gusu kuani shinuma kopao nisa ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, Yakob orowa no utara araki etokota, shinuma anak ne Oya utara tura no ibe nisa ruwe ne: koroka, nei utara araki wa okai chiki shinuma okarituye buri akire utara ishitoma gusu, yaishietaye wa yaishinnaire nisa ruwe ne.
Shui moshima okai Yudea un utara ne yakka shinuma tura kankapkapeka ambe iki nisa ruwe ne; Barnabas kankapkapeka akire pakno nei utara iki nisa ruwe ne na.

Koroka, nei utara anak pirika shongo oma sonep nei no oupeka no shomo apkash ambe ku nukara chiki, obitta no okai nei utara kotchaketa Kepas otta ene ku itak-hi: — Aokai anak ne Yudea un guru a ne wa, Yudea un utara shomo ne no Oya utara korachi e an chiki, hemanda gusu, Oya utara anak Yudea un utara korachi okai kuni ne e ki ya?
Chi utara anak ne katpak koro Oya utara shomo chi ne wa,

ashikore wano Yudea un utara chi ne ruwe ne, yakka, ainu anak tuitak ikip gusu aoupekare shomoki no ouse Yesu Kiristo eishokoro ari an ambe ani aoupekare ne sekoro chi eraman gusu, chi utara ne yakka tuitak ikip gusu shomo ne wa Kiristo eishokoro ari an ambe ani a un oupekare kuni ne Kiristo Yesu eishokon nisa ruwe ne na. Inambe gusu ne yakun, inan kara aye yakka tuitak ikip gusu shomo aoupekare kusu ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, chi utara Kiristo otta aoupekare kuni chi hunara rapoketa, chi utara yaikota katpak koro utara ne anukara chiki, Kiristo anak ne katpak hetukure gusu yaishieiwangere guru ne ruwe he an?
Oara shomoki ruwe ne. Kuani teeda ku isamka okaibe shui ku kara chiki, kuani ohaita guru ne sekoro a en yaiesanniyo ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui gusu ku ishu kuni ne, tuitak ankushkerai gusu tuitak epeka ku rai nisa ruwe ne.

Kuani Kiristo tura no utasa chikuni otta akotukka okere; yakka, ku ishu wa an; kuani shomo ne, koroka, en oshiketa Kiristo ishu ruwe ne: orowa, tane kam otta ku ishu inotu anak eishokoro ambe an gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne, nei ambe anak en omap wa en gusu yaiyange Kamui Poho gusu an ambe ne ruwe tapan na.
Kamui irenga shomo ku isamka; inambe gusu ne yakun, aoupekare ambe anak ne tuitak gusu an ambe ne chiki, Yesu raka-isam no rai nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Ramu-isambe Garatea un utara, echi koro shik samata Yesu Kiristo aande wa anukan no utasa chikuni otta araige, awa, echi shiren guru nen ne ruwe he an?
Tambe patek echi otta ku nu rusui, tuitak ikip gusu nei Ramat echi akore ruwe he an? Eishokoro
an shongo gusu akore ruwe he an? Nei oro pakno echi ramusakbe ne ruwe? Ramat gusu echi heashi wa tane kara gusu echi aeramushinnere ya?
Raka-isam no tap korachi poron no okaibe echi aramushitne ruwe he an? nei ambe son no raka-sakbe ne chiki.
Tambe gusu, echi orun Ramat kore, samata, echi tumta kiroro ikip iki Kamui anak ne tuitak ikip gusu nei ambe ki ya? eishokoro an shongo gusu Shinuma nei ambe ki ruwe he an?
Abraham anak ne Kamui eishokoro, aige, tambe anak shinuma gusu oupeka ambe ne sekoro aesanniyo korachi poka ne ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, tambe uonnere yan, eishokoro ki utara anak ne, nei utara anak Abraham poho utara ne ruwe ne.

Orowa, Kamui anak ne eishokor-i an ambe ani Oya utara oupekare kusu ne sekoro Kamui kambi-sosh teeda wano nukara gusu, — Aokai gusu obitta no okai moshiri uirup ikiri anak ne annkannukara kusu ne, — sekorʼan pirika shongo ani etoko wano Abraham otta eupaskuni a ki nisa ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, eishokor-i atte utara anak ne nei eishokoro ki Abraham tura anukannukara ruwe ne Inambe gusu ne yakun,

tuitak ikip gusu iki utara anak ne obitta aiyoitakushi ambe choropoketa okai: tuitak kashiketa chieshinnuye wa an obitta no okaibe ki kuni ne, shomo nei okaibe otta obitta no okai utara anak pishno pishno aiyoitakushi an — sekoro anuye wa an ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Kamui teksamata tuitak gusu nen ne yakka shomo aoupekare ari an ambe anak ne anukarape ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, aoupekare utara anak ne eishokor-i gusu ishu kusu ne;
orowa, tuitak anak ne eishokor-i gusu an ambe shomo ne; koroka, nei okaibe iki guru anak ne

nei ambe otta ishu kusu ne. Kiristo anak ne un gusu aiyoitakushi ambe ne akara gusu, tuitak gusu an iyoitakushi ambe orowa no un kikiraye nisa ruwe ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, ene chieshinnuye wa an:—Chikuni kata aeokte obitta no okai utara pishno aiyoitakushi an na—sekorʼan itak anuye wa an ruwe

ne gusu ne na: tambe anak ne Kiristo Yesu oshiketa Abraham gusu an nukannukarabe Oya utara kata okai kuni gusu an ambe ne; tambe anak eishokor-i an gusu aeitakamkire an Ramat a un kore kuni gusu an ambe ne ruwe tapan na.

Iriwak utara, ainu ye-hi korachi ku itak ruwe ne: nei ambe anak ne ouse ainu ki uitaknup ne a yakka, iki aeramushinne chiki, nei ambe isamka hene ki, otta moshima okaibe kashioraare hene ki guru isam ruwe ne.

Eitakarakirep anak ne Abraham newa Abraham koro sanike otta aye nisa ruwe ne. Innep gusu aye korachi, koro sanike utara, ari an itak ani seenne ye, koroka, shinep gusu ye nei no, E koro sanike, ari an itak ani ye

ruwe ne, nei ambe anak ne Kiristo ne ruwe ne. Orowa, tambe ku ye; — Tu shine wan hotne pa ikashima wan e tu hotne paha okaketa ek tuitak anak ne aeikanrbak-tep raka sakte kuni hoshiki no Kamui orowʼa no aashte

eitakarakirep isamka shomoki ruwe ne. Inambe gusu ne yakun, ruokake ambe anak ne tuitak an gusu ne okaibe ne chiki, eitakamkire an gusu shomo ne; koroka, Kamui anak ne eitakamkire ambe ani Abraham otta nei ambe koropare nisa ruwe ne na.
Yakun, tuitak anak ne nekon a ambe ne ya? Gusu nei eitakamkire aki sanike ek pakno, ouhaita ambe an gusu kashiiyop ne ruwe ne; iyuturu oma guru ani Kamui hauturun guru orowa no aande nisa ruwe ne na.
Iyuturu oma guru anak ne shinep gusu an ambe shomo ne; koroka, Kamui anak shine Kamui ne ruwe ne.

Yakun, tuitak anak ne Kamui ki eitakamkirep epokba ruwe he an? oara shomo: inambe gusu ne yakun, shiknure eashkai tuitak akoropare wa okai chiki, son no ka un, oupeka ambe anak ne tuitak an gusu an ap ne.
Koroka, Yesu Kiristo eishokoro gusu an eitakamkirep anak ne eishokoro ki utara otta akoropare kuni ne, Kamui kambi-sosh anak obitta no okaibe otta chikokatpak kashiomare nisa ruwe ne na.
Koroka, eishokoro-i ek isam etokota, chi utara anak ne tuitak gusu a un shikkashima nisa, okake anukare kusu ne aeishokor-i otta a un koapa shi nisa ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, tuitak anak ne eishokor-i ani a un oupekare kuni ne Kiristo otta un tura gusu an un epakashnup ne ruwe ne.
Koroka, tane anak ne eishokor-i ek wa an gusu, chi utara shomo un epakashnu guru otta ko-okai.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, obitta no okai echi utara anak ne Kiristo Yesu otta eishokor-i an gusu Kamui poho echi ne.
Echi utara tumugeta Kiristo otta Baptisma akore obitta no okai utara anak ne Kiristo yaitomchiure nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Yudea un guru hene, Herenes un guru hene okai eaikap, ausshiune guru hene, rengaine an guru hene okai eaikap, okkai hene matnep hene okai eaikap ruwe ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, Kiristo Yesu otta obitta no okai echi utara anak ne shinep ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, Kiristo korobe echi ne yakun, Abraham koro sanike echi ne, aige, eitakamkirep an korachi eikeshkoro utara echi ne ruwe tapan na.
Koroka, tambe ku ye, eikeshkore kuni guru anak ne nokan rapoketa, nep ne yakka koro Nishpa ne a yakka usshiune guru echutko no an shomo ne:
koroka, koro michi esanniyo paha epa pakno korobe shikkashimare guru newa epunginere guru orowa no aesapanere wa an ruwe ne.
Chi utara ne yakka pon rapoketa moshiri gusu an isaika epakashi otta akousshiune wa okai nisa ruwe ne: koroka, epa kuni paha epa chiki,
Kamui anak ne koro Poho sange; Shinuma shiwentep orowa no hekatu, tuitak otta hekatu;
tambe anak ne tuitak otta okai utara kikiraye kuni gusu an ambe ne, chi utara anak poho ne akara kuni gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, echi utara poho echi ne wa gusu, Kamui anak ne koro Poho kon Ramat chikoro keutura ta ahunge wa, Abba, Michihi, yere nisa ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, eani anak ne naa tane usshiune guru shomo ne, poho e ne ruwe ne: orowa, poho e ne chiki, Kamui gusu eikeshkore guru e ne ruwe ne.
Koroka, nei ita anak ne echi utara Kamui eamkiri shomoki wa, shomo Kamui ne okaibe otta ausshiunere nisa ruwe ne:
koroka, tane Kamui echi eamkiri, tane Kamui orowa no echi aeamkiri an hine, hemanda gusu, otta kanna-shui ausshiunere rusui katchak aepange an isaika ambe otta koshikiru ya?
Echi utara anak ne toho enomi, chup enomi, un pa enomi, paha enomi ruwe ne.
Ikineipeka kuani raka-sak no echi utara gusu ku iki sekorʼambe ku shitoma ruwe ne.
Iriwak utara, echi utara en korachi okai kuni echi onishnishi ash, inambe gusu ne yakun, kuani anak ne echi utara korachi ku an ruwe ne:
koroka, ku kara otta katchak ushike an gusu, atpaketa echi otta pirika shongo ku eupaskuma nisa ruwe ne sekoro echi eraman:
orowa, ku kam gusu echi koramnukara ambe anak shomo echi etunne, shomo echi emaka nisa ruwe ne; koroka, Kamui hauturumbe korachi, Kiristo Yesu korachi echi utara en uk nisa ruwe ne.
Yakun, echi gusu an shinnunuke ambe neita an ruwe he an? Inambe gusu ne yakun, tap ku paweteshu ku ki-hi, echi eashkai chiki, echi utara anak ne yaikota koro shikihi oashinge wa en kore kusu ne na.
Son no ambe kuani echi nure ash gusu, echi epokba guru ku ne ruwe he an?
Nei utara anak ne shiarikiki no echi hunara ruwe ne koroka pirikap gusu shomo ki; echi utara nei guru hunara kuni gusu, nei utara anak ne echi soita koapa shi rusui ruwe ne na.
Ouse echi tura ku an ita patek shomo ne, koroka, ramma-kane pirikap gusu shiarikiki no hunara ambe anak ne pirika ruwe ne.
Ku goro nokan utara, Kiristo anak ne echi oshiketa akara pakno, shui, echi utara gusu unuwap ku ki;
ruwe un, tane echi tura no ku an wa ku hawe itasare rusui; echi utara gusu ku keutum utumashire ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tuitak choropoketa okai rusui utara tambe en nure

yan, nei tuitak echi nu shomoki ruwe he an? Inambe gusu ne yakun, Abraham anak ne tu po koro, shinen anak auitek-mat orowa no ashikore, shinen auitek shomo ne an mat orowa no ashikore nisa ruwe ne, sekorʼambe chieshinnuye wa an ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, auitek-mat orowa no ashikorep anak ne kam irenga gusu an ambe ne; nei shomo auitek an mat orowa no ashikorep anak eitakamkire an irenga gusu an ap ne ruwe ne.

Tapan okaibe otta aki maukushte ikip an: inambe gusu ne yakun, nei shiwentep anak ne tu aeuitaknup ne; shinen anak ne Sinai nupuri wano an wa ausshiune kuni poho hekatu, nei ambe anak ne Hagar ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, tan Hagar anak ne Arabia moshiri ta an Sinai nupuri ne wa tane an Yerusarem epeka ruwe ne; shinuma anak ne poho tura ausshiune an ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, rikta an Yerusarem anak ne ausshiune ambe shomo ne, shinuma anak chikoro unu ne ruwe ne.
Ene chieshinnuye wa an ruwe ne gusu ne na: —
Po shikore shomoki po-sak guru nupetne yan;
Nuwap shomoki guru hawe ashte yan;
Inambe gusu ne yakun, yaikoan guru koro poho anak ne hoku koro guru koro poho kasu no naa inne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Hetak, iriwak utara, Isaak korachi chi utara ne yakka eitakamkire an irenga gusu an poho chi ne ruwe ne.
Koroka, nei ita kam irenga gusu hetuku poho anak ne Ramat irenga gusu betukup keshke korachi, tane ne yakka ene ani ne ruwe ne.
Yakka, Kamui kambi-sosh hemanda ye ya? Nei uitek-mat poho tura emaka yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, uitek-mat koro poho anak ne shomo auitek an mat koro poho tura okaibe eikeshkore shomoki gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, iriwak utara, chi utara anak ne nei uitek-mat koro poho shomo chi ne, koroka nei shomo auitek an mat koro poho chi ne ruwe ne na.
Son no rengaine an nrondum ari an an ambe ani Kiristo anak ne un honnere nisa ruwe ne: tambe gusu, roshki wa iteki ausshiune an rekuchi orunbe gusu aeyausshiunere yan.
Ingara yan, kuani, Pauros anak ne echi otta ku ye, echi utara okarituye buri akire chiki, Kiristo anak ne shomo echi pirikare kusu ne.
Ruwe ne wa, nen ne yakka okarituye buri akire pishno pishno an gurʼanak ne obitta no okai tuitak ki kunip ne sekoro ku ye ruwe ne.
Tuitak gusu aoupekare kuni esanniyo echi utara anak ne Kiristo orowa no aemakap ne, Kamui irenga ehaitap ne ruwe ne na Inambe gusu ne yakun,
chi utara anak ne chipachipa ki hine eishokor-i ani Ramat gusu oupeka ambe untere ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Kiristo Yesu oshiketa okarituye buri akire-hi hene, shomo okarituye buri akire-hi hene, epirikare shomoki: koroka, omap iki wa eishokor-i patek epirikare ruwe ne.
Echi utara anak ne pirika no hoyuppa nisa, awa, son no ambe shomo echi ki kuni shinnetush guru nen ne ruwe?
Tan onishnishi ambe anak ne echi hotuyekara ambe orowa no an ambe shomo ne.
Pon no pandane anak ne nei epunepushbe obitta shipushkere ruwe ne.
Echi utara anak ne shinnai no esanniyo shomoki kusu ne sekoro Utarapa gusu ku yainu ruwe ne; koroka, nen ne yakka echi chiukopo-yere gurʼanak ne nei akoipishi ambe sei kusu ne na.
Koroka, iriwak utara, kuani anak ne okarituye orushpe eupaskuma yakun, nep gusu tane ne yakka, a en keslike wa an a? Yak anak ne utasa chikuni gusu an ureepetchiurep anak aisamka nisa ruwe ne na.
Echi chiukopoyere utara anak ne echi orowa no paye kuni ku kon rusui ruwe ne.

Iriwak utara, echi utara anak ne rengaine an nrondum akore kuni ne ahotuyekan nisa ruwe ne; awa, kam irenga gusu iteki nei a echi akore rengaine an nrondum eiwange yan, koroka, omap ki wa gusu uweutashpa uweyaiusshiunere yan.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, tuitak ebitta, shine itak ani auweomare ruwe ne, nei ambe anak ene ani ne; Eani yaikota yaiomap korachi aota un guru omap yan, sekorobe ne.
Koroka, echi utara anak ne, uweutashpa uwekuba hemhem ki, uweibe hemhem ki chiki, ikineipeka, echi utara shomo utashpa uweaisamka kuni ne yaitubare yan.
Koroka, ene ku ye-hi: — Ramat otta apkash yan; yakun, kam gusu ibeporore ambe shomo echi uweomare kusu ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, kara anak ne ramat gusu ibeporore ki, orowa, ramat anak ne kam gusu ki ruwe ne gusu ne na; nei okaibe utashpa uweepokba ruwe ne gusu, echi ki rusuibe echi kara eaikap ruwe ne.
Koroka, echi utara anak ne Ramat ari aani yakun, tuitak choropoketa echi okai shomoki ruwe ne.
Kain gusu iki ikip anak ne anukara wa an ruwe ne; aige, tapne an ruwe ne: — Hoiyop hene, ichakkere ambe hene, ramupelcerep hene, potoki ko ongami ambe hene,

aesaman ambe hene, epokbap hene, upaore hene, ikoitupap hene, kinrakarabe hene, sakayo karabe hene, uwekoppa an ambe hene, Kamui orusbpe ohoge yainu ambe hene, eyaitunnap ki ambe hene, ihoshki ambe hene,

iku-sakayo hene, nei no okaibe anak kam gusu iki ikip ne ruwe ne: tap okaibe gusu etokota echi nure ash korachi, irammakaka echi nure na, nei okaibe iki utara anak ne Kamui moshiri eikeshkore shomoki kusu ne na.
Koroka, Ramat hetukure ibehe anak ne tambe ne mwe ne; — Onrap-hi hene, akopuntek ambe hene, itomo hene, ramushiporore ambe hene, ramuhauge-hi hene, pirika-hi hene, eishokor-i atte ambe hene,
ramushiroma ambe hene, yaishikkashima ambe hene ne ruwe ne: nei okaibe epokba tuitak isam ruwe ne.
Orowa, Kiristo Yesu kore utara anak ne kam hene, kara gusu an ayairamshitnere ambe newa ibeporore ambe tura utasa chikuni otta kotukka nisa ruwe ne na.
Chi utara Ramat gusu ishu chiki, Ramat gusu apkash ne yakka ki yanro.
Chi utara iteki yaiomonnure ki wa utashpa uweirushkare uweeyairamikashure ki yanro.
Iriwak utara, nen ka katpak ani aoshkoni guru an chiki, echi tumugeta an Ramat oma guru ramushiroma hine shinuma oupekare yan; yaikota iteki akoramnukara kuni ne yai yaitubare no ki yan.
Uweutashpa koro ashikerep uweseire hine, Kiristo kore tuitak uweomare yan.
Orowa, nen ne yakka nep aramu ka shomoki ita yaikota yaiokkainere guru an chiki, shinunra anak ne yaikokandama ruwe ne.
Koroka, ainu pishno yaikota ki ikip uwandere yan, yakun, shinuma ouse yaikota gusu yaiomonnure ki, moshima guru gusu shomo omonnure ki kusu ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, ainu pishno yaikota sei kuni aseirep sei kusu ne gusu ne na.
Itak gusu aepakashnu gurʼanak ne, epakashnu ki
guru otta nep ne yakka pirika okaibe iki yan. Iteki yaikoshunge yan; Kamui akokandama aeaikap: ainu anak ne nep ne yakka etoita korachi nei ambe ka nanke kusu ne gusu ne na.
Yaikota koro kam gusu etoita gurʼanak ne kara gusu muninbe nanke kusu ne; koroka, Ramat gusu etoita gurʼanak, Ramat gusu otusashuishiri pakno an inotu nanke kusu ne na.
Orowa, pirikap iki gusu iteki yaishingere; inambe gusu ne yakun, ramurai shomoki chiki, paha epa ita nanke kusu ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, ki kuni gusu an i an rapoketa obitta no okai utara gusu pirikap ki yanro; eishokor-i atte iri utara gusu makangane nei no ki yanro.
Nekon a poro ikiri ani yaikota ku tekehe ani echi utara gusu ku nuye ambe ingara yan.
Kam gusu iramasure ambe nukare kuni kon rusui obitta no okai utara anak ne okarituye buri echi kire ruwe ne; ouse nei utara Kiristo utasa chikuni gusu iteki aekeshke kuni gusu nei no ki ruwe ne na.
Okarituye buri akire utara poka yaikota tuitak shikkashima shomoki ruwe ne; koroka, echi otta koro kam gusu yaiomonnure kuni ne echi otta okarituye buri kire rusui ruwe ne.

Koroka, chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo koro utasa chikuni gusu moshima oara shomo ku yaiomonnure ku ki na; nei ambe ani en gusu moshiri utasa chikuni otta akotukka, samata, moshiri gusu kuani utasa chikuni otta akotukka nisa ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, okarituye buri akire yakka gusu aepirikarep isama, shomo akire yakka aepirikare shomoki ruwe ne, koroka, ashiribe ne akara ambe anak epirikare ambe ne.
Tapan ikiri kari wa ikiri an no apkash obitta no okai utara kata ne yakka, Kamui koro Israeru kata ne yakka, itomo newa rampoken an kuni ku koramkoro.
Tewa no poka, nen ne yakka iteki en ramusarakka yan, inambe gusu ne yakun, Yesu koro kochihi ku netobake otta ku sei ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Iriwak utara, chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo korʼirenga echi kon ramat tura no an kuni ku koramkon na. Amen.
Kamui rengaine an gusu Kiristo Yesu koro Apostoro ne Pauros anak ne Epesos kotan ta okai aashkannere utara newa Kiristo Yesu gusu ikipniukesh utara otta kambi omande:
Chikoro Michi ne Kamui newa Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo orowa no irenga newa itomo echi gusu an an.
Kiristo oma kando oshiketa obitta no okai ramat gusu an kashnukarape ani un nunuke chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo koro Michi ne Kamui shinnunuke ne:
chi utara anak ne Shinunra teksamata omap ki hine, ashkanne newa pirisak no okai kuni ne, moshiri naa shomo akara etoko wano Kiristo gusu nei Kamui anak ne un numge nisa ruwe ne:
Shinunra etoko wano Yesu Kiristo ankushkerai gusu Kamui yaikota koro poho ne kuni uir kara gusu an ambe esanniyo,
awa, Shinunra koro Omap an guru gusu un otta nuye an no koropare arakuru newa irenga gusu ramuaye kuni ne koro keutum pirikap rengaine ambe an korachi nei no ki nisa ruwe ne na:
Shinunra koro kemihi gusu chi utara anak ne kikiaraye wa katpak
tusare ambe koro, tambe anak ne Kamui koro irenga oteknu ambe an korachi obitta no okai wayashnu ambe newa eramu ambe gusu un koropare nisa ruwe ne;
Shinunra koro keutum ta an anuinap rengaine a un eramande;
tap ambe anak ne epa kuni paha epa ita Shinuma gusu aesanniyo kando otta an okaibe ne yakka, toi kata an okaibe ne yakka, obitta no an okaibe Kiristo otta aukotamgere kuni gusu an ambe ne;
nep ne yakka yaikota rengaine ukoramkoro wa iki, aige, keutum an korachi etoko wano un esanniyo wa koro eikeshkorobe ne kuni un kara nisa ruwe ne;
tambe anak etoko wa Kiristo gusu chipachipa ki chi utara anak ne, Shinuma koro arakuru gusu airamye ambe ne kuni ne aki na;

echi utara ne yakka son no an itak, echi kashiobiuki gusu an pirika shongo echi nu okaketa, orowa, Shinuma gusu eishokoro ki okere chiki, Ashkanne Ramat gusu an eitakamkirep ani echi hau aomare ruwe ne;
tambe anak ne Kamui nupeki ramuayere kuni gusu an Kamui yaikota iki kikiraye ambe epeka Kamui eikeshkorobe emkoso asangep ne ruwe tapan na.
Tambe gusu, kuani ne yakka, echi utara Utarapa ne Yesu otta eishokoro ki ambe hene, obitta no okai Ashkanne utara gusu echi ki ikip ku nu gusu,
inonno-itak ku ki ita echi eshkarun wa ramma echi utara gusu yaiiraige ku ki ruwe ne;
aige, chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo koro Kamui, nupeki koro Michi, echi utara Shinuma eramande kuni ne echi wayashnure newa eramande gusu an ramat echi koropare;
shui, echi keutura ta okai shikihi makke hine, gusu echi utara ahotuyekara an chipachipa ambe hemhem, Ashkanne utara eikeshkoro kusu ne nupeki gusu an oteknu ambe hemhem,
orowa, eishokoro wa okai chi utara gusu Shinuma Kiristo otta okirashnu an kiroro yupu wa iki Shinuma shi no poro kiroro echi eramande
kuni gusu an ambe ne, Shinunra Kiristo rai orowa no hetopo-shiknure wa obitta no okai esapane ambe hene,

nrondum korobe hene, kiroro hene, enishpare ambe hene, samata, tan moshirʼotta okai patek shomo ne, koroka, iyoshi no ek moshiri ta ne yakka obitta no okai aporose reihei kasu no pasere kuni gusu, kando oshiketa shimontek samata Shinunra roktere nisa ruwe ne:
orowa shui, Shinuma obitta no okaibe Kiristo koro
chikiri choropoketa ande wa itaknure, samata, koro netobake ne, ani nep ne yakka shikte Kamui koro shikte-i ne, karisia gusu obitta no okaibe esapanere nisa ruwe ne na.
Kamui anak ne koro ouhaitap newa chikokatpak gusu rai okere echi utara kanna shiknure nisa ruwe ne;

teeda echi utara tane an ainu ikiri kara korachi nei ouhaitap newa chikokatpak kari apkash; shui, tane okai itakkashi ki poho oshiketa iki ramat ne taskoro-mau un kiroro esapanep nei no teeda echi apkash nisa;

etokota echi utara ne yakka nei utara tumugeta okai wa kara gusu an ibeporore ambe koro, kara newa yainu-hi gusu an okaibe ki rusui wa moshima okai utara korachi shiko orowa no irushka gusu an poho echi ne nisa ruwe ne: — koroka,
Kamui anak ne nuye an no rampoken koro wa, chi utara koro katpak gusu rai okere yakka,
poro omap-i ani un omap poka hi hine, Kiristo tura un shiknure nisa ruwe ne (irenga ankushkerai gusu echi utara kashiaobiuki nisa ruwe ne),
orowa, Shinunra tura un hetoposhiknure wa, Kiristo Yesu gusu Shinunra tura no kando un ushiketa un rokte nisa ruwe ne na:
tambe anak iyoshi no ek paha ikiri ta Kiristo Yesu oshiketa okai un epeka no an irenga newa iyeramuhauge ambe shi no nuye an no an ambe un nukare kusu ne okaibe ne:
inambe gusu ne yakun, irenga ani eishokor-i ankushkerai echi kashiaobiuki nisa ruwe ne; echi utara yaikota gusu an ambe shomo ne: koroka,
Kamui kore ambe ne ruwe ne: inan guru ne yakka shomo yaiomonnure ki kuni ne, ki ikip gusu echi

kashiaobiuki shomo ki ruwe ne. Chi utara anak ne Shinunra karape ne, pirikap iki gusu Kiristo Yesu otta akan nisa ruwe ne; nei pirika ikip otta apkash kuni ambe Kamui anak ne teeda etoko-oiki nisa ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu, tambe uonnere yan, etokota kam gusu Oya utara echi ne wa, teke ani kam otta akara Okarituye buri akire utara orowa no, Shomo-okarituye buri akire utara ani echi aporose nisa ruwe ne;

awa, nei rapoketa, echi utara Kiristo sak no okai, Israeru un utara koro ikiri gusu uwoyakta aande wa okai, eitakamkire gusu an uitaknup shomo koro, chipachipa kunip isam no Kamui sak no moshiri kata okai utara echi ne nisa ruwe ne.
Koroka, tane poka teeda ukattuima no okai echi utara anak ne Kiristo Yesu oshiketa, Kiristo koro kem gusu, ehange no arakire an ruwe ne.
Shinuma anak ne chikoro itomo ne wa gusu, nei tup ani shinep ne kara,

Shinuma nei tumugeta ash wa usaraye gusu an tumama hokushte wa ikashpaotte oshiketa okai ipawetenge gusu an tuitak, koro kam ani nei uwe-epokba ambe isamka ruwe ne; tambe anak ne Shinuma nei tup ani yaikota yaioshiketa shine ashiri ainu kara wa itomo hetukure kuni gusu an ambe ne;
orowa shui, nei ambe ani nei uwe-epokba ambe araige wa, utasa chikuni gusu, nei tup shine netobake koro hine Kamui tura irenga aratchire kuni gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne;
orowa, Shinuma ek wa ukattuima no okai echi utara otta itomo gusu an pirika shongo eupaskuma ki, shui, ehange no okai utara otta ne yakka itomo irenga eupaskuma ki nisa ruwe ne na:
inambe gusu ne yakun, Shinuma gusu tup ne okai chi utara anak ne shine Ramat otta Michi orun ehange no arakire nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, echi utara anak ne tane Oya utara hene, payekai utara hene shomo echi ne, koroka, Ashkanne utara tura, Kamui uni un utara tura shine moshiri uirup utara echi ne ruwe ne;
Apostoro newa uweingara utara kashiketa asama aande wa akarabe an utara echi ne, Kiristo Yesu yaikota nei sapane shikkeu nep ne ruwe ne;
Shinuma otta pishno okai aashte kunip anak ne auweunu wa Utarapa gusu Ashkanne kenru ne
shukup ruwe ne; Shinuma otta echi utara ne yakka Ramat ani Kamui gusu an oshiroma-i echi kara an na.
Tambe gusu, Oya utara echi utara rengap gusu Kiristo Yesu koro apakashnu guru Pauros ku ne anak,
echi utara gusu Kamui en shikkashimare kuni en koropare irenga echi nu nangora;
eeshiri moyo an itak ani ku nuye korachi, ekambakbe ani mukke wa an okaibe a
en eramande ruwe ne; nei ambe echi oro-oitak chiki, kuani Kiristo koro mukkep ku eraman ambe echi onnere kusu ne na;
tane Ramat ani koro Apostoro utara newa uweingara utara otta aekambakte nei no, nei ambe anak moshima okai ikiri ta ainu poho utara otta shomo aeramande nisa ruwe ne;
Oya utara anak ne pirika shongo gusu uko eikeshkoro utara ne, ukotura shine netobake un awehe ne, Kiristo Yesu koro eitakamkire ambe uko-uina utara ne ruwe ne;
koro kiroro ikip an gusu a en koropare Kamui irenga ne korarape an korachi, kuani anak ne nei pirika shongo otta yaishieiwangerere guru ku ne ruwe ne na.
Obitta no okai Ashkanne utara tumugeta an iyotta ponbe kasu no pokashnu guru ne en otta hunara eaikap pakno an Kiristo koro aeoteknup oya utara otta eupaskuma ki kuni irenga a en kore;
samata, obitta no okai ikiri wano nep ne yakka kara Kamui oshiketa mukke wa an asbikkashimarep obitta no okai utara otta nure kuni irenga a en koropare nisa ruwe ne;
tambe anak ne Kamui chikoro Utarapa ne Kiristo Yesu gusu shashuishiri wano an keutum an korachi,
tane kando un kiroro newa mondum koro utara otta karisia ani Kamui inne no okai wayashnu ambe anure kuni gusu ne na;
chi utara anak ne Shinuma eishokoro gusu rametok koro wa ehonnai shomoki no Kamui otta karange no araki ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu, echi utara gusu ku ki aerarachuptekbe gusu iteki echi ramurai kuni ku koramkoro; nei ambe anak ne echi gusu an nupeki ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, orowa no kando otta ne yakka
moshiri kata ne yakka pishno pishno okai uirup areikore Michi otta ku kokkaea ruwe ne;
Shinuma anak ne koro nupeki an ikoro esanniyo wa echi onnaigeta an ainu Shinuma kon ramat gusu kiroro
ani atumashnure hemhem ki, orowa, eishokor-i an gusu Kiristo anak ne echi koro keutum ta okai, samata, echi utara anak ne omap ambe orun shinrit oma hine
asama aande wa, obitta no okai Ashkanne utara tura aesanniyo eaikap an Kiristo koro omap-i eraman hine,
nei tomotuye ambe hene, epesh ambe hene, ri-hi hene, ooho-i hene, echi atumashnure wa onnere ki, orowa, Kamui koro aeshikbe ani echi aeshiktere kuni ne ku koramkon na.
Un oshiketa iki kiroro an korachi, chi utara koramkoro hene ki, esanniyo hene ki kasu no naa nuye an no kara eashkaibe otta,
Shinuma otta shashuishiri pakno karisia oshiketa hene, Kiristo Yesu oshiketa hene nupeki anro. Amen.
Tambe gusu, Utarapa gusu apakashnu guru kuani anak ne, echi okai utara yaieoripakka hene ki, ramushiroma hene ki, ramushiporore hene ki, uwe-utashpa omap hene ki hine uwe-eyai-shiporore hene ki,
orowa, gusu echi atak wa okai atak ambe kopakeot no apkash hene ki,
samata, itomo ari an kut ani akutkoro hine, shiarikiki no Ramat gusu an shinep ne ambe shikkashima hene echi ki kuni echi onishnishi ash na.
Echi utara poka atak wa okai wa nei atak ambe gusu shine chipachipap an korachi, shine netobake, shine Ramat an;
Shine Utarapa, shine eishokor-i, shine baptisma, utara obitta enishpare gusu shine Michi ne Kamui an,
Shinuma anak ne obitta no okai utara kashiketa an, obitta no okai utara gusu an, obitta no okai utara otta an ruwe ne.
Koroka, Kiristo sange aikrap apakari wa an wa, pishno pishno okai un otta irenga a un kore nisa.
Tambe gusu, shinunra ene itak-hi; —
Shinuma ri ushike oruu rikiu ita, teke-apashte ambe teke-pashte nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, utara otta aikrap koropare nisa ruwe ne na.
(Tapan Shinunra rikin, sekorʼan itak—Shinuma moshiri pokna an-i otta ne yakka ran moshima hemanda ne ya?
Ran guru anak ne nep ne yakka shikte kuni gusu, obitta no okai kando ara kashike orun ne yakka rikin guru uoyap shomo ne ruwe ne).

Orowa, Shinunra koropare aikrap anak ne Apostoro ne kuni sereke an; uweingara guru ne kuni sereke an; pirika shongo akore guru ne kuni sereke an; epungine guru newa epakashnu guru ne kuni sereke an ruwe ne;
tambe an chi utara obitta shinep ne an eishokor-i ki hine Kamui Poho eraman wa rupne guru ne, Kiristo gusu an aeshikte ambe upak an kewe ri pakno shukup ash kuni ne,
shieiwangere-hi gusu Kiristo kon netobake aashte gusu, Ashkanne utara eramushinnere kuni gusu an ambe ne;

tewa no chi utara anak ne nokan utara shomo chi ne wa, irara wa utara chinorep gusu shomo ashiren wa obitta no okai epakashi gusu koshunge an kokandama ambe ari aye rera ani iteki ekeshne-ekeshne ashishuye kuni gusu an ambe ne;
koroka, omap wa sonep ki hine nep ne yakka gusu sapaha ne Kiristo otta shukup kuni gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne na;
Shinuma gusu pishno okai ikra koropare ambe an gusu, netobake ebitta irammakaka aurukire wa uweyupu hine pishno an awehe ki ikip an korachi, omap ki wa netobake shukupte wa yaiashte ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, tapne ku ye wa Utarapa gusu paweteshu ku ki: — Oya utara ka keutum raka-sakbe otta, koro oshike un ramusakbe gusu, koro sarabe nishte wa gusu,
Kamui inotu orowa no uwoyakta an wa eraman kuni mondum akunnere wa an gusu apkash korachi, iteki nei no echi apkash yan;
nei utara yainikoroshmap erampeutek wa yaikoshipuinere hine obitta no okai ichakkere ambe iraugetupa kuni ne ramupekere otta yaikoropare nisa ruwe ne.
Koroka, echi utara anak ne nei no korachi shomo Kiristo eyaihannokkara ruwe ne;
echi utara Yesu oshike un son no ambe an korachi Shinuma otta ko-nu wa Shinuma otta aepakashnure an nisa ruwe ne:
nei ambe tapne ne, kokandama oina iki rusuibe gusu awende wa an fushko ainu etoko an buri tura oyakta ande hine,
echi keutum oma ramat ashin no akara wa Kamui gusu,
oupekap gusu hemhem, son no unbe newa turu-sakbe otta hemhem akara ashiri ainu yaimire kuni ambe ne ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu, echi utara anak ne shungep ande wa pishno pishno aun guru otta son no ambe ye yan: chi utara anak ne uwe-utashpa an awehe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na Irushka wa iteki katpak ki:
chup ahun pakno iteki irushka yan:
samata, nitne Kamui gusu ushike iteki kara yan.
Ikka nisa guru anak ne tewa no iteki ikka yanro: koroka, eishiramne guru otta koropare kuni okaibe an kuni ne, monraige wa koro teke ani pirikap ki yan.
Echi paro wano iteki wen itak sange yan, koroka, nu utara otta irenga an kuni gusu eashkai pakno wayashnure pirikap sange yan.
Kikiraye kuni toho pakno ani echi utara han aomare Kamui koro Ashkanne Ramat iteki oknatara yan.
Obitta no okai iporo-shiube hene, kinrakarabe hene, irushka ambe hene, irambotarare ambe hene, koatcha ambe hene, obitta no okai wenbe tura oyakta ande yan:
orowa, utashpa uweramuhauge ki hine uweramuhapuru yan, Kamui anak ne Kiristo gusu ka echi koro chikokatpak tusare korachi, echi utara ne yakka uweutashpa tusare yan.
Tambe gusu, aomap an poho utara nei no Kamui eikosamba utara ne yan; orowa, omap ki wa apkash,
Kiristo ne yakka echi omap wa un rengap gusu niwa hura an aikrap newa ayange kunip gusu Kamui otta yaikota yaiyange korachi ki yan.
Koroka, hoiyo newa obitta no okai ichakkere ambe hene, yaikoshipuinere ambe ne yakka, ashkanne kuni utara an korachi, echi tumugeta porose poka iteki ki yan;
samata, turu-ushbe hene, katchak itak hene, eoya-itak ambe hene, iteki porose yan, tap okaibe oupak no an ambe shomo ne ruwe ne: koroka, makangane ko-yaiiraige ki yan.

Echi utara pirika no tambe uonnere na, hoiyo ki guru hene, ichakkere guru hene, yaikoshipuinere ki guru hene, potoki ko-ongami guru hene, Kiristo newa Kamui moshiri oara eikeshkoro shomoki ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Oha itak ani nenka orowa no iteki aeyaikokandama kuni okai yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, tap okaibe an gusu itakkashi utara kashiketa Kamui irushka-hi kashiaomare ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, iteki nei utara tura ukouina yan;
inambe gusu ne yakun, teeda echi utara kurokokbe echi ne a koroka, tane anak Utarapa otta pekerebe echi ne ruwe ne gusu ne na:
pekere poho korachi apkash yan (pekere hetukup anak ne pirikap otta hene, oupekap otta hene, sonep otta hene an ambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne),
Utarapa nupetnere ambe uwande wa okai yan:
shui, ibe-sak no an kurokok buri shomo ukokoro wa nei ambe koipishi wa esanniyo yan,
inambe gusu ne yakun, nuina no nei utara ki ikip aporose yakka yainikoroshmarep ne ruwe ne gusu ne na Koroka,
obitta no okaibe akoipishi wa aesanniyo chiki pekere gusu anukare ambe ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, nep ne yakka pekereka ambe
anak ne pekere ne ruwe ne gusu ne na. Tambe gusu, Shinuma ene itak-hi—Mokoro wa an guru mosh wa rai-hi orowa no hetopo-shiknu yan, orowa, Kiristo anak ne e orun pekere atte kusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, nekon a echi apkash ya yaitubare yan; wayasap guru korachi shomo ne no wayashnu guru nei no ki yan;
toho wen wa gusu pakihi kikiraye yan.
Tambe gusu iteki ramu-sak no okai yan, koroka, Utarapa irenga nekon a ambe ne ya esanniyo yan.
Samata, otta esanasapte an tonoto gusu iteki ihoshki yan, koroka, Ramat ani aeshik no okai yan; orowa,
iyohaiochish ani hene, shinotcha ani hene, ramat oma yairap ani hene, uweutashpa itak, orowa, koro keutum ta Utarapa gusu shinotcha ki wa hau ashte yan;
ramma nep ne yakka gusu chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo kon reihei ankushkerai akoro Michi ne Kamui otta koyaiiraige ki;
samata, Kiristo gusu an ishitoma-hi koro wa uweutashpa yai-uitaknure yan.
Machi ne utara, Utarapa otta itaknu korachi, echi koro hoku otta ne yakka ki yan.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, hoku ne guru anak ne koro machi sapaba ne, Kiristo poka karisia koro sapaba ne wa, yaikota nei netobake kashiobiuki ambe korachi ne na.
Koroka, karisia anak ne Kiristo otta koitaknu korachi, tambe nei no machi ne utara ne yakka nep ne yakka gusu
koro hoku otta koitaknu yan. Hoku ne utara, Kiristo anak ne karisia omap wa nei ambe gusu yaiyange nei no, echi utara poka shem korachi koro machi omap yan;
Shinuma nei no ki ambe anak ne, itak ani wakka otta furaye wa nei karisia turu-sakte, aige, ashkannere hene ki wa,
echi ne wa ukokomonse nei no an okaibe sak no, koroka, ashkanue, turu-sak no Shinuma nei karisia ani nupeki an karisia yaikota otta kore kuni kan nisa ruwe ne.
Tap korachi poka hoku ne utara anak ne yaikota koro netobake omap korachi koro machi ne yakka omap kuni gusu ne a ambe ne. Yaikota koro machi omap guru anak ne yaikota yaiomap ruwe ne:
yaikota koro kam etunne guru shinen ka isam; koroka, Kiristo anak ne koro karisia poka omap korachi, utara anak ne koro kara ne yakka reshpa wa nitata ruwe ne;
chi utara Shinuma kon netobake oma awehe chi ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, ainu anak ne koro ona koro unu ande wa koro machi tura ko-an, orowa, nei tun anak ne shine kara ne kusu ne.
Tan mukkep anak ne poro: koroka, Kiristo newa karisia epeka no ku ye na.
Yakka, echi utara pishno yaikota yaiomap korachi yaikota koro machi omap yan; orowa, machi ne guru anak ne koro hoku ko-oripak yan.
Nokan utara, Utarapa gusu echi koro eshikop otta koitaknu yan:
tambe echi ki kunip ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Aokai irammakaka ohonno moshiri koishu kuni ne e koro ona e koro unu ko-oripak yan (tambe anak uitaknu koro atpake an ikashpaotte ne ruwe ne na).
Orowa, Michi ne echi utara, iteki echi koro poho irushkare yan: koroka, Utarapa gusu an pakashnu ambe hene, onishinishi ambe hene ani reshpa yan.
Ausshiune an echi utara, Kiristo otta korachi, shine keutura koro wa tusushke newa ishitoma kane ki hine kara gusu an echi kon nishpa gusu koitaknu yan;
utara nupetnere anukara kuni gusu shomo ne no, koroka, sarabe osshi wano Kamui irenga ki hine Kiristo koro usshiune utara korachi ki yan;
irenga keutum koro wa utara otta korachi shomo ne no,

Utarapa otta iki korachi yaishieiwangere yan: aige, nep ne yakka pishno okai echi utara ki pirikap gusu, usshiune guru ne a yakka, rengaine an mondum koro guru ne a yakka shui nei ambe Utarapa orowa no

akore kusu ne na, sekoro uonnere yan. Orowa, nishpa ne echi utara, shinuma utara gusu nei no ki wa, iteki kosakayokara yan; aige, nei utara kon nishpa ne yakka echi kon nishpa ne yakka kando oshiketa an sekoro esanniyo yan, orowa, Shinuma anak ne ainu chari ainu kowen keutura shomo kon ruwe ne na.
Tewa no, Utarapa newa Shinuma koro kiroro oina tumashnu ambe gusu aeyaitumashnure no okai yan.
Echi utara nitne kamui kokandama ambe esbishi eashkai kuni ne, Kamui hayokbe utomchiure yan.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, chi ki ukotereke ambe anak ne kem newa kara tura ikip shomo ne, koroka, esapanep tura hene, mondum korobe tura hene, tapan kunne-i moshiri esapanep tura hene, kando un ushiketa okai wen ramat tura hene ukotereke ambe ne ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, wen toho ta echi eshishi hemhem ki, orowa, obitta no okaibe kara wa echi roshki hemhem ki eashkai kuni ne, Kamui koro obitta no okai hayokbe koro yan.
Tambe gusu, echi roshki kane sonep ani kutkoro,
oupeka ambe ani rerara-kotukbe koro, itomo an pirika shongo etokooiki-hi ani chikiri otta eushi;
samata, ani nitnep koro obitta no okai abe-o ai ushka eashkai gusu an eishokor-i ari an kikhumbe koro yan.
Orowa, kashiobiuki-hi ani kane pon kasa ne koro, samata, Kamui itak ari an Ramat un rangetam ne koro yan;
shui, ramma-kane Ramat otta obitta no okai inonno newa koramkorobe ani inonno-itak ki, orowa, nei okaibe gusu shiure wa obitta no okai ashkanne utara gusu yaishiporore hine koramkoro,
samata, ku paroho ku maka wa pirika shongo gusu an anuina ambe ku eupaskuma ehonnai shomoki no a en itakte kuni ne,
nei ambe gusu shomo ehonnai no ku ki wa ku ye kusu ne ap korachi ku ye kuni ne, en gusu koramkoro yan; nei ambe gusu kani shinkop eok ateshkara guru ku ne ruwe ne na.

Koroka, echi utara anak ne kuani nekon a iki ya, en gusu an orushpe ne yakka echi nu kuni gusu, aomap an iriwak ne Utarapa otta ikipniukesh wa yaishieiwangere Tikikus anak obitta no okaibe echi nure kusu ne na:
tambe gusu, echi orun shinuma ku arapare ruwe ne, echi utara un gusu an orushpe aeramande wa echi keutum aomaoma kuni ne ruwe tapan na.
Michi ne Kamui newa Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo orowa no iriwak ne utara otta itomo newa eishokor-i tura omap ambe an kuni ku koramkoro.
Turu-sak no chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo omap obitta no okai utara otta irenga an na.
Kiristo Yesu koro usshiune utara ne Pauros newa Timoteos anak ne Piripoi kotan ta okai ashkanne utara episkopos newa deakonos tura orota kambi omande na:
chikoro Michi ne Kamui newa Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo orowa no irenga newa itomo echi gusu an an na.
Atpake an toho wano tane pakno pirika shongo otta echi utara en tura no ko-okai gusu,
ramma echi eshkarun wa ku goro Kamui otta yaiiraige ku ki;
orowa, ramma obitta no okai echi utara gusu pishno pishno an ku ki inonno-itak yaikopuntek wa ku ki na;
echi oshiketa pirika ikip heashire Kamui anak ne Yesu-Kiristo koro toho pakno nei ambe eramushinnere kusu ne a ambe,

tambe gusu, ku eishokon ruwe ne: obitta echi utara gusu tap korachi poka ku esanniyo ambe anak ne pirikap ne, inambe gusu ne yakun, ku goro tupep otta hene, pirika shongo gusu kikikara wa ashte ambe otta hene, echi utara obitta en tura irenga koro utara echi ne pakno, echi koro keutura ta en eshkarun ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Yesu Kiristo koro keutura ta obitta no okai echi utara gusu ku yaikatekara ambe Kamui paweteshu ruwe ne.
Orowa, tambe gusu inonno-itak ku ki: echi ki omap ambe anak ne naa naa eramu ambe otta hene,
obitta no okai ramepakari otta hene aporore wa iyotta pirika okaibe echi esanniyo kuni ne ruwe ne;
samata, Kamui aramye kuni an, otta nupeki atte kuni an Yesu Kiristo gusu hetuku oupeka oma ibehe ani aeshik wa Kiristo koro toho pakno echi turu-sak wa shomo ureepetchiure kuni an ambe ne ruwe ne.
Tambe, iriwak utara, echi onnere kuni ku kon rusui, en gusu hetuku orushpe anak ne makangane pirika shongo assuru ashte gusu an ap ne;
Kiristo gusu ku tupep anak ne esapane guru epungine obitta no okai tumikoro utara otta hemhem, obitta no okai moshima utara otta hemhem anukarape pakno an ap ne; orowa,
shui, Utarapa gusu an iriwak utara poro sereke anak ne ku goro tupep gusu rametokkoro wa naa kiroro yupu hine ishitoma shomoki no Kamui itak ye ruwe ne.
Eyairamikashure newa upaore gusu poka Kiristo eupaskuma ki utara okai: shui, pirika irenga an gusu ki utara ka okai:
eatteketa okai utara anak ne kuani pirika shongo kikikara gusu aashte guru ne sekoro eraman gusu,

omap ki wa upaskuma ki ruwe ne: shui, eatteketa okai utara anak ne kuani atupetupe an-hi kashita en eramuchuptekka rusui gusu, son no keutum koro shomoki no sakayo an gusu Kiristo orushpe assuru ashte ruwe ne na.

Yakun, nekon a an he ne ya? ouse nekon a ka, shunge ani hene ya, son no ambe ani hene ya, Kiristo anak ne assuru aashte ruwe ne; tambe gusu, ku nupetne ruwe ne, ruwe un, tambe gusu ku nupetne kusu ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, tap okaibe anak ne echi koro ki koramkorobe newa Yesu Kiristo kon Ramat ikashui ambe an gusu en kashiobiuki kusu ne na,

sekoro ku eraman; kuani ara kon rusui wa chipachipa ambe anak ne ene ani ne, nep ne yakka gusu shomo a en yainikoroshmare koroka, ramma korachi tane poka, ku shiknu yakka, ku rai yakka, Kiristo anak ne ku netobake otta pasere kuni ambe ne ruwe tapan na.
Kuani gusu shiknu ambe anak ne Kiristo ne, rai ambe anak ne yaiepirikare ambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, kam otta shiknu ambe anak ne, — tambe anak ku monraige gusu an hetuku ibehe ne chiki, yakun, hemanda ku numge kusu ne ya, sekoro ku erampeutek ruwe ne.
Koroka, tan tup gusu ku utumashire ruwe ne, ku oman wa Kiristo tura no ku an rusui; tambe anak kasu no pirika ruwe ne:
yakka, kam otta ku an-i anak ne echi utara gusu naa an kunip ne ruwe tapan na.
Orowa, tap korachi ku eishokoro gusu, ku an wa riya sekoro ku eraman, ruwe ne wa echi utara eishokoro ki wa naa nupetne no okai kuni ne obitta no okai echi tura no ku an wa ku riya kusu ne;
tambe anak ne shui kuani echi tura no ku an hine ku rengap gusu Kiristo Yesu oshiketa naa kasu no echi ramuritetke wa okai kuni gusu ne na.

Koroka, echi ki buri anak ne Kiristo koro pirika shongo kopakeat kuni ne ki yan: tambe anak, kuani ku ek wa echi nukara hene ki, shomo ku ek no echi koro orushpe ku nu hene ku ki chiki echi utara shine keutum koro wa uwetushmak no pirika shongo gusu shikkashima hine shine ramat otta tumashnu no echi roshki kuni ne kara yan;

orowa, echi ipokba utara gusu okai nep orushpe an yakka iteki ishitoma no okai yan: nei ambe anak ne, nei utara gusu an aisamka kuni anukara shiroshi ne, koroka, echi utara gusu Kamui orowa no an kashiobiuki-hi gusu an ap ne ruwe tapan na;
inambe gusu ne yakun, Kiristo ankushkerai echi utara anak ne ouse Shinuma eishokoro patek shomo ne, koroka, Shinuma rengap gusu ayairamshitnere kuni-hi ne yakka echi otta akore ruwe ne:
shui, teeda en oshiketa echi nukara, orowa shui, tane an en otta an sekoro anu yairamkoiki ambe echi utara kon ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu, Kiristo otta aomaoma ambe an, omap-i gusu keutura ratchire ambe an, Ramat gusu ukopoyege ambe an, kuroma newa rampokiwen wa akore ambe an chiki, echi utara shine yainu-hi ki,
shine omap ambe kishima, Shine keutum koro, shineatki no ramuoshma wa en nupetnere wa en eramushinnere yan;
nep ne yakka echi ki ita anak ne sakayo newa yaiomonnure gusu iteki ki yan, koroka, keutum yaieoripakka wa moshima okai utara anak ne yaikota kasu no pirikap ne sekoro pishno pishno esanniyo yan;
pishno echi utara anak ne iteki yaikota korobe otta ingara yan, koroka, echi pishno moshima an guru korobe ne yakka nukara yan.
Kiristo Yesu koro keutum ta tap esanniyo korachi echi utara ne yakka esanniyo yan;
Shinuma anak ne Kamui kat nep koro an, awa, Kamui tura ueripak an ambe anak aoshkoro kash pa kunip ne sekoro esanniyo shomoki nisa ruwe ne,
koroka, Shinuma anak ne yaikota yaiohare hine ausshiune guru kat nep koro uk, awa, ainu nokaha korachi ne nisa ruwe ne;
orowa, koro katuhu anak ne ainu nei no an ap anukarape ne gusu, Shinuma yaieoripakka wa rai pakno itaknu ki, ruwe un, utasa chikuni otta araige pakno itaknu ki nisa ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu ka Kamui anak ne shi no Shinuma pasere wa kando otta hene, moshiri kata hene, moshiri choropoketa hene obitta no okai reihei kasu no assuru an reihei koropare nisa ruwe ne;
Yesu ari an reihei otta obitta no okai kokkasap anak ne komo hemhem ki,
samata, obitta no okai parumbe anak ne Michi ne Kamui nupeki gusu Yesu Kiristo anak Utarapa ne sekoro eyaipushi kuni hemhem ki ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Tambe gusu, ku omap an utara, echi utara anak ne ramma kane itaknu ki wa ouse ku an rapoketa korachi shomo ne no, koroka, naa kasu no ku isam ita ne yakka ishitoma wa tusushke hine kashiaobiuki kuni gusu ki yan;
inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui anak ne koro pirika irenga rengaine gusu echi onnaigeta iki wa echi keutum attere hemhem ki, echi monraigere hemhem ki ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Echi utara chikokatpak sak newa pekashnu hine wen wa oheuge ainu ikiri tumta turusak no an Kamui poho utara echi ne, aige, nei utara tumuge un moshirʼotta echi okai wa inotu oma itak eukoturire tombe korachi anukara kuni ne,
oromam newa upaore shomoki no nep ne yakka kara yan:
kuani raka sak no shomo ku hoyupu, raka sak no shomo ku monraige wa, Kiristo koro toho ta kuani yaiomonnure ushike an kuni ne nei no ki yan.
Ruwe un, echi koro eishokor-i gusu an ayangep newa yaishieiwangere ambe gusu a en enomi chiki, ku nupetne, obitta no okai echi utara tura ramu-ritetke ruwe ne:
nei no korachi echi utara ne yakka nupetne hine en tura no ramu-ritetke yan.
Koroka kuani echi orushpe ku nu wa aomaoma kuni gusu, nahun Utarapa ne Yesu irenga gusu echi orota Timoteos ku omande kunibe koro yainu ruwe ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, son no newa shinuma korachi echi gusu an orushpe kashiramu kusu ne a guru isam ruwe ne.
Obitta no okai utara anak yaikota korobe hunara, Yesu Kiristo korobe shomo hunara ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, Shinuma anak ne nekon a auwande-i an a ainu ne ya sekoro echi eraman, poho koro michi ikashui korachi, shinuma pirika shongo assuru ashte-hi gusu en ikashui nisa ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu, en gusu nekon a akara ya ku eraman chiki, nani echi otta shinuma ku omande kunibe koro yainu ruwe ne:
koroka, kuani yaikota tewa no tunashi no echi orun ku oman kuni Utarapa gusu ku chipachipa ruwe ne.

Koroka, ku iriwak ne guru, tura no monraige, tura no tumikoro guru ne, echi orowa no aette wa ku eishiramnep gusu yaishieiwangere an Epaproditus echi orota nekon a ka aomande kunip ne sekoro ku esanniyo nisa ruwe ne;
inambe gusu ne yakun, shinuma anak ne tashum ki ruwe ne sekoro echi nu a gusu, nei guru shi no yairamkoiki wa echi enishomap nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na;

son no poka shinuma rai ehange pakno tashum ki: koroka, Kamui anak ne shinuma ko-erampokiwen wa kore nisa ruwe ne; orowa, shui, Shinuma patek shomo ne, koroka, kuani anak yairamkoiki wa naa yairamkoiki kashpa shomo ku ki kuni ne, en poka ko-erampokiwen wa kore nisa ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu echi utara kanna-shui shinuma nukara chiki, yaikopuntek, samata, kuani ne yakka naa isaika no yairamkoiki kuni ne yaikikip no echi orun ku omande nisa ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu, Utarapa oshiketa shinuma uk wa nupetne yan; samata, nei no okai ainu ko-oripak yan:

inambe gusu ne yakun, shinuma anak Kiristo koro moni gusu rai ehange nisa ruwe ne, echi utara en gusu yaishieiwangere kunip aeikohayep epakte gusu koro inotu aeyaikikip no aisamka ange shiri iki nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orokeseta, ku iriwak utara, Utarapa oshiketa enupetne yan. Ukorachi an ap echi utara gusu ku nuye ambe anak ne ku erannak poka shomo ku ki ruwe ne,
koroka, echi utara gusu pirikarep ne. Nei seta yaitubare, wenbe ki utara yaitubare, tuye ki utara yaitubare yan:

inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui Ramat ani ongami hene ki, Kiristo Yesu otta yaiomonnure hene ki, samata, kara gusu shomo eyaikopashte-i hene ki chi utara anak ne son no okarituye buri akire utara chi ne ruwe ne:
koroka, kuani yaikota anak ne kara gusu poka eyaikopashte ushike an na: nenka moshima guru anak ne kam gusu eyaikopashte-i an sekoro yainu chiki, kuani anak ne naa kasu no an:
tupesan ikinne an toho ta okarituye buri akire, Israeru sanikiri ne, Benyamin koro ikiri un guru ne, Hebrai un utara un Hebrai un guru ku ne ruwe ne; tuitak gusu Parisee un guru ne,
keutum opopmau kara gusu karisia keshke; tuitak gusu an oupeka ambe gusu oheuge sak no anukan nisa ruwe ne.
Yakka, en epirikare ambe anak ne Kiristo gusu so-no-ki ambe ne sekoro ku esanniyo nisa ruwe ne na.

Ruwe ne wa, son no un, ku goro Utarapa ne Kiristo Yesu eramambe pirikap gusu kuani obitta no okaibe so-no-ki ambe ari ku esanniyo nisa; Shinuma gusu obitta no okaibe kuani so-no-ki wa aemakbap ne sekoro ku esanniyo;

tambe anak ne Kiristo ku epirikare wa Shinuma oshiketa a en nukara, samata, tuitak gusu hetuku yaikota koro oupeka ambe koro shomoki, koroka, Kiristo otta an eishokor-i gusu hetuku oupeka ambe, — eishokor-i gusu Kamui orowa no hetuku oupeka

ambe ku koro kuni gusu an ambe ne: orowa, kuani anak ne Shinuma newa Shinuma hetopo-shiknu ambe gusu an kiroro newa Shinuma tura ayairamshitnere ambe ki hine ku eraman wa Shinuma ki rai ambe nep koro korachi a en kara;
aige, nekon a ka kuani rai-i orowa no hetopo ku shiknu kuni gusu aki na.

Kuani koro okere nei no shomo ne, samata, kuani aeramushinnere okere nei no shomo ne: koroka, nekon a ka, gusu Kiristo Yesu ani a en shikkashima okaibe, kuani ne yakka shikkashima kuni gusu ku keshke na.
Iriwak utara, kuani shikkashima okere sekoro yaikota shomo ku esanniyo: koroka, tan shinep an, oshmake un okaibe ku oira hine kotchake un okaibe orun ku turi,
aige, Kiristo Yesu oshiketa Kamui rik oro atak kuni aoshkorobe ari an oshikpekarep orun ku keshke ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, aeramushinne okere obitta no okai chi utara anak ne nei no esanniyo ashro; orowa, nep okaibe gusu shinnai no echi sanniyo chiki tambe poka Kamui anak ne echi eramande kusu ne:
ouse pakno shirepa ash okere-hi gusu nei no korachi apkash ashro.
Iriwak utara, en tura eikoisamba utara ne wa, chi utara ani aikoikarabe ne kara hine apkash utara esanniyo yan.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, gusu kanna-kanna echi nure ash utara, samata, tane ku chish poka echi nure ash inne utara apkash, aige, Kiristo koro utasap gusu keshke utara ne ruwe ne;
nei utara okere-i anak ne aisamka ambe ne, koro Kamui anak koro honihi ne, aeyainikoroshma kuni ambe iramye, nioshirʼotta okaibe esanniyo ruwe ne.
Chikoro moshiri anak ne kando otta an; nei i wano Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo ari aye kashiobiukip ek kuni poka chi ehuye wa okai ruwe ne:
Shinuma anak ne ani obitta no okaibe yaikota otta itaknure eashkai iki-hi nei no an no chikoro aeoripakka an netobake ashinno kara hine koro nupeki an netobake korachi kara kusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, aomap an, aeyaikatekara an, ku nupetne arabe, ku sapa-umbe ne iriwak utara, tap korachi akoro omap an utara Utarapa otta roshki yan.
Utarapa otta shine keutum koro kuni ne Euodia ku onishnishi, Sintike ne yakka ku onishnishi ruwe ne.

Ruwe ne wa, en tura son no monraige ki guru aokai ne yakka ku onishnishi ruwe ne, tan shiwentep utara ikashiu yan, inambe gusu ne yakun, nei utara anak ne Kurementos ne yakka, orowa moshima okai kon reihei inotu un kambi-sosh kata anuye wa an en tura monraige utara poka pirika shongo otta monraige nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Ramma Utarapa enupetne yan: shui, nupetne yan, ani ku ye.
Echi kon rotcha keutum obitta no okai utara otta nukare yan.
Utarapa ehange no an. Nep ne yakka gusu iteki nishomap yan; koroka, nep ne yakka gusu iyaiiraige wa inonno-itak ani, koramkor-i ani echi eishiramnep Kamui nure yan.
Orowa, obitta no okai eraman kuni mondum akkari kara Kamui itomo irenga, Kiristo Yesu gusu echi yainu-hi hemhem echi keutura hemhem epungine kusu ne na.

Orokeseta, iriwak utara, nep ne yakka son no arabe, nep ne yakka aeoripak kuni arabe, nep ne yakka oupeka arabe, nep ne yakka turu-sak ambe, nep ne yakka aomap kuni ambe, nep ne yakka pirika assuru koro ambe; nep ka buri pirika ushike an chiki, nep ka ramye kuni ushike an chiki, tap okaibe esanniyo yan.
Echi utara anak ne eyaihannokkara hene ki, akore hene ki, nu hene ki, en otta nukara hene ki okaibe, tap okaibe kara yan; orowa, itomo koro Kamui echi tura an kusu ne na.

Koroka, tane an aine echi utara anak ne shui en eshkarun gusu, Utarapa otta shi no ku nupetne ruwe ne; nei ambe gusu echi utara anak ne eshkarun poka echi ki nisa, koroka, kara kusu ne i isam ruwe ne na.
Kuani nepka eikohaye gusu ku ye shomoki; inambe gusu ne yakun, nekon a i an a yakka nei ambe gusu aeramushinne kuni ku eyaihannokkara okere.
Yaishiwennere ambe hene, nuye an no koro ambe hene, ku eraman: nep ne yakka gusu, obitta no okaibe gusu, akironnu ambe hene sambe-chinoiba ambe hene, nuye an no koro ambe hene, eikohaye ambe hene,
ku eyaihannokkara nisa ruwe ne. En tumashnure Kamui oshiketa kuani nep ne yakka ki eashkai ruwe ne.
Yakka echi utara anak ne ku ki aeramuchuptekbe gusu en tura no echi ki-hi anak pirika ruwe ne.

Orowa, Piripoi un echi utara, pirika shongo eatpakeheta, kuani Makedonia kotan orowa no ku hopumba ita anak ne, echi utara moshima, kore hene ki akore hene ki orushpe gusu, en tura no ki karisia isam, sekoro, echi utara yaikota echi eraman;
Tessaronike otta poka kuani aeishiramnep an gusu kanna-kanna en otta echi teshkara nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Aikrap ku hunara gusu shomo ne; koroka, echi utara gusu nuye an no hetuku ibehe ku hunara gusu ne ruwe tapan na.
Koroka, nep ne yakka ku koro wa nuye an no ku an; Epaproditos koro wa ek echi orowa no okai shisak hura pirikap, uk kuni ayangep, Kamui nupetnere okaibe, ku uk okere gusu kuani kironnu wa an ruwe ne.
Orowa, ku goro Kamui anak ne Kiristo Yesu oshiketa nupeki otta okai koro oteknu ambe an a-i korachi obitta no an echi eishiramne ambe uweomare kusu ne na.
Tane shashuishiri wano shashuishiri pakno chikoro Kamui ne Michi orota arakuru an na. Amen.
Kiristo Yesu otta ashkanne guru pishno rangarap yan. En tura no okai iriwak utara anak ne echi otta rangarap ki.
Obitta no okai Ashkanne utara echi otta rangarap an, Kaisaros chisei un utara anak ne makangane nei no ki na.
Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo korʼirenga echi kon ramat tura an kuni akoramkon na.
Kamui rengaine an gusu Kiristo Yesu koro Apostoro ne Pauros newa akoro iriwak ne Timoteos anak ne,
Korosai kotan ta oshiroma Kiristo oshiketa okai ashkanne utara newa ikipniukesh uiriwak utara orun kambi omande na: chikoro Michi ne Kamui orowa no irenga newa itomo echi gusu anro.
Chi utara anak ne chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo koro Michi ne Kamui otta koyaiiraige ki hine ramma echi utara gusu inonno-itak ki na:
eeshiri echi otta ek pirika shongo oma son no arabe an itak ani echi nu kando otta echi utara gusu eumashnu wa an aechipachipa ambe gusu,
Kiristo Yesu otta echi ki eishokor-i hene, obitta no okai ashkanne utara gusu echi ki omap ambe hene chi nu nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na:
nei ambe poka moshirʼebitta ta okai wa ibehe hetukure hine shipiraspa, aige, nei arabe echi nu wa son no ka un Kamui irenga echi eraman toho wano echi otta ne yakka korachi ne;
echi utara gusu Kiristo koro ikipniukesh aeyaishieiwangere guru ne chikoro omap an tura iki usshiune Epapras orowa no ka echi yaihannokkara korachi ne;
shinuma anak, shui, Ramat otta an echi omap arabe un nure nisa ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, chi utara ne yakka, nei orushpe nu toho orowa no echi utara anak ne obitta no okai ramat oma wayashnu ambe newa eraman-i otta Shinuma koro irenga eramanbe ani echi aeshikno an kuni hene,

samata, Utarapa nupetnere kuni kopakeatbe otta echi apkash hine obitta no okai pirika ikip otta ibehe hetukure wa Kamui oma eramanbe otta naa shukup kuni ne okere shomoki no inonno-itak chi ki wa koramkoro shiriki okai;
Shinuma koro nupeki ani kiroro an korachi, nupetne hine obitta no okai yaiyupupu arabe newa ramushiporore ambe gusu, obitta no okai kiroro ani atumashnure:
orowa, pekere otta okai ashkanne utara tura aeikeshkoro kuni an ambe chi uina kuni ne un kopakeatte Michi otta koyaiiraige ki;
Shinuma anak ne kunne kiroro orowa no un ohaitare wa, koro omap an Toho koro moshiri orun un ahupte nisa ruwe ne;
samata, Shinuma ankushkerai kikiaraye arabe chi koro, aige, chikoro katpak atusare an na:
Shinuma anak ne anukara eaikap Kamui koro nokaha ne, obitta no okai akarabe etoko hetukup ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, kando oshiketa okai yakka,
moshiri kata okai yakka, anukarabe ne a yakka, anukara eaikapbe ne a yakka, araset hene, enishpane arabe hene, esapane arabe hene, nrondum korope hene ne yakka obitta Shinuma otta akan nisa ruwe ne;
obitta no okaibe Shinuma ankushkerai akara, Shinuma otta akan na; aige, Shinuma anak ne obitta no okaibe eto-kota an, samata, Shinuma gusu obitta no okaibe roshki ruwe ne.
Orowa, Shinuma anak ne nei netobake ne karisia koro sapaha ne: atpake an ap ne, rai-i orowa no hoshike hetukup ne ruwe ne; Shinuma obitta no okaibe gusu esapanep ne kuni gusu ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, obitta no okai eupakte-i Shinuma oshiketa oshiroma kuni ambe anak Shinuma irenga ne ruwe ne gusu ne na;
