samata, koro utasap kemihi ani itomo ashte hine, Shinuma ankushkerai gusu yai otta obitta no okaibe irenga usaraye kuni gusu ne na; moshiri kata okaibe ne a yakka, kando oshiketa okaibe ne a yakka, Shinuma ankushkeraipo aratchire kuni gusu nep.
Orowa, echi utara anak ne etoko wa echi wen ikichi arabe gusu echi koro keutum oshke uwoyake an hine epokba utara echi ne a yakka,
Shinuma kotchaketa ashkanne newa turu-sak newa wen-buri sak no echi roshkire kuni ne, tane, Shinuma rai arabe koro kara netobake oshiketa irenga usaraye nisa ruwe ne:

echi utara anak ne nei eisbokor-i ta asamaha ande hine yaiatte wa kando choropoketa an obitta no okaibe otta echi nu okere aeupaskuma pirika shongo gusu an chipachipa arabe orowa no shomo oyakta okai wa echi okai yakun, nei no an ruwe ne; Pauros ne kuani anak ne gusu yaishieiwangere guru ku ne ruwe ne na.

Tane anak ne echi utara gusu ku iki yai ramshitnere arabe ku enupetne ruwe ne, aige, kuani anak Kiristo iki aeramchuptekbe eikohaye ambe karisia ne Shinuma kon netobake gusu ku kara otta kashi iyo wa upakte ruwe ne;
otusashiri wano okai uirup ikiri otta eshina wa an mukkep ne Kamui itak uweomare kuni gusu, echi utara epeka a en kore Kamui en kara ambe nei no korachi,
nei karisia otta aeyaishieiwangerere guru ku ne ruwe ne: koroka, tane anak ne nei arabe Shinuma koro ashkanne utara otta aeramande, awa,
Oya utara tumugeta tapan mukkep gusu an arakuru koro oteknu-hi eramande kuni ap Kamui keutum ne, nei ambe anak arakuru echipachipare ambe ne, echi oshiketa an Kiristo ne ruwe ne na:
chi utara anak ne pishno an ainu Kiristo oshiketa aeramushinne wa atte kuni ne, wayashnu no pishno an ainu onishnishi hene ki, pishno an ainu epakashnu hene ki hine, Kiristo eupaskuma ash ruwe ne;
nei arabe gusu poka kuani anak, en onnaigeta kiroroashnu no iki, Shinuma kara arabe nei no kiroro yupu hine ku monraige ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, echi utara gusu hemhem, Raodikia un utara gusu hemhem, kara oma ku nanuhu shomo nukara obitta no okai utara gusu hemhem, hemanda yupke no kiroro atte hine ku iki arabe echi eraman kuni ku kon rusui ruwe ne;

tambe anak nei utara koro sarabe aomaoma kuni gusu an ap ne, aige, shinuma utara omap ambe ani aurukire hine eraman no an shomo utumashire an arabe gusu hetuku aeoteknup otta an kuni gusu ne; tambe anak nei utara.
Kamui mukkep eraman kuni gusu nep; nei mukkep anak ne Kiristo ne, aige, Shinuma oshiketa wayashnu ambe newa eramushbe oma aeoteknup anuina wa an na.
Inan guru ne yakka iteki shisak itak ani echi kokandama kuni ne, tambe ku ye ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, kara gusu echi tura no ku an shomoki yakka, ramat gusu echi tura no ku an, aige, echi ikiri an no an arabe hemhem, Kiristo gusu echi atte eishokor-i yupkep hemhem ku nukara wa ku nupetne ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu, echi utara Utarapa ne Kiristo Yesu akore korachi, Shinuma oshiketa apkash yan; Shinuma oshiketa shinrichi koro hine aeyairoshkire, aige,
aepakashnu an korachi poka, iyaiiraige an keutura koro wa echi ki eishokor-i atte yan.

Kiristo gusu shomo ne, koroka, utara koro oina gusu hene, moshiri gusu an isaika epakashi gusu hene, koro aeramasure eramushbe newa oira kokandama itak ani iteki echi shiren guru an kuni yaitubare yan:
inambe gusu ne yakun, aeramushinne an kamui-oibe anak netobake an nei no Kiristo oshiketa oshiroma ruwe ne,
aige, Shinuma oshiketa echi utara aeramushinnere an na, aine, Shinuma anak ne obitta no okai esapanep newa nrondum korobe koro sapaha ne ruwe ne:

Shinuma oshiketa teke ani shomo akore okarituye buri ani echi utara anak ne okarituye buri ani akore poka ki nisa ruwe ne, tambe anak Kiristo koro okarituye buri ne, kam netobake shiraraye arabe ne ruwe ne;
aige, Shinuma tura baptisma eun aomare hine rai-i orowa no Shinuma hetopo-shiknure Kamui iki ikip ani eishokor-i ankushkerai Shinuma tura echi utara ne yakka hetopo-ashiknure nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, echi utara anak ne, koro chikokatpak newa kam oma okarituye buri ankushkerai gusu rai okere echi utara anak ne, obitta no okai chikoro chikokatpak Shinuma tusare hine Shinuma orowa no Shinuma tura ashiknure nisa ruwe ne;
aige, un epeka wa un epokba ipawetenge nei no ikiri koro teke ani anuye kambi isamka: aine, nei ambe oyakta koro wa utasa chikuni otta kungi kokikkik nisa ruwe ne;
samata, yaikota yai orowa no esapane ambe newa nrondum korobe soshpa okere chiki, anukan no nei ambe nukare hine, gusu nei ambe epeka yaiokkainere nisa ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu, ibe arabe gusu hene, iku ambe gusu hene, iwai an toho gusu hene, ashiri kunne-chup gusu hene, shini toho gusu hene, iteki nen ka echi koipishi kuni ne ki yan:
tap arabe anak ne ek kushki okaibe gusu an kurihi ne; koroka netobake anak ne Kiristo korobe ne ruwe ne.
Iteki nenka iki rengaine an yaieoripakka ambe newa Kamui hauturumbe koongamire ambe ani echi koro iwayehe eikkare yan; nei no ikichi gurʼanak ne anukarabe an arabe kata roshki,

raka-sak no koro kam-ush keutura gusu pittarane, aige, ari netobake ebitta ikra newa kut-rit ankushkerai gusu areshpa hine Kamui orowa no ashukupte wa shukup nei sapaha yupke no shomo shikkashima ruwe ne na.
Tam moshiri gusu an isaika ambe epeka Kiristo tura echi rai nisa ruwe ne a yakun,
hemanda gusu, moshiri gusu koishu korachi, utara epakashi nei no utara ikashpaotte nei no ipawetenge nep koran esanniyop koitaknu ya?
(nei arabe anak, iteki teke ani kishima, iteki sapke, iteki tomooshma ari an ap ne).

Tap an okaibe anak ne rengaine an keutura ani Kamui koongami ambe gusu hemhem, yaieoripakka ambe gusu hemhem, netobake epeka eramu-yupke kore ambe gusu hemhem wayasbnu kotom arabe ne sekoro anukara; koroka, kam iki rusuibe epeka raka-sak no an ambe ne ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu echi utara anak ne Kiristo tura hetopo-ashiknure chiki, Kamui shimon tek-samata a koran Kiristo oshiroma ushiketa an okaibe hunara yan.
Rikta an okaibe esanniyo wa iteki moshiri kata an okaibe esanniyo yan.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, echi utara anak ne rai nisa ruwe ne, echi koro inotu Kiristo tura
Kamui otta anuina wa an ruwe ne. Chikoro inotu ne Kiristo anak ne anukara kusu ne ita, nei ita anak echi utara ne yakka Shinuma tura no nupeki otta anukara kusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, moshiri kata okai echi koro awehe raige yan; hoiyo hene, ichakkere arabe hene, wenkatcham hene, wenbe ki rusui keutura hene, potoki koongami ari an yaikoshipuinere arabe hene raige yan;
tap okaibe rengap gusu itakkashi poho utara otta Kamui irushka ambe ek ruwe ne;
orowa, tap okaibe otta echi shiknu wa an rapoketa, otta eeshiri echi utara ne yakka apkash nisa ruwe ne na.
Koroka, irushka arabe hemhem, kinrakarabe hemhem, wenbe hemhem, koatcha arabe hemhem, paro wano san yainikoroshma itak ambe hemhem, tane tap okaibe obitta oyakta are yan:
iteki utashpa shunge yan: fushko ainu koro iki ikip tura echi shioraye hine ashiri ainu echi utomchiure okere ruwe ne gusu ne na;
nei arabe anak ne orowa no akara Kamui koro katuhu nei no eramanushbe gusu ashinno akara korʼan ruwe ne:

nei ushiketa Herenes hene Yudea unbe hene, okarituye buri akore arabe hene okarituye buri shomo akore ambe hene, oya kotan un guru hene, Skitia un guru hene, ausshiune an guru hene, rengaine an guru hene isama: koroka, Kiristo anak ne obitta no okaibe okkashi an, obitta no okaibe onnaigeta an ruwe ne na.

Tambe gusu, Kamui koro anumge ashkanne newa aomap an utara korachi, rampokiwen an keutura hemhem, pirika irenga hemhem, yaieoripakka arabe hemhem, ramu-rotcha arabe hemhem, ramu-shiporore ambe hemhem,
utomchiure yan; utashpa uwe-shiyupupu; nep ne yakka eiyonnuppa kuni ushike an chiki uweusaraye yan; Utarapa echi tusare korachi echi utara ne yakka nei no ki yan;
orowa, tap okaibe kasu no pasere wa omap arabe utomchiure yan; tambe anak ne aeramushinne gusu an kut ne ruwe ne na.
Shui, Kiristo koro itomo echi keutum ta esapanere yan, tambe gusu ka shine netobake otta echi ahotuyekara wa okai ruwe ne na;

orowa, yaiiraige an no okai yan. Shi no wayashnu no nuye an no Kiristo korʼitak echi oshiketa oshironmre yan; iyobaichish ani hene, shinotcha ani hene, ramat oma yairap ani hene echi koro keutura ta irenga koro wa Kamui otta shinotcha ki wa utashpa uwe-epakashnu hemhem ki, uwe-onishnishi hemhem ki yan.
Orowa, itak otta hene ikip otta hene nep ne yakka echi ki chiki Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo reihei ankushkeraipo ki, aine, Shinuma korʼirenga gusu Michi ne Kamui otta ko-yaiiraige yan.
Machi ne utara, Utarapa gusu kopakeat kuni ne echi koro hoku otta koitaknu yan.
Hoku ne utara, echi koro machi omap wa otta iteki iporo-slriuka yan.
Poho utara, nep ne yakka gusu echi koro eshikop koitaknu yan, tambe anak ne Utara nupetnere ambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Michihi utara, echi koro poho utara iteki ramu-rai kuni ne iteki irushkare yan.

Ausshiune okai utara, nep ne yakka gusu kara epeka an echi esapane utara koitaknu yan; ainu nupetnere gusu aeshikkoingara kuni korachi shomo ne, koroka, Utarapa gusu iki nei no oheuge sak sarabe koro yan: nep ne yakka echi ki chiki,
ramu-osshi wa ki yan, utara gusu shomo iki no Utarapa gusu iki korachi ki yan;
Utarapa orowa aeikeshkorobe gusu an iwayehe akore kusu ne ambe eraman; aige, Utarapa ne Kiristo gusu echi yaishieiwangere na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, wenbe ikichi gurʼanak ne aki okere wenbe gusu tasa akore kusu ne: aine, utara kowen utara kopirika keutum isam ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Nishpa ne utara, echi koro usshiune utara otta oupeka newa oupak an ambe kore yan; aige, echi utara ne yakka kando oshiketa Nishpa kon ruwe ne kunak eramu yan.
Shiyuppa no inonno-itak ki, iyaiiraige koro wa iki hine shiruwande yan;
samaketa, un gusu ne yakka iki, Kiristo gusu an anuina ambe aye hine itak arabe ahun gusu, un orun Kamui apa maka kuni ne ki yan,
nei okaibe gusu ku atupetupe an na; samata, nekon a katu ani ku ye kunip ne ya aeramande kuni gusu ki yan.
Soita okai utara epeka pakihi kikiraye korachi wayashnu no apkash yan.
Nekon a katu ani pishno an guru orun koese kunip ne ya sekoro echi eraman kuni ne, ramma kane echi ye itak irenga tura asange wa shippo eomare yan.

Obitta no okai ku goro orushpe gusu anak Tikikos echi nure kushki, nei guru anak ne Utarapa oshiketa aomap an iriwak ne, ikipniukesh yaishieiwangere guru ne, tura no iki ausshiunere an gunʼne ruwe ne: echi utara un gusu an orushpe eraman,
orowa, shinuma echi sambe omaoma kuni gusu an, tapan son no ikkewehe an gusu echi orun kuani shinuma omande nisa ruwe ne;
echi tumuge wano an nei ikipniukesh newa aomap an iriwak guru ne Onesimos tura ku omande ruwe ne na. Nei utara anak ne teda an orushpe obitta echi nure kushki na.

En tura no ipakashnu chisei ta an Aristarkos echi ekap an na, Barnabas koro karaku Markos ne yakka echi ekap na (shinuma gusu echi kashpaotte ash okere; aige, shinuma echi orun ek chiki uk wa en kore yan),
samata, okarituye-buri oma Youstos ari aporose Yesu ne yakka echi ekap na: tan utara patek Kamui moshiri gusu tura no ikichi utara ne, gusu a en omaoma utara ne ruwe ne.

Echi tumuge wano an Kiristo Yesu koro usshiune guru ne Epapras anak ne echi ekap na, echi utara aeramushinne no roshki hine Kamui koro oma-irenga utumashi shomoki no eraman kuni ne, ramma kane shinuma shiyuppa no inonno-itak ruwe ne.
Echi utara gusu ne yakka, Raodikia un utara gusu ne yakka, Hieraporis un utara gusu ne yakka poro shinuma iki ambe epeka shinuma gusu paweteshu ku ki ruwe ne.
Aomap an potara guru ne Roukos newa Demas echi ekap na.
Raodikia un iriwak utara hemhem, Numpas hemhem, Numpas kot chisei ta an karisia hemhem rangarap yan.
Orowa, tan kambi echi tumugeta oro-a-oitak okere chiki, Raodikia un utara ne karisia otta ne yakka orooitakte wa en kore; samata, Raodikia orowa no an kambi ka echi utara ne yakka orooitak yan.
Orowa, Arkippos orun ene itak yan: — Utarapa orowa no akore an otta e iki kuni yaishieiwangere ambe aomare kuni ne yaitubare yan.
Pauros ne kuani anak ne yaikota koro teke ani rangarap ikiri ku nuye na. Ku goro tupep eshkarun wa en kore yan. Irenga echi tura an na.
Pauros newa Sirounos newa Timoteos anak ne Michi ne Kamui oshiketa an Tessaronike un karisia otta kambi omande na: irenga newa itomo echi utara gusu anro.
Chi utara anak ne inonno-itak ki ita echi korʼorushpe ye hine ramma-kane obitta no okai echi utara gusu Kamui koyaiiraige na;
aige, Michi ne chikoro Kamui kotchaketa an eishokor-i oma ikip newa omap oma monraige ambe newa chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo oshiketa chipachipa oma yaiyupupu ambe newa chi eshkarun wa iki na;
aine, Kamui orowa no aomap an iriwak utara, echi anumge an ambe eraman shiriki,

inambe gusu ne yakun, chikoro pirika shongo anak ne ouse itak ani patek echi otta ek ka shomoki, koroka, kiroro ani ne yakka, Ashkanne Ramat ani ne yakka, shi no aeshikno an ambe ani ne yakka ek nisa ruwe ne; echi tumugeta chi okai rapoketa echi rengap gusu echi epeka no nekon a ainu chi ne ya echi eraman poka korachi ne ruwe ne na.
Orowa, echi utara anak ne poron no aeramchuptek ambe newa Ashkanne Ramat oma yaikopuntek-hi tura itak uk hine chi utara newa Utarapa a un eikoisamba utara ne akan ruwe ne;
Makedonia newa Akaya kotan ta obitta no okai eishokoro utara gusu aikoikarabe echi ne pakno ne ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, Utarapa koro itak echi orowa no assuru-aashte okere, ouse Makedonia newa Akaya otta patek shomo ne, koroka, inan ushiketa ne yakka Kamui epeka no an echi koro eishokor-i anak ne assuru an na; tambe gusu nepka chi ye shomoki yakka aeraman ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, nei utara yaikota ye wa nekon a chi ki hine echi tumugeta ahup ash ya un gusu assuru ashte ruwe ne: samata, ishu newa son no an Kamui gusu yaishieiwangere hemhem ki, kando orowa no ek Shinuma koro Poho untere hemhem ki kuni ne potoki echi emakba wa Kamui orun hosari an ambe ye nisa ruwe ne;
Kamui anak ne rai i orowa no Shinuma hetopo-shiknure nisa ruwe ne, tambe anak, ek kusu ne irushka-i orowa no un ohaitare Yesu ne ruwe ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, iriwak utara, chi utara anak ne echi tumuge un ahup ash katu anak raka isam no an ambe shomo ne sekoro echi eraman: koroka,

echi onnere korachi, etokota piripoi kotan ta aeramushitnere wa a un ko shomo yaikatanu okere chiki, chi utara anak ne Kamui gusu yai-rametok koro hine shi no yairamkoiki wa Kamui pirika Shongo echi orun ye nisa ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, chi ki onishnishi arabe anak ne ouhaita ambe orowa no hene, ichakkere ambe orowa no hene irarape gusu an ambe hene shomo ne ruwe ne;

koroka, pirika shongo a un shikkashimare kuni pakno an utara chi ne kunak Kamui anak esanniyo korachi; tambe nei no chi ye ruwe ne; utara nupetnere kuni korachi shomo ne, koroka chikoro sambe uwande wa ingara Kamui nupetnere kuni gusu itak ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, echi eraman korachi, hembara ne yakka panore itak eiwange hene ki, yaikoshipuinere arabe kamure gusu hene iki-hi sekoro shomo a un nukan ruwe ne ari an ambe gusu Kamui paweteshu ruwe ne;

samata, Kiristo koro Apostoro utara ne-hi korachi an wa echi orowa no a un eoripakte kuni ne ki eashkai ita anak, echi orowa no ne yakka, moshima utara orowa no ne yakka, ainu utara orowa no ne yakka airamye kuni ambe shomo chi hunarapa ruwe ne na.
Koroka, iyopakkai-ushi guru yaikota koro poho utara reshpa korachi, chi utara anak ne echi tumugeta ratchitara no okai ash nisa:

tambe nei no chi utara anak ne shi no echi kon rusui gusu, Kamui koro pirika shongo echi kore patek shomo ne, koroka, yaikota koro sambe ne yakka yainuchattek no echi kore kuni aramu, echi utara shi no un gusu aoshkorobe ne nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, iriwak utara, chi ki monraige ambe newa nuwap ambe echi eshkarun: inan guru ne yakka shomo iramukurukuru kuni ne, tokap to ta hene kunne to ta hene monraige ki, aine, Kamui pirika shongo
echi otta eupaskuma ash nisa ruwe ne. Hemanda Kamui ko-oripak an no, oupeka an no, oheuge sak no eishokoro wa okai echi utara epeka yaikota chi iki ya echi nukan ruwe ne: michi anak ne yaikota koro
poho utara otta iki nei no chi utara ne yakka pishno no an echi utara onishnishi ash hemhem ki, rametokte ash hemhem ki,
yaikota koro moshiri newa araguru orun echi nishuk Kamui kopakeot no echi apkash kuni ne hemhem ki wa paweteshu chi kon nisa sekorʼambe echi eraman korachi ne ruwe ne na.

Orowa, echi utara anak ne nei a chi ye itak ambe, nei a Kamui korobe echi akore ita, ainu itak ambe nei no shomo auk, koroka, son no an arabe nei no, eisho-koro shiri echi utara onnaigeta iki poka ki Kamui itak nei no echi uk nisa ruwe ne, tan ikkewehe an gusu ne yakka okere shomoki no Kamui koyaiiraige ash ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, iriwak utara, echi utara anak ne Yesu Kiristo oshiketa Yudea kotan ta okai Kamui karisia ikoisamba utara echi ne nisa: echi utara ne yakka yaikota koro moshiri ta okai hine, nei utara anak ne Yudea un utara orowa no aeramushitnere korachi nei no an ambe gusu echi eramushitne ruwe ne gusu ne na:
nei utara anak ne Utarapa ne Yesu newa uweingara utara ronnu, orowa, un okeuba hemhem ki, shomo Kamui nupetnere hemhem ki, obitta no okai utara epokba hemhem ki;
aige, Oya un utara kashichiobiuki kuni ne chi itak katu hattoki ruwe ne; aine, ramma-kane koro chikokatpak epa shiriki; koroka, okese pakno nei utara kashita irushka arabe ek an ruwe ne na.
Iriwak utara, keutura gusu shomo ne a koroka tumama gusu anak irukai tomta echi isama gusu, chi utara son no shiariki no echi nanuhu nukara kuni ne iki nisa:
inambe gusu ne yakun, kanna kanna Pauros ne kuani anak, — echi orun araki ash rusui; aige, Satan un shinnatush nisa ruwe ne na.
Gusu aechipachipa arabe hene, aenupetnep ne hene, aeyaiomonnure sapaumbe hene nekon a arabe ne ruwe he an? Ek kushki chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu kotchaketa echi utara shomo ne arabe ne ruwe he an?
Echi utara anak ne chikoro aeyaiomonnure arabe ne, aenupetnep ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu naa yaishiporore eaikap chiki chi utara puine no Atens kotan ta ahoppa yak pirika sekoro yainu;

aige, echi roshkire hemhem ki, echi iki eishokor-i gusu aomaoma hemhem ki gusu, Kiristo koro pirika shongo gusu Kamui otta yaishieiwangere guru chikoro iriwak ne Timoteos echi orun arapare nisa ruwe ne;

tambe anak, inan guru ne yakka tapan aeramchuptekbe gusu shomo amoimoigere kuni gusu an ap ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, chi utara anak ne tambe gusu aatte utara chi ne sekoro echi yaikota eraman ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Son no newa, echi tura no okai ash ita anak ne echi utara aeramchutekte kusu ne a arabe irammakaka echi nure ash nisa; iki korachi nep, echi eraman korachi ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Tan ikkewehe an gusu kuani poka, naa yaishiporore eaikap chiki, echi iki eishokor-i eraman kuni ne ku teshkan nisa ruwe ne, nekon a poka ika nei a ikoranmukarape echi koramnukara, aige, chi utara iki monraige iteki raka-sak kuni gusu ne na.

Koroka, Timoteos anak ne tane echi orowa no un orun ek ita echi iki eishokor-i newa omap ambe gusu an pirika shongo hemhem chi utara echi nukan rusui korachi echi un nukan rusui wa ramma-kane pirika no un eshkarun arabe hemhem un nure nisa ruwe ne;
tapan ikkewehe an gusu, iriwak utara, obitta no okai chi iki kunip newa eramchuptekbe an ita echi iki eishokor-i ankushkeraipo aomaoma nisa ruwe ne;
inambe gusu ne yakun, Utarapa oshiketa pirika no echi roshki chiki,
chi utara ishu ruwe ne gusu ne na. Kamui tek-samata echi ankushkerai, ani chi eyaikopuntek nupetne ambe gusu, shui Kamui otta echi utara gusu nekon a yaiiraige an arabe chi yange eashkai ruwe he an?
echi kon nanuhu chi nukara hine echi eishokor-i ta eikohaye ambe eramushinnere kuni ne kunne to ta ne yakka tokap to ta ne yakka shiarikiki no inonno-itak ruwe ne na.
Tane, chikoro Kamui newa Michihi yaikota, orowa, chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu anak ne echi orun araki ash gusu un epakashnu kuni ne akoramkoro, aige, echi
epeka chi utara ne yakka iki nei no Utarapa anak ne uweutashpa echi omap wa nuye an no echi kire kuni akoramkon na;

tambe anak ne chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu obitta no okai koro ashkanne utara tura no ek ita, Shinuma anak chikoro Kamui newa Michihi kotchaketa ashkanne arabe gusu oheuge-sak no echi koro sambe ashte kuni gusu an arabe ne.

Orosama iriwak utara echi utara, nekon a arabe ani apkash wa Kamui nupetnere kusu ne a ambe ne ya, un otta echi nu a gusu, nei no korachi echi apkash kuni ne—naa naa echi nuye an no okai kuni gusu— Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo gusu koramkoro wa echi onishnishi ash ruwe ne.
Echi utara anak ne nekon a ikashpaotte ani Utarapa ne Yesu gusu chi utara echi kashpaotte nisa ruwe ne ya, echi eraman ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Kamui keutura anak ne ene ani ne, echi turu-sak wa shomo hoiyo ki;
pishno pishno echi utara anak koro aeramhekotep turu-sak no aeoripak an no shikkashima arabe echi eraman wa,
shomo Kamui eamkiri oya utara nei no wenbe ki rusui yainu-hi koro shomoki no okai:

inan guru ne yakka tap ambe otta iteki eikaunu ki hine koro iriwak ika kokandama na: inambe gusu ne yakun, chi utara teeda anu no chi ye wa nure ash korachi, tap okaibe gusu Utarapa anak ikemnu ki ambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Kamui anak ne ichakkere ambe un kire gusu un nishuk shomoki, un turu-sakte gusu un nishuk nisa ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, emaka gurʼanak ne ainu emaka shomoki, koroka, echi otta Ashkanne Ramat koropare Kamui emaka ruwe ne na.

Koroka, iriwak utara otta omap ki ambe gusu anak, shomo echi orun kambi ku omande yak pirika ruwe ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, echi yaikota anak uwe-utashpa uwe-omap kuni ne Kamui orowa no aepakashnu wa an ruwe ne gusu ne na;
son no poka Makedonia moshiri ta obitta no okai iriwak epeka echi iki shiriki okai ruwe ne na. Koroka, iriwak utara, naa naa echi nuye an no okai kuni ne echi onishinishi ash;
samata, echi kashpaotte korachi koro teke ani monraige hine yaikota koro moni esanniyo wa mo no okai kuni ne ramepakari;
samata shui, nep ne yakka echi eishiramne ushike isam wa soita okai utara epeka oupeka keutum kon no apkash kuni ne echi onishnishi ash na.
Koroka, iriwak utara, mokonnoye utara gusu echi erampeutek-hi chi kopan; aechipachipa kuni ushike sak no moshima no okai utara korachi iteki echi ok keutum koro kuni gusu ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Yesu rai wa hetopo-shiknu sekorʼambe chi eishokoro yakun, nei no korachi Yesu ankushkerai mokonnoye utara anak Shinuma tura Kamui ani wa ek kusu ne.
Utarapa itak ani tambe echi orun chi ye, shiknu wa okai chi utara, Utarapa ek-hi pakno okai utara anak, son no poka mokonnoye utara etokota paye shomoki kusu ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, Utarapa yaikota anak ne hawe ashte, sapane an hauturumbe koro hawe ani, Kamui rappa koro wa kando orowa no ran kusu ne: aige, Kiristo oshiketa rai utara hoshiki no hetopo-shiknu:
orowa no, shiknu wa okai utara, ahoppa wa okai utara anak, rik-mau tumta Utarapa uwetunangara kuni ne nei utara tura no nishkuru orun auk kusu ne: aine, ramma pakno Utarapa tura no okai kusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, tap okai itak ani uwe-utashpa onishnishi yan.
Koroka, pakihi newa paha epeka anak, iriwak utara, echi gusu ku nuye ika isam ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Utarapa toho anak ne an noshiketa ek ikka guru korachi ek kusu ne-hi sekoro irammakaka echi yaikota eraman ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Itomo an, aeyaikikipbe isam, sekoro nei utara ye ita anak, nei ita po shikore shiwentep gusu ikoni an korachi, ekushkonna nei utara epeka isamka ambe hetuku kusu ne, aige, oara nei utara yaiohaitare shomoki kusu ne na.
Koroka, echi utara anak ne, iriwak utara, ikka utara, iki korachi nei toho echi oshkoni kuni ne kunne-i oshiketa okai utara shomo echi ne ruwe ne:
inambe gusu ne yakun, echi utara obitta pekere un poho echi ne, tokap to un poho echi ne ruwe ne gusu ne na: anchikara unbe shomo chi ne, kunne-i unbe shomo chi ne ruwe ne;
tambe gusu, moshima utara iki korachi iteki mokoro ashro, koroka, shiruwande hene ki yairamatte hene ki yanro.
Mokoro utara anak ne anchikara ta mokon ruwe ne; ihoshki utara anak ne anchikara ta ihoshki ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Koroka, chi utara anak ne tokap to un utara chi ne ruwe ne gusu, eishokor-i newa omap an rerara-kotukbe unu hine yairamatte wa okai anro; samata, kane-pon-kasa gusu kashichiobiuki ne chipa-chipa arabe koro anro.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, irushka ambe gusu shomo ne, koroka, un gusu rai chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo ankushkerai kashichiobiuki arabe a un kore kuni ne, Kamui anak ne un atte nisa ruwe ne;
tambe anak, shiruwande ash yakka, mokoro ash yakka, Shinuma tura no ishu ash kuni gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, echi iki shiri poka korachi utashpa uweomaoma hemhem ki utashpa uweashte hemhem ki yan.
Koroka, iriwak utara, echi tumugeta monraige hemhem ki, Utarapa oshiketa echi epungine hemhem ki, echi epakashnu hemhem ki utara onnere kuni echi onishnishi ash ruwe ne;
samata, koro iki ikip gusu omap wa kooripak an no esanniyo yan. Yai uturu ta itomo irenga sange yan.
Orowa, iriwak utara, uottumashi utara pakashnu, keutum katchak utara omaoma, turasak utara nitata orowa obitta no okai utara epeka ramu-shiporore kuni echi onishnishi ash ruwe ne.
Wenbe gusu iteki nen ne yakka wenbe eumontasa kuni ingara yan; koroka, uwe-utashpa hemhem, obitta no okai utara epeka hemhem, ramma pirikap iki yan.
Ramma nupetne yan; okere shomoki no inonno-itak ki yan;
nep ne yakka gusu yaiiraige ki yan;
inambe gusu ne yakun, echi epeka no tambe anak Kiristo oshiketa Kamui koro irenga ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Iteki Ramat ushka yan; uweingarape iteki pange yan;
nep ne yakka uwande yan; pirika okaibe shikkashima yan;
nep wen noine an ap a yakka eshishi yan.

Orowa, itomo irenga koro Kamui yaikota anak echi ebitta ashkannere kusu ne; samata, (chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo ek pakno) echi kon ramat newa keutum newa netobake anak ne turu-sak no ramne no akoshiratki kuni akoramkoro.
Echi nishukbe anak ne ikipniukeshbe ne, aige, nei no kara poka iki kusu ne na.
Iriwak utara, un gusu inonno-itak ki wa un kore yan.
Ashkanne chopsekara arabe ani obitta no okai iriwak utara ekap yan. Tan kambi anak ne obitta no okai iriwak utara otta aorooitak kuni Utarapa ani echi kashpaotte ash ruwe ne.
Chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo korʼirenga echi tura no an kuni akoramkon na.
Pauros newa Sirounos newa Timoteos anak ne chikoro Michi ne Kamui newa Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo oshiketa an Tessaronike kotan un karisia otta kambi omande na;
Michi ne Kamui newa Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo orowa no irenga newa itomo echi gusu an na.

Iriwak utara, oupak an no korachi ramma-kane echi utara gusu Kamui koyaiiraige ash kunip ne, echi iki eishokor-i nuye an no shukup, samata, uwe-utashpa pishno echi iki omap arabe echi obitta gusu aporore wa an ruwe ne gusu ne na;

obitta no okai echi eyaishiporore aekeshke arabe newa aerarachuptekbe uturu echi ki yaiyupupu arabe newa eishokor-i gusu Kamui karisia tumta echi utara gusu chi utara yaiomonnure ash pakno ne ruwe ne;
tambe anak ne Kamui oupeka an koipishi gusu an anukara shirosh ne; gusu ka echi ramushitne hine Kamui moshiri uina kuni oupak no okai utara echi ne sekoro echi esanniyo an kuni gusu ne na:
Kamui erampeutek utara newa chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo koro pirika shongo
koitaknu shomoki utara koikemnu hine paraparase abe oma koro kiroro un hauturumbe utara tura kando wano ek Utarapa ne Yesu anukara ita echi ramuchuptekka
utara epeka tasa iramuchuptekka wa kore ambe hemhem, aeramchuptekka wa okai echi utara un tura no asbinire arabe hemhem anak ne Kamui tek-samata oupeka ambe ne nangon na:

Shinuma anak koro ashkanne utara onnaigeta anupekte hemhem ki, orowa, nei toho ta (echi nure ash paweteshu ambe aeishokoro okere gusu) obitta no okai eishokoro okere utara orowa no aenushkari kuni gusu ek hemhem ki ita, nei utara anak ne apachigoatte kusu ne,
Utarapa koro nanuhu newa Shinuma koro kiroro oma nupeki orowa no otusashuishiri pakno akoisamka kusu ne na.

Chikoro Kamui anak ne gusu echi anishuk ambe epeka oupak no an utara echi ne hunak sanniyo hine kiroro ani obitta no okai pirikap kon-rusuibe newa eishokor-i iki ikip uweomare kuni ne, ramma-kane echi utara gusu chi utara ne yakka inonno-itak ash ruwe ne;

tambe anak chikoro Kamui irenga newa Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo an nei no, Chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo kon reihei echi oshiketa, samata, echi utara Shinumaoshiketa anupekte kuni gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne na.
Iriwak utara, chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo ek kusu ne a arabe newa Shinuma orun chi utara uwekarapa ash ambe newa gusu echi koramkoro ash ruwe ne;
tambe anak Utarapa toho tane an sekorobe gusu iteki echi keutura autumashire tunash, ramat ani ne yakka, itak ani ne yakka, un orowa no aette kambi ani ne yakka, iteki keutum chiukopoyere kuni

an arabe ne; nep ne yakka gusu iteki inan guru ne yakka echi kokandamare yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, hoshiki no eyaikoemaka arabe an, samata, nei a chikokatpak ainu, nei a aisamka ambe poho anukara shomoki chiki,

nei toho shomo an ruwe ne; nei guru anak ne obitta no okai Kamui aporosep okkeukashi hene ongami kunip okkeukashi hene yairiknare epokbap ne; Kamui kora kenru ta a kane yaikota Kamui ne kara pakno poka iki guru ne ruwe ne.
Kuani naa echi tura no ku an rapoketa tap okaibe gusu echi nure ash nisa sekorʼambe echi eshkarun shomoki ruwe he an?
Nei guru yaikota koro pakihi ta anukare kuni ne tane shinuma shinnatush ambe echi eraman ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, ikashpaotte otereke mukkep anak ne tane monraige shiri-ki: ouse nei guru oyake un auk pakno shinnatushbe an ruwe ne.
Orowa, okake an koro, Utarapa ne Yesu anak koro paro oma heisepa ani raige wa iki koro ek wa an arabe ani isamka nei ikashpaotte otereke guru anukare kusu ne na;
aige, nei utara anak ne kashiaobiuki kuni ne sonep omap ambe shomo uina nisa ruwe ne gusu,
nei guru anak ne Satan iki-hi korachi, usa okai kiroro newa shiroshi newa shunge iyokonnurep, samata, aisamka kuni gusu an utara gusu usa okai kokandama arabe newa oupeka-sakbe koro wa ek ruwe ne.
Nei utara anak ne shungep eishokoro kuni ne, tambe gusu Kamui nei utara orun ouhaitap ikichi kuni arabe omande ruwe ne:
tambe anak ne sonep eishokoro shomoki wa oupeka-sakbe enupetne obitta no okai utara akoipishi kuni gusu an ap ne ruwe ne.

Koroka, Utarapa orowa no aomap an iriwak utara, atpake wano Kamui anak ne Ramat ashkannere ambe newa sonep eishokoro ambe otta echi numge wa kashiobiuki gusu, ramma-kane echi utara gusu Kamui koyaiiraige kunip chi ne ruwe ne;
chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo koro nupeki akore kuni ne, Shinuma anak ne chikoro pirika shongo ankushkerai tata otta echi nishuk nisa ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu iriwak utara, tumashnu no roshki, orowa, itak ani hene ne ya chi nuye kambi ani hene ne ya aepakashnu oina shikkashima yan.
Tane chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo yaikota hemhem un omap wa irenga ankushkerai otusashiri pakno an omaoma ambe newa pirika chipachipa ambe un koropare chikoro Michi ne Kamui hemhem anak ne,
echi koro sambe omaoma hine obitta no okai pirika ikip newa itak otta roshkire kuni akoramkon na.
Orokeseta, iriwak utara, echi tumta korachi poka, Utarapa koro itak shipiraspa wa anupekte kuni ne,
un gusu inonno-itak ki wa un kore; samata, sambe oheuge newa wen utara orowa no chi utara aouhaitare kuni ne inonno-itak yan; obitta no okai utara anak eisbokor-i atte shomoki ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, Utarapa anak ne ikipniukeshbe ne hine echi roshkire hemhem ki, wenbe gusu echi koshiratki hemhem ki kusu ne na.
Orowa, echi kashpaotte ash okaibe echi iki shiri okai sekorobe hemhem, echi iki kusu ne sekorobe ka hemhem, echi utara gusu Utarapa oshiketa eishokoro ash ruwe ne.
Utarapa anak ne Kamui omap-i otta hemhem, Kiristo gusu an yaiyupupu ambe otta hemhem echi koro sambe tura kuni akoramkon na.

Orowa, iriwak utara, un orowa no akoropare oina korachi shomoki wa uottumashi apkash pishno okai iriwak wano yai-shishire kuni, chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo kon reihei ankushkerai echi kashpaotte ash na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, echi utara anak ne un eikoisamba kunip ne sekoro echi yaikota eraman ruwe ne: chi utara yaikota anak ne echi tumugeta okai rapoketa uottumashi ki ka shomoki nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na:
samata, oro sange shomoki no inan guru koro aep shomo chi e, koroka, echi tumuge un inan guru ne yakka iteki airamukurukuru kuni ne tokap ne yakka anchikara ne yakka monraige wa nuwap nisa ruwe ne:
shomo uk kuni utara cbi ne wa gusu an ambe shomo ne, koroka, echi utara anak un eikoisamba kuni ne, echi gusu aikoikarabe ne yaikara nisa ne ruwe ne a ambe ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, echi tumugeta okai ash rapoketa, tambe ikashpaotte ash nisa ruwe ne; — Inan guru ne yakka shomo monraige yakun, shinuma iteki ibe yak pirika.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, echi tumugeta uottumashi iki hine pon no ka shomo monraige, koroka, katukari utara okai sekoro chi nu ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tane nei no okai utara mo no monraige wa yaikota koro aep ibe kuni ne Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo oshiketa onishnishi wa kashpaotte ash ruwe ne.
Koroka, echi utara gusu anak, iriwak utara, pirikap iki gusu iteki shingi yan.
Nen ka tan kambi kata anuye wa an chi ki itak koitaknu shomoki guru an chiki, nei guru shirosh omare yan, aige, iteki echi aeyainikoroshmare kuni ne shomo shinuma tura yan.
Yakka aepokba kuni guru ne sekoro iteki esanniyo, koroka, iriwak ne guru nei no epakashnu yan.
Nei ta pakno nei wa ne yakka itomo koro Utarapa yaikota echi orun itomo irenga sange kuni akoramkoro. Utarapa obitta no okai echi utara tura no an kuni akoramkon na.
Pauros ne kuani anak ne yaikota koro teke ani ekap an itak nuye na, nei ambe anak pishno ku sange kambi kata ku goro shirosh ne: nei no ku nuye ruwe ne.
Chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo korʼirenga obitta no okai echi utara tura no an kuni akoramkon na.
Chikoro un kashiobiukip ne Kamui ikashpaotte newa, gusu echipachipa ash Kiristo Yesu ankushkerai Kiristo Yesu koro Apostoro ne akara Pauros ku ne anak ne,

eishokor-i gusu son no an ku poho ne Timoteos otta kambi ku omande na: Michi ne Kamui newa chikoro Utarapa ne Kiristo Yesu orowa no irenga hemhem, rampoken hemhem, itomo hemhem echi kore an kuni akoramkon na.

Etokota Makedonia moshirʼotta ku arapa ita eani anak ne Epesos kotan ta riya hine, okai an utara anak ne moshima an epakashi iteki epakashnu, samata, eishokor-i oma Kamui orowa no ashikkashimare ambe shomo ne no an,
koroka, makangane upahunara ambe hetukure uwepekere newa ainu ikiri reihei gusu an orushpe iteki ekotanu wa esanniyo kuni ne ku ikashpaotte ash korachi, tane ne yakka ku iki na.

Koroka, nei ikashpaotte eramushinnere ambe anak turu-sak sambe wano omap-hi oashinge ambe hemhem, aotkeotke shomo ne an keutura korobe hemhem, kankapkapeka sak no an eishokor-i atte ambe hemhem ne ruwe ne:
tapan okaibe gusu sereke okai utara ihaita wa oha-itak eun eshirihoshi henoye nisa ruwe ne;
nei utara anak ne yaikota sange itak hene shiyuppa no ye orushpe ikkeu hene erampeutek a yakka, tuitak epakashnu utara ne rusui ruwe ne.
Koroka, ainu anak ne oheuge sak no nei tuitak eiwange yakun, tuitak anak pirikap ne sekoro chi eraman;

tambe ka chi eraman, tuitak anak ne oupeka utara gusu akarape shomo ne, koroka, ihaita keutura koro utara newa itakkashi utara gusu Kamui kooripak shomoki utara newa chikokatpak utara gusu, turu-ush utara newa momok utara gusu, michihi raige utara newa unuhu raige utara gusu, keweuk utara gusu,

hoiyo utara gusu, ukokateaikap utara gusu, ainu eikka utara gusu, shunge utara gusu, ikoshunge utara gusu, samata, nep ne yakka nisashnu epakashi kopakeat shomo ne ambe an chiki, nei ambe gusu tuitak akan na;
tambe anak en shikkashimare shinnunuke an Kamui arakuru gusu an pirika shongo nei no an ap ne ruwe ne na.
En eashkaire chikoro Utarapa ne Kiristo Yesu ku koyaiiraige na, Shinuma anak ne ikipniukesh guru ku ne sekoro esanniyo hine otta ku yaishieiwangere kuni ne en atte nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na;
etokota Kamui koatchap ku ne, keshke guru ku ne, shomo yaikatanu ki guru ku ne a yakka: aige, ku eumbipka wa erampeutek no nei no ku iki nisa ruwe ne gusu aerampokiwen wa a en kore an na;
orowa, chikoro Utarapa korʼirenga anak Kiristo Yesu oshiketa an eishokor-i newa omap ambe tura shi no nuye an no an nisa ruwe ne na.

Kiristo Yesu anak ne katpak koro utara kashiobiuki gusu moshirʼotta ek nisa ruwe ne ari an itak anak ne son no ambe ne, utara shikkashima kuni an itak ne ruwe ne na; nei utara tumuge ta iyotta wenbe ku ne ruwe ne!

Yakka, tapan ikkewehe an gusu a en erampokiwen wa akore ruwe ne, tewa no shiokere shomoki inotu aoma kuni ne Shinuma eishokoro utara epeka shiroshi ne gusu iyotta wenbe ne en otta Yesu Kiristo anak ne obitta no okai koro ramushiporore ambe nukare kuni gusu ne na.
Tane, otusashuishiri pakno an, munin shomoki, anukara eaikap, patek Kamui ne, Moshiri shikkashimap otta aeoripakbe newa arakuru newa ramma-ramma an na. Amen.
Ku poho ne Timoteos, ani pirika tumi e kotumikoro iki kuni ne, teeda e kashita etoko arapa uweingarape an korachi,
ku e ikashpaotte ash na; aotke-otke shomo ne an keutura ani korachi eishokor-i atte yan; sereke okai utara anak ne nei ambe epeka eyaikoemaka hine eishokor-i gusu mimam-awende okere ruwe ne:
nei utara tumugeta Humenaios newa Areksandros okai; aige, nei utara iteki Kamui koatcha kuni ne aepakashnu gusu, Satan otta ku arapare nisa ruwe ne na.
Obitta no okai utara gusu koramkoro itak hemhem, inonno-itak hemhem, Kamui anishuk itak hemhem, yaiiraige an ambe hemhem, hoshiki no aye kuni kuani e onishnishi ash na;
Moshiri shikkashima utara newa pase nrondum koro utara gusu ne yakka; tambe anak nekon a ka Kamui kooripak an no yaikatanu hine ratchitara wa itomo kon no oshiroma kuni gusu ne na.
Nei no ikichi ambe anak ne un kashiobiukip ne Kamui tek-samata pirika newa nupetnere ambe ne;
obitta no okai utara kashiaobiuki wa sonep eraman kuni ambe anak ne Shinuma koro keutum ne ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, shine Kamui an, Kamui newa ainu uturu shine iyuturuoma guru an, ainu ne,
Kiristo Yesu ne, Shinuma anak ne obitta no okai utara kikiraye gusu yaikota yaiyange nisa ruwe ne; aige, yaikota koro pakihi ta aepaweteshu an ambe ne na;
nei ambe assuru ashte guru newa Apostoro ne kuni gusu a en atte okere (sonep ku ye, ku shunge shomoki,) eishokor-i newa sonep Oya un utara epakashnu gusu a en atte an na.
Tambe gusu nei ita ne yakka okai utara anak ne kimakara newa utumashi keutum isam no turu-sak tekehe puni hine inonno-itak ki kuni ku kon rusui ruwe ne.

Tambe nei no shiwente utara oripak an hine yaikatanu wa pirikap kopakeat amip ani yaimire; otop oshke ambe ani hene kongani ani hene ikani ani hene ataye yupke amip ani hene iteki ki yak pirika; koroka,
(Kamui kooripak sekoro ye shiwente utara kopakeat korachi) pirika ikip ani ki yan.
Shiwente guru anak ne itaknu wa eyaihannokkara yak pirika.
Koroka, shiwentep anak ne epakashnu wa okkai esapane ambe ku ramuoshma shomoki, koroka, mo no an yak pirika Inambe gusu ne yakun,
Adam anak ne hoshiki no akara, okaketa Hefa; shui, Adam akokandama shomoki,
koroka, nei shiwentep akokandama wa chikokatpak ki okere ruwe ne:
koroka, nei utara yaikatanu ambe tura eishokor-i atte hemhem ki, omap ambe hemhem ki, aturu-saktep otta an hemhem iki yakun, poho shikore ita akaobiuki kusu ne na.
Nei itak ambe sonep ne. Nen ka episkopos moni gusu yaishieiwangere-hi hunara guru an chiki, shinuma pirika ambe kon rusui ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu episkopos anak ne aekot kuni ushike sak, ouse shine mat koro, yairamatte wayashnu keutum koro, irammakaka an, ikateomare ki, epakashnu eashkai, shomo iku-sakayo ki,
ainu kokik shomoki guru ne kunip ne; koroka, yaikatanu keutura koro, koiki kopan, aetunne kuni ani eyaiepirikare ambe shomo ko-omap guru ne kunip ne:
pirika no yaikota kot chisei epungine hine nep yaikatanu ambe tura koro poho itaknure;
(koroka, ainu anak ne nekon a yaikota koro uni epungine ambe erampeutek chiki, hemanda iki wa Kamui karisia shikkashima eashkai ruwe he an? tanebo baptisma akore guru shomo ne,)
ikineipeka shinuma pakesara wa nitne kamui nei no aesanniyo korachi aesanniyo kusu ne na.
Naa moshima, soita okai utara anak shinuma gusu pirika paweteshu ambe koro kunip ne; ikineipeka shinuma aesapse wa nitne kamui koro akbe oro-oshma kusu ne na.
Diakonos utara ne yakka yaikatanu kunip ne, iteki tu parumbe koro, iku rui shomoki, aetunne kuni ani yaiepirikare ambe kon rusui shomoki;
turu-sak keutum ani eishokor-i gusu an mukke ambe shikkashima.
Tan utara hoshiki no aeshiruwande yara; orowa, wen-buri sak yakun, diakonos korachi yaishieiwangerere yan.
Shiwente utara ne yakka yaikatanu kunip ne, shomo ohaigekara, yairamatte, nep ne yakka gusu son no ambe ki kunip ne ruwe ne.
Diakonos utara anak ne ouse shine mat koro wa irammakaka yaikota koro uni newa poho utara epungine.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, diakonos ki kuni moni epeka pirika no yashieiwangere okere utara anak ne yaikota gusu pirika assuru koro, samata, Kiristo Yesu otta an eishokor-i gusu shi no rametok kon no an kusu ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Naa pon no okaketa e orun ku oman kuni ku chipachipa wa tapan okaibe ku nuye ruwe ne;

koroka, ohon no uturuta shomo ku ek yakun, Kamui kora kenru ta ainu utara anak ne nekon a iki yak pirika ya e eraman kuni gusu ne na, nei ambe anak ne ishu Kamui koro karisia ne, sonep gusu an ikushpe newa asamaha ne ruwe ne.

Orowa, shomo aye a yakka, Kamui kooripak gusu an mukke ambe anak ne poro ruwe ne; Shinuma anak ne kam oshiketa anukara, ramat oshiketa oupekap ne aesanniyo, Kamui hau-turumbe orowa no anukara, moshiri uirup tumuge ta aeupaskuma, moshiri kata aeishokoro an, arakuru orun auk okere na.
Koroka, okake an pakihi ta sereke okai utara anak ne kokandama ramat newa nitne kamui utara koro epakashi inu hine shunge itak ki utara kankapkapeka
ambe ankushkerai seisek kani ani korachi koro keutura auhuyeka wa eishokor-i gusu eyaikoemaka kusu ne ari Ramat anak irammataka ye ruwe ne;
nei utara matakore ambe hattoki hemhem ki, sonep eishokoro wa eraman utara iyaiiraige koro auina kuni Kamui kara aep gusu shomo ramnu ki ambe kashpaotte hemhem ki ruwe ne.
Kamui karape obitta pirika ruwe ne, aige, iyaiiraige an keutura ani auina yakun,
aemaka kuni ambe isam ruwe ne.

Eani anak ne tapan okaibe iriwak utara eshkarunde chiki, Kiristo Yesu koro pirika diakonos e ne wa, eishokor-i gusu an itak otta hemhem, e iki pirika epakashi otta hemhem areshpa guru e ne kusu ne na:
koroka, momok uwepekere newa bakko ramkoro an uwepekere eshishi yan.

Orowa, Kamui kooripakbe ani yaikota yairiterite yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, netobake gusu an yairiterite ambe anak ne pon no ka epirikare kunip ne, koroka, Kamui kooripak ambe anak ne nep ne yakka gusu epirikare kunip ne, aige, tane an inotu gusu ne yakka, okaketa an inotu gusu ne yakka eitakamkire aeoma an ambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Nei itak ambe anak ne sonep ne, auk kuni oupak an ambe ne na.

Tan ikkewehe an gusu chi utara anak ne monraige wa shiyuppa no iki, inambe gusu ne yakun, chi utara anak ne obitta no okai utara, makangane eishokor-i atte utara, koro kashiobiukip ne ishu Kamui gusu chipachipa ruwe ne na.
Tap okaibe kashpaotte hemhem ki, epakashnu hemhem ki yan.

Inan guru ne yakka iteki e paha ponbe esapse kuni ne ki yan; koroka, itak otta ne yakka, iki buri otta ne yakka, omap ambe otta ne yakka, eishokor-i otta ne yakka, turu-sakbe otta ne yakka, eishokoro wa okai utara gusu aekoikarabe ne yaikara yan.
Ku ek pakno, karabi-orooitak ambe, onishnishi ambe epakashnu ambe ki yan.
Puresbuteros utara koro teke e kashiketa aande-hi tura uweingara ambe ani akore an eikrap iteki isaika no koro yan.
Tap an okaibe gusu muchinashnu no iki yan; nei ambe orun ramne no yaikoropare yan; e ki ikip obitta no okai utara otta anukara kuni gusu ne na.

Yaikota gusu ne yakka e iki epakashnu ambe gusu ne yakka yaitubare yan. Tap okaibe oshiketa riya yan; inambe gusu ne yakun, tap ambe e ki chiki, eani anak ne yaikota ne yakka e nu utara ne yakka e kashiobiuki kusu ne na.
Ekashi ne chiki iteki kopashirota, koroka, michi korachi onishnishi yan;
upen utara ne yakun; uiriwak utara korachi; rupne shiwentep utara ne yakun, habo korachi, upen mat ne yakun, nep turu-ushbe sak no, turesh korachi iki yan.
Son no okai shiyompiyara shiwentep kooripak yan.

Koroka, nei shiyompiyara shiwentep anak poho hene mitpo hene koro yakun, nei utara anak ne yaikota koro uni un utara epeka hoshiki no kooripak ki hene koro eshikop utara tasa kore kuni iki yak pirika; tambe anak ne Kamui nupetnerep ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Koroka, son no newa shiyompiyara ne hine shinen ne po an shiwentep anak ne Kamui echipachipa, aige, kunne to ta ne yakka tokap to ta ne yakka ramma-kane Kamui koramkoro hemhem ki inonno-itak hemhem ki ruwe ne.
Koroka, shiniwe patek gusu iki shiyompiyara shiwentep anak ne shiknu rapoketa rai wa an ruwe ne.
Nei utara anak ne aekot kuni ushike isam kuni ne tap okaibe ne yakka kashpaotte yan.

Koroka, inan ainu ne yakka yaikota korobe gusu, makangane yaikota koro uni un utara gusu, etoko-oiki shomoki yakun, shinuma anak aeishokor-i eshikashke ruwe ne, aige, eishokoro shomoki guru kasu no wen guru ne ruwe ne na.
Ouse shine ainu kon machi ne, samata, pirika buri gusu pirika assuru koro hine hotne pa pokashnu pa an yakun, iteki shiyompiyara oma kambi kata sapa nuye yan,

nei guru anak ne poho utara reshpa yakun, atchi un utara ayando kore yakun, ashkanne utara chikiri uraye yakun, yairamhekonro utara kaobiuki yakun, shiarikiki no obitta no okai pirika ikip nei no iki yakun, sapaha nuye yan.
Koroka, upen shiyompiyara shiwentep gusu iteki sapaha nuye yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, nei utara Kiristo gusu keutum ehaita chiki,
shui soshipi rusui; aige, nei utara anak ne atpakta koro eishokor-i atte keutum eyaikoemaka gusu ekokatpakte ruwe ne na.

Samata, nei no okai utara anak ne toranne iki wa chisei pishno shioyapkire apkash; toranne patek shomo ne koroka paro-rui ne yakka ki, moshima guru orushpe orun isaikako, aige, shomo aye kuni itak ye ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, upen shiwentep utara anak ne hoku koro wa poho shikore, orowa, epokba guru oitakushi gusu an ika shomo kore hine koro uni shikkashima kuni ku kon rusui ruwe ne;
inambe gusu ne yakun, sereke an utara anak ne tane ne yakka Satan orun henoye okere ruwe ne.
Eishokoro iki shiyompiyara shiwentep koro shiwentep an chiki, shinuma nei utara kaobiuki yak pirika, aige, son no an shiyompiyara kaobiuki eashkai kuni ne iteki karisia seire yan.
Pirika no epungine puresbuteros utara eusamanu aainukoro kunip ne sekoro esanniyo yan, makangane nei itak gusu ne yakka epakashnu ambe gusu ne yakka monraige utara epeka nei no iki yan.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, amam ibehe oashinge beko otta iteki etukarip eunu yan, sekorʼambe Kamui kambi kata anuye wa an ruwe ne gusu ne na. Samata, monraige guru anak ne koro pummaha akore kunip ne ruwe ne na.
Tun ren paweteshu guru iki ambe shomo ne yakun, puresbuteros epeka eiyonnuppa ambe iteki uk yan.
Chikokatpak utara okai chiki, moshima okai utara ishitoma kuni ne obitta no okai utara shik-samata pakashnu yan.

Oheuge sak no tap okaibe e iki, ainu kashiramu gusu shomo ki no nep ne yakka ki kuni ne Kamui tek-samata newa Kiristo Yesu teksamata newa anumge wa okai Kamui hauturumbe tek-samata newa e ikashpaotte ash na.
Yaitunashka wa ainu kata iteki teke ande, shui, moshima guru tura iteki chikokatpak koro: yaituru-sak no e an kuni ki yan.
Tewa no ouse wakka patek shomo iku, koroka, e honihi gusu hemhem kanna-kanna e etashumka ambe gusu tonoto pon no ka eiwange yan.
Sereke okai utara koro chikokatpak anak ne etoko wano aeramanbe ne, aige, aesanniyo kuni ne hoshiki no arapa; orowa, sereke okai utara korobe gusu anak, nei ambe iyoshi no arapa ruwe ne.
Tambe nei no ne yakka anukarape ne pirika ikip okai; orowa, pirika shomo ne ambe anak anuina eaikap ruwe ne.
Rekut unbe pokta ausshiune wa okai utara yaikota koro nishpa aainukoro kunip ne sekoro esanniyo yak pirika, tambe anak ne Kamui reihei newa nei epakashi shomo akoatcha kuni gusu ne na.

Orowa, eishokor-i atte nishpa utara koro utara anak ne, iteki nei utara pange yak pirika, iriwak utara ne ruwe ne gusu ne na; torota, makangane otta yaishieiwangere yak pirika, inambe gusu ne yakun, nei pirika ikip koro utara anak ne eishokoro utara ne, omap ki utara ne ruwe ne. Tap okaibe epakashnu wa onishnishi yan.
Moshima okai epakashi epakashnu hine, nisashnu itak, chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo koro itak otta hemhem Kamui kooripak korachi an epakashi otta hemhem ramuoshma shomoki guru an chiki:

nei guru anak nep ne yakka erampeutek wa pittaranne, koroka, Kamui kooripak ambe anak ani eyaiepirikare kunip ne sekoro yainu wa eyaitunnap keutum hemhem, upaore ambe hemhem, Kamui koatcha ambe hemhem, wenbe eyainu ambe hemhem, keutura munin wa
sonep sak wa oheuge upahunara hemhem patek iki guru ne ruwe ne.
Koroka, Kamui kooripak wa yaiyainuwere ambe anak ne poro aepirikarep ne:
nep ne yakka koro wa moshirʼotta araki ash shomoki, samata nep ne yakka koro wa moshiri kohoppa eaikapbe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na:
koroka, aep newa amip chi koro hine yaiyainuwere ki kusu ne na.

Koroka, yaieoteknure rusui utara anak ne, isamka ambe newa wen ushike ta utara esumba wa aronnu korachi an akoramnukara ambe newa akbe newa inne no okai ohaita iwende ibeporore ambe oro-oshma ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yatun, ichen omap ambe anak ne usa okai wenbe koro shinrit ne ruwe ne: sereke okai utara anak ne nei ambe epa kuni iki hine eishokor-i wano ashiren, aige, inne no okai shirikirap ani yaiotke kushna nisa ruwe ne na.
Koroka, Kamui koro ainu e ne gusu, tap okaibe eshaot yan; aige, oupeka ambe, Kamui kooripak ambe, eishokor-i atte ambe, omap ambe, yaiyupupu ambe,

ramushiroma ambe keseamba yan. Eishokor-i gusu an pirika tumi iki yan, otusashuishiri pakno an inotu shikkashima yan, nei ambe gusu e nishuk an okere, samata, inne utara shik-samata pirika paweteshu ambe e ki nisa ruwe ne.
Obitta no okaibe shiknu kuni ne koshiratki Kamui tek-samata ne yakka, Pontio Pirato kotchaketa pirika paweteshu ambe iki Kiristo Yesu shik-samata ne yakka e kashpaotte ash na;
chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo anukara pak no, echi sak no, aekot kuni ushike isam no,

nei ikashpaotte shikkashima yan: yaikota koro pakihi ta Shinuma nei ambe nukare kusu ne, Shinuma anak ne shinnunuke an patek Sapanep ne Ahekote nishpa utara ok kashi an Ahekote Kamui ne, utarapa utara ok kashi an Utarapa ne ruwe ne;

Shinuma patek shomo rai-ambe koro hine otta karange no arapa eaikap shiripekere ta oshiroma ruwe ne; inan guru ne yakka naa shomo Shinuma nukara, samata, Shinuma nukara eaikap ruwe ne; Shinuma orun otusashuishiri wano otusashuishiri pakno an aainukorobe newa kiroro an na. Amen.

Tan moshiri ta okai wa oteknu utara anak ne iteki yaiesanniyorire hene ki, iteki autumotne an ikoro eyaikopashte hene ki, koroka, ani eyainupetnere kuni gusu nuye an no obitta no okaibe un kore Kamui eyaikopashte kuni ikashpaotte yan;
nei utara pirikap iki,

pirika iki ambe gusu nuye an no iki, eimek wa utara tura no koro hine iyoshi no ek kusu ne pakihi gusu, yaikota gusu pirika asamaha ande wa nei inotu, son no inotu, aeumashnure kuni ne kashpaotte yan.
Aa Timoteos, e shikkashimare an okaibe epungine hine momok an oha-hawe orowa no hene shunge no aye eramushbe epokbap orowa no hene yaiohaitare yan;
sereke okai utara anak ne nei okaibe eishokoro kunak ye wa eishokor-i ohaita nisa ruwe ne na.
Irenga e otta an kuni akoramkon na.
Kiristo Yesu oshiketa an inotu akore kuni eitakamkire an korachi Kamui irenga ankushkerai Kiristo Yesu koro Apostoro ne Pauros ku ne anak ne, ku omap an poho Timoteos otta kambi omande na:
irenga hemhem rampoken hemhem itomo hemhem Michi ne Kamui newa chikoro Utarapa ne Kiristo Yesu orowa no an kuni akoramkon na.

Tokap ne yakka kunne ne yakka echi nukan rusui hine okere shomoki no ramma echi eshkarun wa ku inonno-itak, aige, ku goro ekashi utara wano aotke-otke shomo ne an keutum ani otta ku yaishieiwangere Kamui ku yaiiraige na,
echi nupe ku eshkarun wa shiri ku nupetne kuni ne nei no ku ki na;

orowa, e onnaigeta an kankapkapeka sak eishokor-i a en eshkarunde an; hoshiki no nei ambe anak ne e koro huchi Rois newa e koro habo Euneike oshiketa an; orowa, e onnaigeta ne yakka an sekoro ku eishokon ruwe ne.
Tapan ikkewehe an gusu, ku teke e kashi-ta ku ande ankushkerai Kamui orowa akore ambe e paraparasere kuni ne e eshkarunde ash ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui anak ne ishitoma kuni gusu an ramat un kore shomoki, koroka, kiroro newa omap ambe newa keutum yaieashirikara kuni ramat un kore nisa ruwe ne.

Tambe gusu chikoro Utarapa gusu an paweteshu ambe hene, Shinuma gusu upakashnu chisei ta an guru ne kuani gusu hene iteki yainikoroshma yan: koroka, Kamui kiroro nei no an pirika shongo tura wenbe gusu eyairamkoiki yan;

Shinuma anak ne un kashiobiuki nisa, ashkanne nushuk ambe ani un tak, iki ikip nei no an korachi shomo ne, koroka, otusashuishiri an pakihi etokota Kiristo Yesu oshiketa okai wa un kore Shinuma yaikota koro keutura newa irenga an korachi nep;

aige, nei ambe anak ne chikoro un Kashiobiukip ne Kiristo Yesu ek-hi ani anukare nisa ruwe ne; Shinuma anak ne rai ambe isamka wa pirika shongo ankushkerai inotu newa shomo muninbe sarare nisa ruwe ne;
nei ambe gusu eupaskuma ki guru, Apostoro ne guru, epakashnu guru ne kuni akara ainu ku ne ruwe ne.

Tap ambe gusu obitta no tan okaibe ku eramushitne wa an: yakka ku yainikoroshma shomoki ruwe ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, ku eishokoro okere guru ku eamkiri, orowa, ku shikkashima re okaibe Shinuma nei toho gusu epungine eashkaibe ne sekoro ku eishokon ruwe ne gusu ne na.
En orowa no e nu okere nisashnu an itak katuhu gusu anak, Kiristo Yesu oshiketa an eishokor-i atte ambe newa omap ambe ani shikkashima yan.
Aokai ashikkashimare okere pirika ambe gusu anak, e onnaigeta oshiroma wa an Ashkanne Ramat ankushkerai epungine yan.
Tambe e eraman, Asia moshiri ta okai utara obitta en orowa no hosari okere; nei utara tumugeta Pugeros newa Herraogones okai ruwe ne.
Onesiporos koro uni un utara Utarapa erampokiwen wa kore kuni ku koramkoro; inambe gusu ne yakun, shinuma anak ne kanna-kanna en sambe shiturire nisa, orowa,
ku shinkop gusu shomo yainikoroshma ki; koroka, Roma kotan ta an ita irammakaka en hunara hine

en pa nisa ruwe ne (Utarapa toho ta Utarapa anak ne shinuma erampokiwen wa kore kuni ku koramkoro); samata, Epesos kotan ta hempak inne okaibe ani shinuma en gusu yaishieiwangere ambe aokai pirika no eraman ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu ku poho ne aokai, Kiristo Yesu oshiketa an irenga otta yaitumashnure yan.
Orowa, inne paweteshu utara tumugeta en otta e nu okere okaibe, epakashnu eashkai sone an moshima utara otta ne yakka shikashimare yan.
Kiristo Yesu koro pirika tumikoro guru korachi uturu wenbe eyairamshitne yan.
Nep tumi-koro gusu iki guru ne yakka tan moshiri ta ishu kuni gusu an okaibe gusu shomo yainishomapte ruwe ne; tambe anak ne tumi-koro guru gusu shinuma sapaha nuye guru nupetnere kuni gusu ne na.
Samata, nei shinot gusu ukirorowande guru an chiki, ikashpaotte nei no iki shomoki yakun,
sapa-umbe shomo aunu ruwe ne Monraige wa etoita gurʼanak ne hoshiki no nei hetuku ibehe ibe kunip ne.
Ku ye itak esanniyo yan; nep ne yakka gusu Utarapa anak ne e eramande kusu ne gusu ne na.
Ku iki shongo nei no an, Dabid sanikiri ne, rai-i orowa no hetopo-shiknu Yesu Kiristo eshkarun yan:
nei shongo gusu wen-buri ki guru korachi a en tupetupe wenbe eyairamshitne wa an na; koroka, Kamui itak anak ne atupetupe shomoki ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, anumge wa okai utara gusu obitta no okaibe ku eyaishiporore ruwe ne, nei utara ne yakka Kiristo Yesu tura otusashuishiri pakno an arakuru ne kashiobiuki ambe akore kuni gusu ne na.
Nei aye itak ambe sonep ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, Shinuma tura no chi rai yakun, Shinuma tura no shiknu ash ne yakka ki kusu ne;
yaishiporore yakun, Shinuma tura no epungine kusu ne; Shinuma eshikashke ash yakun, Shinuma un eshikashke ne yakka ki kusu ne:
chi utara anak ne sone ambe shomo ne a yakka, Shinuma ramma sonep ne; Shinuma yai-eshikashke eaikap ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tapan okaibe gusu nei utara eshkarunde yan, aige, ani eyaiepirikare eaikapbe, nu utara oheugere kuni itak gusu upahunara ambe nei utara itek iki kuni ne Utarapa kotchaketa kashpaotte yan.
Oupeka no sone an itak koro, yainikoroshma kuni ika sak no an monraige guru nepkoro, Kamui iramye nei no an guru korachi yaikoropare kuni ne shiarikiki no iki yan.
Koroka, momok an oha-hawe eshishi yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, nei okaibe anak ne shomo Kamui kooripakbe gusu naa iki kuni okaibe ne,
orowa, koro itak anak ne nini shipirasa korachi shipiraspa ruwe ne:

nei utara tumugeta Humenaios newa Piritos okai ruwe ne; nei utara anak ne sonep gusu ohaita, aige, hetopo-a-shiknure ambe anak ne aokere ruwe ne sekoro ye hine sereke okai utara eishokor-i hokushte ruwe ne.

Yakka. Kamui koro nishuwamne asamaha aatte wa an, aige, tan han aomare an na; — Utarapa anak ne yaikota koro utara eraman; orowa, Utarapa reihei ye obitta no okai utara oupeka-sakbe orowa no shikiru yan.

Koro chisei onnaigeta ouse kongani op newa shirokani op patek okai shomo ne, koroka, chikuni op newa toitoi op ne yakka okai; samata, momokbe gusu aeiwange kunip okai, aeoripakbe gusu aeiwange kuni ambe okai ruwe ne.

Tambe gusu, ainu anak ne nei okaibe gusu yaituru-sakte chiki, shinuma anak aeoripakbe kuni gusu an op ne, ashkannep ne, kon Nishpa orowa no aeiwange kuni oupakbe ne, nep pirika ikip gusu aetokooiki kunip ne akara kusu ne na.
Koroka, upen guru iki rusui wen-buri eshishi hine turu-sak sarabe wano Utarapa konishuk utara tura, oupeka ambe hemhem, eishokor-i hemhem, omap ambe hemhem, itomo irenga hemhem keseamba yan.
Koroka, ramu-sak, aerampeutekbe an upahunara ambe eshishi yan, e eraman korachi, nei okaibe anak ne ukoiki ambe hopunire ruwe ne na.
Orowa, Utarapa koro usshiune guru anak ne ukoiki kunip shomo ne, koroka, obitta no okai utara epeka rotcha wa an, epakashnu eashkai no an, wenbe gusu eyaishiporore wa an,
ramu-shiroma no yaiatte wa epokba utara pakashnu kuni an guru ne kunip ne ruwe ne; Kamui anak ne nei utara yaikokatpakte wa sonep eramande, orowa,
nei utara yaieashirikara hine nitne Kamui atte akbe aohaitare, aine, Kamui irenga ankushkerai shinuma ani auk kuni gusu ne na.
Koroka, tambe onnere yan, okese an toho ta hokamba pakihi ek kusu ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, utara anak ne yai-omap utara ne kusu ne, ichen omap utara ne kusu ne, yaiomonnure ki, shitumkanere, Kamui koatcha hemhem ki, eshikop epeka itakkashi,
shomo yaiiraige an no okai, turu-ushbe,
omap ki keutum sak, utara epokba, yaishikkashima eaikap, niwen, pirikap shomo koomap, ainu ekoshi,
koetaraka iki, pakesara, Kamui koomap kasu no yainupetnere ambe koomap utara ne; Kamui koori-pak noine an katuhu koro, koroka, nei kiroro eshikashke:
tap okai utara wano eyaishishire yan. Tap okai utara wano usa chisei orun reyepa ahup hine chikokatpak sei ehaita shiwentep tek-pashte, usa okai wenbe ki rusui keutura an gusu aani,
ramma eyaihannokkara, koroka, ramma sonep eraman kuni pakno epa eaikap utara ne ruwe ne Orowa,
Yannes newa Yambres anak ne Mose shisamchashnure korachi, tan utara ne yakka sonep shisamchashnure ruwe ne; keutum munin utara ne wa eishokor-i gusu yaikoemakbap ne ruwe ne.

Koroka, nei utara anak ne tewa no naa iki shomoki kusu ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, nei tun iki ohaita ambe anak ne obitta no okai utara shik-samata anukara wa an korachi, nei utara gusu an orushpe ne yakka anukara kusu ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, aokai anak ne ku epakashnu ambe, ku iki buri, ku keutum, ku eishokor-i, ku ramu-shiporore ambe,

ku omap ambe, ku yaiyupupu ambe, a en epokba ambe, aeyairamshitnere ambe e ikoisamba nisa ruwe ne; Antiok kotan ta, Ikoniom kotan ta, Rustra kotan ta en gusu nep okaibe hetuku ya; nep aepokba ambe ku eyaishiporore ya: aige, obitta nei okaibe orowa no Utarapa en ohaitare nisa ruwe ne.
Ruwe un, inan guru ne yakka Kiristo Yesu oshiketa Kamui kooripak an no ishu kusu ne sekoro ramuoshitchiu gurʼanak ne aepokba kusu ne.
Koroka, wen utara newa tusu ikichi utara uwepaketa wen ne kusu ne, aine, moshima guru kokandama hemhem ki,

yaikota akokandama aiki kusu ne na. Koroka, eani anak eyaihannokkara okere okaibe, sonep ne sekoro e eraman okaibe shikkashima yan, aige, inan guru otta eani nei okaibe eyaihannokkara ya eraman no okai yan;
orowa, Kiristo Yesu oshiketa an eishokor-i ankushkerai kashichiobiuki gusu e wayashnure eashkai Ashkanne kambi ponram orowa no e eraman ruwe ne na.
Nep Ashkanne kambi ne yakka obitta Kamui pariri, aige, epakashnu gusu hemhem, shirosh ne gusu hemhem, oupekare gusu hemhem, oupeka an ambe epeka pakashnu gusu hemhem epirikare ambe ne:
Kamui koro ainu anak ne aeramushinne no an wa nep pirika ikip gusu irammakaka etokooiki an kuni gusu ne na.
Kamui shik-samata hemhem, shiknu guru ne yakka rai guru ne yakka koipishi Kiristo Yesu shik-samata hemhem, samata, Shinuma ek kusu ne a ambe newa koro moshiri ankushtapne e onishnishi ash na;
nei itak eupaskuma yan; pakihi pirika ita ne yakka, pirika pakihi isam ita ne yakka ramma-kane iki yan; shi no ramu-shiporore wa epakashnu tura koipishi wa esanniyo,

pakashnu, onishnishi yan. Inambe gusu ne yakun, nei utara anak ne nisashnu an epakashi kopange pakihi ek kusu ne; koroka, mayaige kisara koro hine yaikota koro iki rusui keutura kopakeat epakashnu utara yaikota gusu roshki kusu ne;
orowa, sonep orowa no koro kisara hosari hine uwepekere orun atte kusu ne.
Koroka, nep ne yakka gusu yairamatte yan, enishte yan, pirika shongo eupaskuma guru ki kuni ikip ki yan, otta yaishieiwangere ambe uweomare yan.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, tane kuani a en ayange okere, ku oman kuni a-i epa nisa ruwe ne.
Pirika ukoiki ambe ku ki okere, pakno ku hoyupu kuni-hi ku oman okere aeishokor-i ku shikkashima nisa ruwe ne; tewa no en gusu oupeka sapa-umbe eumashnu wa an;
oupeka no koipishi ki Utarapa nei toho ta nei ambe en kore kusu ne: orowa, en otta patek shomo ne, koroka, Shinuma ek kuni ambe omap obitta no okai utara, otta ne yakka akore kusu ne ruwe ne.

Tunashino en orun ek kuni iki yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, Demas anak ne tane okai moshiri omap gusu en emaka wa Tessaroniki orun oman wa isam ruwe ne gusu ne na; orowa, Kureskens anak Garatea otta arapa, Titus anak ne Darmatea otta oman nisa ruwe ne. Roukos patek en tura no an ruwe ne.
Markos tura wa ek yan: nei guru anak yaishieiwangere otta en gusu raka an guru ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, Epesos otta Tikikos ku omande nisa.
Troas kotan ta an Karpos otta ku hoppa mipihi; samata, kambi-sosh, orowa makangane anuye kambi,
e ek chiki koro wa en kore yan. Fure-kani kik guru ne Areksandros anak ne shi no en wende nisa ruwe ne; Utarapa anak ne shinuma ki ikip esanniyo wa koropare kusu ne:
aokai ne yakka nei guru gusu yaitubare yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, shinuma earikimre chi ki itak shisamchashnure nisa ruwe ne na.
Atpake an ku iki kikikara itak ku sange ita anak ne en tura shinen poka shomo iki, koroka, obitta en emaka nisa ruwe ne: tap ambe ika nei utara epeka wa aesanniyo kuni ku koramkoro.

Koroka, Utarapa anak ne en samaketa an, awa, en tumashnure nisa ruwe ne; tambe anak ku ankushkerai nei orushpe naa irammakaka aashte kuni, samata, obitta no okai Oya un utara inu kuni ne aki na: orowa nei shishi paro wa a en ohaitare nisa ruwe ne na.
Utarapa anak ne pishno no an wen ikip orowa no en ohaitare kusu ne, orowa, kando un moshiri gusu en kashiobiuki kusu ne: otusashuishiri wano otusashuishiri pakno Shinuma orun arakuru an na. Amen.
Priskas newa Akiras newa Onesiporos koro uni un utara tura ekap yan.
Erastos anak ne Korintos kotan ta riya nisa: koroka, Tropimos tashum wa gusu Miretos kotan ta ku hoppa nisa ruwe ne.
Mata etokota ek kuni ne shiarikiki no iki yan. Eubouros e ekap na; Pondes ka, Rinos ka, Kraudia ne yakka obitta no okai iriwak utara tura e ekap ruwe ne.
Utarapa e kon ramat tura no an kuni akoramkoro. Irenga e tura no an kuni ku koramkon na.
Kamui koro usshiune guru ne, samata, Kamui koro anumge wa okai utara atte eishokor-i newa Kamui kooripak ambe nepkoro an sonep eramu ambe nei no an wa Yesu Kiristo koro Apostoro ne Pauros

ku ne anak ne shunge eaikap Kamui otusashuishiri wano an pakihi etokota eitakamkire otusashuishiri pakno an inotu echipachipa hine obitta no okai utara koro eishokor-i gusu ku poho ne Titus eun kambi ku omande na:
koroka, Shinuma anak ne koro pakihi ta nei shongo ani koro itak sarare, aige, chikoro un kashiobiukip ne Kamui kashpaotte nei no nei ambe a en shikkashimare nisa ruwe ne;
Michi ne Kamui newa chikoro Utarapa ne Kiristo Yesu orowa no irenga newa itomo an kuni akoramkon na.
Tambe gusu, Krete kotan ta e ande ash nisa ruwe ne, eikohaye okaibe e shitchashnure hene ki, ku e kashpaotte ash korachi, pishno an machiya oshiketa ekashi atte hene e ki kuni ne e ande nisa;
nenka wen-buri sak, shine mat koro, rurisama eyanasapbe shomo ne, itakkashi shomo ne okai eishokor-i atte poho koro yakun.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, episkopos anak ne Kamui korobe ashikkashimare guru korachi wen-buri sak no okai kunip ne; yaikota koro keutum eikaunu shomoki, shomo nukoshne, shomo iku sakayo ki, ainu koiki shomoki, aetunne kuni ani eyaiepirikare ambe kon rusui shomoki;
koroka, ikateomare ki, pirikap koomap, yaikatanu wa an, oupeka, ashkanne keutum koro, yaishikkashima kunip ne; orowa, shinuma
anak ne nei nisashnu an epakashi gusu onishnishi eashkai hemhem ki, eutastasa utara oitaksakka eashkai hemhem ki kuni ne, nei epakashi kopakeat no an sone an itak shikkashima kuni guru ne ruwe ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, inne no okai itakkashi utara, raka-sak itak sange wa kokandama ki utara okai, makangane okarituye-buri oma utara nei no okai,
aige, nei utara koro paro aseshke kunip ne; nei utara anak ne ramne an chisei hokushte utara ne wa aetunne kuni ani eyaiepirikare ambe gusu shomo epakashnu kunip epakashnu ruwe ne.
Nei utara tumuge un shinen, nei utara yaikota koro shine uweingara guru ene itak-hi:—Krete kotan un utara anak ne ramma shunge utara ne, wen chikoikip, toranne ibekashpa utara ne ruwe ne, ari itak.
Tan paweteshu ambe anak ne son no ambe ne. Tambe gusu shiyuppa no nei utara pakashnu yan; aige, nei utara eishokor-i gusu nisashnu no okai wa Yudea un utara koro
uwepekere newa sonep wano ohaitare kuni ainu ki ikashpaotte newa iteki ekottanu yan.

Turu-sak guru otta obitta no okaibe anak turu-sak ruwe ne: koroka, turu-ush wa eumbipka utara otta nep ne yakka shomo turu-sak ruwe ne; aige, koro sambe ne yakka keutum ne yakka turu-ushbe ne ruwe ne na.
Nei utara anak ne Kamui eamkiri ari itak; koroka, aetunnep ne, itakkashi utara ne, nep pirika ikip gusu ne yakka aemakbap ne wa gusu koro iki ikip ani Shinuma eshikeshke utara ne ruwe ne.
Koroka, eani anak ne nei nisashnu an epakashi kopakeatbe ye yau:
onne utara yairamatte, yaikatanu keutum yaieashirikara, eishokor-i gusu nisashnu, omap ki,
yaiyupupu no okai kuni kara yan: orowa, huchi utara ne yakka oripak an katu koro, ohaigekara shomoki, tonoto gusu yaiusshiunere shomoki, pirika orushpe epakashnu kuni kara yan;
upen shiwentep anak ne aeyaieashirikara hine koro hoku koomap,
koro poho utara koomap kuni ne kara yan, shui, keutum yaieashirikara, turu-sak, koro uni ta monraige, ramu-hauge, Kamui itak iteki akoatcha kuni ne yaikota koro hoku koitaknu kuni kara yan:
upen ainu ne yakka keutum yaieashirikara kuni kara yan:
nep ne yakka gusu eani anak ne pirika ikip epeka yaikota y aekoikarabe ne yai kara yan; epakashi gusu oheuge sak,
yaikatanu, pakekoshne eaikap nisashnu itak sange yan; tambe anak un epeka shomoki utara, un gusu sange wen itak isam no, yainikoroshma kuni gusu nep ne na.
Ausshiune okai utara anak ne yaikota kon nishpa koitaknu hine nep ne yakka gusu nupetnere kuni ne kara yan; iteki tasa itak ki; iteki eameokte,
koroka, ikipniukesh no okai; tambe anak ne nei utara nep ne yakka gusu chikoro un kashiobiuki Kamui koro epakashi tomtere kuni ne iki ambe ne ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui irenga hetuku an wa obitta no okai utara eun kashichiobiuki ambe kore ruwe ne,

aige, shomo Kamui kooripakbe newa kanna moshiri gusu an wenbe kon rusui keutum newa emaka wa keutum yaieashirikara hine, oupeka no, Kamui kooripak an no tam moshiri koapkash kuni gusu un epakashnu ruwe ne;
orowa, nei a shinnunuke an aechipachipa ambe newa chikoro pase Kamui newa un kashiobiukip ne Yesu Kiristo koro arakuru hetuku ambe ehuye ash ruwe ne;

Shinuma anak ne obitta no okai ikashpaotte otereke ambe orowa no un kikiraye hemhem ki, pirika ikip shiarikiki no iki yaikota korope ne gusu utara turu-sakte hemhem ki kuni ne yaiyange nisa ruwe ne na.
Ikashpaotte an korachi tap okaibe ye hemhem ki, onishnishi hemhem ki, pakashnu hemhem ki yan. Inan guru ne yakka iteki e pange kuni ne ki yan.
Nei utara anak ne esapane utara newa mondum koro utara kotpoketa yairapokekara wa koitaknu kuni ye yan, samata, nep pirika ikip gusu ne yakka yaietokooikire,
iteki nen ne yakka ohaigekara, iteki ukoiki, rotcha keutum koro, obitta no okai utara epeka ramu-hauge no okai kuni ye yan.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, chi utara ne yakka, etokoko wano ramu-sak utara chi ne, itakkashi, akokandama an, usa okai wenbe kon rusui keutum koro wa yaishiniupare, wenbe newa eyaitunnap ikichi, aetunne, uwe-enupitara chi ne nisa.
Koroka, un kashiobiukip ne Kamui ramu-hauge ambe newa ainu epeka no an omap ambe hetuku an chiki,
yaikota chi iki oupeka an ikip ankushkerai shomo ne, koroka, kanna-shikore furaye ambe newa Ashkanne Ramat ashin no kara ambe ankushkerai hetukup ne,
Shinuma anak ne chikoro un kashiobiukip ne Yesu Kiristo ankushkerai nuye an no nei ambe un kashita echikiki nisa ruwe ne;
tambe anak ne chi utara Shinuma koro irenga gusu aoupekare wa otusashuishiri pakno an inotu echipachipa ambe an korachi eikeshkoro utara ne akara kuni gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne.

Nei itak ambe sonep ne, orowa, tap okaibe gusu anak, Kamui eishokoro okere utara anak ne esanniyo hine pirika moni iki kuni ne, yupke no e ye kuni ku kon rusui ruwe ne. Tapan okaibe anak ne ainu utara gusu pirika newa pirikare ambe ne: koroka,

ramu-isam upa-hunara ambe hene, ainu ekashi ikiri hene, upaore ambe hene, ukoiki ambe hene, tuitak gusu upaukoiki ambe hene eshishi yan; nei okaibe anak ne pirikare ambe shomo ne wa raka-sakbe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Kamui orushpe ohoge yainu gurʼanak ne ara-shui tu-shui epakashnu okake eshishi yan;
nei no an guru oheuge wa chikokatpak an hine aeyaiesanniyo okere ruwe ne ari eraman yan.
Artemas hene Tikikos hene e orun ku arapare chiki, Nikaporis kotan ta en otta e ek kuni irammakaka iki yan: nei kotan ta ku mata-riya kuni ku esanniyo okere ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Nep eikohayep isam kuni ne ipawetenge pita guru ne Zenas newa Aporros irammakaka ette yan.
Koro kuni eishiramne ambe chikoro utara ne yakka uina kuni ne pirika moni iki ambe eyaihannokara kara yak pirika, iteki ibehe sak kuni gusu ne na.
En tura no obitta no okai utara anak ne e orun ekap na. Eishokor-i oshiketa un omap utara ekap wa en kore.
Irenga obitta no okai echi utara tura no an kuni ku koramkon na.
Kiristo Yesu koro apakashnu guru Pauros newa akoro iriwak ne Timoteos anak ne, un tura no iki aomap an akoro Pirimon otta hemhem, akoro matiriwak ne Appia otta hemhem,
akoro tura no iki tum-koro guru ne Arkippos otta hemhem, orowa, e kot chisei ta an karisia otta hemhem kambi omande na:
chikoro Michi ne Kamui newa Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo orowa no irenga newa itomo echi otta an kuni akoramkon na.
Ramma-kane ku goro Kamui ku koyaiiraige wa ku ki inonno-itak otta e reihei ku ye ruwe ne; e ki omap ambe gusu ne yakka,
Utarapa ne Yesu epeka e atte eishokor-i gusu ne yakka, orowa, ashkanne utara epeka e iki ambe gusu ne yakka ku nu ruwe ne;
aige, echi onnaigeta an pishno okai pirikap eramu an ambe Kiristo orun tura no e atte eishokor-i anak ne iki kuni kiroroashnup ne kuni gusu ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, e koro omap ambe gusu poron no ku nupetne wa aomaoma an, ku iriwak ne guru, e ankushkerai ashkanne utara koro keutum sambe-shiturire nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, oupak no an ambe e ikashpaotte ash kuni,
Kiristo oshiketa, nep rametokkorobe ka ku goro yakka, omap ambe ankushkerai ku onishnishi ash ruwe ne, onne Pauros ku ne gusu, samata, tane Kiristo Yesu koro epashkanu guru ku ne wa gusu ne na:
atupetupe wa an rapoketa ku shikore ku poho ne Onesimos gusu e orun ku koramkon ruwe ne, shinuma anak ne etoko wa en gusu raka-sak guru ne,
koroka, tane anak ne en gusu ne yakka aokai gusu ne yakka rak an gun ne ruwe ne: nei guru yaikota,

ku keutum tura, e orun ku hoshipire na: kuani anak ne pirika shongo gusu an tupep a en eokte wa an rapoketa e shirihine Shinuma en otta yaishieiwangere kuni ku reushire rusui, a koroka, e keutum shomo ku nu chiki nep ne yakka shomo ku iki;
e koro pirika keutum anak asangere gusu an ambe shomo ne wa rengaine hetuku ambe ne kuni gusu ne na.
Ramma pakno aokai anak ne shinuma koro kuni gusu, an pakihi uturu shinuma oyakta an nangora;

tewa no ausshiunere wa an guru korachi shomo ne, koroka, ausshiunere wa an guru kasu no pasep korachi ne, aomap an iriwak ne guru korachi, makangane en gusu, koroka, kara otta ne yakka Utarapa otta ne yakka naa kasu no aokai gusu ne na.
Kua-ni anak ne e tura no iki guru ku ne kunak e esanniyo chiki,
en korachi shinuma uk wa en kore. Koroka, shinuma e kowende hene ki chiki, e orun shohose hene an chiki, ku goro sanniyo kambi kata nuye wa

en kore yan; Pauros ku ne anak ne yaikota ku goro teke ani ku nuye ruwe ne, nei ambe ku sange kusu ne na: aige, aokai yaikota anak ne nei a moshima yaikota en orun sange kunip ne sekoro shomo ku ye kuni gusu ne na.
Ruwe un, iriwak ne guru, aokai gusu Utarapa oshiketa a en kaobiuki kuni ne ki yan: Kiristo oshiketa ku sarabe shiturire wa en kore yan.
Aokai anak ne itaknu ki kuni ku eishokoro gusu e orun kambi ku nuye ruwe ne, ku ye-hi kasu no poka e ki kusu ne sekoro ku eraman ruwe ne na.
Koroka, moshima shui, reushi kuni ushike ne yakka en gusu etokooiki wa en kore: inambe gusu ne yakun, e ki inonno-itak ankushkerai e orun a en omande kusu ne sekoro ku chipachipa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Kiristo Yesu oshiketa en tura apakashnu wa an Epapras e ekap na;
samata, en tura no iki Markos hemhem, Aristarkos hemhem, Demas hemhem, Roukos hemhem ne yakka.
Chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo e kon ramat tura no an kuni akoramkon na. Amen.
Fushkotoita poron no ausarayep newa usa okai katuhu ari, uweingarape ani ekashi otta itak ye Kamui anak ne,
tan okese an toho ta obitta no okaibe eikeshkore kuni gusu atte, ani moshirʼebitta ne yakka kara poho teshkara wa un orota itak sange nisa ruwe ne;

Shinuma anak ne Kamui nupeki oma tomtep ne, Kamui katuhu oma son no nokaha ne, koro kiroro an itak ani obitta no okaibe nitatpa ruwe ne; Shinuma anak ne chikoro katpak gusu furaye ambe ki okere chiki, rik un pasep shimon samata a nisa ruwe ne;
Shinuma anak ne Kamui uitekbe kon reihei kasu no eitasa pirika reihei ani areikore pakno, nei Kamui uitekbe ka kasu no pirika ne ruwe ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui uitekbe utara tumugeta okai inambe otta hembara ta ene ene ye ya?
Aokai anak ne Ku Poho ne,
Tanto Kuani e hekature ash na.
Orowa shui,
Shinuma gusu Kuani Michi ku ne kusu ne,
En gusu anak Shinuma Poho ne kusu ne na.
Orowa shui, moshiri otta kiyanuepo ahunge chiki, ene itak-hi:—
Obitta no okai Kamui uitekbe Shinuma koongamirero.
Orowa Kamui uitekbe gusu ene itak-hi:—
Shinuma anak koro uitekbe ani rera ne kara,
Koro yaishieiwangere utara ani abe-nui ne kara;
Koroka poho gusu;—
Aa Kamui, E koro amset auak ne otusashuishiri wano otusashuishiri pakno an ambe ne;
Aokai esapane kuni mondum anak ne oupeka mondum ne ruwe ne.
Aokai anak ne oupekap omap wa wenbe etunne nisa ruwe ne;
Tambe gusu, Kamui anak ne, E koro Kamui anak e koro utara akkari wa
Yaikopuntek oma shum ani E kashiota nisa ruwe ne na.
Orowa,
Utarapa, Aokai anak ne atpaketa toitoi asama E ande nisa ruwe ne,
Kando ne yakka E tekehe karape ne ruwe ne:
Nei okaibe anak aisam kusu ne; koroka Aokai ramma pakno an shiri ki;
Amip korachi nei ambe fushko ne kusu ne;
Amip aukoniko korachi Aokai anak ne nei ambe ukoniko kusu ne,
Amip korachi, orowa, nei ambe chiitasare kusu ne:
Koroka, Aokai anak ne an a-i korachi an,
E paha anak aokere shomoki kusu ne na.
Koroka, koro hauturumbe utara tumugeta okai inambe orun hembarata ene ene ye ya?
E epokba utara ani e chikiri andep ne ku kara pakno,
Ku shimon tek-samata a yan.
Nei okaibe anak ne kashichiobiuki ambe eikeshkoro kushki utara rengap gusu auitek kuni ne aomande yaishieiwangere ramat shomo ne ruwe he an?
Tambe gusu chi utara anak ne anu okere orushpe gusu naa irammakaka ikokanu kunip ne, ikineipeka chi mom wa ehaita ruwe ne kusu ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui hauturumbe ani asange wa an itak aashtere wa an yak anak ne, aige, pishno an ehaitap newa shomo-itaknu ambe oupeka an no an pummaha akore yakun;
ene poro kashiobiuki-hi ikorampoktuye chiki, nekon a ahonnere ash kusu ne ya? Nei ambe anak ne atpaketa Utarapa orowa no aye, awa, nei ambe nu utara ani un orun sonnere nisa ruwe ne;
Kamui ne yakka shirosh newa iyokunnurep newa inne no okai kirorobe newa yaikota rengaine an mondum an nei no Ashkanne Ramat eimekbe newa ani nei utara tura no paweteshu ki nisa ruwe ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, gusu aye ek kushki moshiri Shinuma anak ne hauturumbe otta itaknure shomoki nisa ruwe ne. Koroka,
nei ita an nep ushiketa paweteshu ki wa ene itak-hi:—
Aokai orowa no aeshkarun kani gusu ainu anak ne nekon a ambe ne ya?
Otta Aokai arapa kuni gusu ainu poho nekon a ambe ne ruwe he an?
Aokai ouse pon no patek hauturumbe kasu no shinuma pokashnure,
Aige, araguru newa nupeki ani sapa unure ruwe ne,
Orowa E teke ani akarape nei guru esapanere:
Nep ne yakka shinuma kema pokta E are nisa ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, Shinuma anak ne obitta no okaibe nei guru otta itaknure nisa ruwe ne gusu, otta aitaknure shomoki ambe nep ne yakka isam ruwe ne na. Koroka, tane anukara chiki obitta no okaibe naa shomo Shinuma ko-itaknu.

Koroka, Kamui irenga ankushkeraipo pishno pishno okai ainu shirihine hauturumbe kasu no pon no pokashnu no akara hine rai ambe sapke wa, rai-i oma aeyairamshitnere ambe gusu araguru newa aeoripakbe ani sapa aunure Yesu chi nukara ash ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, gusu obitta no okaibe an, ankushkeraipo obitta no okaibe hetuku ambe auak ne inne no okai poho utara arakuru otta tura shiriki ita ayairamshitnere ki wa gusu nei utara koro kashiobiuki-hi hetukurep eramushinnere kuni oupak ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, aturu-sakte shiriki utara newa turu-saktep anak ne obitta shinep orowa no an ambe ne: tambe gusu. Shinuma anak ne nei utara iriwak
ani porose kuni yainikoroshma shomo ki; ene itak-hi:—
Ku iriwak utara otta E reihei ku nure kusu ne;
Karisia tumugeta E orun ramye shinotcha ku ki kusu ne na.
Orowa shui, kuani shinuma gusu eyaikopashte ash kusu ne. Orowa, shui, ingarʼan, kuani newa Kamui en kore poho utara ne.

Poho utara anak ne kem newa kam utura kon ruwe ne gusu, Shinuma yaikota ne yakka shem korachi nei ambe kon ruwe ne; tambe anak Shinuma rai ambe ani nitne kamui ari aye rai-i kiroro korobe isamka kuni gusu ne na;
samata, rai ambe koishitoma gusu moshiri koapkash rapoketa ausshiunere wa okai utara honnere kuni gusu ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Shinuma anak ne Kamui hauturumbe koro sanike kishima shomoki, koroka, Abraham koro sanike nep kishima nisa ruwe ne.

Tambe gusu, Shinuma anak ne nep ne yakka gusu koro iriwak utara nei no akara kuni oupakbe ne; tambe anak Shinuma utara koro katpak gusu imommuye kara kuni ne erampokiwen wa kore ikipniukesh Kamui korope gusu yaisbieiwangere esapane guru ne kuni gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Shinuma yaikota akoramnukara wa ayairamshitnere gusu, akoramnukara wa okai utara kaobiuki eashkai ruwe ne na.
Tata otta ashkanne iriwak utara, kando orowa no ahotuyepakara utara, chi eishokoro ash okaibe nei
apostoro newa Kamui korope gusu yaishieiwangere esapane guru Yesu esanniyo yan; Mose anak ne obitta no Shinuma kora kenru gusu ikipniukesh korachi, Shinuma ne yakka i ashtep gusu ikipniukesh ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, chisei kasu no nei chisei kara guru anak ne aeoripakbe ne-hi pakno, Shinuma ne yakka Mose kasu no aeoripakbe kunip ne aesanniyo nisa ruwe ne. Inambe gusu ne yakun,
nep chisei ne yakka nenka orowa no aetokooiki ruwe ne; koroka, obitta no okaibe etokooikip anak ne
Kamui ne ruwe ne. Orowa, Mose anak ne auitek guru korachi Shinuma kot chisei onnaigeta ikipniukesh ruwe ne, tambe anak okaketa aye kusu ne okaibe gusu paweteshu ambe ne kuni gusu ne na;

koroka, Kiristo anak ne poho korachi Shinuma kora kenru esapanep ne; aige, chi utara anak ne okese pakno tumashnu no rametok koro wa chipachipa gusu an yaiyomonnure-hi shikkashima yakun, Shinuma kora kenru chi ne na.
Tambe gusu, Ashkanne Ramat ye-hi korachi poka:—
Tanto Shinuma koro hau echi nu kusu ne yak ne,
Nei nup ta koramnukara an toho nei no,
Koro kinrakara sambe asangere i nei no, iteki echi keutum nishtere yan,
