Nei ambe ani echi shinrit utara en uwande wa en koramnukara,
Aine, tu hotne pa uturu Ku ki ikip nukan nisa ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, tan ainu ikiri gusu Ku irushka hine ene itak-hi:—
Nei utara anak ne ramma-kane koro keutum ta ohaita:
Koroka, Ku ruhu nei utara erampeutek;
Aige, nei utara Ku shini-i otta ahup shomoki kusu ne,
Sekoro, Ku irushka wa shiyuppa no ku ye nisa ruwe ne.
Iriwak utara, ikineipeka nenka echi tumugeta an guru anak eishokor-i sak wen keutum koro bine ika ishu Kamui wano eyaishishire kuni ne yaitubare yan: koroka,
tanto ari aporosep an rapoke pakno, kesto utashpa uwe-onishnishi yan; ikineipeka nenka echi tumugeta an guru anak ne chikokatpak kokandama ambe gusu anishtere kushki na:
inambe gusu ne yakun, okese pakno chi utara anak ne shiyuppa no akoro aatte oibe shikkashima yakun, Kiristo tura no ukouina utara no akan ruwe ne na;
ene itak-hi,
Tanto shinuma koro hau echi nu kusu ne yak ne,
Koro kinrakara sambe asangere i nei no, iteki echi keutum nishtere yan.
Nu okere orowa no irushkare guru nen ne ruwe he an? Mose orowa no atura wa Echipt Moshiri wano araki shomo ne ruwe?
Samata, tu hotne pa uturu pakno hunna epeka Shinuma koirushka ruwe he an? koro tumama-awehe nup otta hachiripa chikokatpak ki utara shomo ne ruwe?
Orowa, hunna epeka no koro shini-i otta ahup shomoki kusu ne sekoro shinuma shiyuppa no ye ya? Itakkashi utara epeka gusu shomo ne ruwe he an?
Nei utara anak ne eishokor-i sakbe ne wa gusu otta ahup eaikap ne sekoro chi nukara ash ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu, ikineipeka Shinuma koro shini-i otta chi ahup ash kuni gusu an aeitakamkirep ahoppa wa, nei ambe epa kuni shomo nep ne echi anukara an sekorobe ishitoma anro.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, son no poka nei utara otta korachi un otta ne yakka pirika orushpe aeupaskuma an na: koroka, anu itak anak ne nei utara pirikare shomoki, eishokor-i ani nei utara anak ne anure utara tura shomo ukopoye nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Eishokoro okere utara anak ne nei shini-i otta ahup ruwe ne; shinuma ye korachi poka ne,
Nei utara ku shini-i otta ahup shomoki kusu ne,
Sekoro, Ku irushka wa shiyuppa no Ku ye nisa ruwe ne:
moshiri asamaha aande paki wano nei iki ikip aokerepa yakka ne.
Shui Shinuma anak ne an ushiketa nei arawan ikinne an ap gusu ene itak-hi. Orowa, Kamui anak ne obitta no okai kara ikip otta nei arawan ikinne an toho ta shini nisa ruwe ne;
orowa, shui tan ushiketa ne yakka,
Nei utara Ku shini-i otta ahup shomoki kusu ne.
Tambe gusu, nei ambe otta ahup kuni ambe an gusu, samata, etoko wa otta pirika shongo aeupaskuma utara itakkashi gusu ahup shomoki sekorʼambe anukara gusu,
Shinuma shui shine an toho epeka wa Dabid otta, an pakihi aokere orowa, Tanto, ari itak, etoko wa aye-hi korachi nep,
Tanto Shinuma koro hau echi nu kusu ne yak ne,
Iteki echi keutum nishtere yan, ani itak.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Yoshua anak ne nei utara shinire okere chiki, okaketa moshima an toho gusu shomo shinuma ye nangon na.
Tambe gusu, Kamui koro utara gusu shini-i an na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Shinuma koro shini-i otta ahun guru anak ne, Kamui ikichi korachi, yaikota koro iki ikip otta eshini okere ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, inan guru ne yakka iteki nei no an itakkashi ambe koikara wa hachiri kuni gusu, nei a shini-i otta ahup ash kuni ne shiarikiki no iki anro.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui itak anak ne ishu wa iki kuni kiroroashnu, tu ibe oma rangetam kasu no eenbe ne, keutum newa ramat, ikra newa kiripu usaraye pakno kushna-otke, samata, sambe yainu newa ramepakari ambe esanniyo tunashbe ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, Shinuma shik-samata shomo anukara okaibe ara isam ruwe ne: koroka, gusu chi iki ambe koro shiki kotchaketa nep okaibe ne yakka obitta atusa hine asarare wa an na.
Tambe gusu, kando oboso wa ahun Kamui otta yaishieiwangere iyotta pase guru ne Kamui koro Poho Yesu an gusu, chikoro eishokoro ambe shiyuppa no shikkashima anro.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, chikoro katchakbe nu wa eramu eaikap Kamui otta yaishieiwangere guru un otta isam; koroka, nep ne yakka chi utara korachi akoramnukara nep a yakka chikokatpak isam ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, a un erampokiwen wa akore kuni ne, samata, aeishiramne an ita chikaobiuki gusu an irenga a un kore kuni ne, rametokkon no irenga koro araset otta karange no araki anro.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, pishno okai Kamui otta yaishieiwangere iyotta pase guru anak ne, ainu utara tumuge wa auk hine Kamui gusu an okaibe gusu ainu utara ankushkerai aatte ruwe ne, nei ambe anak chikokatpak gusu akorep newa ayangep yange kuni gusu ne na:
nei guru yaikota ne yakta katchakbe ani aokarire wa an gusu, eramsatbe newa ohaita utara eramu-haugere eashkaibe ne;
aige, nei ikkewehe an gusu moshima okai utara gusu nei no, yaikota gusu ne yakka, chikokatpak gusu an ayangep yange kunip ne ruwe ne.
Aine, inan guru ne yakka yaikota gusu rengaine tapan aainukorobe koro shomoki, Aaron korachi, Kamui orowa no anishuk chiki kon ruwe ne.
Tambe nei no Kiristo ne yakka Kamui otta yaishieiwangere iyotta pase guru ne kuni yaiatte shomoki, koroka, Shinuma otta aye-hi korachi ne:—
Aokai anak ne Ku poho e ne ruwe ne,
Tanto e hetukure ash na:
Shui, moshima an ushiketa ne yakka ye:—
Aokai anak ne Merukisedek korachi
Otusashuishiri pakno Kamui otta yaishieiwangere guru ne.

Shinuma anak ne kam netobake koro ita, rai-i orowa ohaitare eashkaibe otta, rui-chish newa nupe tura, inonno-itak newa koramkorope yange okere chiki, orowa, oripak an no ishitoma gusu anu okere chiki,
Shinuma poho ne a yakka aeyairamshitnere an okaibe gusu itaknu ambe eyaihannokkan nisa;
samata, Shinuma aeramushinnere okere chiki, otta koitaknu obitta no okai utara gusu otusashuishiri pakno an kashichiobiuki ambe koro ikkewe ne akan na;
aige, Merukisedek ikiri korachi Kamui otta yaishieiwangere guru ne ari Kamui orowa no areikore nisa ruwe ne.
Nei ambe gusu aye kuni ambe poron no okai, awa, echi utara nu e wen utara ne ruwe ne gusu, apita kuni hokamba ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, pakihi gusu echi utara anak ne moshima utara epakashnu kuni gusu an utara echi ne kunip ne, awa, Kamui orushpe gusu an iyotta atpake an ap koro isaika ambe aepakashnu wa eyaihannokkara kuni utara echi ne; aige, nishte aep shomo ne no an tope eishiramne utara echi ne okere ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, tope ibe inan guru ne yakka oupeka an itak gusu eram-sakbe ne; shinuma teinep ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, nishte aep anak ne shukup okere utara gusu an ambe ne, eiwange gusu koro mondum-kat anak ne pirikap newa wenbe shinnai-are utara gusu nep ne ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, Kiristo atpake an itak moshima no an wa aeramushinne an ap shikkashima anro; rai an ikip gusu shui yaikokatpak asamaha hemhem,

Kamui gusu eishokor-i atte-i hemhem, baptisma gusu an epakashi hemhem, tekehe ande-hi hemhem, rai-i orowa no hetopo-shiknu ambe hemhem, orowa, otusashuishiri pakno gusu an koipishi ambe gusu hemhem an asamaha kanna-shui shomo ande no okai anro.
Aige, Kamui ramuoshma yakun, nei no chi ki kusu ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, arashuine apekereka wa kando orowa no an eikrap sapke hemhem ki,
Ashkanne Ramat akore hemhem ki, Kamui pirika

itak newa ek kushki pakihi gusu an kiroro newa sapke hemhem ki hine orowa shui eyaikoemaka utara gusu anak, nei utara anak ne ayaikokatpakte wa ashirikinne eashinno akara eaikapbe ne ruwe ne; nei utara yaikota gusu Kamui Poho kanna-shui utasa chikuni otta kokikkik wa anukan no Shinuma yainikoroshmare ki ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, kanna-kanna kashiketa ek apto iku wa, koro toi-kara utara gusu haru hetukure toitoi anak ne,
Kamui orowa no pirika irenga koro: koroka, ai-ush-ni newa anzami hetukure chiki aemaka wa aeyoitakushi kunip ehange ruwe ne; aige, okake an koro auhuyeka ruwe ne na.
Koroka, aeomap utara, tambe nei no chi itak a yakka, echi utara gusu an okaibe newa kashichiobiuki-hi kopaketa an okaibe gusu naa pirika chi esanniyo ash ruwe ne:

Kamui anak ne echi utara teeda ne yakka tane ne yakka ashkanne utara otta yaishieiwangere ani an ambe ani Shinuma kon reihei gusu echi iki ambe hene omap ambe hene oira kuni oupekasak Kamui shomo ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, okese pakno echi utara pishno pishno ukorachi an yuptek no aeshik no an chipachipa ambe ki kuni chi kon rusui ruwe ne:
toranne utara shomo ne, koroka, eishokor-i newa yaiyupupu ambe ankushkerai eitakamkirep eikeshkoro utara echi ikoisamba kuni akon rusui ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui anak ne Abraham otta eitakamkire ita, naa kasu no pasep epeka shiyuppa no ye eaikap gusu,
Shinuma yaiepeta wa shiyuppa no ye bine ene itak-hi:—Son no newa, nunuke ku ki wa e nunuke ash kushki, innere Ku ki wa e innere ash kusu ne, ari itak.
Aige, tap korachi yaiyupupu wa yaishiporore gusu, shinuma nei aeitakamkirep akore nisa ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, ainu utara anak ne iyotta pase ambe epeka wa shiyuppa no ye; orowa, nep upaure ambe an a yakka nei utara ki shiyuppa itak anak ne okaibe sonnere kuni ambe ne aesanniyo gusu auk ruwe ne.
Tambe otta, Kamui anak ne aeitakamkirep eikeshkoro utara orota koro esanniyop shomo aitasare ambe naa eitasa no nukare kuni ne, shiyuppa no an itak ani iyuturu omare nisa ruwe ne:

tambe anak, gusu Kamui shunge eaikap tu itasare shomoki ambe ani, un kotchaketa aande wa an chipachipa ambe ashikkashimare gusu numne kuni ushike orun kokira chi utara anak ne shiyuppa no aonishnishi kuni gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne;
nei ambe anak ne chikon ramat gusu an chip kaite nepkorʼan ambe ne, nishuwamne newa oshinnu hine nei otbe oshmake un ahun;
Yesu anak ne Merukizedek ikiri nei no an korachi otusashuishiri pakno an Kamui otta yaishieiwangere iyotta pase guru ne akara wa chi utara gusu nei oshike un ahun nisa ruwe ne na.

Tan Merukizedek anak ne Sarem esapane guru ne, Iyotta Rikun Kamui otta yaishieiwangere guru ne, awa, shinuma anak ne nei moshiri shikkashima utara ronnu-i orowa no hoshipi korʼan Abraham etunangara wa shinnunuke nisa,

orowa, Abraham anak ne obitta no okaibe gusu wanbe un shinep Shinuma orota kore nisa ruwe ne, aige shinuma ramma-kane Kamui otta yaishieiwangere guru ne ruwe ne na (nei reihei apita yakun, hoshike no Oupekap esapane guru ari an ikkeu ne, orowa no,
Itomo esapane guru ari an ambe ne; ona sak, unu sak, ikiri sak, toho gusu atpake isam, ishu ambe gusu shiokere shomoki, koroka, Kamui Roho nei no akara an na).
Tane, otta nei ekashi mak un ekashi ne Abraham anak ne iyotta pirika auina okaibe gusu wanbe un shinep koropare tan an guru nep pase ambe ne sekoro esanniyo yan.

Orowa, Kamui otta aeyaishieiwangere kuni ne anumge okai Rebi poho utara anak ne son no newa tuitak nei no utara orowa no wanbe un shinep uina kuni akashpaotte ruwe ne, awa, nei utara Abraham tumam-noshke san wa koro iriwak ne a yakka shiriki an na:
koroka, nei utara orowa no san ikiri shomo ne an guru anak ne Abraham orowa no wanbe un shinep uina, aige, eitakamkirep akore guru shinnunuke nisa ruwe ne.
Koroka, pase guru orowa no pokashnu an guru anunuke an ruwe ne sekorʼambe gusu anak upaure ambe isam.
Orowa, teda anak ne rai kuni utara wanbe un shinep uina; koroka, toada anak ne shinen uina ruwe ne, aige, shinuma ishu ruwe ne sekoro aepaweteshu an na.
Orowa, wanbe un shinep akore Rebi ne yakka Abraham kari wanbe un
shinep sange okere korachi nep; inambe gusu ne yakun, Merukizedek etunangara ita shinuma anak ne koro michi koro tuman-noshiketa an ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Nei Rebi gusu an Kamui otta yaishieiwangere ambe gusu aeramushinne-hi an chiki (inambe gusu ne yakun, nei ambe pokta utara okai hine tuitak akore nisa), Aaron ikiri nei no aesanniyo shomo ne no Merukizedek ikiri ne no aesanniyo Kamui otta yaishieiwangere guru hopuni kuni naa okai aeshiramne ushike nep an a?
Inambe gusu ne yakun, nei Kamui otta yaishieiwangere moni anak ne aitasare an gusu, nekon a ka tuitak ne yakka aitasare kunip ne.
Aige, gusu tapan okaibe aye guru anak ne oya ainu ikiri un gunʼne, awa, nei ikiri orowa no an wa nei yange-set otta yaishieiwangere guru isam ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yatun, chikoro Utarapa anak ne Youda orowa no hetukup ne, aine, tan ikiri wano okai Kamui otta yaishieiwangere utara gusu Mose anak ne nepka shomo ye nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, Merukizedek nepkoro an, kam gusu aeikashpaotte tuitak nei no shomo ne, koroka, ramma okere shomoki inotu kiroro nei no an,
Kamui otta yaishieiwangere guru hetuku yakun, tap okaibe naa aeramu-isaikap ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, paweteshu ambe anak ene ani ne,
Aokai anak ne Merukizedek korachi
Otusashuishiri pakno Kamui otta yaishieiwangere guru ne,
kiroro-sak wa pirikare eaikap gusu hoshike no an

ikashpaotte anak ne aisamka an na (inambe gusu ne yakun, tuitak anak ne nep ne yakka eramushinnere eaikap), shui, gusu chi utara anak ne Kamui koehange hine nei kashita naa pirika no an chipachipa kunip aahunge ruwe ne.
Orosama, shiyuppa no ye shomoki no nei ambe shomo iki gusu inambe gusu ne yakun,
(nei utara anak ne shomo shiyuppa no ye wa Kamui otta yaishieiwangere utara ne akara; koroka, nei guru anak ne Shinuma gusu itak wa shiyuppa no ye guru ani iki, ene hawe okai-hi:—
Utarapa shiyuppa ekambakte wa eyaikokatpak shomoki,
Aokai anak ne otusashuishiri pakno Kamui otta yaishieiwangere guru ne);
nei oro pakno ka Yesu anak ne naa pirika aeuitaknup gusu an eikotchanep ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei utara anak ne son no poka rai hine okai eaikap gusu, Kamui otta yaishieiwangere inne utara ne akara;
koroka, Shinuma anak ramma pakno an gusu, chiitasare shomo ne an Kamui otta yaishieiwangere moni kon ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, Shinuma anak ne utara gusu koramkoro kuni ne ramma ishu shiriki, aine, Shinuma kari Kamui koehange no araki utara earikinne kaobiuki eashkai ruwe ne na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, nei no an, ashkanne, wen-buri isam, turu-sak, chikokatpak utara wano shinnai no aande wa kando kasu no eetasa ri no akara Kamui otta yaishieiwangere iyotta pase guru un gusu aatte ruwe ne;

Shinuma anak ne hoshike no yaitota koro chikokatpak gusu, orowa no nei okaketa utara korobe gusu, nei Kamui otta yaishieiwangere iyotta pase utara korachi kesto range ayange kunip yange tuni guru shomo ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, Shinuma yaikota yaiyange ita arashui patek iki nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tuitak anak ne katchak wa okai utara ani Kamui otta yaishieiwangere iyotta pase utara ne atte; koroka, tuitak okake an shiyuppa no ye itak anak ne ramma pakno aeramushinne an Poho atte ruwe ne.
Tane aye an orushpe ikkeu anak ne ene ani ne: Nei no an Kamui otta yaishieiwangere iyotta pase esapane guru un gusu an, aige, Shinuma anak kando oshiketa pasep koro am-set kata a,
orosama, Shinuma ashkanne okaibe gusu ainu ashte shomo ne, Kamui ashte son no an kash gusu yaishieiwangere ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yatun, Kamui otta yaishieiwangere obitta no okai iyotta pase guru anak ne akorep newa ayangep yange kuni aatte ruwe ne; tambe gusu, Kamui otta yaishieiwangere tan guru ne yakka nep ka yange kunip koro kuni ambe ne.
Aine, Shinuma anak ne kanna moshiri ta an yakun,. Kamui otta yaishieiwangere guru shomo ne, inambe gusu ne yakun, tuitak nei no akorep yange kuni utara okai;

nei utara anak ne kando oshiketa an okaibe koro kochihi newa kurihi gusu yaishieiwangere, Mose anak tane nei kash kara kushki ita Kamui orowa no aepakashnu poka korachi nep: inambe gusu ne yakun, ene Shinuma itak-hi:—Ingarʼan, nei nupuri kata e nukare an okaibe katuhu nei no kara yan, ani itak.

Koroka, tane Shinuma anak ne gusu naa eitasa pirika yaishieiwangere kuni ambe akore Shinuma naa pirika aeitakamkire ambe gusu aki eitasa pirika euitaknup gusu an iyuturu oma guru poka pakno ne ruwe ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, nei hoshiki an ap piri-sak yakun, tutanu an ap gusu
an ushike shomo anukan na. Aine, nei okaibe otta piri nukara wa ene itak-hi:—
Utarapa ene itak-hi:—Ingarʼan, toho ek,
Nei ita Kuani Israeru chisei tura hemhem, Youda chisei tura hem-hem, ashiri aeuitaknup ku kara kusu ne;
Kuani nei utara Echipt moshiri orowa tura gusu koro teke Ku ani toho ta
Koro ekashi utara tura iki aeuitaknup korachi shomo ne;
Inambe gusu ne yakun, nei utara anak ne Ku iki euitaknu ambe otta shomo riya,
Aige, Kuani shomo nei utara ekottanu nisa ruwe ne, ani Utarapa itak.
Utarapa ene itak-hi:—Nei toho okaketa Israeru chisei tura ku iki kushki euitaknup anak ne tambe ne ruwe ne;
Koro keutum ta Ku goro tuitak Ku omare kusu ne,
Orowa, koro sambe kata nei ambe Ku nuye kusu ne:
Shui, nei utara gusu Kamui Ku ne kusu ne,
Aige, En gusu nei utara uirup ne kusu ne na:
Orowa, nei utara pishno anak ne heru machiya un guru hene, Utara pishno koro iriwak otta hene:—Utarapa eamkire yan, ari an ambe ani shomo epakashnu kusu ne:
Inambe gusu ne yakun, nei utara iyotta ponbe orowa no iyotta porobe pakno,
Obitta En eamkiri kusu ne gusu ne na.
Aige, nei utara koro wen-buri gusu erampokiwen wa Ku kore,
Orowa, koro chikokatpak tewa no shomo Ku eshkarun kusu ne na.
Ashiripe ari an itak ani Shinuma ye gusu, atpake an ap fushko ne akara an. Koroka fushko ne akara wa uwepaketa onne ambe anak ne isam kuni ehange ruwe ne.
Nei atpake an ap otta poka Kamui otta aeyaishieiwangere gusu aesanniyop hemhem an, tan moshiri ta ashkanne ushike hemhem an.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, hoshiki no, oshiketa nei ratchako hemhem, set hemhem, automoraye pantak hemhem, etokoaoiki kash an ruwe ne; nei ushike anak ne Ashkanne ushike ari aporose ruwe ne na.
Orowa, nei tutanu an otbe oshmaketa Ashkanne gusu Ashkannep ari aporose kash an ruwe ne;

nei oshiketa anak ne Senko uhuika kuni gusu kongani yange set hemhem, shui, onnaigeta okai manna o tongani itangi newa niye hetuku Aaron koro kanni newa aeuitaknup oma shuma-ita newa okai upishkan utorosamaha kongani akokapa shuop an;
orowa, nei kashiketa imommuye kuni set ekamu arakuru koro Kerubim okai ruwe ne; tap okaibe pishno gusu tane chi itak eaikap ruwe ne.
Aine, tap okaibe anak ne tambe nei no etotoaoiki wa an wa, otta aeyaishieiwangere kuni ambe iki gusu ramma-kane Kamui otta yaishieiwangere utara anak ne nei hoshiki an kash orun ahup,

koroka, shine pa ta arashui range, kem sak shomoki no, nei Kamui otta yaishieiwangere iyotta pase guru anak shinen ne nei tutanup orun ahun ruwe ne, aige, yaikota gusu hemhem uirup koro, ouhaitap gusu hemhem nei ambe yange ruwe ne:
nei hoshiki no an kash ash wa an rapoketa Ashkanne ushike orun paye kuni ruhu naa shomo asarare an sekorobe Ashkanne Ramat nei ambe ani epakashnu ruwe ne;
tane an pakihi ta anak tap okaibe itak-maukushtep ne; nei ambe an korachi keutum gusu Kamui koongami ambe eramushinnere eaikap no an akorep ne yakka yange kunip ne yakka eyange ruwe ne,
nei ambe anak ashin no aeashirikara kuni gusu an pakihi pakno aashte kam oma aesanniyop ne (aep hemhem, iku ambe hemhem, usa yashke ambe hemhem tura ikip ne ruwe ne).
Koroka, Kiristo anak ne hetuku kusu ne pirikap gusu Kamui otta yaishieiwangere utara Esapanep ne hine, kasu no poro naa aeramushinne an kash ani, teke ani shomo akara, shomo tan moshitʼta akara kash,
samata, shomo yangi newa pon beko koro kem gusu, koroka, yaikota koro kem ani shashuishiri pakno an kikiarayep kara wa arashui no nei ashkanne ushike otta ahun nisa ruwe ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, yangi newa pinne beko koro kem, samata, upen matne beko koro uina ani kashiachari ambe turu-ush utara koro kam turu-sakte wa ashkannere chiki;

shashuishiri pakno an Ramat gusu opiri sak no Kamui otta yaikota yaiyange Kiristo koro kem anak ne echi utara ishu Kamui otta yaishieiwangere gusu echi koro keutura ta okai rai an ikip ashkannere kuni naa kasu no shomoki ruwe he an?

Orowa, tambe gusu, Shinuma anak ne ashiri aeuitaknup gusu an eikotchane guru ne ruwe ne; atpake an aeuitaknup an ita hetuku katpak kikiraye kuni rai ambe an gusu, anishuk wa okai utara shashuishiri pakno an eitakamkirep eikeshkore kuni gusu ne na.
Aeuitaknup an chiki, oara nei ambe ki guru rai shomoki ko aeaikapbe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, rai ambe an chiki nei aeuitaknup aki kunip ne ruwe ne; koroka, nei ambe ki guru shiknu wa an rapoketa aki kunip ne ruwe he an?
Tambe gusu, atpake an ap poka kem isam no aashtep shomo ne ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, tuitak an korachi obitta no okai utara otta pishno an ikashpaotte Mose orowa no anure okere chiki, shinuma anak ne pon beko newa yangi kem, wakka hemhem fure wata hemhem hissop hemhem koro hine, nei kambi-sosh yaikota hene obitta no okai utara hene kochari wa ene itak-hi:—
Tambe anak ne echi utara gusu Kamui kashpaotte an aeuitaknup oma kem ne ruwe ne.
Samata, Shinuma anak ne nei no korachi kem ani nei kash hene Kamui gusu eiwange gusu an aeramhekotep hene ne yakka kochari nisa ruwe ne.
Shui, tuitak gusu aye chiki, obitta no okai-be kem ani aashkannere ruwe ne, ari ku ye yak pirika; orowa, kem aohetu ambe isam chiki tusare ambe isam ruwe ne.

Tambe gusu, kando otta an okaibe koro nokaha tap ambe ani aashkannere-hi anak aki kunip ne ruwe ne; koroka, kando otta an okaibe yaikota tap okai ayangep kasu no naa pirikap ani akara kuni an ambe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kiristo anak ne son no an ambe koro nokaha nei no, teke ani akara ashkanne ushike otta shomo ahun; koroka, Shinuma anak ne tane chi utara gusu Kamui tek-samata an kuni ne kando otta ahun nisa ruwe ne:
samata, Kamui kora kenru poro esapane guru anak ne yaikota korobe shomo ne an kem ani wa kespa range ashkanne ushike otta ahun korachi,

Shinuma kanna-kanna yaiyange shomoki ruwe ne; shomo ne yakun, moshiri akara wano tane pakno Shinuma kanna-kanna ayairamshitnere nangoro: koroka, tane moshiri paha okese an paha ta Shinuma yaikota yaiyange wa kat-pak isamka kuni ne arashui no anukan nisa ruwe ne na.
Orowa shui, ainu utara arashui no rai hine nei okaketa akoipishi kusu ne a ambe aesanniyo wa an korachi,
tap korachi Kiristo ne yakka inne utara koro katpak sei gusu arashui no ayange, awa, Shinuma katpak sei shomoki no echipachipa wa okai utara otta kanna-shui anukare hine kashiobiuki kusu ne na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, tuitak anak ne okaketa ek kushki pirikap koro kurihi ne wa, nei okaibe son no nokaha shomo ne gusu, nei utara anak ne kespa range ramma ukorachi an ayangep ani karange no araki utara oara eramushinnere eaikap ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Shomo ne chiki, nei ambe ayange kuni-hi aokere shomoki kusu ne a ambe ne, inambe gusu ne yakun, nei Kamui ko-ongami ki utara anak ne arashui no aashkannere wa naa katpak gusu an yaikowepekere keutum sak ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, nei a ayangep gusu kespa range katpak aeshkarunbe an ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, pinne beko newe yangi koro kem anak ne oara katpak isamka eaikap ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, Shinuma moshiri otta ahun ita, ene itak-hi;—
Ayange kunip newa aikrap shomo e kon rusui,
Koroka, en gusu netobake E etoko-oiki nisa ruwe ne;
Katpak gusu an ramne uhuyeka ayangep newa aikrap otta Aokai shomo enupetne ruwe ne;
Nei ita ene ku itak-hi:—Aa Kamui, ingarʼan,
(En gusu nei Kambi-sosh kata anuye wa an)
E korʼirenga ki kuni gusu ku ek ruwe ne, ari ku itak.

Tap kashiketa ene ye-hi:—Ayange kunip newa aikrap newa ramne uhuyeka ayangep newa katpak gusu an ayange kunip newa shomo E kon rusui, shomo nei okaibe otta Aokai enupetne (tap okaibe tuitak an gusu ayange nisa ruwe ne),
sekoro itak; orowa tambe aye na:—Ingarʼan, E korʼirenga ki kuni gusu ku ek ruwe ne, sekorobe aye an nisa. Tutanu an okaibe ashte kuni gusu nei atpake an ap shinuma uk ruwe ne.
Tap ambe ani Yesu Kiristo kon netobake arashui no ayange okere gusu, chi utara anak ne aashkannere nisa ruwe ne na.
Orowa, Kamui otta yaishieiwangere pishno okai uitek guru anak ne son no kesto ash wa iki hine kannakanna ukorachi an ayange kunip yange ruwe ne; nei ambe oara katpak isamka eaikapbe ne ruwe tapan na:
koroka, Shinuma anak ne arashui no katpak gusu shine ayange kunip yange okere chiki, Kamui shimon-tek samata ramma gusu a nisa ruwe ne na;
awa, tewa no ikeshke utara Shinuma chikiri gusu an aandep ne akara kuni pakno chipachipa koran ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Shinuma anak ne shine ayange kunip ani aashkannere utara ramma pakno eramushinnere nisa ruwe ne na Orowa,
Ashkanne Ramat ne yakka un otta paweteshu ki wa:—
Utarapa ene itak-hi:—Nei toho okaketa nei utara tura no
Ku ki kusu ne aeuitaknup anak ne ene ani ne;
Nei utara koro sambe ta Ku tuitak Ku omare,
Koro keutum kata ne yakka nei okaibe Ku nuye kusu ne, ani itak,
Nei no ye okere chiki ene itak-hi:—
Orowa nei utara koro katpak hene, koro wen-buri hene naa Ku eshkarun shomoki kusu ne,
ari an itak ani itak.
Orowa, tap okaibe atusare ambe an yakun, katpak gusu ayange kuni ambe isam ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, iriwak utara, Yesu koro kem ani, chi utara gusu akara ashiri shiknu an ru kari,
otbe ne Shinuma kon netobake kari, rametokkon no nei ashkanne ushike otta ahup ash eashkai gusu;
samata, Kamui kora kenru esapane pase Kamui otta yaishieiwangere guru an gusu,
chi utara anak ne eishokor-i eshik wa son no keutum ani, keutum oma wen yainu-hi gusu akochari wa ashkanne wakka ani chikon netobake ayashke hine karange no araki yanro:
chi utara utumashi shomoki kuni ne aeyaipushi an chipa-chipa ambe yupke no shikkashima yanro; inambe gusu ne yakun, eitakamkire Kamui anak ne ikipniukeshbe ne ruwe ne gusu ne ruwe ne na:
orowa utashpa pirika ikip kire hemhem ki, omap hemhem kire kuni gusu uwe-esanniyo yanro;
moshima okai utara ki buri korachi iteki uwekarapa kuni ambe oira, koroka, uwe-onishnishi yanro; shui, nei toho karange no ek an-hi echi nukara wa naa nei no ki yanro.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, sonep eraman kuni mondum akore orowa no rengaine chikokatpak chi ki yak anak ne, nei chikokatpak gusu an ayange kunip isam ruwe ne,
koroka, akoipishi kuni ambe newa pokba utara isamka kusu ne a opopmau an abe aramu-hi koishitoma ambe newa an ruwe ne.
Mose tuitak otereke ainu anak ne shomo aerampokiwen wa akore no tun ren paweteshu utara gusu rai ruwe ne:

awa, Kamui Poho ekema-pok-otereke hemhem ki, orowa, ani aashkannere aeuitaknu kemihi use ambe ne ari yainu hemhem ki, orowa, irenga an Ramat gusu shomo eyaikatanu hemhem ki utara anak ne, hemanda naa yupke no apanakte kunip ne sekoro echi ramu ya?
Inambe gusu ne yakun, panakte kuni ambe anak ne Ku ki kunip ne, Kuani itasa iki kusu ne ari an itak ani ye guru chi eraman. Shui an, Utarapa anak ne koro utara koipishi kusu ne.
Ishu Kamui koro teke otta hachiri ambe anak ne ashitomap ne ruwe ne na.
Koroka, echi utara apekereka okaketa aeyairamshitnere gusu an poro ukoiki ambe eyaishiporore teeda an toho eshkarun yan;
oattekeheta, aesapsep gusu ne yakka aeramchuptekbe gusu ne yakka aeiyoroingara utara ne akara; shui oattekeheta, nei no akara utara ukotura utara echi ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, echi utara anak ne atupetupe an utara erampokiwen wa kore hemhem ki yaikopuntek no yaikota korobe akoisamka ambe eshiporore hemhem ki nisa, echi utara yaikota naa pirika newa riya an okaibe echi koro ambe echi eraman ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, shi no oro an no an pummaha koro echi koro rametokkorobe iteki osura yan.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, yaiyupupu ambe anak echi koro kunip ne, Kamui irenga echi ki okere chiki, nei eitakamkirep koro kuni gusu ne na.
Naa shi no irukai okaketa,
Ek kuni guru, tere shomoki no, ek kusu ne,
Koroka, ku goro oupeka guru eishokor-i gusu shiknu kusu ne:
Aige, Shinuma yaishietaye yakun, Shinuma gusu shomo ku keutum enupetne ruwe ne.
Koroka, chi utara anak ne aisamka kuni-hi pakno yaishietaye utara shomo chi ne; aine, ramat epirikare gusu eishokor-i atte utara tura ikichi utara chi ne ruwe ne.
Eishokor-i anak ne chipachipa kuni ambe ikkeu ne,
shomo anukarabe uwandep ne ruwe ne. Inambe gusu ne yakun, nei ambe ankushkerai ekashi utara
otta paweteshu ambe aki nisa ruwe ne. Moshiri anak ne Kamui itak ani akara an sekoro eishokor-i gusu chi eraman, tambe gusu anukarabe anak ne hetuku an okaibe orowa no shomo akan na.

Eishokor-i an gusu Aberu anak ne Kain kasu no eetasa pirika yange kunip Kamui otta yange nisa, nei ambe ankushkerai Shinuma anak oupeka guru ne sekoro otta paweteshu an, aige, shinuma ayangep epeka Kamui paweteshu ki, aine, nei guru rai okere yakka nei ambe gusu itak sange ruwe ne.

Eishokor-i an gusu Enok anak ne rai ambe shomo nukara kuni ne eishokor-i gusu auk nisa; awa, shinuma shomo anukara, Kamui shinuma uk nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na: inambe gusu ne yakun, shinuma auk etokota, Kamui aenupetne ruwe ne sekorʼan paweteshu ambe an ruwe ne gusu ne na:

orowa, eishokor-i sak chiki Kamui nupetnere eaikap ruwe ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui otta ek guru anak ne Kamui an sekoro eishokoro, samata, Shinuma ihunara utara epirikare Kamui ne sekoro eishokoro kunip ne ruwe ne.

Eishokor-i an gusu Noa anak ne naa shomo anukarabe epeka Kamui orowa no anure gusu Kamui kooripak an ishitoma keutum atte gusu, koro uni un utara shiknure kuni ne chip kan nisa ruwe ne; nei ambe ankushtapne shinuma moshiri kokatpakte, aige, eishokor-i kari an oupekap aeikeshkore guru ne akara.
Eishokor-i an gusu Abraham anak ne anishuk ita, aeikeshkoro kuni ushike orun arapa kuni koitaknu nisa; awa, nei oro arapa ya eramushkare no shinuma oman nisa ruwe ne.

Eishokor-i an gusu shinuma anak ne, yaikota korobe shomo ne an korachi nei aeitakamkire moshiri ta, payekai guru ne, aige, tura no nei heru aeitakamkirep uina Isaak newa Yakob korachi kash otta oshiroma;
inambe gusu ne yakun, shinuma anak ne asamaha an machiya hunara nisa, nei ambe esanniyo wa kara guru anak Kamui ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Eishokor-i an gusu Sara poka yaikota poro shukup ita shinnaikat iyeunu kuni kiroro akore, eitakamkire guru sonep ne sekoro esanniyo nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na:
tambe gusu poka rai okere guru korachi an shine ainu orowa no kando un nochiu nei no inne, atuisam ota korachi shiri poron no hetuku nisa ruwe ne.

Tapan obitta no okai utara anak ne aeitakamkire ambe shomo uina no eishokor-i atte wa raipa nisa, koroka ehangeko no nei ambe ingara wa ekap, aine, nei utara moshiri koapkash wa oya utara ne payekai utara ne kunak ye nisa ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, nei no okaibe ye utara anak ne yaikota koro kuni moshiri hunara shiriki okai sekoro irammakaka epakashnu ruwe ne.
Orowa shui, orowa no oaship moshiri nei utara ramepakari poka iki a chiki, hoshippa kuni ika an nangon na.

Koroka, tane nei utara anak ne naa pirikap, kando ne an ap kon rusui: tambe gusu, koro Kamui ne aporose kuni ambe, Kamui nei utara gusu shomo eyainikoroshma shiriki: nei utara gusu Shinuma anak ne shine machiya kan nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Eishokor-i an gusu Abraham anak ne auwande ita Isaak yange nisa: ruwe un, yaikopuntek no nei aeitakamkirep akore guru anak ne yaikota koro shinen ne poho yange shiriki an nisa;
shinuma otta—Isaak gusu e sanike anak ne aporose gusu ne—ari itak;
Kamui anak ne rai-i orowa no poka hetopo-shiknure eashkai kunak esanniyo nisa ruwe ne; awa, ikimaukushte ikip gusu ka rai-i wano shinuma hetopuina nisa ruwe ne na.
Eishokor-i an gusu Isaak anak ne, ek kushki okaibe gusu ne yakka, Yakob newa Esau shinnunuke nisa.
Eishokor-i an gusu Yakob anak ne, rai shiri an rapoketa, Yosep koro poho utara pishno shinnunuke nisa; aige, koro kanni sapa eyaikopashte hine ongami nisa ruwe ne.
Eishokor-i an gusu Yosep anak ne, tane onne ehange ita, Israeru un utara payekai kuni ambe ye nisa; aige, yaikota koro pone gusu kashpaotte nisa ruwe ne.

Eishokor-i an gusu Mose anak ne shiko yakun, koro eshikop utara orowa no re chup uturu anuina, pirika aiai ne sekoro nukan nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na: samata, nei utara anak ne moshiri shikkashima guru sange
oma-irenga shomo koishitoma an na. Eishokor-i an gusu Mose anak ne shukup okere yakun, Parao matnepo koro poho aporose katu ekatupase;
an pakihi uturu chikokatpak an ambe ani yainupetnere kasu no, Kamui koro utara tura aeramu nishte wa akore katu pirikap ne sekoro yainu ruwe ne;

samata, Kiristo gusu wen no aye-hi anak ne Echipt moshiri ta okai ikoro kasu no oteknu ambe ne sekoro esanniyo nisa ruwe ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, shinuma anak ne pummaha gusu an iwayehe echipachipa nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Eishokor-i an gusu shinuma anak ne, moshiri shikkashima guru irushka ambe koishitoma shomoki no Echipt moshiri emaka nisa ruwe ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, anukara eaikapbe orun nukara korachi yaishiporore nisa ruwe ne.
Eishokor-i an gusu shinuma anak ne, nei kiyanne utara isamka ambe shinuma utara iteki orooiki kuni ne, Kamakush marapto newa kem chari ambe atte nisa ruwe ne.
Eishokor-i an gusu sat toi akush korachi nei utara anak ne Kokai atui kush nisa ruwe ne; aige, Echipt moshirʼun utara nei no iki kuni heashire, awa, akamure nisa ruwe ne.
Eishokor-i an gusu Yeriko koro chashi tumama anak ne, arawan toho uturu anikkotama okere chiki, hachiri nisa ruwe ne.
Eishokor-i an gusu hoiyo-buri koro Rahab anak ne, itomo irenga sange wa nei inukara utara uk, aine, itakkashi utara tura shomo aisamka nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa shui, tambe moshima hemanda ku ye kusu ne ya? Inambe gusu ne yakun, Gedeon hene, Barak hene, Samson hene, Yeppata hene; orowa moshima shui, Dabid newa Samoueru newa uweingara utara gusu ye pakihi isam ruwe ne gusu ne na:
nei utara anak ne eishokor-i ankushkerai moshiri annokara, oupekap iki, eitakamkirep akore,
shishi chikoikip koro paro seshke, abe kiroro ushka, rangetam-ibe eyaiohaitare, katchakbe ne a yakka atumashnure, tumi gusu tumashnu, oya un utara koro tumi-koro topaha okeuba nisa ruwe ne.

Hetopo-ashiknure gusu shiwentep utara anak ne koro rai utara uina: moshima okai utara anak ne aeramushitnere, aige, kikiraye kuni ambe ekatupase; tambe anak naa pirika hetopo-shiknu-hi akore kuni gusu an ambe ne:
orowa, moshima okai utara anak ne auwande wa aeoyaitak hine akoshirikik an, ruwe ne wa, nei a moshima, atupetupe hemhem aki, ipakashnu chisei ta ahupte hemhem aki ruwe ne:
shuma ani apiyekara hene aki, ekushna acha hene aki, akoramnukara hene aki, atameraige hene aki: hitsuji chiko-ikip rush hene yangi chikoikip rush hene rai wa apkash;
otek-sak wa eyairamshitnere, otta wen no iki an (moshiri anak ne nei utara gusu upak shomoki), nup otta hene, iwero otta hene, poru otta hene, toi un shui otta hene ekeshinne yaimunkopoiba ruwe ne.
Tap okai utara anak ne obitta yaikota koro eishokor-i ankushkerai paweteshu ambe akore,

awa, aeitakamkirep shomo akore, tambe anak ne chi utara wano oyakta okai hine nei utara shomo aeramushinnere kuni gusu an ap ne, Kamui anak ne un gusu naa pirika an okaibe ramepakari nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Tambe gusu, chi utara ne yakka, tap korachi an nishkuru nepkoro inne paweteshu ki utara koro wa okai gusu, ene irammakaka un nikkotama obitta no okai aeoshirokokbap newa chikokatpak oyakta ande hine, yaishiporore wa un kotchaketa aatte wa an uwetushmak kuni ambe otta hoyuppa anro,

aige, chikoro eishokor-i esapane hemhem ki, eramushinnere hemhem ki Yesu orun ingara anro, Shinuma anak ne yaikotchaketa aatte wa an enupetne kunip gusu, aeyainikoroshmarep pange hine, utasa chikuni eyaishiporore nisa, orowa, Kamui araset oshimon samta a shiriki an.
Echi utara anak ne iteki echi keutum ta ramu-rai hine echi shingi kuni ne, yaikota gusu chikokatpak utara iki ene upaure ambe eyaishiporore guru esanniyo yan.
Echi utara anak ne chikokatpak epeka yupki no iki wa kem oro pakno naa shomo eshishi ruwe ne:
samata, poho utara tura eukoyupekere korachi echi tura iki onishnishi ambe echi oira okere:—
Ku poho, Utarapa sange shirikik ambe iteki isaika no esanniyo yan,
Shui, Shinuma orowa no apakashnu chiki iteki ramurai yan;
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Utarapa anak ne omap guru pakashnu,
Orowa, Shinuma uk obitta no okai poho shirikik ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Echi utara anak ne apakashnu gusu yaiyupupu; poho korachi Kamui echi gusu iki na; koro Michi orowa no shomo apakashnu poho inan guru ne ya?
Koroka, ani obitta no okai utara apakashnu ari an ambe ani echi utara shomo apakashnu chiki, chieappise echi ne wa poho shomo ne ruwe ne;
Shui, chikoro kara gusu an michi anak ne un pakashnu, aige, chi utara shinuma ko-oripak; yakun, naa kasu no un shiknure kuni ne ramat koro Michi otta ko-itaknu shomoki kusu ne ya?
Son no newa, nei utara kata rengaine irukai un pakashnu, koroka, Shinuma anak un pirikare gusu, Shinuma koro oupeka ambe a un koropare kuni gusu un orun iki nisa ruwe ne na.

Nep shirikik ambe an yakka iki an rapoketa eyaikopuntek kuni gusu an ambe shomo ne wa eoknatara kuni gusu an ambe ne sekoro anukara; yakka, okake an koro nei ambe gusu apakashnu utara otta itomo an ibehe, oupeka an ambe, hetukure ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, rachichi teke shipeshte yan,
tusushke kokkasap ne yakka; orowa, hera ambe anak ne ru ohaita shomoki no aiwangere an kuni gusu, echi kemaha gusu kuwanno no an ruhu kara yan.
Obitta no okai utara epeka itomo noshpa yan, samata, sak no ne yakun nen ne yakka Utarapa shomo nukara aeashkamrere ambe noshpa yan:
nen ka Kamui irenga gusu eyaikoemaka guru an ya shomo ya irammakaka ingara yan; ikineipeka shiu shinrit ika hetuku wa echi keutum-chiukopoyere hene ki, ani inne utara turu-ushte hene ki na;
orowa, hoiyo ki guru hene, yaikota koro kuni eikeshkorobe shine rai no an aep oro gusu ehok Esau nei no an shomo oripak an guru hene an ya isam ya ingara yan.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, shinuma nei okaketa shinnunuke an ambe aeikeshkore rusui poka ki ita, nupe yaikorange tura nei ambe shiarikiki no hunara yakka (yaikokatpak kuni ushike shomo shinuma nukara gusu), aemaka nisa sekorambe echi eraman ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, echi utara anak ne atomooshma kuni ushike otta hene, abe ari uhuye ushike otta,

hene, ekureok an ushike otta hene, kunne-i otta hene, rera-mau-shiuyupu-i otta hene, rappa humi otta hene, orowa, itak hawe an ambe otta hene shomo echi koehange ruwe ne; nei hawe inu utara anak ne koramkoro wa otta kanna iteki itak an kuni gusu iki nisa ruwe ne;
inambe gusu ne yakun, nei utara anak ne ene aekashpaottep sei eaikap;—Chikoikip poka nei nupuri tomooshma yakun akopiyekara kusu ne ari an ambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na:
orowa, kuani shi no ishitoma wa tusushke shiriki ari an itak ani Mose ye pakno,

nei anukarape ashitoma ruwe ne: koroka, echi utara anak ne Sion nupuri otta, ishu Kamui koro machiya otta, kando un Yerusarem otta araki wa okai, orowa, inne topaha otta, Kamui hauturumbe uwekari otta,
kando oshiketa auwatore an hoshiki no hetuku karisia otta, obitta no okai utara koipishi Kamui otta, aeramushinnere okere oupeka utara kon ramat otta echi araki wa okai,
shui, ashiri aeuitaknup gusu an iyuturu oma Yesu otta, gusu Aberu korobe kasu no pirika okaibe ye achari kem otta echi araki wa okai ruwe ne.

Itak sange shiriki an guru iteki ekatupase kuni ne yaitubare yan. Inambe gusu ne yakun, moshiri kata an wa nei utara anak ne epakashnu guru ekatupase chiki shomo aohaitare yakun, naa eitasa no chi utara anak kando wano un epakashnu guru eyaishishire chiki shomo yaiohaitare ruwe ne:

Shinuma koro hawe anak ne moshiri shimoyere nisa: koroka, tane anak Shinuma eitakamkire wa ene itak-hi: — Kanna arashui ne Kuani anak ne moshiri patek shomo ne, koroka, kando ne yakka ku tusushkere kusu ne na.

Orowa, tan:—Kanna arashui ne—sekorʼambe anak ne, akara okaibe nei no korachi an wa ashimoyere ambe anak oyakta aomande kunip ne sekorʼan ikkewe an itak ne, aige, shomo shimoyepa okaibe anak an kusu ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, ashimoyere eaikap moshiri a un kore gusu, kooripak ambe newa ishitoma ambe tura, ani Kamui nupetnere yaishieiwangere iyaiiraige an keutum koro anro:
inambe gusu ne yakun, chikoro Kamui anak ne okaibe isamka abe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Iriwak utara koomap ambe ramma-kane an kuni ki yan.
Oya utara koomap kuni ambe iteki oira yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, an utara anak ne eramushkare no Kamui hauturumbe reushire nisa ruwe ne.
Tura no atupetupe korachi atupetupe wa okai utara eshkarun yan; echi utara ne yakka netobake ta okai wa okai gusu otta wen no iki an utara eshkarun yan.
Obitta no okai utara tumuta umurek guru nei-hi hemhem, akoatcha shomoki shotki hemhem kooripak yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui anak ne hoiyo utara newa omoinu koro utara koipishi kusu ne gusu ne na.
Ichen shomo koomap no okai; yaikorobe gusu yaiyainuwere yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, Shinuma yaikota ene itak-hi:—Kuani anak ne son no moshima no e ande shomoki, e emaka shomoki kusu ne. Tarahe gusu,
rametokkon no ene itak-hi;—
Utarapa anak ne en ikashiube ne; shomo ku ishitoma kusu ne:
Ainu anak ne en epeka hemanda iki kusu ne ya?
Echi epungine utara, Kamui itak echi orun ye utara eshkarun yan; orowa, nei utara ene moshiri koapkash wa ikichi ambe esanniyo hine, koro eishokor-i koikara yan.
Yesu Kiristo anak ne numan ne yakka tanto ne yakka otusashuishiri pakno ne yakka upakitara an na.

Usa okai newa oya an epakashi gusu iteki aeyaiutumashire yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, irenga gusu keutum aeumashnure ambe pirika ruwe ne; otta apkash utara anak ne shomo eyaiepirikare aep gusu shomo ne na.
Chi utara gusu shine yange-set an, aige, nei kash otta eyaishieiwangere utara anak nei ambe gusu ibe kunip shomo ne ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, katpak ankushkerai Kamui otta yaishieiwangere utara esapane guru ashkanne ushike orun ani wa ek kemihi gusu an chikoikip kon netobake anak ne,
kash-tai soita uhuyeka ruwe ne. Tambe gusu, Yesu ne yakka, yaikota koro kemihi ani utara ashkannere kuni ne, apa soigeta aeyairamshitnere nisa ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu chi utara ne yakka Shinuma gusu an aesapse ambe sei wa kash-tai soigeta an Shinuma orun paye anro.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, teda anak ramma an kuni machiya shomo chi koro, koroka, ek kusu ne ambe chi hunara ash shiriki okai ruwe ne.
Yakun, Shinuma ankushkerai ramma-kane chi utara Kamui orun iramye an ayange kunip yange anro, tambe anak, Shinuma kon reihei orun eyaipushi papush wano hetuku ambe ne ruwe ne.
Pirikap hene ki, tura hene iki ambe iteki oira yan: nei no okai ayange kunip Kamui shiri enupetne ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Echi epungine utara koitaknu wa otta yairapo-kikara yan: nei utara anak ne echi kon ramat gusu shiruwande wa okai, gusu aesanniyo kusu ne utara korachi nep; nei utara nuwap shomoki no, nupetne no iki kuni ne kara yan: shomo ne yakun, tambe echi gusu raka-isambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Un gusu inonno-itak ki wa un kore: chi utara anak ne oheuge keutura sak wa nep ne yakka gusu oupeka no moshiri koapkash rusui ruwe ne sekoro chi ramu ash ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, naa tunashino echi orota a en omande kuni ne, tap korachi echi ki kuni naa kasu no echi onishnishi ash ruwe ne.
Orosama, nei hitsuji chikoikip koro pase epungine guru ne Yesu Kiristo, otusashuishiri pakno an aeuitaknup gusu an kemihi ankushkerai, rai-i orowa no hetopo-shiknure irenga koro Kamui anak ne,

pishno an pirika ikip ani Shinuma irenga echi kara kuni ne echi eramushinnere, aige, Yesu Kiristo gusu shinuma nupetnere kunip un onnaigeta ikichi kuni ne ku koramkon na; otusashuishiri wano otusashuishiri pakno Shinuma orun arakuru an na. Amen.
Koroka, iriwak utara, onishnishi an itak echi inu kuni echi onishnishi ash na: moyo no an itak ani echi orun ku nuye nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Chikoro iriwak ne Timoteos anak ne ahonnere okere sekoro eramu yan; shinuma naa pon no okaketa ek yakun, tura no echi nukara ash kusu ne.
Obitta no okai echi epungine utara, obitta no okai ashkanne utara tura, ekap yan. Itaria un utara echi ekap an na.
Irenga anak ne obitta no okai echi utara tura an kuni atoramkon na. Amen.
Kamui newa Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo koro usshiune guru Yakob ku ne anak ne chiusachari wa okai tu ikashima wan ainu sanikiri un uirup otta irangarap ku ki na.
Ku iriwak utara, echi koro eishokor-i auwande ambe anak yaiyupupu ambe hetukure ruwe ne sekoro eraman wa,
chi utara usa okai akoramnukar-i koekari chiki aenupetne gusu an ambe ne sekoro esanniyo yan.
Orowa, echi utara aeramushinne newa ranme no okai wa nep ne yakka otta shomo eikohaye kuni gusu yaiyupupu ambe ara monraigere yan.
Koroka, echi utara tumugeta wayashnu-i gusu eikohaye guru an chiki, nuye an no obitta no okai utara otta koropare hine kosakayokara shomoki Kamui otta koramkoro yan; yakun akoropare kusu ne na.
Koroka, eishokor-i wa utumashi shomoki no koramkoro yan; inambe gusu ne yakun, yaiutumashire guru anak ne rera ani apata wa akaikaire an atui riri korachi ne ruwe ne.
Nei no an guru anak ne Utarapa orowa no nep ka akore kusu ne na sekoro iteki yainu yan;
tu keutum o guru ne, nep ne yakka gusu maunmaun ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, eraratki an iriwak anak ne arikande gusu nupetne yan;
orowa no, oteknu guru aeraratki gusu nupetne yan; mun epuige korachi isam kusu ne gusu ne na.

Shirishumpa rera utura chup hetuku chiki, nei mun shumumgere ruwe ne; orowa, epuige rapapse hine nei hetuku aekiroro an-i aisamka ruwe ne: tap korachi ka ikoro koro guru anak ne koro apkash ru otta isam kusu ne na.
Koramnukara wa yaishiporore gurʼanak ne anunuke ne: Shinuma auwande aokere chiki, Utarapa omap utara otta akoropare kuni aitakamkire wa an inotu oma sapaumbe akore kusu ne gusu ne na.

Nen ne yakka akoramnukara ita, kuani anak Kamui orowa no a en koramnukara an iteki ye yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui anak ne wenbe gusu akoramnukara eaikapbe ne, shui, Shinuma yaikota shomo ainu koramnukara ruwe ne:
koroka, ainu pishno yaikota koro iki rusui keutum gusu apashte wa shiren chiki akoramnukan ruwe ne.
Orowa, yai-keutum iki rusuibe yairat chiki, katpak o: orowa, katpak anak shukup chiki; rai-arabe hetukure ruwe ne.
Aomap an ku iriwak utara iteki akokandama wa okai yan.
Obitta no okai pirika aikrap, obitta no okai aeramushinne an aikorep anak ne, rik orowa no an ap ne, yaiutasare shomoki, hosari gusu kurihi kara shomoki pekere koro Michi orowa no sap ruwe ne.
Shinuma yaikota irenga gusu chi utara anak ne Shinuma kara okaibe otta aro-ibehe ne kuni ne, son no an itak ani un hetukure nisa ruwe ne na.
Ku omap an iriwak utara, onnere yan. Koroka, pishno an guru anak ne nu gusu chashnu, itak gusu moire,
irushka gusu moire yanro; inambe gusu ne yakun, ainu ki irushka ambe anak ne Kamui oupekap shomo kan ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, obitta no okai turu-ushbe newa wenbe eikaunu kashpap ande wa echi kon ramat kashichiobiuki eashkai onnaige un hekatu wa an itak ramu-rotcha wa uina yau.
Koroka, echi utara anak ne nei itak ki, iteki ouse nei ambe nu wa echi yaikota yaikokandama yan.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, inan guru ne yakka nei itak nu wa shomo nei ambe ki chiki, yaikunnukarabe otta ahetuku an koro nanuhu esanniyo guru koheraye ruwe ne:
shinuma yainukara orowa oman wa nekon a anukarabe ainu ne ya ari an ambe oira ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Koroka, aeramushinne an, rengaine an nrondum oma tuitak otta hotku wa ingara wa okai gurʼanak ne, shinuma oira no an nu guru shomo ne, koroka, ikip ki guru ne wa gusu, tan guru anak ne iki wa akoingara kusu ne na.

Inan guru ne yakka, Kamui otta yaishieiwangere guru ne sekoro yaiyainu wa, koro parumbe shikkashima shomoki no, kon ramat kokandama chiki, nei guru ki yaishieiwangere ambe anak ne raka isambe ne ruwe ne.

Chikoro Kamui newa Michihi tek-samata an turu-sak newa shomo echi yaishieiwangere-hi anak ne, tambe ne ruwe ne,—Aeramchuptek wa okai eshikop sak utara newa shiyompiyara shiwentep utara hotanukara, samata, iteki moshiri ani yaiturukotachi kuni ne yaishikkashima ambe ne ruwe ne.
Ku iriwak utara, ainu yaikoramu ki wa gusu iteki chikoro Utarapa ne nupeki koro Yesu Kiristo gusu an eishokor-i shikkashima yan.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, kongani tek-orunbe aunu, sarambe anrip yaimire guru echi koro nwekari ta ahun chiki, samata, shui, wen

amip ami otek-sak guru ne yakka ahun yakun, aige, nei sarambe amip yaitomchiure guru orun nukara wa hetak tan pirika ushike ta a wa en kore ani ye, aine, toada ash hene, teda an ku goro chikiri set samta a hene otek-sak guru otta e ye chiki;
keutum ta utara ushinnai are wa wen yainu-lri gusu koipishi ki utara shomo echi ne ruwe he an?
Ku omap an iriwak utara nu yan; Shinuma omap utara otta aeitakamkire wa an moshiri eikeshkore gusu Kamui anak tara moshiri gusu irapokkari wa eishokor-i gusu oteknu utara numge shomoki ruwe he an?
Koroka, echi utara anak ne nei irapokkari guru epeka shomo yaikatanu ki nisa ruwe ne na, oteknu utara anak ne echi ramunishte wa kore hine akoipishi set otta echi nimba shomoki ruwe he an?
Ari echi reikore an aeoripak an reihei nei utara koatcha shomoki ruwe he an?
Yakka, echi utara anak ne Kamui kambi kata chieshinnuye wa an—Eani yaikota yai-omap korachi aota un guru omap yan, — ari an sapane an tuitak uweomare chiki, pirikap echi iki na;
koroka, echi utara ainu yaikoramu iki yakun, katpak echi ki na, aige, akatpakte an utara korachi tuitak gusu katpak an sekoro aesanniyo ruwe ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, nen ne yakka tuitak ebitta ki wa shinep gusu ureepetchiu chiki, nei guru anak obitta ehaita ruwe ne.

Iteki omoinu koro yan, sekoro ye Kamui anak ne, shui, iteki keuk yan ne yakka ye nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na. Orowa, eani anak ne omoinu shomoki yakka, koroka, keuk chiki, tuitak ehaita guru e ne ruwe ne.
Rengaine mondum an tuitak ani akoipishi kusu ne utara nei no korachi ye yan, iki yan.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, erampokiwen wa kore shomoki guru anak ne shomo aerampokiwen wa akoipishi kusu ne na: koipishi ambe anak ne rampoken gusu anrapoki akari kusu ne ruwe tapan na.
Ku iriwak utara, ainu anak ne eishokor-i an sekoro ye wa ki ikip isam chiki nep yaiepirikarep an a? Nei eishokor-i anak ne nei guru kashiobiuki eashkai ruwe he an?
Okkai ainu iriwak hene mat ainu iriwak hene atusa hene ki, kesto e kuni aep sak hene ki,

aige, orota mo an no paye wa yaipopkere hene ki, ibe yaieramushinnere hene ki yan, sekoro echi tumugeta nenka ye chiki; yakka, netobake gusu nei aeishiramnep koropare shomoki yakun, nep epirikarep an ya?
Tap korachi eishokor-i anak ne ki ikip sak no an chiki, yaikota gusu rai wa an ruwe ne.

Ruwe un, Eani anak ne eishokor-i koro, orowa, kuani anak ki ikip an, sekoro ye kusu ne guru an: ki ikip sak no an e koro eishokor-i en nukare yan, yakun, kuani anak ku ki ikip ani ku goro eishokor-i e nukare ash na.
Kamui shinep ne sekoro eani eishokoro ki; nei ambe pirika ne: nitnep ne yakka eishokoro wa tusushke ruwe ne.
Aa haita guru, ki ikip sak no an eishokor-i anak ne toirenbe ne sekoro onnere shomoki ya?
Yange set kashiketa koro poho Isaak yange gusu, chikoro michi ne Abraham anak ne nei ki ikip gusu aoupekare shomoki nisa ruwe he an?
Shinuma koro ki ikip tura eishokor-i ki, samata, ki ikip gusu eishokor-i anak aeramushinnere nisa ruwe ne sekoro eani nukara; awa,

Abraham anak ne Kamui eishokoro, aige, tambe anak shinuma gusu oupeka ambe ne sekoro aesanniyo nisa ruwe ne sekorobe ye Kamui kambi auweomare nisa ruwe ne; orowa, shinuma anak ne Kamui koro ikatairotke guru ne ani aye nisa ruwe ne na.
Ainu anak ne ki ikip gusu aoupekare wa ouse eishokor-i gusu shomo ne ruwe ne sekoro echi nukan ruwe ne.
Tambe nei no yaiupshoro chari gunʼne Rahab ne yakka nei ateshkara utara ahupte, orowa, oya ru kari payere-hi gusu seenne aoupekare shomoki ruwe he an?
Inambe gusu ne yakun, ramat sak no an netobake anak ne rai korachi, tambe nei no ki ikip sak no an eishokor-i anak ne rai wa an ap ne ruwe ne na.
Ku iriwak utara, chi utara anak ne naa yupke no aesanniyo wa akoipishi kusu ne sekorʼambe eraman wa inne no echi utara anak ne iteki epakashnu utara ne yan.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, inne no okaibe gusu chi utara obitta ureepetchiu ruwe ne gusu ne na. Itak gusu ureepetchiu shomoki guru an chiki, shinuma anak aeramushinne ainu ne, kon netobake ne yakka ebitta shikkashima eashkaibe ne.
Shui, chikon rusuibe akire kuni ne, umma paroho otta kuchiwa omare yakun, koro tumama ne yakka ebitta henoyere ruwe ne.
Chip ne yakka ingara yan, nei ambe anak ne ene poro shiriki, aine, yupke rera ani apashte yakka, kanchi koro guru rengaine nei shiri pon kanchi gusu henoyere eashkai ruwe ne.
Tap korachi parumbe anak ne ponbe ne a koroka porobe gusu yaiomonnure shiriki. Ingara gusu, nep poro nitai pon abe anak uhuye ruwe!
Orowa, parumbe anak ne abe ne: netobake ebitta turusakte chikoro tumam awehe tumta an oupeka sak moshiri ne, Gehenna gusu aare wa moshirʼebitta uhuyeka ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, nep chikoikip hene, chikap hene, reye ambe hene, rep un okaibe hene, aratchitara shiomaparare an, Ainu orowa no aratchitara shiomaparare nisa ruwe ne:
koroka, parumbe ratchitara shiomaparare guru isam; nei ambe anak ne shinire hokamba wenbe ne, rai oma surugu ne ruwe ne na.
Nei ambe ani chi utara anak ne Utarapa newa Michi ne Kamui ramye ruwe ne; shui, nei ambe ani Kamui katuhu nepkoro korachi akara ainu iyoitakushi ki ruwe ne;
shine paro wano ramye ambe newa iyoitakushi ambe san ruwe ne. Ku iriwak utara tap ambe anak ene okaibe an kunip shomo ne ruwe tapan na.
Shine pui orowa no pituru wakka newa shiunin wakka tup ne kane asangere eashkaibe ne ruwe he an?

Ku iriwak utara, ichijiku chikuni anak ne kanran nikaop hetukure eashkai ya? Shui, hat pungara anak ne ichijiku nikaop hetukure eashkai ya? tap korachi, runnu wakka anak ne pituru wakka sangere eaikap ruwe ne na.
Echi tumta wayashnu wa eramush guru nen ne ruwe? Nei guru ishu wa pirika buri koro hine ramurotcha an wayashnu ikip nukare yan.
Koroka, keutum ta ikoitupa shiuninbe newa sakayo kane echi koro chiki, iteki yaiomonnure, iteki sonep gusu shunge ki yan.
Tapne an wayashnu-i anak ne rik orowa no ran ap shomo ne, koroka, moshiri umbe ne, rengaine an keutum umbe ne, nitne kamui umbe ne ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, ikoitupa ambe newa sakayo an ita anak ne, nei ushiketa eramu-hokasusu ambe

newa obitta no okai wen-buri an gusu ne na. Koroka, rik orowa no an wayashnu-i anak ne hoshiki no turusakbe ne, orowa, itomo irenga korobe ne, rotcha ne, yairotchare kasush ne ambe ne, rampoken newa pirika ikip ani aeshik, utomotne shomoki, kankapkapeka shomoki ruwe ne.
Orowa, oupeka gusu an ibehe anak ne itomo an no itomo irenga sange utara ani aetoita ruwe ne na.
Echi tumugeta okai iki tumi newa ukoiki ambe anak ne hunak wa hetuku ya? Echi koro awehe ta iki eikaunu an keutum gusu shomo hetuku ya?
Echi utara ibeporore ki, koroka, shomo koro: echi keuk hemhem ki, ikoitupa hemhem ki, koroka, uina eaikap ruwe ne: ukoiki echi ki, tumi echi koro; shomo echi koramkoro gusu shomo echi kon ruwe ne.
Echi koramkoro, aige, shomo akore na, eikaunu an no yaikota gusu nei ambe eiwange kuni ne wen no echi koramkoro ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Omoinu koro utara, moshiri kateomare ambe anak ne Kamui epokbap ne sekoro shomo echi eraman ya? Tambe gusu, nen ne yakka moshiri kateomare kuni ramu gurʼanak ne, Kamui epokba guru ne yaikara ruwe ne.
Samata, ikkewe isam no Kamui kambi ye ruwe ne sekoro echi yainu ya? Un onnaigeta Shinuma shiromare ramat anak ne eyaitunnap iki ruwe he an?
Koroka, Shinuma anak ne irenga naa an no un koropare. Tambe gusu, Kamui anak ne pakesara utara eshishi, koroka, yaieoripakka utara otta irenga koropare ruwe ne, ari itak.
Tambe gusu, Kamui koitaknu yan; koroka, nitne kamui esbishi yan, yakun shinuma echi orowa no shaot kusu ne na.
Kamui orun karange no araki yan, yakun, Shinuma echi orun karange no ek kusu ne. Katpak koro utara, echi koro teke ashkannere yan; tu keutum koro utara, echi koro sarabe turusakte yan.
Yairamkoiki hene ki, yaituwashkarap hene ki, chish hene ki yan; echi mina ambe itasare wa yaituwashkarap ne kara, echi nupetne-hi itasare wa oknatara ambe ne kara yan.
Utarapa tek-samata yaieoripakka yan, yakun Shinuma echi riknare kusu ne na.

Iriwak utara, utashpa iteki ohaigekara yan. Koro iriwak gusu ohaigekara hene ki, iriwak koipishi hene ki gurʼanak ne tuitak ohaigekara, tuitak koipishi ruwe ne: koroka, eani anak ne tuitak koipishi chiki, tuitak ki guru shomo e ne, koipishi ki guru e ne ruwe ne.
Tuitak sange wa koipiship shinep an, nei ambe anak ne kashiobiuki hene ki isamka hene ki eashkaibe ne: koroka, aota un guru koipishi eani anak ne nen ne ruwe?
Tanto hene nishatta hene nei kotan paye ash hine shine pa reushi, orowa, iraugetupa wa yaiepirikare kusu ne, ari an itak ani ye utara hetak tane esanniyo yan:

nishatta hetuku kusu ne okaibe nekon a ambe ne ya sekoro echi erampeutek ruwe ne gusu ne na. Echi koro inotu nekon a ambe ne ya? Echi utara anak ne irukai an, aige, ush wa isam paha echi ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Utarapa ramuoshma yakun chi utara shiknu wa tambe hene ki nei ambe hene ki kusu ne na ari an itak ani echi ye kuni an ambe ne.
Koroka, pakesara wa tane echi yaiomonnure ruwe ne: tap korachi yaiomonnure ambe anak ne wenbe ne ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu, pirikap ki katu eraman wa nei ambe shomo iki guru an chiki, shinuma gusu katpak ne ruwe ne na.
Oteknu an echi utara, tane paye wa echi otta ek kushki yairamkoiki ambe gusu chish yan, hawe ashte yan.
Echi koro ikoro munin, echi koro amip shish ae ruwe ne.
Echi koro kongani, echi koro shirokani shikopop; nei shikopopbe anak ne echi gusu paweteshu ki, abe korachi echi koro kam ibe kusu ne na. Okese an toho ta ikoro echi eumashnu nisa ruwe ne.

Ingarʼan, echi utara iramisamka ki wa echi kot toi mose-kara gusu auitek utara koro pummaha hawe ashte ruwe ne: mose-kara ki utara koro hawehe anak ne Sabaot koro Utarapa kisaraha orun ahun nisa ruwe ne na.
Moshiri kata aep oshiroma no echi ishu wa yai yainuchattekte nisa, raige kuni toho ta keutum echi ritetkere nisa ruwe ne.
Katpak kore wa oupeka guru echi raige; shinuma eshishire shomoki ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu, ku iriwak utara, Utarapa an pakno ramushiporore yan. Ingarʼan, toita guru anak ne aro-apto okake apto ek pakno ramushiporore wa toi wano an nupuru ibehe untere ruwe ne.
Echi utara poka ramushiporore yan; koro keutum atte yan:
Utarapa ehange no an ruwe ne gusu ne na. Ku iriwak utara, shomo echi akoipishi an kuni ne, iteki utashpa oromam ki yan; ingarʼan, koipishi ki Kamui anak ne apa samaketa an ruwe ne.
Ku iriwak utara. Utarapa reihei gusu ye uweingara utara koikara hine yairamkoiki wa ramushiporore yan.

Ingarʼan, yaishiporore ki a utara anunuke ne sekoro chi ye: Yob ki yaishiporore ambe echi nu nisa, orowa, Utarapa anak ne chishildraine ani aeshik wa rampoken kore Utarapa ne sekoro echi nukan nisa ruwe ne na.

Koroka, ku iriwak utara, tambe makangane yaitubare yan, kando epeka no hemhem, toitoi epeka no hemhem, moshima okaibe epeka no hemhem iteki shiyuppa no ekambakbe ki yan: koroka shomo echi akoipishi an kuni ne, ruwe un anak ne ruwe un ani ye, shomo anak ne shomo ani ye yan.
Echi tumugeta wenbe gusu yairamkoiki guru an ya? yakun, inonno-itak ki yan. Yainuchattek guru an ya? yakun, iramye shinotcha ki yan.
Echi tumugeta tashum ki guru an ya? yakun, Karisia un ekashi utara hotuyekara wa shinuma gusu inonno-itak ki, aige, Utarapa reihei ankushkerai kashiketa shum ota yan: orowa,
eishokoro an inonno-itak anak ne tashum guru shiknure, Utarapa anak ne Shinuma iwangere kusu ne na: samata, shinuma katpak ki a chiki atusare kusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, echi ki katpak utashpa uwe-eyaipushi yan, echi utara aiwangere kuni ne uweutashpa gusu inonno-itak ki yan. Oupeka guru ki inonno-itak anak ne porobe iki ruwe ne na.
Ericha anak ne chi utara korachi ainu buri koro, aige, apto shomo ash kuni ne shinuma inonno-itak ki nisa ruwe ne, aine, re pa re chup uturuta moshiri kata apto isam nisa ruwe ne na.
Orowa, shui shinuma inonno-itak ki; awa, kando anak ne apto koropare, aige, toitoi ibehe hetukure nisa ruwe ne.
Ku iriwak utara, echi tumugeta nen ka sonep ehaita, aige, moshima guru shinuma yaikokatpakte chiki; tambe onnere yan,
koro ohaita katpak eyaikokatpakte guru anak ne rai-i orowa no ramat ohaita re kusu ne, samata, inne no okai katpak kamure kusu ne na.
Yesu Kiristo koro apostoro ne Petros anak ne, Michi ne Kamui etoko wano eraman korachi, Yesu Kiristo koro kem aota ambe newa itaknu ambe gusu Ramat ani aashkannere wa,
Pontus, Garatia, Kappadokia, Asia newa Bitunia ta chichari hine riya wa okai anumge utara otta kambi omande: irenga newa itomo echi gusu aporore an na.
Okese an ita eishokor-i ani kashiaobiuki wa okai kunak anukara kuni ne aetoko-oiki wa okai Kamui kiroro ani aepungine echi utara,

kando oshiketa eumashnu wa an munin shomoki, turu-sak wa, shomo shumumge eikeshkorobe shikkashimare kuni ne, rai orowa no Yesu Kiristo hetopo-shiknure ambe ani koro poro rampoken gusu ishu chipachipa kuni ambe otta hetopo un shikore,
chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo koro Michi newa Kamui anak ne airamye an na.

Tambe otta, echi koro eishokor-i akoramnukara ambe anak ne, abe ani turu-sakte yakka munin kongani kasu no nupuru wa, Yesu Kiristo anukara ita airamye, anupekte, aeoripakka an kuni ne, tane irukai aki etokosh yakun,
inne no okai auwande ambe an gusu echi oknatara yakka, poron no chi utara nupetne ruwe ne.
Shomo Shinuma echi nukara yakka ko-omap ruwe ne; tane shomo echi nukara yakka, Shinuma eishokoro wa nupeki ani aeshik aye eaikap pakno an nupetne ambe ani echi poron no enupetne ruwe ne: aige,
gusu echi eishokoro ki ambe, echi kon ramat kashiaobiuki ambe echi kon ruwe ne na.
Nei kashiobiuki-hi gusu, echi utara gusu an irenga gusu uweingara ki uweingara utara anak ne shiarikiki no hunara wa uwepekennu nisa ruwe ne; nei utara onnaigeta an Kiristo kon Ramat anak ne,
etoko wano Kiristo ayairamshitnere ambe hene, okaketa an kusu ne nupeki ambe paweteshu ki ita nekon a paha epeka ruwe he an? nei utara chimchimi nisa ruwe ne.

Kando orowa no aette Ashkanne Ramat ani echi orota pirika shongo eupaskuma ki utara ankushkerai echi anure tan okaibe yaikota gusu ki shomoki no, echi utara gusu ki ruwe ne ambe nei utara aeramande nisa ruwe ne na; Kamui hauturumbe nei okaibe esanniyo rusui nisa ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu, echi koro keutum ta kut koro wa yairamatte yan, orowa, Yesu Kiristo anukara ita echi utara gusu hetuku irenga utumashi shomoki no echipachipa yan;
itaknu poho utara korachi ki wa eramushkare ita ki korachi iteki ibeporore ambe otta yaikoropare yan;
koroka, echi tak Kamui anak ne turu-sak korachi, nep ne yakka gusu echi utara ne yakka turu-sak no okai yan;
kuani anak ne ashkanne ruwe ne gusu, echi utara ne yakka ashkanne ne kusu ne, sekoro chieshinnuye wa an ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, ainu kashiramu shomoki no pishno pishno an guru koro ikip an korachi koipishi Kamui, Michi nep koro korachi echi konishuk yak anak ne

ishitoma an on teda oshiroma yan: aige, tambe onnere yan, echi utara anak ne echi koro ekashi epakashnu raka isam no an ki buri orowa no, munin kuni shirokani ani hene kongani ani hene echi kikiaraye shomo ne,
koroka, turu-sak no echi-sak no an pon hitsuji korachi an Kiristo koro nupuru kem ani poka echi kikiaraye an na:
Shinuma anak ne moshiri asama aande etoko wano aeramu ambe ne, koroka, echi utara gusu pakihi okeseketa anukare nisa ruwe ne;

echi utara anak ne Kamui otta eishokoro hene ki chipachipa hene ki kuni ne, Shinuma rai-i orowa no hetopo-shiknure wa otta nupeki koropare Kamui otta, Shinuma gusu eishokor-i ki utara echi ne ruwe ne.
Echi utara anak ne oheuge sak no iriwak utara omap hemhem ki, sonep otta itaknu hemhem echi ki-i ani kon ramat echi turu-sakte okere gusu, orowa,
munin kuni piyehe ani shomo ne, koroka, shiknu wa okai Kamui itak ani munin shomoki piyehe ani echi hekatu wa an gusu, shiarikiki no ramuosshi wano utashpa uweomap yan.
Inambe gusu ne yakun,
Obitta no okai kam anak ne mun korachi ne.
Nei tombe-i anak ne mun ponno ukorachi ne ruwe ne.
Mun auak ne shumumge, nei nonno rapapse:
Koroka, Utarapa itak anak ne otusashuishiri pakno an ruwe tapan na.
Orowa tan itak anak ne echi utara otta eupaskuma an pirika shongo ne ruwe ne na.
Tambe gusu obitta no okai wenbe hene, obitta no okai kokandama ambe hene, kankapkapeka ambe hene, eyaitunnap ki ambe hene, obitta no okai wen itak sange ambe hene oyakta ande yan;
kashiaobiuki gusu echi shukup kuni ne, tane shiko aiai korachi,
Utarapa anak ne irenga an ambe ne sekoro echi sapke wa nu okere chiki, wenbe sak no an ramu oma tope ekatnu yan:
utara orowa no aemaka yakka, Kamui numge shiknu wa an aeoripak an shuma ne Shinuma orota araki yan;

echi utara ne yakka shiknu shuma ne korachi, Yesu Kiristo ani Kamui nupetnere ramat oma yangep yange kuni ne, Kamui otta yaishieiwangere ashkanne utara echi ne kuni gusu, ramat oma chisei ne echi kara an na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui kambi kata ene an na;—
Ingarʼan, Zion otta anumge, aeoripak an sapane shikkiu nep Ku ande ruwe ne:
Nei ambe eishokoro gurʼanak ne shomo ayainikoroshmare kusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, eishokoro ki echi utara gusu tan aeoripak ambe an: koroka, shomo eishokoro ki utara gusu,
Chisei kara utara emaka shuma anak ne,
Nei shuma anak shikkiu sapane shuma ne akara nisa ruwe ne;
Orowa,
Eshitchiure kuni shuma, epetchiure kuni watara ne akan nisa ruwe ne:
inambe gusu ne yakun, nei utara itakkashi wa eshitchiu ruwe ne; nei ambe gusu poka nei utara anak ne aashte nisa ruwe ne.

Koroka, kunne-i wano koro iyokunnure an pekere otta echi tak Kamui koro pirika ambe assuru ashte kuni ne echi utara anak ne anumge an utara echi ne, esapane guru koro Kamui otta yaishieiwangere utara echi ne, ashkanne uirup echi ne, Kamui yaikota shikkashima kuni utara echi ne ruwe ne:
etokota anak ne uirup utara shomo echi ne, koroka, tane anak Kamui utara echi ne ruwe ne: etokota anak erampokiwen wa akore shomoki, koroka, tane aerampokiwen wa okai na.
Aomap an utara, echi utara anak ne payekai utara ne, irukai reushi utara korachi echi ne wa gusu, ramat kotumikoro wa okai kam oma ibeporore ambe shomo echi ki kuni echi onishnishi ash na;

Oya utara tumugeta okai rapoketa yairamatte wa okai yan: nei utara echi iyohaigekara wa wenbe ki guru echi ne sekoro ye chiki, echi ki pirika ikip nukara hine aesanniyo toho ta nei utara Kamui ramye kuni ne nei no kara yan.
Utarapa gusu utara aashtep otta koitaknu yan;
iyotta pase Ahekote nishpa otta hene, wen-buri ki utara panakte hemhem ki, pirikap ki utara ramye hemhem ki kuni Shinuma orowa no aette epungine utara otta hene ne yakka ki yan.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, echi utara anak ne pirikap ki-hi ani ramu-sak utara erampeutekbe raore kuni ambe anak ne, Kamui irenga ne ruwe ne:
rengaine an mondum koro yakka wenbe akamurep ne gusu iteki nei a echi koro rengaine an mondum koro yan; koroka, Kamui usshiune utara korachi echi okai yan.
Obitta no okai utara ko-oripak yan. Iriwak ne utara omap yan. Kamui koishitoma yan. Ahekote nishpa ko-oripak yan.
Auitek utara, ishitoma ki wa koro nishpane utara otta koitaknu yan; ouse pirikap newa rotcha guru otta patek shomo ne, koroka, niwen guru otta ne yakka ki yan.
Nen ka Kamui ko-oripak an gusu ikkewe sak no ayairamshitnere, aige, nei sarabe oknatara ambe eyaishiporore yakun, tambe anak ne irenga ne ruwe ne.

Katpak echi ki gusu shirikik an wa echi yaishiporore yakka, nekon a airamye kuni ambe an a? Koroka, pirikap echi iki wa gusu echi ayairamshitnere hine eyaishiporore chiki, tambe anak Kamui gusu an irenga ne ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, echi anishuk nisa ruwe ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, Kiristo ne yakka echi utara gusu ayairamshitnere, awa, nei kochi otta echi kari kuni ne, echi utara gusu aikoikarabe ande nisa ruwe ne:
Shinuma anak ne katpak seenne ki, koro paro otta kokandama ambe ne yakka anukara shomoki nisa ruwe ne:
Shinuma, aiyoitakushi ita, shomo tasa oitakushi ki; ayairamshitnere ita kosakayokara shomoki; koroka, oupeka no koipishi guru otta yaikoropare nisa ruwe ne:

Shinuma yaikota kon netobake oshiketa chikoro chikokatpak koro hine chikuni otta sei wa arapa, nei ambe anak ne chi utara katpak otta rai wa oupekap otta shiknu gusu ne a ambe ne; Shinuma akore shirikik-hi gusu echi utara aiwangere nisa ruwe ne.
Hitsuji chikoikip korachi echi ru turainu shiriki wa okai, awa, tane echi kon ramat anak ne koro shiure guru ne echi epungine guru otta hoshipi wa an ruwe ne na.
Tap korachi, machi ne echi utara, yaikota koro hoku otta itaknu yan: nei utara poka itak otta ko-nu shomoki no,
nei itak sak no an a yakka, echi puri pirikap ne oripak ambe nukara hine, koro machi ki buri ani aitaknure kuni gusu ne na.
Yaitomte kara chiki, shomo anukara kuni sapa shiocha hene ki, shomo kongani an tombe unu hene ki, mipihi utomchiure hene shomo ki, koroka,
Kamui tek-samata shi no ataye nupuru, keutum oshiketa anuina wa an guru, munin shomoki ramu-shiroma newa rotcha keutum ani yaitomte kara yan.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, tap korachi fushkotoi ta okai Kamui gusu chipachipa ashkanne shiwentep utara anak ne yaikota koro hoku otta ko-itaknu wa yaitomte kan nisa ruwe ne:
Sara anak Abraham otta itaknu wa nishpa ari an itak ani porose ruwe ne: echi utara anak ne pirikap echi ki wa, nep ashitomare ambe gusu shomo ishitoma chiki, tane shinuma koro poho echi ne ruwe ne.

Tap korachi hoku ne echi utara, echi koro inonno-itak shomo aerannakbe ne kuni gusu, eraman no koro machi tura oshiroma, aige, echi utara ukotura shiknu irenga koro wa okai gusu, shinuma turasak awehe ne aesanniyo wa ko-oripak yan.
Orosama okeseketa, echi utara obitta keutum shineatkire, utashpa uwerampokiwen wa kore, uiriwak korachi omap ki, uweiyeramuhauge an keutum koro,

yaieoripakka wa okai yan: wenbe gusu iteki wenbe hekiru, akowenpashuipa gusu iteki kowenpashuipa ambe hekiru, koroka, makangane nunuke yan; inambe gusu ne yakun, nunuke ambe echi eikeshkore kuni gusu echi anishuk nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Inotu omap wa,
Pirika toho nukan rusui gurʼanak ne,
Wenbe wano koro parumbe eshishire,
Koro patoi iteki irarabe ye kuni kara yan:
Nei guru wenbe eshishi wa pirikap ki;
Itomo hunara wa nei ambe noshpa kuni ki yan.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Utarapa shikiki anak ne oupeka utara kashiketa an,
Nei utara koro inonno-itak otta koro kisara ikokanu wa okai:
Koroka, wenbe ikichi guru kashiketa Kamui nanuhu an ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, echi utara pirikap ki kuni echi kiroro yupu chiki,
echi wende guru nen ne ruwe he an? Koroka, oupekap gusu echi ayairamshitnere an yakun, echi anunuke ne: iteki nei utara ashitoma ambe gusu ishitoma yan, iteki yaikota eyairamusarakka yan; koroka,

Kiristo anak ne Utarapa ne sekoro echi keutura ta esanniyo yan: echi oshiketa okai chipachipa ambe ikkewehe ramu-rotcha wa ishitoma an no nen ne yakka otta ese-itak sange kuni ne ramma-kane etokooiki wa okai yan:
echi ohaigekara an wa, Kiristo otta echi iki pirikap wen no ye utara anak ne ayainikoroshmare kuni gusu, katpak isam no an keutum koro yan.
Kamui rengaine nei no esanniyo chiki, echi utara wenbe echi ki gusu aeramshitnere kasu no, pirikap echi ki wa gusu aeramshitnere-hi anak ne naa pirika ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kiristo anak ne Kamui otta un tura kuni ne arashui no katpak gusu ramshitnere nisa ruwe ne, tambe anak oupeka sak utara shirine oupeka an guru aeyairamshitnere ambe ne; Shinuma anak ne kara gusu araige, koroka,
ramat gusu ashiknure; nei ambe ani Shinuma upakashnu ushike ta okai ramat otta oman wa upaskuma ki,

nei ramat anak ne fushkotoita, Noa okai wa shinuma kara chip aetokooiki wa an Kamui ramushiporore ki wa untere rapoketa itakkashi utara ne; nei chip otta moyo utara, tupesan niu ne utara wakka gusu kashiaobiuki nisa ruwe ne na;

nei wakka anak ne tane un kashiobiuki baptisma koro son no nokaha ne ruwe ne, tambe anak ne kara oma ichakkerep isamka gusu shomo ne, koroka, Yesu Kiristo hetoposhiknu-hi an gusu Kamui epeka no keutum yaikowepekere shomoki-i gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne;
Shinuma anak ne kando otta ahun wa Kamui shimon tek-samata an ruwe ne; orowa, Kamui hauturumbe hene, raondum korobe hene, kiroro umbe hene, Shinuma gusu akoitaknure an ruwe ne na.

Tambe Kiristo anak ne kam otta ayairamshitnere gusu, tambe gusu, echi utara ne yakka nei no an yainu-hi ani yaikota echi yaimutkare yan; inambe gusu ne yakun, kara otta ayairamshitnere guru anak ne katpak shiokere nisa ruwe ne na;
tambe anak ne echi utara tewa no poka utara koro eikaunu ambe gusu kara otta shomo echi utara ishu, koroka, Kamui irenga nei no ki wa moshiri echi ko-ishu kuni gusu ne na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, oya moshiri un utara ki rusuibe gusu shiokere pakihi anak ne pakno ne nangoro, samata, ramupekere ambe otta hene, ibeporore ambe otta hene, iku-rui ambe otta hene, iku-sakayo otta hene, iku ambe hene, katpak an potoki ko ongami ambe otta hene, apkash gusu shiokere pakihi anak ne pakno ne nangoro:
echi utara tap koracki ki wa nei utara tura no wen-sakayo hopunire shomoki gusu aeoyamokte wa aokaigekarʼan na:
nei utara anak ne shiknu guru kene rai guru kene koipiski gusu skipini wa an Kamui otta yaieoruskpe nu yara kusu ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, rai guru anak ne shiknu guru nep koro akoipishi, koroka, ramat otta Kamui korachi shiknu kuni gusu, orota pirika shongo anure nisa ruwe ne.
Koroka, obitta no okaibe aokere-hi anak ne ehange ruwe ne; tambe gusu, keutum yaieashirikara hine yairamatte wa inonno-itak ki yan: orowa, utashpa
makangane ara uweomap ki yan; inambe gusu ne yakun, onrap ambe anak ne uwatte no okai katpak
kamure ruwe ne gusu ne na: oromam shomoki no
uweutashpa ikateonrare yan: echi utara pishno pishno aikrap akore an nei no, Kamui inne no okai irenga gusu pirika no okai ashikkashimare utara korachi,

uweutashpa nei ambe gusu yaishieiwangere yan: itak ye guru an chiki, Kamui shongo an korachi yero; yaishieiwangere guru an chiki, Kamui orowa no ako-ropare kiroro an korachi kiro; tambe anak Yesu Kiristo rengap gusu nep ne yakka otta Kamui ako-oripak kuni gusu ne na; nupeki newa kiroro kane shashuishiri wano shashuishiri pakno Shinuma korobe ne. Amen.
Aomap an utara, echi utara tumugeta an abe o koramnukarabe gusu aoyaraoktep echi gusu hetuku an sekoro iteki yainu yan:
koroka, Kiristo iki ayairamshitnere ambe tura no iki utara echi ne ruwe ne gusu nupetne yan; tambe anak Shinuma koro nupekihi anukara ita ne yakka, poron no ramuritetke wa, echi nupetne gusu ne na.
Echi utara anak ne Kiristo reihei gusu akosakayokara an chiki, echi anunuke ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, nupeki Ramat newa Kamui Ramat anak ne echi kashiketa okai shiri ne gusu ne na.
Koroka, keweuk guru korachi hene, ikka guru korachi hene, wen-buri iki guru korachi hene, moshima guru korope ekottanu guru korachi hene gusu iteki ayairamshitnere kuni ki yan:
koroka, Kiristian gusu nenka ayairamshitnere chiki, iteki yainikoroshma yan; koroka tan reihei an gusu Kamui ramye yan.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui kora kenru ta akoipishi heashi kuni pakihi anak ne an; aige, hoshiki no un gusu aheashire chiki, Kamui pirika shongo koitak-nu shomoki utara okesehe anak ne nekon a ambe ne kusu ne ya?
Orowa, oupeka guru anak ne hokamba no kashiaobiuki chiki, Kamui shomo kooripak utara newa katpak ki utara nei ita anukarape ne ruwe he
an? Tambe gusu, Kamui irenga gusu ayairamshitnere utara poka pirikap iki wa ikipniukesh moshiri kara Kamui otta koropare yan.
Tura no iki ekashi, samata, Kiristo iki yairamshitnere-hi gusu paweteshu ki, samata anukara kusu ne nupeki ne yakka tura no koro guru ku ne anak ne, tambe gusu,

echi tumugeta okai ekashi utara onishnishi ash na: Echi tumugeta okai Kamui koro topaha reshpa yan, nekon a ka akire wa an gusu shomo ne wa, koroka, Kamui an gusu eyaitupa keutum koro wa esapane yan; samata, aetunne kuni yaiepirikare ambe gusu shomo ne no, etoko-oiki wa an keutum koro wa ki yan;
shui, echi epungine kuni gusu akorep enishpane shomo ne, koroka, nei topaha gusu aekoikarape gusu yaikara yan.
Orowa, nei esapane reshpa guru anukara ita echi utara anak ne nin shomoki nupeki oma sapa umbe echi akore an kusu ne na.

Samata, echi okai upeure utara, ekashi otta koitaknu yan. Ruwe un, echi utara obitta uweutashpa ukoyaishieiwangere gusu oripak ambe ani yai koshaye wa okai yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui anak ne shiokunnure utara eshishi, koroka, oripak an utara otta irenga sange wa koropare ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu pakihi epa kuni ita echi rikta aande kuni gusu, Kamui kiroro un teke choropoketa echi okai wa yaioripakka yan;
echi ki nishomap ambe obitta Shinuma otta seire, Shinuma echi esanniyo ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Yaishikkashima wa yairamatte yan; echi epokba nitnep anak ne hawe ashte shishi korachi e kuni guru hunara gusu apkash korʼan ruwe ne:
ukorachi an aeramshitnere ambe anak ne moshiri otta okai echi iriwak utara otta ne yakka an sekoro echi eraman wa, utumashi shomoki no eishokoro wa nei ipokbap shisamchashnure yan.

Orowa, Kiristo oshiketa koro aokere shomoki nupeki otta echi tak obitta no okai irenga koro Kamui anak ne, pon no uturuta echi eramusarak okaketa, Shinuma yaikota echi ramushinnere, echi roshkire, echi tumashnure kusu ne.
Shashuishiri wano shashuishiri pakno Shinuma otta kiroro an na. Amen.

Chikoro ikipniukesh iriwak ne sekoro ku esanniyo Sirouanos ani takne no echi gusu kambi ku nuyere yara, aine, onishnishi ku ki, samata, tambe anak ne Kamui son no irenga ne sekoro, paweteshu ku ki ruwe ne; nei ambe otta utumashi shomoki no roshki yan.
Echi tura no anumge Babironia kotan ta okaibe echi ekap ruwe ne; shui, ku poho ne Markos ne yakka nei no ki na.
Onrap an chopchopse ambe ani uweutashpa uwekap yan.
Kiristo oshiketa obitta no okai echi utara gusu itomo an a an na.

Yesu Kiristo koro usshiune guru newa Apostoro ne Simon Petros anak ne, chikoro Kamui newa un Kashiobiukip ne Yesu Kiristo koro oupeka-i otta un tura no ukorachi an aoshkoro eishokor-i akore utara otta,
kambi omande na: Kamui newa chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu eraman-i otta irenga newa itomo echi gusu aporore na;
yaikota koro nupeki newa pirika ambe ani un takbe eraman-i gusu, koro Kamui oma kiroro anak ne inotu newa Kamui ko oripak-i otta an obitta no okaibe un koropare nisa;

tambe gusu, Shinuma anak ne koro aoshkoro newa shi no poro uitaknup un koropare nisa; tap okaibe ani, echi utara anak ne ibeporore ambe gusu moshiri otta okai muninbe orowa no ohaita okere wa, Kamui oma oibe echi orota akoropare kuni gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne.
Ruwe newa, tapan ikkewehe an gusu obitta no okai yuptek-hi echi kashiomare yan, echi ki eishokor-i otta pirika ambe iyo; orowa, pirika ambe otta eraman-i iyo;
orowa, eraman-i otta yaishikkashima ambe iyo; orowa, yaishikkashima ambe otta yaishiporore ambe iyo; orowa, yaishiporore ambe otta Kamui ko-oripak ambe iyo;
orowa, Kamui ko-oripak ambe otta iriwak utara kokatairotke ambe iyo; orowa iriwak utara katairotke ambe otta omap ambe iyo yan.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, tap okaibe echi korobe ne wa nuye an chiki, chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo eraman-i otta shomo toranne,
shomo ibehe sak no echi kara an na Inam-be gusu ne yakun, tap okaibe sak guru anak ne shiknakbe ne, koro fushko katpak aashkannere-hi oira wa ouse ehange no an ambe nukan ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Tambe gusu, iriwak utara, echi atak an ambe newa anumge an ambe anak ne atumashnure kuni ne naa shiarikiki no kara yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, tap okaibe echi kara chiki, ramma pakno shomo echi ureepetchiu kusu ne na:
orowa, tapne kane chikoro Utarapa newa Kashiobiukip ne Yesu Kiristo koro shashuishiri pakno an moshiri orun ahup-i anak ne nuye an no echi kore an ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, tap okaibe echi eraman, samata, echi tura an sonep orota echi roshki wa okai yakka, tap okaibe echi eshkarunde kuni ne ramma-kane ku etoko-oiki wa an ruwe ne kusu ne na.
Orowa, chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo en epakashnu korachi, ku goro kash oyakta ande-i tunashi no ek na, sekoro,
ku eraman hine kuani anak ne tan kash orota an wa, an pakno echi eshkarunde wa echi keutum paraparasere kuni-hi pirika ruwe ne sekoro ku esanniyo ruwe ne na.
Ruwe ne wa, ku isam okaketa ramma-kane tap okaibe echi eshkarun eashkai kuni ne shiarikiki no ku ki kusu ne na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, echi utara anak ne chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo koro kiroro newa ek an-i echi nure ash ita, ashkai no aoshke uwepekere koro wa ki shomoki, koroka, chi utara anak ne Shinuma koro poro pase ambe shiki ari nukara utara chi ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, Shinuma orota, — Tambe anak ku omap, shi no ku enupetne Poho ne ruwe ne, sekorʼan nepkoro hawehe son no tomte no an nupeki wano ek ita, Shinuma anak ne Michi ne Kamui orowa no aeoripak-i newa nupeki akore nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na:
orowa, chi utara anak ne Shinuma tura nei ashkanne nupuri ta okai ita, tan hawehe kando wano asange-hi chi nu nisa ruwe ne.

Orosama, naa atumashnure wa an uweingara itak chi koro; orowa, kunne-nisat hetuku pakno, echi koro keutum ta tokap-nochiu hetuku pakno, kunne ushiketa nupeki atte ratchako ne-hi korachi, nei ambe gusu echi yaitubare chiki pirika na:
hoshike no tambe onnere yan, Kamui Kambi kata obitta no okai uweingarape anak ne rengaine gusu apita kuni ambe shomo ne ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, nep uweingarape ne yakka ainu rengaine gusu asangep shomo ne: koroka, utara anak ne Ashkanne Ramat ani apariri wa Kamui orowa no chiitakte nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Koroka, nei utara tumugeta shunge uweingara utara ka hopumba nisa ruwe ne; tambe nei no, chashnu no an aisamka-i yaikoropare, orowa no nei utara hok Nishpa poka eshikashke, Kamui orushpe ohoge yainu ambe nuina no ahupte shunge epakashnu utara echi tumugeta ne yakka hopumba kusu ne na.
