Orowa, inne utara anak ne nei utara koro ramupekere iki buri kara kusu ne; tambe gusu, nei utara okai gusu son no an ruhu anak ne akoatcha kusu ne na.
Orowa, yaikoshipuinere ki wa shiwayashnure itak ani echi iraugetupa kusu ne; nei utara gusu an aesanniyop anak ne fushko wano tane poka tere shomoki, koro aisamka-i mokoro shomoki ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui anak ne katpak ki hauturumbe honnere shomoki koroka, akoipishi kuni gusu ashikkasmimare wa Tartaros otta an kunne shui orun okeuba chiki,
orowa, fushko moshiri honnere shomoki koroka, shomo Kamui ko-oripak raoshiri uirup gusu pesambe hetukure ita, oupekap eupaskuma Noa newa tura no okai ara wa niu ne utara shiknure chiki; samata,
shomo Kamui ko-oripak no moshiri koishu utara pakashnu gusu Sodom newa Gomorra kotan uina ne kara hine wentoikantoi akokiru wa panakte; aige,
ohaita utara koro ramupekere iki buri gusu shi

no yaioknatara wa an oupeka Rot kashiobiuki (inambe gusu ne yakun, nei oupeka guru anak ne nei utara tumugeta oshiroma hine, nukara hene ki inu hene ki wa, kesto-kesto nei utara ohaita ikip gusu, kon ramat iuninkare nisa ruwe ne na):
Utarapa anak ne Kamui ko-oripak utara akoramnukara-i ohaitare katu eraman, samata, koipishi toho pakno apanakte kuni gusu oupeka sak utara shikkashima katu eraman;

makangane turu-ushbe kam eikaunu no apkash hene ki, enishpane ambe etunne hene ki utara otta kara katu Utarapa eraman ruwe ne. Wen rametok koro, keutum eikaunu no ki wa nupeki ambe koatcha wa shomo tusushke ruwe ne;
koroka, Kamui hauturumbe anak ne, nei utara kasu no naa tumashnu wa kiroro koro yakka, nei utara gusu Utarapa kotchaketa koatcha akoipishi itak sange shomoki ruwe ne.

Koroka, tan utara anak ramu-sakbe, chikoikip nepkoro gusu aki kuni an buri koro wa akoiki hene ki a wende hene ki kuni ne hekatu erampeutekbe koatcha, tan utara auak ne, koro ki oupeka sak pummaha gusu aewende,

iwende ki wa son no poka awende kusu ne na; tokap to ta ko ibesam kuni ambe aenupetnerep ne sekoro yainu, echi newa piri-ushbe, echi tura no marapto ki ita echi koro omap gusu an marapto ko ibesam ruwe ne;
koro shikihi anak ne omoinu ani aeshik; katpak okakeanka eaikap; utumashi keutum shiren; koro sarabe yaikoshipuinere shiri ki; aiyoitakushi poho; oupeka ruhu emaka,
aige, oupeka sakbe iki gusu an pummaha konoburu Beor poho Beraam kon ru otta apkash wa,

ru turainu nisa ruwe ne; koroka, Shinuma anak ne yaikota ki ohaita buri gusu apakashnu nisa ruwe ne: shomo-itak roba anak ne, ainu hau sange hine nei uweingara guru kon ramusakbe hattoki nisa ruwe ne na.
Tan utara anak ne wakka sak shimpui ne, rerashui pashte rakura ne; nei utara gusu kurokok kunnep aenmashnu wa an na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, raka-sak ashipushkere wa an ambe sange hine, wenbe ki wa ishu utara orowa no ohaitare shiri okai utara, ramupekere ambe ani, kara oma ibeporore otta shiren ruwe ne gusu ne na;
yaikota aisamka gusu an ambe otta yaiusshiunere wa okai rapoketa, rengaine an raondum koropare kuni eitakamkire ruwe ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, orowa no aannokara gusu anak ne,

nei ambe otta ausshiunere wa an na. Nei utara anak ne Utarapa newa Kashiobiukip ne Yesu Kiristo eramu-an-i gusu moshiri turu-ushbe aohaitare okaketa, shui nei ambe gusu akishima wa aannokara chiki, atpake an katuhu kasu no iyoshi no an katuhu anak nei utara gusu naa wenbe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, oupeka an ruhu eraman orowa no, orota akoropare ashkanne ikashpaotte emaka ambe kasu no, nei ambe atpaketa shomo eraman kuni i anak naa pirika ruwe ne na.
Nei utara gusu nei son no an itak-maukushtep korachi an na: — Seta anak ne yaikota sange eatup orun hosari, afuraye okere matne buta anak yachi oshiketa yaikirukiru gusu hosari ruwe tapan na.
Aomap an utara, tambe anak ne echi utara gusu tu ikinne an ku nuye kambi ne ruwe ne; orowa, nei tup otta echi eshkarunde wa echi koro so ne an keutum ku chiukopoyere na;
ashkanne uweingara utara etokota ye itak hene echi eshkarun, samata, echi koro Apostoro utara gusu an Utarapa newa Kashiobiukip sange ikashpaotte hene echi eshkarun kuni ambe ne:
tambe hoshiki no uonnere yan, okese an toho ta eoya-itak ki utara araki, orowa, yaikota koro ibeporore an keutum nei no kara wa eoya-itak ki,
aige, ene itak kusu ne-hi; — Shinuma ek kuni eitakamkire ambe hunakta an a? inambe gusu ne yakun, ekashi utara mokonnoye orowa no, moshiri akara heashi wano, nep ne yakka ramma-ramma an na,
ari an itak ani itak kusu ne. Nei utara anak ne hokamginʼno tambe oira, Kamui itak an gusu, fushko wano kando an, orowa, wakka orowa no etuk, wakka oshiketa roshki toitoi ka an na;
nei okaibe ari nei rapoketa an raoshiri anak ne wakka ani akamure wa aisamka:
koroka, tane okai kando, toitoi tura kane, nei shinep ne an itak ari, akoipishi kuni toho, Kamui koatcha utara aisamka kuni toho pakno ashikkashima wa abe gusu aande wa an na
Koroka, aomap an utara, tan shine ambe iteki oira yan; Utarapa otta shine to anak ne ashikne shine wan hotne pa ukorachi ne, orowa, ashikne shine wan hotne pa anak shine to korachi ne ruwe ne.

Okai utara esanniyo korachi Utarapa anak ne koro eitakamkire gusu moire shomo ne; koroka, nen ne yakka aisamka kuni ambe Shinuma konoburu shomoki no, utara obitta yaikokatpak kuni ambe konoburu wa, echi utara gusu ramushiporore ruwe ne na.

Koroka, Utarapa tobo anak ne ikka guru korachi ek kusu ne; nei ita kando anak ne poro humi ashte wa isama, orowa, kando orunbe shiri seisek wa nin, orowa, toitoi hene otta okai ikip hene auhuyeka wa aisamka kusu ne na.
Tap korachi tap okaibe nin wa aisamka kuni ambe ne sekoro chi eraman gusu, turu-sak no moshiri koishu hene ki,
Kamui ko-oripak hene ki, gusu kando uhuye wa nin, kando orunbe shiri seisek wa ru Kamui toho ek kuni ambe shi no chipachipa hine ehuye hene ki wa, nekon a okai utara chi ne kunip etokosh ruwe he an?
Koroka, Shinuma ki eitakamkire ambe nei no, otta oupeka ambe oshiroma ashiri kando ashiri toitoi chi ehuye korʼan ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, aomap an utara, tap okaibe echi ehuye wa okai gusu, echi utara anak ne Shinuma tek-samata echi sak no, piri isam no, itomo an no anukara kuni ne shiarikiki no kara yan.

Orowa, chikoro Utarapa ramu-shiporore-hi anak ne kashiobiuki ambe ne sekoro esanniyo yan; chikoro omap an iriwak ne Pauros ne yakka orota akore wayashnu-i korachi echi gusu nuye nei no ki yan; Shinuma anak ne obitta nuye kambi kata poka tap okaibe gusu ye na;
nei oshiketa eramuhokamba orushpe okai, aine, erampeutek wa utumashire utara anak ne yaikota isamka gusu moshima okai Kamui kambi poka oheugere korachi, nei ambe ne yakka oheugere ruwe ne.

Tambe gusu, aomap an utara, echi utara anak ne etoko wano eraman gusu, ikineipeka, katpak koro utara koro ohaitap ani aekira wa, yaikota koro utumashi shomoki ambe iteki autumashire kuni ne yaitubare yan.
Koroka, chikoro Utarapa newa un Kashiobiukip ne Yesu Kiristo gusu an irenga newa eramushbe oshiketa shukup yan. Shinuma orota tane ne yakka otusashuishiri pakno ne yakka nupeki an na. Amen.
Atpake wano an, chi utara nu, shikihi ani chi nukara, ingara wa koro teke ani chi tomooshma inotu an Itak gusu an ap;
(orowa, nei inotu anak ne anukara wa chi nukanʼnisa, gusu paweteshu chi ki, Michi tura no an, awa, un otta anukara, nei inotu, nei rai uina pakno shiknu an inotu orushpe gusu echi nure ash na);

chi nukarabe hemhem, chi nup hemhem echi otta ne yakka nure ash; echi utara ne yakka un tura no shine-ikinne okai kuni gusu ne na: ruwe newa, chi utara anak ne Michi tura hemhem, Michi koro poho Yesu Kiristo tura hemhem shine-ikinne okai ruwe ne:
orowa, tap okaibe chi nuye ikkewehe anak ne echi utara anupetnere ambe aeshik kuni gusu ne ruwe ne na.
Samata, Shinuma orowa no chi nu wa echi nure ash shongo anak ene ani ne, — Kamui anak ne pekere ne, Shinuma otta pon no kunne-i ka isam ruwe ne.
Shinuma tura chi utara kookai ruwe ne sekoro chi itak wa, kunne-i otta apkash chiki, shunge chi ye, son no ambe shomo chi ki ruwe ne:

koroka, Shinuma anak ne pekere otta an korachi chi utara ne yakka pekere otta apkash yakun uwe-utashpa uwekookai ruwe ne, orowa Shinuma koro poho Yesu koro kem anak ne obitta no okai chikoro katpak isamka wa un ashkannere ruwe ne.
Katpak chi sak sekoro chi itak chiki, yaikokandama ruwe ne, orowa, son-i anak ne un oshiketa isam ruwe ne na.
Koro katpak chi eyaipushi ash chiki, Shinuma anak ikipniukesh oupekap ne gusu chikoro katpak tusare hemhem ki, obitta no okai oupeka sak-i ashkannere hemhem ki ruwe ne.
Shomo katpak chi ki na sekoro chi ye chiki, Shinuma shungere ruwe ne, orowa, Shinuma korʼitak un oshiketa isam ruwe tapan na.

Ku goro nokair utara, echi utara anak ne iteki katpak ki kuni ne tap okaibe echi gusu ku nuye ruwe ne. Orowa, nen ne yakka katpak ki guru an chiki, Michi otta chi utara gusu eikotchanep an, oupeka Yesu Kiristo ne;
Shinuma anak ne chikoro katpak gusu an imommuyep ne ruwe ne; ouse chikoro katpak gusu patek shomo ne, koroka, ingi-nroshiri gusu an ap gusu ne yakka ne ruwe ne na.
Shinuma ki ikashpaotte shikkashima ash yakun, tata ani chi utara Shinuma eamkiri ruwe ne sekoro chi eraman.
Shinuma ku eamkiri ari ye wa koro ikashpaotte shomo shikkashima gurʼanak ne, shunge itak ki gunʼne, aige,

son no ambe nei guru onnaigeta isam ruwe ne: koroka, Shinuma ye itak shikkashima gurʼanak, son no poka, Shinuma onnaigeta Kamui omap-hi aeramushinne nisa ruwe ne na. Shinuma onnaigeta chi okai ruwe ne sekoro tambe ani chi eraman:
Shinuma onnaigeta ku riya sekoro ye gurʼanak ne, Shinuma apkash nisa korachi nei guru poka yaikota apkash kunip ne ruwe tapan na.
Aomap an utara, echi utara gusu ashiri ikashpaot-te shomo ku nuye, koroka, atpake wano echi koro fushko ikashpaotte ku nuye na; nei fushko ikashpaotte anak ne echi nu okere itak ne ruwe ne.

Shui, ashiri ikashpaotte echi gusu ku nuye na, nei ambe anak ne Shinuma oshiketa ne yakka echi oshiketa ne yakka son no ambe ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, kunne-i okere koran, orowa, son no pekere nupeki atte wa an ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Pekere otta an ani ye wa koro iriwak etunne gurʼanak ne tane pakno poka kunne-i otta an ruwe ne.
Koro iriwak omap gurʼanak ne pekere otta oshiroma, aige, Shinuma oshiketa ureepetchiure ika isam ruwe ne.
Koroka, koro iriwak etunne gurʼanak ne kunne-i oshiketa an wa kunne-i otta apkash, orowa, ine un oman a shinuma erampeutek, kunne-i anak ne shinuma koro shikihi shiknakte nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Nokan utara, Shinuma kon reihei rengap gusu echi koro katpak atusare wa an, tambe gusu echi gusu

kambi ku nuye na. Michi utara, atpake wano an guru echi eamkiri gusu, tambe gusu echi otta kambi ku nuye. Upen utara, wenbe echi annokara okere gusu, tambe gusu, echi otta kambi ku nuye. Nokan utara, Michi echi eamkiri gusu, tambe gusu,

echi otta kambi ku nuye. Michi utara, tambe gusu, atapake wano an guru echi eamkiri gusu, echi otta kambi ku nuye. Upen utara, echi utara okirashnu wa an, Kamui itak echi onnaigeta an, samata, echi utara anak ne wenbe annokara okere gusu, tambe gusu echi utara otta kambi ku nuye na.
Moshiri hene moshirʼotta okaibe hene iteki omap yan, moshiri ko-omap guru an chiki Michi koro omap ambe anak ne shinuma oshiketa isam ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, moshirʼotta an obitta no okaibe, kam eikaunu ambe hene, shiki eikaunu ambe hene, ishu gusu pakesara ambe hene, Michi orowa no hetukup shomo ne, koroka, raoshiri orowa no an ambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, raoshiri hene, moshiri gusu eikaunu ambe hene aokere kusu ne; koroka, Kamui irenga ki gurʼanak ne ramma pakno okai kusu ne na.

Nokair utara, tane anak keseke an pakihi ne: orowa, anti-kiristo ek kusu ne sekoro echi nu nisa, tane poka inne no okai anti-kiristo hetukba wa okai; tambe gusu, tane anak keseke an pakihi ne ari an ambe chi eraman ruwe ne.

Nei utara anak ne un orowa no soyumba, koroka un tura no okai utara shomo ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, nei utara anak ne un tura no okai utara ne ruwe ne a chiki, un tura no ramma okai kusu ne gusu ne na: koroka, nei utara un tura no okai utara shomo ne sekoro aeraman kuni gusu an okaibe ne ruwe ne na.
Echi utara anak ne Ashkannep orowa no kashiketa aota utara echi ne wa obitta no okai echi utara anak ne nep ne yakka eraman ruwe ne na.
Echi utara son no ambe shomo eraman gusu ku nuye shomoki,, koroka, son no ambe echi eraman, samata, son no ambe orowa no hetuku shungep isam ruwe ne gusu ku nuye na.
Shunge guru nen ne ruwe? Yesu anak ne Kiristo ne sekorʼambe eshikashke guru shomo ne ya? Michi newa poho kane eshikashke gurʼanak ne, shinuma anak anti-Kiristo ne ruwe ne.
Nen ne yakka Poho eshikashke gurʼanak ne nei guru anak Michi shomo koro: Poho pushpusu guru anak ne Michi ne yakka kon ruwe ne.

Echi utara gusu atpake wano echi nu orushpe echi oshiketa oshironmre yan. Atpake wano echi nu orushpe echi oshiketa oshiroma chiki, echi utara poka Poho oshiketa hemhem, Michi oshiketa hemhem oshiroma kusu ne.
Un gusu Shinuma eitakamkire uitaknup anak ne shiokere shomoki inotu ne ruwe ne.
Echi shiren wa turainure utara gusu tap okaibe ku nuye nisa.

Echi utara gusu Shinuma orowa no echi kore an kashiaota ambe anak ne echi oshiketa oshiroma chiki echi epakashnup isam yak pirika na; koroka, nep ne yakka Shinuma ki kashiota ambe echi epakashnu, aige, nei ambe son no ambe ne wa shunge shomo ne gusu, echi aepakashnu wa an korachi, Shinuma oshiketa echi oshiroma ruwe ne.
Orowa, tane nokan utara, Shinuma oshiketa oshiroma yan; Shinuma anukara chiki, chi utara rametok-koro, orowa, Shinuma ek ita chi utara shomo yainikoroshma kusu ne gusu okai yan.
Orowa, Shinuma oupeka ambe ne sekoro echi eraman chiki, nen ne yakka oupekap ki guru anak ne Shinuma orowa no hetu-kurep poka onnere yan.

Chi utara anak ne Kamui Poho ne aporose kuni ne Michi un koropare omap ambe nekon a okaibe ne ya sekoro ingara yan: ene ani ka chi ne ruwe ne. Tambe gusu, moshiri anak ne un eamkiri shomoki, shomo Shinuma eamkiri nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Aomap an utara, tane anak ne chi utara Kamui poho chi ne ruwe ne, koroka, nekon a okaibe chi ne kusu ne ya sekorʼambe naa shomo anukare ruwe ne. Shinuma anak ne anukara chiki, chi utara Shinuma koheraye kusu ne sekorʼambe chi eraman; Shinuma an korachi chi nukara ash kusu ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, Shinuma gusu tapne no chipachipa gurʼanak ne, Shinuma ka turasak korachi yaikota yaiturusakte ruwe ne.
Nen ne yakka katpak ki gurʼanak ne ikashpaotte oterekep ne yakka ki ruwe ne: katpak anak ikashpaotte oterekep ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, Shinuma anak ne katpak sei kuni gusu anukan nisa ruwe ne sekoro echi eraman; orowa, Shinuma oshiketa katpak isam ruwe ne.
Shinuma oshiketa oshiroma gurʼanak ne shomo katpak ki ruwe ne; nen ne yakka katpak ki gurʼanak ne shomo Shinuma nukara, shomo Shinuma eamkiri nisa ruwe ne na.
Nokan utara, iteki moshima guru orowa no ayaishirende: oupekap ki gurʼanak ne, Shinuma oupeka korachi,

oupekap ne ruwe ne; katpak ki guru anak ne nitnep orowa no an ambe ne; atpake wano nitnep anak katpak ki ruwe ne gusu ne na. Tambe gusu, Kamui poho anukan ruwe ne, nitnep ki ikip isamka kuni gusu ne na.

Nen ne yakka Kamui orowa no hekatu gurʼanak ne katpak shomo ki ruwe ne. Shinuma koro piyehe nei guru onnaigeta oshiroma ruwe ne gusu ne na: nei guru anak ne katpak ki eaikap, Kamui orowa no hekatu nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tata otta Kamui poho utara hemhem nitnep koro poho utara hemhem anukan ruwe ne: nen ne yakka oupekap shomo ki guru hene, koro iriwak shomo omap guru hene, Kamui orowa no an ap shomo ne.
Atpake wano echi nu okere shongo anak ne ene ani ne, chi utara utashpa uweomap ki kuni an ambe ne:
nitnep orowa no an wa koro akihi kewe-uk Kain korachi shomo ne ruwe ne Orowa, nep gusu shinuma kewe-uk a? koro ki ikip wen wa, akihi ki ikip oupekap ne ruwe ne gusu ne ruwe tapan na.
Iriwak utara, moshiri anak ne echi etunne chiki, iteki enushkari yan.
Chi utara anak ne iriwak utara omap gusu rai-i orowa no paye wa ishu-i otta ahup ash nisa ari an ambe chi eraman ruwe ne. Shomo omap ki gurʼanak ne rai-i otta riya ruwe ne.
Nen ne yakka koro iriwak etunne gurʼanak ne keweuk gunʼne: orowa, nen ne yakka kewe-uk gurʼanak ne, nei oshiketa ramma okere shomoki inotu koro shomoki ruwe ne ari an ambe echi eraman.
Shinuma anak ne un gusu koro inotu ande-hi gusu, tambe gusu omap ambe chi eraman; chi utara ne yakka iriwak utara gusu koro inotu ande kusu ne ap ruwe ne.
Koroka, nen ne yakka tamʼmoshirʼun okaibe koro, aige, koro iriwak aeishiramne i nukara wa rampoken keutura seshke guru an yakun, nekon a Kamui omap-i nei guru oshiketa okai ya?
Nokan utara, iteki itak ani, parumbe ani, omap ki, koroka, iki-buri newa sonep ani omap yan.
Tata otta chi utara anak ne son-i orowa no oka-hi chi eraman, orowa, nep gusu ne yakka chikoro keutura anak un katpakte yakka,
Shinuma tek-samata chikoro keutura ratchi wa okai ruwe ne; Kamui anak ne chikoro keutura kasu no pase wa nep ne yakka eraman ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Aomap an utara, chikoro keutura anak ne un katpakte shomoki chiki Kamui gusu chi rametokkon ruwe ne;
orowa, Shinuma sange ikashpaotte chi shikkashima wa Shinuma nupetnere kuni buri chi ki ruwe ne gusu, tambe gusu, nep ne yakka koramkoro yakka Shinuma un koropare ruwe ne.
Orowa, chi utara anak ne Shinuma koro Poho Yesu Kiristo kon reihei eishokoro, samata, un kashpaotte korachi utashpa uwe-omap kuni an ambe anak ne, tambe anak Shinuma sange ikashpaotte ne ruwe ne.

Orowa, shinuma sange ikashpaotte shikkashima gurʼanak ne Shinuma otta riya, orowa, Shinuma anak ne nei guru otta riya ruwe ne. Orowa, a un koropare Ramat ani gusu, chi utara anak ne shinuma un otta riya ruwe ne sekoro chi eraman.

Aomap an utara, obitta no okai ramat pishno iteki eishokoro yan, koroka, Kamui orowa no okaibe ne ya shomo ne ya ingara kuni ne, nei ramat uwande yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, inne no okai shunge uweingara utara moshiri orota paye nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe ani Kamui Ramat echi eraman: Yesu Kiristo anak ne kam otta ek na sekoro pushpusu nep ramat ne yakka Kamui orowa no an ambe ne:

orowa, Yesu pushpusu shomoki nep ramat ne yakka Kamui orowa no an ambe shomo ne ruwe ne: orowa, ek kusu ne sekoro echi nu anti-kiristo korobe anak tambe ne ruwe ne; tane ne yakka nei ambe mosbirʼotta an ruwe ne.

Nokan utara, echi utara anak ne Kamui orowa no an okaibe echi ne, nei utara annokara okere echi ki nisa ruwe ne: echi oshiketa okaibe anak ne moshiri oshiketa okaibe kasu no naa porobe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Nei utara anak ne moshiri orowa no an ambe ne: tambe gusu moshiri gusu ye, orowa, moshiri anak nei utara nu ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Chi utara anak ne Kamui orowa no an ambe chi ne: Kamui eamkiri guru un nu ruwe ne: Kamui orowa no shomo ne an guru anak ne un nu shomoki ruwe ne. Tambe ani son no an ramat newa ohaita wa an ramat chi eraman ruwe ne na.
Aomap an utara, chi utara, anak ne utashpa uweomap anro: omap-hi anak ne Kamui orowa no an ambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na; orowa, obitta no okai omap ki gurʼanak ne pishno Kamui orowa no hekature gunʼne,
orowa, Kamui eamkiri ruwe ne. Shomo omap ki gurʼanak ne Kamui eamkiri shomoki ruwe ne; Kamui anak ne omap ambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Shinuma rengap gusu chi utara ishu kuni ne Kamui anak ne yaikota koro Shinen ne Poho moshirʼotta sange nisa ruwe ne gusu, tambe ani chi utara gusu Kamui omap ambe anukare nisa ruwe ne na.
Chi utara anak ne Kamui omap nisa ruwe ne a gusu shomo ne, koroka, Shinuma un omap wa chikoro chikokatpak imommuye kuni gusu koro Poho ette ari an ambe otta, tata otta omap-hi an.
Aomap an utara, nei i oro pakno Kamui un omap yakun, chi utara ne yakka utashpa uweomap ki kuni utara chi ne ruwe ne.
Hembarata ne yakka Kamui nukara ainu isam: chi utara utashpa uweomap ki chiki, Kamui un oshiketa riya ruwe ne, orowa, un oshiketa Shinuma omap-hi aeramushinne an ruwe ne;
Shinuma anak ne kon Ramat un koropare gusu chi utara Shinuma oshiketa riya, Shinuma ka un oshiketa riya ari an ambe chi eraman ruwe ne.
Orowa chi nukara, awa, Michi anak ne moshiri kashiobiukip ne kuni gusu nei Poho ette nisa ruwe ne ari an ambe paweteshu chi ki ruwe ne.
Nen ne yakka Yesu anak ne Kamui Poho ne sekoro pushpusu wa ye gurʼanak, nei guru oshiketa Kamui riya, orowa, Kamui oshiketa nei guru riya ruwe ne.

Orowa, un gusu Kamui sange omap-hi ari an ambe chi eishokoro wa chi eraman ruwe ne. Kamui anak ne omap ambe ne; orowa, omap-hi otta riya guru anak ne Kamui otta riya, orowa, Kamui anak shinuma otta riya ruwe ne.

Chi utara anak ne akoipishi toho ta rametok koro wa okai kuni gusu, tambe otta un tura omap ambe eramuashinnere an ruwe ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, Shinuma an korachi, chi utara ne yakka tam-moshirʼotta

okai ruwe ne gusu ne na. Omap-hi otta ishitomap isama; koroka, aeramushinne an omap ambe anak ne ishitoma ambe soyumbare ruwe ne; ishitoma ambe otta panakte-i okai ruwe ne gusu ne na; orowa, ishitoma ki guru anak ne omap-hi otta seenne aeramushinnere ruwe ne.
Shinuma hoshiki no un omap nisa ruwe ne gusu, chi utara omap ki ruwe ne.

Koro iriwak etunne wa Kamui ku omap ari ye guru an chiki anak ne, shunge itak ki gunʼne: inambe gusu ne yakun, nukara a-hi iriwak shomo ko-omap chiki, shomo nukara Kamui omap eaikap ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Kamui omap guru anak ne koro iriwak ne yakka omap kuni sekorʼan ipawetenge Shinuma orowa no a un kore nisa ruwe ne na.
Nen ne yakka Yesu anak ne Kiristo ne ari an ambe eishokoro gurʼanak ne Kamui orowa no hekatu ruwe ne; shui, hekaturep omap gurʼanak ne Shinuma gusu hekatup ne yakka omap ruwe ne.
Kamui omap wa shinuma koro ikashpaotte chi ki chiki, tambe gusu chi utara anak ne Kamui poho utara omap ash sekoro chi eraman ruwe ne.
Koro ikashpaotte shikkashima ambe auak ne, tambe anak Kamui omap ambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na; orowa Shinuma koro ikashpaotte anak ne sei hokambap shomo ne ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, nep ne yakka Kamui orowa no ahekature ambe anak ne moshiri annokan ruwe ne: orowa, moshiri annokan nisa kiroro anak ne,
tambe anak chikoro eishokor-i ne ruwe ne. Yesu anak ne Kamui Poho ne sekorʼambe eishokoro guru moshima moshiri annokara guru anak nen ne ruwe he an?
Wakka newa kem gusu ek gurʼanak, tambe anak ne Yesu Kiristo ne ruwe ne; ouse wakka gusu patek shomo ne, koroka, wakka gusu ne yakka kem gusu ne yakka an ap ne.
Orowa, paweteshu ki ambe anak ne Ramat ne, Ramat anak ne son no ambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Paweteshu ki ambe anak ne rep ne, Ramat hene an, wakka hene an; kem hene an, orowa, tan reppish anak ne shinep otta uweepak ruwe ne.
Ainu ki paweteshu-hi chi uina yakun, Kamui ki paweteshu ambe anak naa pase ruwe ne. Kamui ki paweteshu-hi anak ne tapne ne: koro Poho gusu Shinuma paweteshu ki nisa ruwe ne a ambe ne.

Kamui poho eishokoro gurʼanak ne, koro oshiketa nei paweteshu-hi koro: shomo Kamui eishokoro guru anak ne Shinuma shungere nisa ruwe ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, koro Poho gusu Kamui ki paweteshu-hi eishokoro shomoki nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, nei aki paweteshu ambe anak ne tambe ne, Kamui un otta shiokere shomoki inotu un koropare, orowa, tan inotu anak ne Shinuma koro Poho otta an ruwe ne Nei Poho koro gurʼanak ne nei inotu koro;
Kamui Poho koro shomoki gurʼanak, nei inotu shomo kon ruwe ne.
Shiokere shomoki inotu echi koro koran ruwe ne a ambe echi eramande kuni ne Kamui poho kon reihei eishokoro utara gusu echi otta tap okaibe ku nuye nisa ruwe ne na.
Orowa, Shinuma gusu chi utara rametok koro ki a ambe anak ne tapne ne: Shinuma korʼirenga an korachi nep ne yakka chi koramkoro yakka,
Shinuma un nu ruwe ne; orowa, nep ne yakka chi koramkorobe Shinuma nu sekoro chi eraman chiki, otta chi koramkorobe anak a un kore ari an ambe chi eraman ruwe ne.

Nen ne yakka shomo gusu rai kuni katpak koro iriwak ki-hi nukara, orowa, koramkoro yakun, nei shomo gusu rai kuni katpak ki utara akore kuni ne Shinuma nei utara otta inotu koropare kusu ne na Gusu rai kuni katpak an: nei ambe gusu shinuma koramkoro kuni shomo ku ye ruwe ne.
Nep oupeka-sakbe ne yakka obitta katpak ne: shui, shomo gusu rai kuni katpak an ruwe ne.

Nen ne yakka Kamui orowa no hekatu gurʼanak ne katpak shomo ki ruwe ne sekoro chi eraman; koroka, Kamui orowa no hekaturep anak ne Shinuma shikkashima, orowa, wenbe anak ne shomo shinuma tomooshma ruwe ne.
Chi utara anak ne Kamui orowa no okai utara chi ne sekoro chi eraman, orowa,

ingi-moshiri anak ne wenbe otta okai ruwe ne. Orowa, sone an guru chi eamkiri kuni ne Kamui Poho ek wa un otta eraman mondum koropare nisa ruwe ne sekorʼambe chi eraman, orowa, sone an guru otta, Shinuma koro Poho Yesu Kiristo otta, chi okai ruwe ne. Tambe anak son no Kamui ne, shiokere shomoki inotu ne ruwe ne.
Nokan utara, potoki gusu yairamatte yan.
Ekashi anak ne son no ku omap anunge wa an shiwentep koro poho utara tura kane orota kambi omande na; ouse kuani patek shomo ne, koroka, son no ambe eraman obitta no okai utara ka e omap ruwe ne;
tambe anak ne un oshiketa oshiroma wa ramma pakno un tura no okai sonep rengap gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne:
irenga hemhem, aerampokiwenbe hemhem, itomo hemhem, son no, omap an no, Michi ne Kamui newa Michi koro Poho Yesu Kiristo orowa no an wa un tura no okai kusu ne na.
Michi orowa no akore ikashpaotte nei no e koro poho tumuta okai utara anak ne son no apkash wa okahi ani an ambe ku nukan nisa ruwe ne gusu, shi no ku nupetne ruwe ne.
Orowa, tane akoro shiwentep, onishnishi ku ki-hi; ashiri ikashpaotte aokai gusu ku nuye korachi shomo ne, koroka, atpake wano chikorobe ne, nei ambe anak ne, uweutashpa uweomap ash ambe ne ruwe ne.
Shinuma ki ikashpaotte nei no apkash ambe anak ne, tambe anak omap ambe ne. Otta apkash kuni gusu an atpake wano echi nu ikashpaotte tambe ne ruwe ne na.

Inne no okai kokandama ki utara anak ne moshiri orota araki wa okai, Yesu Kiristo ainu netoba koro wa ek sekoro ambe shomo pushpusu utara tambe ne ruwe ne. Tambe anak kokandama ki guru ne, nei a anti-kiristo ne ruwe tapan na.
Aki okere okaibe shomo aturainu, koroka, pummaha obitta echi koro kuni ne yaikota yaitubare yan.

Nen ne yakka iki wa Kiristo koro epakashi otta oshiroma shomoki gurʼanak ne, Kamui koro shomoki ruwe ne: Shinuma koro epakashi otta oshiroma gurʼanak ne, Shinuma anak Michi hemhem Poho hemhem kon ruwe ne na.
Nen ka e orun araki wa tap epakashnu ambe koro shomoki chiki, iteki e kot chisei ta akunge, iteki shinuma rangarap yan:
inambe gusu ne yakun nei guru korangarap ki gurʼanak ne shinuma koro wen ikip tura ki ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Aokai gusu ku nuye kuni inne okaibe an koroka, kambi newa sumi ani shomo ku ki na: shui, poron no eani nupetne kuni gusu e orun ku arapa wa uwenitomom no ku ye kuni ku chipachipa ruwe ne.
E koro anumge an turesh koro poho anak ne e korangarap ki na.
Ekashi anak ne, son no ambe gusu ku omap, omap an Gaios orota kambi omande na.
Aomap an guru, e kon ramat aepirikare an korachi, nep ne yakka gusu aokai yaiepirikare wa nisashnu an kuni ne inonno-itak ku ki na.
Iriwak utara araki wa paweteshu ki korachi aokai anak ne sonep otta apkash koran sekoro en nure ita, poron no ku nupetne
nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na. Ku goro poho utara sonep otta apkash koran ruwe ne ari an ambe nu kasu no en nupetnerep isam ruwe ne na.
Aomap an guru, nep ne yakka iriwak utara newa oya un utara poka gusu e iki chiki ikipniukesh no e ki ruwe ne;
nei utara anak ne karisia kotchaketa e koro omap ambe gusu paweteshu ki: Kamui kopakeot buri an no nei utara payekai kuni arura yan:
inambe gusu ne yakun nei Reihei irenga gusu nei utara oya kotan un utara orowa no nep ne yakka uk shomoki no paye nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Tambe gusu, chi utara sonep gusu tura no iki utara chi ne kuni ne, nei no okai utara uk kunip ne ruwe ne.
Karisia gusu nepka ku nuye nisa; koroka, nei utara tumugeta esapane rusui Diotrepes anak ne shomo un uk ruwe ne.

Tambe gusu, ku ek chiki wen itak ani un ohaigekara iki ikip ku eshkarunde kusu ne: tambe anak pakno ne sekoro nei guru esanniyo shomoki hine shinuma yaikota iriwak utara uk shomoki, orowa, uk rusui utara ne yakka hattoki wa karisia orowa no emaka ruwe ne.
Aomap an utara, wenbe iteki koikara, koroka, pirikap koikara yan. Pirikap iki gurʼanak ne Kamui orowa no an gunʼne; wenbe iki gurʼanak ne shomo Kamui nukan ruwe ne.

Demetrius anak ne obitta no okai utara ki paweteshu ambe koro, samata, sonep yaikota gusu an paweteshu-hi kon ruwe ne; ruwe ne wa, chi utara ne yakka paweteshu ki; aige, chi ki paweteshu ambe anak ne sonep ne sekoro aokai eraman ruwe ne na.
Aokai gusu ku nuye kunip inne ne, koroka, sumi newa nuyep ani ku nuye ambe ku kopan:
naa nisako ne chiki e nukara kuni ku chipachipa, yakun, uwenitomom wa utashpa ye kusu ne. Itomo irenga e otta an na. Utara anak ne e korangarap na. Utara reihei pishnopishno ye wa uwekap an na.
Yesu Kiristo koro usshiune guru ne Yakob koro iriwak Youdas anak ne, ahotuyekara wa okai, Michi ne Kamui otta aomap, Yesu Kiristo gusu ashikkashima wa okai utara otta kambi omande na:
echi utara gusu rampoken newa itomo newa omap ambe newa ainnere an na.

Aomap an utara, chi utara gusu an kashiobiuki ambe gusu echi otta ku nuye kuni irammakaka ku esanniyo ita, echi utara anak ne nei arashui no ashkanne utara otta akore aeishokor-i gusu shiarikiki no uwetushmak ki kuni nekon a ka echi onishnishi ash kusu ne sekoro ku yainu wa ku nuye nisa ruwe ne.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, nuina no ahup utara okai; nei utara anak ne tap aesanniyo ambe gusu fushkotoi wano aashte utara ne, shomo Kamui ko-oripak, chikoro Kamui sange irenga ani ramupekere ne kara, patek chikoro Nishpa newa Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo shikashke utara ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Orowa, arashui no obitta no okaibe echi eraman a yakka, kuani echi eshkarunde ash rusui na; Utarapa anak ne Echipt moshiri wano utara kashiobas, awa, okaketa, eishokoro shomoki utara isamka nisa ruwe ne.
Samata, yaikota koro esapane kuni ushike shomo shikkashima, koroka, okai kuni oshiroma-i ande uitek utara, Shinuma nei poro toho koipishi an-hi pakno kunne-i otta ramma pakno an tupep ani

shikkashima nisa ruwe ne. Orowa, Sodom newa Gomorra, samata nei okari an machiya poka, nei ushike korachi yaikota hoiyo ki wa oya kam otta paye gusu, ramma okere shomoki abe ani apanakte wa okai wa epakashnup gusu aashte ne ruwe ne.
Yakka, tan utara ne yakka nei no korachi wendarap ki wa kam turu-ushte, orowa, esapane ambe esapse hene ki, nupeki ambe koatcha hene ki ruwe ne.
Koroka, sapane uitekbe ne Mikaeru anak ne nitne kamui tura upahunara iki ita koatcha koipishi itak sange shomoki no, Utarapa e kopao kusu ne ari an itak ani ye nisa ruwe ne.
Koroka, tan utara anak ne yaikota eramnskkare ambe gusu koatcha ki: orowa, ramu-sak no an okaibe rengaine eramanbe korachi, nei utara nei ambe eraman, tap okaibe gusu aisamka ruwe ne na.
Nei utara yaisambepokash humi! Kain koro michi kari apkash, pummaha gusu Baraam koro ohaitap gusu vaiemaka, Kora Ainu ki tasa itak gusu aisamka nisa ruwe ne.

Tan utara anak ne echi tura no marapto ki ita echi koro omap gusu an marapto oshiketa okai nuina no an watara ne, ishitoma shomo-ki yaiibere reshpa utara ne, rera pashte wakka sak nishkuru ne, ibe sak chukpa un chikuni, tu shui shumumge,
shinrit komesup ne ruwe ne; yaikota koro yainikoroshma kuni koishum sange atui un yupke riri ne, gusu shashuishiri wano kunne kurokokbe eumashnu wa okai ekeshne paye nochiu ne ruwe ne na.
Tan utara gusu, Adam orowa no arawan ikinne an ainu ne Enok anak ne uweingara ki wa ene itakhi: — Ingara yan, Utarapa anak ne koro turu-sak inne topaha tura wa ek hine,

obitta no okai utara koipishi, Kamui koatcha obitta no okai utara koatcha an wa obitta no okai koatcha ki ikip gusu hemhem, Shinuma ohaigekara wa koatcha wen-buri koro utara ye hokamba itak gusu hemhem ki kusu ne na.
Tan utara anak ne oromam ki utara ne, iyaishirikara utara ne, koro hoiyo keutum nei no eshipa ki (paroho an poro yaiomonnure itak ye) ani yaiepirikare gusu an utara panore ruwe ne.
Koroka, aomap an echi utara, chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo koro Apostoro utara ye okere itak eshkarun yan;
okese an paki ita yaikota koro Kamui koatcha an hoiyo keutum nei no apkash wa eoyaitak ki utara araki kusu ne, ari an itak ani echi epakashnu
gusu ye nisa ruwe ne. Nei utara anak ne uwekopi ki utara ne, Ramat koro shomoki no rengaine an keutum koro utara ne ruwe ne.
Koroka, aomap an utara echi utara anak ne Ashkanne Ramat oshiketa inonno-itak ki,
Kamui omap-i otta yaishikkashima, shiokere shomoki inotu gusu an chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo koro rampoken etere hine, echi koro iyotta turu-sak an eiskokorope kata yaiashtere yan.
Orowa, echi epeka upahunara utara erampokiwen wa kore; an utara abe orowa no yange wa kashiobas;
ishitoma ki wa an utara erampokiwen wa kore: samata, kam gusu chikosamtek anrip poka etunne yan.
Orowa shui, iteki echi ureepetchiu kuni ne echi shikkashima, orowa, turu-sak no shi no nupetne no koro kotchaketa echi ashte eashkaibe orota,

chikoro Utarapa ne Yesu Kiristo gusu patek chikoro un kashiobiuki Kamui orota nupeki newa, pase ambe newa, kiroro newa, nrondum kane, paki-i etoko ne yakka, tane ne yakka, shashuishiri pakno ne yakka an kuni akoramkon na. Amen.

Naa iruka ne koro hetuku kusu ne, koro usshiune utara orun nukare kuni gusu, Shinuma orota Kamui koropare Yesu Kiristo koro ekambakbe: orowa, shinuma anak ne koro hauturumbe teshkara hine koro usshiune guru Yoannes eramande;
nei guru anak ne Kamui itak gusu hemhem, Yesu Kiristo koro paweteshu ambe gusu hemhem, nep ne yakka shinuma nukarabe gusu hemhem paweteshu ki nisa ruwe ne.
Tan uweingarape oro-oitak hene ki, nu hene ki, orowa, nei kashiketa chieshinnuye wa an okaibe shikkashima gurʼanak ne anunuke ne: pakihi ehange no an ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Yoannes anak Asia ta okai arawan karisia utara orota kambi omande na: an wa an, an nisa, orowa, ek kusu ne Kamui orowa no hemhem; shui, Shinuma koro amset kotchaketa okai arawan Ramat orowa no hemhem;

orosama, ikipniukesh paweteshu ki, rai guru orowa no hoshiki no ahetukure, moshiri shikkashima utara epungine Yesu Kiristo orowa no hemhem, echi utara gusu irenga newa itomo an na. Un omap hemhem ki, koro kem ani chikoro katpak gusu un furayepa hemhem ki:
orowa, nei moshirʼun utara ne kuni un kara, koro Michi newa Kamui otta un yaishieiwangererep otta anak; Shinuma otta shashuishiri wano shashuishiri pakno arakuru newa mondum an na. Amen.

Ingarʼan, Shinuma nishkuru ani ek shiri ki obitta no okai shikihi pishno Shinuma nukara, Shinuma otke utara Shinuma nukara kusu ne; orowa, obitta no okai moshiri uirup Shinuma gusu rayaise kusu ne na. Ruwe un, Amen.
Kuani anak ne, An wa an, an nisa, ek kusu ne, nep ne yakka ki eashkai, Arupa newa Omega Ku ne ruwe ne, sekoro, Utarapa ne Kamui ye ruwe ne.

Yesu oshiketa an aeramchuptekbe hemhem moshiri hemhem yaiyupupu ambe hemhem e tura no iki e koro iriwak ne Yoannes kuani anak ne, Kamui itak newa Yesu gusu an paweteshu ambe newa gusu Patmos ari aporose repun shiri ku an nisa ruwe ne.
Utarapa toho ta kuani anak ne Ramat oshiketa an, awa, en oshmaketa rappa humi korachi poro hawe ku nu,

aige, ene itak-hi:—E nukarape kambi-sosh kata nuye hine nei arawan karisia orun omande yan; Epesos otta, Sumurna otta, Pergamos otta, Tuateira otta, Sardeis otta, Piradarpeia otta, Raodikeia otta omande yan.
Orowa, en orun itak hawe ku nukara gusu ku hosari nisa ruwe ne. Aige, hosari an chiki arawan kongani ratchako ku nukara;
orowa, nei ratchako tumugeta ainu poho nepkoro an guru ku nukara, Shinuma amip iyo keshupkachuire an, orowa, kongani kut ani yarupokkepeka ekutkon ruwe ne.
Orowa, Shinuma koro sapa newa otop retarape anak ne retara wata korachi, upas korachi ne; koro shikihi anak abe nui nepkoro ne;
kemaha anak ne abe-sokot oshiketa aturu-sakte nei no an hereatte shiunin kani korachi nep, orowa, koro hawe anak inne wakka korachi an hawe ne ruwe ne.
Koro shimon tek oshiketa arawan nochiu akoro: koro paro wano een uren no notaku ibetam hetuku ruwe ne: koro nan-katu anak ne kiroroashnu no hereat tokap chup korachi ne ruwe ne na.

Awa, Shinuma ku nukara chiki rai guru nepkoro an no koro chikiri samta ku hachiri nisa ruwe ne. Aige, Shinuma anak ne en kashiketa koro teke ande wa ene itak-hi:—Iteki ishitoma yan; Kuani anak ne atpake an ap ne, iyoshi no an ap ne,
Ishu ambe Ku ne ruwe ne; Ku rai nisa, awa, ingarʼan, ramma otusashuishiri pakno Ku ishu ruwe ne, orowa, rai ambe newa Hedes gusu an kangi Ku kon ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, e nukara okere okaibe hemhem, an okaibe hemhem, okaketa hetuku kusu ne okaibe hemhem nuye yan;

Ku shimon-tekehe kata e nukara arawan nochiu newa nei arawan kongani ratchako newa gusu an mukke ambe tapne ne. Nei arawan nochiu anak ne nei arawan karisia koro hauturumbe ne: nei arawan ratchako anak ne arawan karisia ne ruwe ne na.
Epesos kotan ta an karisia koro hauturumbe gusu ene nuye yan; Koro shimon teke oshiketa nei arawan nochiu koro guru, nei arawan kongani ratchako tumugeta apkash shiri an guru ene itak-hi:—

E iki ambe hemhem, e tumutui ambe hemhem, e yaiyupupu ambe hemhem, samata, wen utara tura e an eaikapbe, orowa, Apostoro shomo ne okai hine apostoro ari an reihei ani yaiporose utara uwande wa shunge utara ne sekoro e nukara ambe Ku eraman;
aige, eani yaiyupupu an wa Ku reihei gusu yaishiporore hine shomo tumutui ruwe ne.
Koroka, aokai anak ne atpaketa e iki omap ambe eyaikoemaka gusu, e eiyonnuppa kunip an ruwe ne na.

Tambe gusu, hunak oro e hachiri an ambe eshkarun yan, orowa, yaikokatpak wa atpake an ikip iki yan; shomo ne chiki, e yaikokatpak shomoki chiki, e orun Ku ek hine koro ushike wano e koro ratchako Ku uk kusu ne.
Koroka, tambe, e otta an ruwe ne, Nikoraitan un utara iki ikip e etunne, Kuani ne yakka nei okaibe Ku etunne ruwe ne na.
Kisara koro guru anak ne karisia utara orun Ramat ye itak ambe nu yan. Annokara guru otta Kamui Paradeisos ta an inotu oma chikuni nikaop shinuma Ku ibere kusu ne na.
Orowa, Sumurna kotan ta an Karisia koro hauturumbe gusu ene nuye yan;

Atpake an, iyoshi no an, rai okere wa ishu ambe ene itak-hi: E ki eramchuptekbe newa e irapokkari an ambe Ku eraman (koroka oteknu ambe e ne), samata, Yudea un utara ne ari yaikota ye a koroka Yudea un utara shomo ne Satan uwekari un utara ne sekorʼan utara iki koatcha ambe Ku eraman.

Tane e iki kusu ne a ramushitnere okaibe gusu iteki ishitoma yan: ingarʼan, echi utara auwande kuni ne nitnep anak ne echi sereke okai utara ipakashnu chisei ta omare kuni etokooiki korʼan ruwe ne; aige, wan to uturuta echi eramchuptek kusu ne na. Rai pakno ikipniukesh no okai yan, yakun, Kuani inotu oma sapa-umbe e kore ash kusu ne na.
Kisara koro guru auak ne karisia utara orun Ramat ye itak ambe nu yan. Annokara ki guru anak ne tu ikinne an rai ambe gusu awende shomoki kusu ne na.
Orowa, Pergamos kotan ta an karisia koro hauturumbe gusu ene nuye yan;

Nei uren notaku ibetam koro guru ene itak-hi: Otta e oshiroma ushike, Satan koro amset an ushike Ku eraman: orowa, eani anak ne Ku reihei shiyuppa no shikkashima, aige, Satan oshiroma ushiketa, echi tumugeta araige Ku goro ikipniukesh guru, en gusu an paweteshu ki Antipas toho ta poka en gusu an eishokor-i shomo e eshikashke ambe Ku eraman.

Koroka, e epeka pon no okaibe an, Israeru un utara anak ne potoki otta ayange ambe ibe hemhem ki, hoiyo hemhem iki kuni ne nei kotchaketa ureepetchiure kuni nep Barak ande gusu epakashnu Baraam iki epakashi koro utara e tura no an ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Shui, nei no korachi, Nikoraitan iki epakashi koro sereke an utara e tura no an ruwe ne.
Tambe gusu, yaikokatpak yan; shomo ne chiki tunashino e orun Ku ek wa Ku paro un rangetam ani nei utara epeka tumi-koro kusu ne na.

Kisara koro gurʼanak ne karisia utara orun Ramat ye itak ambe nu yan. Annokara iki guru otta, Shinuma otta anuina wa an manna Ku ibere kusu ne, orowa, retara shuma Ku kore, nei shuma kata akore guru moshima eraman guru isam no an ashiri reihei chieshinnuye wa an na.
Orowa, Tuateira kotan ta an karisia koro hauturumbe gusu ene nuye yan;
Abe nui nepkoro an shiki koro, aturu-sakte shiuninkani nei no an kemaha koro Kamui Poho ene itak-hi: —

E iki ikip hemhem, omap ambe hemhem, eishokor-i hemhem, yaishieiwangere ambe hemhem, yaiyupupu ambe hemhem Ku eraman, orowa, iyoshi e iki ikip anak ne hoshiki no an ambe kasu no inne sekorʼambe Ku eraman.

Koroka, e epeka gusu an ambe an, yaikota uweingara guru ne ari itak nei a shiwentep anak ne Yesaberu e aude ruwe ne gusu ne na; nei shiwentep anak ne Ku goro usshiune utara hoiyo hemhem ki, potoki otta ayange okaibe ibe hemhem ki kuni epakashnu wa kokandama ruwe ne.
Nei shiwentep yaikokatpak kuni gusu an pakihi Ku kore nisa; awa, koro hoiyo ambe gusu shinuma yaikokatpak ki kuni-hi kopan nisa ruwe ne.

Ingarʼan, Kuani nei shiwentep shotki kata Ku osura kusu ne, orowa, koro iki ikip gusu yaikotkapak shomoki yakun, nei guru tura omoinu koro utara utura poro aeramchuptek an ushike un Ku osurupa kusu ne na.

Orowa, rai ambe ani nei shiwentep koro poho utara Ku ronnu kusu ne; aige, Kuani anak ne kinop newa sambe chimichimi guru Ku ne ruwe ne ari an ambe obitta no okai karisia utara eraman kusu ne: samata, echi ikip an nei no pishno okai echi utara orota Ku kore kusu ne na.

Koroka, echi utara otta, Tuateira kotan ta moshima okai utara otta, tap epakashi shomo koro obitta no okai utara, utara ene ene itak-hi korachi an Satan ooho ambe erampeutek utara otta, ene Ku ye-hi:—Nep moshima an pase ambe echi kashita shomo Ku seire kusu ne.
Yakka, echi koro wa an ambe Ku ek pakno shiyuppa no shikkashima yan.
Orowa, annokara ki wa okake an pakno Ku ikip shikkashima guru otta, shinuma otta moshiri uirup ok kashita mondum Ku kore kusu ne: aige,
Shinuma anak ne yaiyan-kani kuwa koro wa nei utara epungine kusu ne, sei-shintoko kara guru akarape humne apereke korachi nep; Kuani ne yakka Ku goro Michi orowa no a en kore korachi an ambe ne:
orowa, kunne-nisat nochiu nei guru orota Ku kore kusu ne na.
Kisara koro gurʼanak ne karisia utara orun Ramat ye itak ambe nu yan.
Orowa, Sardeis kotan ta an karisia koro hauturumbe gusu ene nuye yan;
Kamui arawan Ramat newa nei arawan nochiu newa koro gurʼanak ne ene orushpe ye-hi:—E ki ikip Ku eraman, aige, eani anak ne ishu korʼan kunak reihei e koro,

aine, e rai okere ruwe ne. Eani anak shiruwande, orowa, rai etokooiki an ikashima okaibe roshkire yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, Ku goro Kamui kotchaketa auweomare an e ki ikip shomo Ku nukan ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Tambe gusu, nekon a echi akore hene ya, echi anure hene ya, eshkarun yan; orowa, shikkashima wa yaikokatpak yan. Tambe gusu, shomo e shiruwande kusu ne chiki, ikka guru korachi Ku ek kusu ne, aige, inan pakihi pakita e orun Ku ek ya e eramushkare kusu ne na.
Koroka koro mipihi shomo turu-ushte moyo an reihei Sardeis kotan ta e koro: aige, nei utara retarape imi wa En tura apkash kusu ne; nei utara oupak utara ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Annokara iki guru anak ne tap korachi retarape amip ani amire kusu ne; orowa, Kuani anak inotu oma kambi-sosh wano shinuma reihei oara shomo Ku ushka kusu ne, orowa, Ku goro Michihi kotchaketa ne yakka, Shinuma koro hauturumbe kotchaketa ne yakka shinuma reihei Ku pushpusu kusu ne.
Kisara koro gurʼanak ne karisia utara orun Ramat ye itak ambe nu yan.
Orowa, Piradarpeia kotan ta an karisia koro hauturumbe gusu ene nuye yan;
Ashkanne guru, son no an guru, Dabid koro kangi shikkashima wa apa maka hine nen ne yakka seshke eaikap, aige, seshke hine nen ne yakka maka eaikap, Shinuma tap okaibe ye ruwe ne:
e ki ikip Ku eraman (ingarʼan, nen ne yakka seshke eaikap asarare wa an apa e kore ash na), eani anak ne pon no kiroro koro, orowa, Ku itak shikkashima, aige, Ku reihei shomo eshikashke nisa ruwe ne.

Ingarʼan, Satan koro nwekari un utara, orowa, Yudea un utara shomo ne, koroka, shunge wa Yudea un utara ne kunak yaiporose utara orowa akore ash ruwe ne; ingarʼan, nei utara anak ne e chikiri kotchaketa koongami kuni ne Ku arakire kusu ne, orowa, Kuani e omap ash an ambe Kuani nei utara eramande kusu ne na.

Eani anak ne Ku yaiyupupu oma itak shikkashima nisa ruwe ne gusu, nei shiruwande kuni gusu an ek kushki pakihi orowa no, moshiri kata oshiroma utara shiruwande kuni ne, ingi-moshirʼun utara kata ek kushki pakihi orowa no e shishire ash kusu ne na.
Tunashino Ku ek ruwe ne: nenka ika e koro sapa-umbe uk kuni ne, shiarikiki no e koro wa an okaibe shikkashima yan.

Kuani anak ne, Ku goro Kamui ashkanne kenru onnaigeta, annokara iki guru ani ikushpe ne kara, aige, shinuma naa nei ushike wano shomo esoine arapa kusu ne: orowa, shinuma kata Ku goro Kamui kon reihei hemhem, Ku goro Kamui wano kando onnaige orowa no ran rok Ku goro Kamui koro machiya reihei hemhem, yaikota Ku korope ashiri reihei hemhem Ku nuye kusu ne na.
Kisara koro gurʼanak ne karisia utara orun Ramat ye itak ambe nu yan.
Orowa, Raodikeia kotan ta an karisia koro hauturumbe gusu ene nuye yan;
Nei a Amen, nei a oupeka newa sonep ne an paweteshu ki guru, nei a Kamui karape atpake an guru tap okaibe ye-hi:
e iki ikip Ku eraman, eani anak ne nani shomo ne seisek shomo ne ruwe ne; eani nani hene seisek hene an kuni Ku kon rusui.
Tambe gusu, eani anak ne tuwara wa seisek shomo ne, nani shomo ne wa gusu, Ku paroho wano e eatu

ash kusu ne na. Yaikota anak ne oteknu ne, aeoteknu ambe Ku goro wa eishiramne ushike isam sekoro e ye gusu; samata, yairamkoiki ambe e ne, yaisambepokashbe e ne, irapokkari guru e ne, shiknak guru e ne, atusa guru e ne sekoro e erampeutek ruwe ne gusu:

oteknu guru e ne kuni ne abe ani aturu-sakte kongani en orowa no hok kuni; samata, eani yaimire wa e atusa yainikoroshma ambe shomo anukara kuni ne retara amip hok kuni; samata, ingara kuni ne e koro shiki eushi gusu an shik kusuri hok kuni ne e onishnishi ash ruwe ne.
Ku omap utara obitta Ku pakashnu wa Ku shirikik ruwe ne: tambe gusu,

opopmau keutum koro wa yaikokatpak yan. Ingarʼan, nei apa samta Ku ash kane kikkik shiri an: inan guru ne yakka Ku hawe nu wa apa maka chiki, otta Ku ahun hine shinuma tura no Ku ibe, orowa, shinuma ka en tura no ibe kusu ne.
Annokara iki guru anak ne en tura no Ku amset kata rok kuni Ku kore kusu ne, Kuani ne yakka annokara iki wa Ku goro Michi tura no Shinuma koro amset kata Ku rok korachi ruwe ne.
Kisara koro gurʼanak ne karisia utara orun Ramat ye itak ambe nu yan.

Tap okaketa ku nukara, awa, ingarʼan, kando otta amaka apa an, awa, hoshike no ku nu hawe anak ne en otta ye rappa korachi an hawe ne, nei guru ene hawashi:—Eteun rikin yan, yakun, okaketa hetuku kusu ne okaibe e nukare ash na sekoro itak.
Nani Ramat otta ku an: awa, ingarʼan, Kando otta shine amset aande wa an, orowa, nei amset kata shinen a kane an ruwe ne;

amset kata a guru otta ingara hike kongo-seki newa fure-meno otta ingara korachi ne; orowa, nei amset pishkaneketa shine raiochi an, nei ambe orun ingara hike anak ne shiunin tama-num otta ingara korachi ne ruwe ne na.

Orowa, nei amset pishkanegeta ine amset ikashima hotne amset okai: nei amset kashiketa retara amip utomechiu ine ekashi ikashima hotne ekashi rok wa okai; orowa, koro sapa kata kongani sapa-umbe aunu ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei amset orowa no tammeru hene, hau hene, kamui-hum hene hetuku nisa ruwe ne. Orowa, amset kotchaketa arawan paraparase ratchako an, nei ambe anak ne Kamui koro arawan Ramat ne ruwe ne:

orowa, amset kotchaketa konru-shuma korachi pekere pindoro atui an; orowa, amset tumugeta newa pishkaneketa anak ne kotchakegeta ne yakka oshmakegeta ne yakka shikihi ani eshik ine shiknu okaibe okai ruwe ne.

Atpake an shiknup anak ne shishi koheraye ruwe ne, otutanup anak ne pon-beko koheraye ruwe ne, re otutanup anak ne ainu nan kon ruwe ne, ine otutanup anak ne hopumba koran kapachiri koheraye nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, nei ine shiknu okaibe anak ne iwan tekkup range koro, okari ne yakka onnaige ne yakka shikihi ari eshik ruwe ne: orowa, tokap-to hene kunne-to hene shini shomoki no ene hawe oka-hi:—Ashkanne, Ashkanne, Ashkanne, nep ne yakka ki eashkai Utarapa ne Kamui, Shinuma an nisa, orowa, an wa an,
orowa, ek kusu ne na, ari itak. Orowa, nei ine shiknu okaibe anak ne amset kata a shashuishiri pakno ishu Kamui otta ko-iramye hemhem ki, ko-oripak hemhem ki,

koyaiiraige hemhem ki chiki, nei ine ekashi ikashima hotne ekashi anak ne amset kata a shashuishiri pakno ishu Kamui kotchaketa hepokiush wa otta ko-ongami hine nei amset kotchaketa koro sapa-umbe osura wa ene itak kusu ne-hi:—

Chikoro Utarapa ne chikoro Kamui, Aokai anak ne iramyep hemhem, aeoripak-hi hemhem, kiroro hemhem koro kuni oupak Kamui E ne ruwe ne: Aokai anak ne obitta no okaibe ne yakka kara, E korʼirenga gusu nei okaibe an wa akan nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na, sekoro itak.
Orowa, nei amset kata rok guru shimon tekehe ta, oshike ne yakka oshmake ne yakka, anuye wa an kambi-sosh ku nukara, aige, arawan han ani irammakaka han aomare an ruwe ne.
Orowa, tan kambi-sosh pirasa wa nei han pita kuni upak guru nen ne ruwe, ari an hawe ani hawe ashte shine kiroroashnu hauturumbe ku nukan nisa.
Orowa, kando oshiketa ne yakka, moshiri kata ne yakka, moshiri pokta ne yakka, nei kambi-sosh pirasa hene ki orun ingara hene iki eashkai guru shinen ka isam ruwe ne.
Aige, nei kambi-sosh pirasa hene ki orun ingara hene ki kuni oupak guru anukara shomoki nisa ruwe ne gusu,

poron no ku chish nisa ruwe ne: aine, nei a ekashi un shinen anak ne en otta ene itak-hi:—Iteki chish: ingarʼan Yuda keushut ikiri un nei a Shishi, Dabid koro Shinrit anak ne nei kambi-sosh newa koro awawan han maka kuni ne annokara iki nisa ruwe ne, sekoro itak.

Orowa, nei amset tumta, nei ine shiknu okaibe tumta, nei ekashi tumta araige okere korachi an Pon-hitsuji chikoikip ku nukara, aige, Shinuma arawan kirawe koro, arawan shikihi koro, nei ambe anak ingi-moshiri ta apayere an Kamui koro arawan Ramat ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, Shinuma ek wa nei a amset kata rok guru koro teke wano nei ambe uk nisa ruwe ne.

Aige, Shinuma nei a kambi-sosh uk okere chiki, nei ine shiknu okaibe newa nei inen ikashima wa niu ne ekashi anak ne pishno range shine koto hemhem, Ashkanne utara koro inonno-itak ne senko ani aeshik wa an kongani domburi hemhem koro wa, nei Pon-hitsuji kotchaketa hachiripa nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, nei utara anak ne ashiri shinotcha iki wa ene itak-hi:—Aokai anak ne nei kambi-sosh uk hemhem iki, nei han maka hemhem iki kuni oupakbe E ne ruwe ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, Aokai anak ne araige an, awa, obitta no okai ainu ikiri wano hemhem, parumbe wano hemhem, utara wano hemhem,

moshiri uirup wano hemhem, E koro kemihi ani Kamui gusu utara hok nisa ruwe ne, aige, nei utara ani chikoro Kamui gusu Kamui otta yaishieiwangere utara ne kara; aine, nei utara anak ne moshiri kata epungine kusu ne gusu ne na Orowa,
ku ingara, aige, nei amset newa nei shiknu okaibe newa nei ekashi utara newa okari ta inne no okai hauturumbe koro hawe ku inu; awa, nei utara pishki-hi anak sen sen man man utara ne ruwe ne;

poro hawe ani nei utara ene itak-hi:—Araige an Pon-hitsuji chikoikip anak ne mondum newa aeoteknup newa wayashnu-hi newa kiroro newa aainukorobe newa arakuru newa shinnunuki ambe newa koro kuni oupakbe ne ruwe ne.

Orowa, kando oshiketa an akara okaibe ne yakka, moshiri kata an akara okaibe ne yakka, moshiri choropoketa an akara okaibe ne yakka, atui kata an akara okaibe ne yakka, nei ushiketa an akara okaibe ne yakka obitta ene itak hawe ku inu nisa ruwe ne,—Amset kata rokbe orun, samata, nei Pon-hitsuji chikoikip orun ne yakka, otusashuishiri wano otusashuishiri pakno shinnunuke ambe an, aainukorobe an,
arakuru an, epungine mondum an na. Aige, nei a ine shiknu okaibe anak—Amen—ari an itak ani itak nisa ruwe ne. Orowa, nei ekashi utara hachiripa wa koongami nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, Pon-hitsuji chikoikip anak ne nei arawan han oma shine han shirosh maka ambe ku nukara, awa, nei ita ine shiknu okaibe un shinep anak kamui-hum nepkoro an hawe ani—Ek yan—ani an itak ani itak katu ku inu nisa.

Orowa, ku nukara, awa, ingarʼan, shine retara umma an, aige, kashiketa o guru anak ne shine ku koro; aine, shinuma orun sapa umbe akore an na: shinuma anak annokara iki, samata, annokara iki kushki gusu ek nisa ruwe ne na.
Orowa, Shinuma nei tutanu an han shirosh maka okere chiki, nei tu ikinne an shiknu okaibe—Ek yan— ani an itak ani ye hawe ku inu.

Aige, naa shine umma, fure umma oashin nisa ruwe ne: orowa, nei umma kata o guru otta anak ne moshiri ka wa itomo uina hine utara utaspa uronnu gusu mondum akore: samata, shinuma otta poro rangetam akore nisa ruwe ne na.

Orowa, nei re otutanu an han shirosh Shinuma maka chiki, nei re ikinne an shiknu okaibe—Ek yan—ani an itak ani ye hawe ku inu. Awa, ingarʼan, ku nukara chiki, shine kunne umma an; aige, nei umma kata o guru anak ne koro teke ta pakarip kon ruwe ne.

Orowa, nei ine shiknu okaibe tumuge wa ene ye korachi an hau ku nu:—shine denaria gusu mungi shine chomba an, orowa, shine denaria gusu omungi re chomba an na; aige, shum newa hat-tonoto iteki wende yan, sekoro itak.
Orowa, nei ine otutanu an han shirosh Shinuma maka chiki, nei ine ikinne an shiknu okaibe—Ek yan—ani an itak ani ye hawe ku inu.

Awa, ingarʼan, ku nukara chiki shine aokashige umma an: aige, nei umma kata o guru an, reihei anak rai ari an reihei ne ruwe ne; awa, Hades anak ne shinuma kashirari nisa ruwe ne. Orowa, shinuma anak ne rangetam ani hemhem, keman ani hemhem, uwetoita tashum ani hemhem, toi kata an niwen chikoikip ani hemhem ronnu kuni gusu, moshiri ebitta inep un shinep okkeu kashi mondum akore nisa ruwe ne na.
Orowa nei ashikne ikinne an han shirosh Shinuma maka chiki, yange set choropoketa okai Kamui itak gusu hemhem, iki paweteshu ambe gusu hemhem aronnu utara kon ramat ku nukara;

awa, nei utara shiri poro hawe ani hawe ashte wa ene itak-hi:—Aa Esapane-nishpa, ashkanne newa sonep, hembara pakno aokai anak ne moshiri kata oshiroma utara epeka chikoro kem gusu shomo koipishi wa ikemnu ya?

Orowa, pishno an nei utara otta retara mipihi akore nisa ruwe ne; aige, naa pon no pakihi uturu, nei utara yaikota anak aronnu okere korachi, tura no ikichi utara newa koro iriwak utara ne yakka aronnu pakihi auweomare pakno, shini kuni ne akashpaotte nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei iwan ikinne an han shirosh Shinuma maka chiki, poro shirishimoye an; awa, tokap-chup anak ne numa ani akara kunne amip pakno kunne ne, samata, kunne-chup ebitta kem korachi ne akan nisa;
orowa, poro rera ani ashuyeshuye ita ichijiku chikuni anak ne koro fu nikaop hachirepa korachi, kando un nochiu toi kata hachiripa nisa ruwe ne na.
Aige, kambi akokarakari nei no kando akokarakari nisa; orowa, obitta no okai nupuri newa repun shiri anak an ushike wano oyakta aarapare nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, moshiri esapane utara hemhem, nishpane utara hemhem, tumi-koro utara esapane utara hemhem, oteknu utara hemhem, kiroroashnu utara hemhem, pishno okai ausshiunere utara newa rengaine an mondum koro utara hemhem, poru oshiketa hene nupuri un watara oshiketa hene yainuinak;
aine, nupuri newa watara otta ene itak-hi:—Un kashiketa hachiripa hine nei amset kata rokbe otta hemhem nei Pon-hitsuji iki kinrakarape otta hemhem un nuina wa un kore:
inambe gusu ne yakun, nei utara gusu an poro kinrakara toho ek an na, aige, hunna roshki eashkai ruwe he an?

Tap okaketa ku nukara chiki moshiri kata ne yakka, atui kata ne yakka, nep chikuni kata ne yakka iteki rera ash kuni ne, moshiri koro ine shikkiu ta roshki wa moshiri koro ine rera shikkashima hauturumbe inep ku nukara.
Orowa, ishu Kamui koro han shirosh koro wa ochuka un hetuku naa shine hauturumbe ku nukara:

awa, shinuma poro hawe ani, otta toitoi newa atui newa wende kuni kiroro akoropare ine hauturumbe orun hawe ashte wa ene itak-hi:—Chi utara anak ne chikoro Kamui koro ausshiune utara keputuru ta shirosh omare shomoki pakno, toitoi hene, atui hene, chikuni hene iteki wende yan, ari itak.
Orowa, nei shirosh aomare utara apishki ikiri ku nu nisa. Israeru un utara san pishno okai uirup otta shirosh aomare utara anak ne shi sen nin ne ainu ikashima ju-shi man nin ne ainu ne ruwe ne na.
Yuda ikiri otta tu sen nin ne ainu ikashima shine ichi man nin ne ainu shirosh aomare:
Ruben ikiri otta tu sen nin ne ainu ikashima shine ichi man nin ne ainu shirosh aomare:
Gad ikiri otta tu sen nin ne ainu ikashima shine ichi man nin ne ainu shirosh aomare:
Aser ikiri otta tu sen nin ne ainu ikashima shine ichi man nin ne ainu shirosh aomare:
Neptareim ikiri otta tu sen nin ne ainu ikashima shine ichi man nin ne ainu shirosh aomare:
Manasse ikiri otta tu sen nin ne ainu ikashima shine ichi man nin ne ainu shirosh aomare:
Simeon ikiri otta tu sen nin ne ainu ikashima shine ichi man nin ne ainu shirosh aomare:
Rebi ikiri otta tu sen nin ne ainu ikashima shine ichi man nin ne ainu shirosh aomare:
Issakar ikiri otta tu sen nin ne ainu ikashima shine ichi man nin ne ainu shirosh aomare:
Zaburon ikiri otta tu sen nin ne ainu ikashima shine ichi man nin ne ainu shirosh aomare:
Yosep ikiri otta tu sen nin ne ainu ikashima shine ichi man nin ne ainu shirosh aomare:
Benyamin ikiri otta tu sen nin ne ainu ikashima shine ichi man nin ne ainu shirosh aomare nisa ruwe ne na.

Tap okaketa ku nukara, aige, ingarʼan, obitta no okai moshiri uirup orowa no hemhem, nep ainu shinrit ikiri orowa no hemhem, nep utara orowa no hemhem, nep itak ani ye utara orowa no hemhem, nen ne yakka pishki eaikap pakno an shiri inne utara, retara amip mi, teke otta shuro chikuni koro wa nei amset newa Pon-hitsuji kotchaketa roshki wa okai-hi ku nukara;
orowa, nei utara poro hawe ashte wa ene itak-hi:—Nei amset kata rok chikoro Kamui otta hemhem, Pon-hitsuji otta hemhem kashiobiuki ambe an na, ari itak.

Orowa, obitta no okai Kamui hauturumbe anak ne nei amset newa ekashi utara newa nei shiknu okaibe pishkanigeta roshki wa okai ruwe ne; aige, amset kotchaketa shirikamu wa Kamui ko-ongami hine ene itak-hi:—Amen:
Anunuke ambe hene, arakuru hene, wayashnu ambe hene, yaiiraige ambe hene, aeoripak ambe hene, tumashnu ambe newa kiroro anak ne shashuishiri wano shashuishiri pakno chikoro

Kamui otta an na. Amen, ari itak nisa ruwe ne. Orowa, nei ekashi un shinen anak ne en orun ese wa ene itak-hi:—Retara amip ani utomchiure wa okai tapan utara hunna ruwe, samata, hunak wa araki an utara ne ruwe he an?

Shinuma otta ene ku itak-hi:—Ku kon nishpa, aoka eraman. Aige, en otta shinuma ene itak-hi:—Tap okai utara anak ne poro aeramchuptekbe wano oashippa utara ne, aine, koro mipihi furayepa wa Pon-hitsuji koro kem oshiketa retaraka nisa ruwe ne.

Tambe gusu nei utara anak ne Kamui amset kotchaketa okai; aige, Shinuma kora kenru ta okai hine tokap-to ta ne yakka kunne-to ta ne yakka Shinuma otta yaishieiwangere ruwe ne: orowa, nei amset kata rokbe anak ne nei utara kashiketa koro kash pirasa kusu ne na.
Orowa, nei utara tewa no naa shomo ibe rusui, naa shomo iku rusui; samata, tokap chup ne yakka seisek-mau ne yakka nei utara kata epeka shomoki kusu ne:

inambe gusu ne yakun, nei amset oshiketa an Pon-hitsuji anak ne nei utara epungine kusu ne, aige, inotu oma wakka purupuruge-i tura wa ani kusu ne: orowa Kamui anak ne obitta no okai nupe nei utara koro shiki wano piruba wa isamka kusu ne na.
Orowa, nei arawan ikinne an han shirosh Shinuma maka chiki, shine ichi ji kan nimara pakihi pakno kando onnaige mo no an ruwe ne.
Orosama, Kamui kotchaketa roshki nei arawan hauturumbe ku nukara; awa, nei hauturumbe otta arawan rappa akore nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, otta senko uhuyeka kuni kongani op koro moshima an hauturumbe ek wa yange set samaketa ash nisa ruwe ne; orowa, obitta no okai Ashkanne utara koro inonno-itak tura amset kotchaketa an nei kongani yange-set kashiketa iyo kuni gusu poron no an senko anak nei hauturumbe akore ruwe ne.
Aige, nei senko shupuya anak ne ashkanne utara koro inonno-itak tura nei hauturumbe koro teke wano Kamui kotchake orun rikin nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa shine hauturumbe anak ne nei senko-op uk; aige, nei yange set oma abe ani shikte wa shiri kata osura: aine, kamui-hum an, hawe an, imeru an, orowa, shine shirishimoye an.
Orowa, nei arawan rappa koro arawan hauturumbe anak ne rappa rekte gusu yai-etoko oiki nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, hoshiki no an ap rekte, aige, kem ukopoye kaukau newa abe an, awa, nei ambe moshiri kata aosurupa: orowa moshiri re sereke uhuye wa isam, chikuni re sereke uhuye wa isam, samata, obitta no okai shiunin mun uhuye wa isam ruwe ne na.
Orowa, tutanu an hauturumbe anak ne rekte, aige, abe gusu paraparase poro nupuri nepkoro ambe atui onnaige un aeyapkiri: orowa, atui re sereke kem ne akara;
aige, atui oshiketa okai inotu korope re sereke rai; orowa, chip re sereke aisamka nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, re ikinne an hauturumbe rekte, aige, ratchako paraparase korachi an poro nochiu kando orowa no hachiri, aine, nei ambe pet re sereke newa wakka purupuruge-i kata hachiri;
nei nochiu reihei anak ne Inchin ari aporose ruwe ne: orowa, wakka re sereke anak ne inchin ne akara; aige, nei wakka gusu inne ainu raipa, nei wakka shiu ne akan nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Orowa, ine ikinne an hauturumbe rekte, aige, tokap chup re sereke, kunne chup re sereke, nochiu re sereke aepeka; tambe anak ne nei re sereke akunnere hine tokap-to re sereke gusu shomo nupeki at, samata, kunne-to shem korachi ne kuni gusu ne na.

Orowa, ku nukara, awa, kando noshke hopumba shiriki an shine kapachiri poro hawe ani ene ene ye ambe ku inu:—Naa okaketa humi ashte kusu ne nei re hauturumbe koro rappa koro moshima an hawe gusu moshiri kata oshiroma utara eyaisambepokash, eyaisambepokash, eyaisambepokash humi.
Orowa, ashikne ikinne an hauturumbe rekte, aige, shine nochiu kando orowa no moshiri kata hachiri: awa, shinuma orun nei asama sak no an shui gusu an kangi akore nisa ruwe ne Orowa,

shinuma nei asama sak no an shui maka; aine, poro sokot wano shupuya rikin korachi, nei shui orowa no shupuya rikin nisa ruwe ne; orowa, nei shui wano hetuku shupuya gusu tokap-chup newa rera-mau akunnere an na.
Orowa, nei shupuya orowa no moshiri eun patta oaship; aige, moshiri kata an sasori kiroro koro wa okai nei no, kiroro akore nisa ruwe ne.

Awa, toi kata an mun hene, nep shiunin kina hene, nep chikuni hene, iteki kowende kuni ne akashpaotte, koroka, ouse koro keputuru ta Kamui han shirosh shomo aomare ainu utara patek iwende kuni ne akashpaotte nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, iteki nei utara ronnu kuni ne akore, koroka, ashikne chup uturu aramushitnere kuni nep ne: aige, ani aeramushitnere ambe anak ne sasori ainu kopiuki nepkorʼan aeramushitne ambe ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei toho uturuta ainu utara anak ne rai kuni ambe hunara, koroka, oara shomo rai-i apa; rai an rusui, koroka, rai ambe anak ne nei utara wano kira kusu ne.
Orowa, nei patta katuhu anak ne tumi gusu shipini okere umma ukoheraye ruwe ne; aige, sapaha kashiketa kongani sapa-umbe nepkoro ambe okai,
nanuhu anak ainu nan ukorachi nep. Koro otop anak ne shiwentep otopihi nepkoro ne, nimaki anak shishi chikoikip ukorachi an ap ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei utara rerara-kotukbe koro, yaiyan-kani nepkorʼan rerara-kotukbe ne ruwe ne; tekkup humi anak ne nishinda humi korachi nep, tumi gusu inne umma pash hum ukorachi ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, sasori saraha ukorachi an saraha koro wa ai oma; orowa, ashikne chup uturuta ainu utara wende kuni gusu an kiroro kon ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei utara okkeu kashita an sapanep anak ne asam-sak shui koro hauturumbe ne; Hebraios un itak ne chiki kon reihei Abaddon ne ruwe ne, Herenes un itak ani aye chiki Aporrion ne ruwe ne.
Atpake an aeyaisambepokashbe aokere, ingarʼan, tap okake naa tu aeyaisambepokashbe an na.
Orowa, iwan ikinne an hauturumbe rekte, aige, Kamui kotchaketa an kongani yange-set koro kirau wano an shine hau ku inu,
nei a hawe anak ne nei rappa koro hauturumbe otta ene itak-hi;—Nei poro Euprates pet ta atupetupe wa okai ine hauturumbe pita yan ari itak.
Orowa, ainu utara re sereke ronnu kuni ne, shine ichi ji kan, shine to, shine chup, shine pa, aetokooiki wa okai nei ine hauturumbe apita nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, umma o tumi-koro utara topaha pishki-hi anak ne tu shuine an man-man ne ruwe ne: nei pishki-hi ku inu nisa ruwe ne na.

Orowa, tap korachi nei anukarape otta nei umma ku nukara, aige, kashiketa o utara anak ne abe iroho newa shiunin iroho newa iwau iroho newa an rerara-kotukbe koro awa, umma sapaha anak ne shishi sapaha ukoheraye; orowa koro paroho orowa no abe newa shupuya newa iwau oaship nisa ruwe ne.
Tap okai re shirikikbe ani, nei okaibe koro paro orowa no oashippa abe newa shupuya newa iwau ani, ainu utara re sereke aronnu nisa ruwe ne.
Inambe gusu ne yakun, nei umma koro kiroro anak ne koro paroho newa saraha ta an ruwe ne: koro saraha anak okokko korachi ne wa sapaha kon ruwe ne gusu ne na, aige, nei ambe ani iwende ki ruwe ne.

Orowa, tan shirikikbe gusu shomo aronnu moshima okai uirup utara anak ne koro teke ani iki ikip gusu, nitne kamui hemhem, kongani potoki-noka hemhem, shirokani potoki-noka hemhem, shiunin-kani potoki-noka hemhem, shuma potoki-noka hemhem, chikuni potoki-noka hemhem, shomo koongami kuni ne yaikokatpak shomoki nisa ruwe ne; nei okaibe anak ingara eaikap, nu eaikap,
apkash eaikapbe ne: samata, nei utara anak ne koro kewe-ukbe gusu, koro esaman-ikip gusu, iki hoiyop gusu, ikka ambe gusu shomo eyaikokatpak nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, ku nukara chiki, nishkuru utomchiure wa an kando orowa no ran shine hauturumbe an; awa, koro sapa kata raiochi an, koro nanu tokap-chup nepkoro an, chikiri anak abe ikushpe ukoheraye ruwe ne; aige, koro teke otta shine pon kambi-sosh pirasa wa an ruwe ne:
orowa, shinuma anak ne koro shimon kema atui kata ande, orowa, hariki kema toitoi kata
ande nisa ruwe ne; aige, shishi hawe ashte korachi shinuma poro hawe ani hawe ashte: aine, shinuma hawe ashte chiki, nei arawan kamui-hum anak ne koro hawe sange nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei arawan kamui-hum koro hawe sange okere chiki ku nuye kuni ku ramu: awa, kando orowa no an ene itak hawe ku nu:—Nei arawan kamui-hum sange orushpe eshina wa iteki nuye yan.
Orowa atui kata hemhem toitoi kata hemhem ash wa an ku nukara hauturumbe anak ne kando eun koro shimon teke puni hine,

kando newa kando oshiketa nep okaibe ne yakka, moshiri newa moshiri oshiketa ne yakka, atui newa atui oshiketa ne yakka kara wa otusashuishiri wano otusashuishiri pakno an Kamui epeka ye wa, tewa no poka pakihi isam kusu ne ari shiyuppa no ekambakbe iki nisa ruwe ne:

koroka, nei arawan ikinne an hauturumbe koro hawe an toho ta, shinuma rekte etokooiki an ita, koro uweingara utara ne usshiune guru orun eramande pirika shongo an korachi, Kamui koro mukkep aokere ruwe ne.
Orowa, kando wano an ku nu hawe shui en otta itak shiri ku inu, ene itak-hi:—Arapa wa atui newa toitoi kata ash wa an hauturumbe koro teke ta apirasa wa an kambi-sosh uk yan, ari itak.

Orowa, nei hauturumbe otta ku arapa wa nei pon kambi-sosh en kore kuni ku ye. Aige, shinuma en orun ene itak-hi:—Uk wa isam pakno ibe yan; aine, nei ambe e koro honi shiu ne kara, koroka, e paro onnaigeta soyai-ninge pakno topembe ne kusu ne, ari itak.

Orowa, kuani nei hauturumbe koro teke wano nei pon kambi-sosh ku uk hine isam pakno ku ibe; awa, ku paro gusu soyai-ninge pakno topembe ne: aige, nei ambe ibe okere chiki ku honi anak ne shiu ne akan nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei utara en otta ene itak-hi:—Aokai anak ne inne utara newa uirup newa parumbe newa moshiri shikkashima utara newa epeka uweingara ki kusu ne na, ari itak.
Orowa, kanni nepkorʼan shine rapembe a en kore nisa: aige, shinen en orun ene itak-hi;—Hopuni wa Kamui kora kenru newa yange set newa nei kenru oshiketa ongami utara newa pakari yan.

Orowa, nei kenru soige an mimdara moshima no an wa iteki pakari yan; nei ambe anak ne moshiri uirup otta akore nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na: orowa, nei ashkanne machiya anak ne tu chup ikashima tu hotne chup uturuta aotereke kusu ne na.
Orowa, Ku goro tu paweteshu ki utara anak ne hai ani akara amip mi wa iwan shine wan hotne to newa re hotne to uturuta uweingara kuni akore kusu ne.
Tap utara anak ne moshiri koro Utarapa kotchaketa roshki wa nei tu kanran chikuni newa nei tu ratchako ne ruwe ne.

Orowa, nei utara iwende rusui guru an chiki, koro paro wano abe oashin hine nei epokba utara isamka; nen ne yakka nei utara iwende rusui guru an kusu ne a chiki tap korachi araige kusu ne kunip ne ruwe ne.

Uweingara ki toho uturuta iteki apto ash kuni ne kando seshke kiroro nei utara kon ruwe ne: samata, wakka kem ne kara kuni kiroro an, rengaine kanna-kanna iki rusui nei no obitta no okai shirikikbe ani moshiri epeka kiroro kon ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei utara anak ne koro iki paweteshu ambe okere chiki, nei asam-sak ushike wano herashi ek chikoikip anak tura no tumi-koro hine annokara wa ronnu kusu ne.

Orowa, koro kaise anak ne nei poro machiya un paruru ta an, ramat oma itak ani nei ambe aporose chiki Sodom newa Echipt ari ayep ne, nei ushiketa nei utara koro Utarapa utasa chikuni otta akungi kokikkik nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, moshiri uirup newa ainu ikiri newa parumbe newa tumuge un utara anak ne ine to e emko uturuta nei kaise orun ingara, aine, iteki tushiri orun aomare kuni ne iki kusu ne na.

Orowa, moshiri kata oshiroma utara anak ne nei okaibe gusu nupetne wa yaikopuntek; aige, utashpa eikrap korara kusu ne; inambe gusu ne yakun, tan tu uweingarape moshiri kata oshiroma utara panakte nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, to e emko e ine to an chiki, Kamui inotu oma heisepa nei onnaige un ahun, aige, nei utara anak kema kata roshki; awa, ingara utara anak ne shi no ishitoma nisa ruwe ne.
Aine, nei utara otta ye kando orowa no an poro hawe anu wa ene itak-hi:—Eteun rikin yan. Aige, nei utara nishkuru onnaige ahup hine kando orun rikin, awa, epokba utara nei ambe nukan nisa ruwe ne na.

Nei pakihi ta poro shirishimoye an, aine, machiya wan sereke hokush; orowa, shichi sen nin ne ainu ne a shirishimoye gusu aronnu: awa, moshima okai utara anak ne kimatek hine kando koro Kamui ramye nisa ruwe ne.
Tu ikinne an aeyaisambepokashbe aokere: ingarʼan, nei re ikinne an aeyaisambepokashbe tunashino ek na.

Orowa, nei arawan ikinne an hauturumbe rappa rekte; aige, kando onnaigeta poro hawe hetuku wa ene itak-hi:—Moshiri esapane kuni ambe anak ne chikoro Utarapa newa Shinuma koro Kiristo korobe ne akara: awa, Shinuma ramma-ramma pakno esapane kusu ne na.
Orowa, koro amset kata Kamui kotchaketa rok kane okai nei inen ikashima hotne ekashi utara koro nan kata hachiripa hine Kamui koongami hine ene itak-hi:—
Aa Nep ne yakka ki eashkai, an wa an, an nisa Utarapa ne Kamui, chi utara anak ne E koyaiiraige ash ruwe ne: Aokai anak ne E koro poro kiroro uina wa esapane iki nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Orowa, moshiri uirup irushka, aine, E iki irushka ambe hetuku an, samata, rai an utara akoipishi kuni pakihi hemhem, E koro uitek utara ne uweingara utara otta ne yakka, ashkanne utara otta ne yakka, E reihei kooripak pon guru hene poro guru hene otta pummaha koropare kuni pakihi ne yakka ek an na; orowa, moshiri koisamka utara isamka kuni pakihi ka ek an ruwe ne na, ari itak.

Orowa, kando oshiketa an Kamui kora kenru asarare nisa; awa, Shinuma kora kenru onnaigeta Shinuma koro aeuitaknu o shuop anukara: aine, imeru newa, hawe newa, kamui-hum newa, shine shirishimoye newa, poro kaukau newa hetuku nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, poro shirosh kando oshiketa anukara; tokap chup ani yaitomchiure shiwentep ne, kema pokta kunne-chup an, sapa kata tu ikashima wan nochiu oma sapa-umbe an; awa, nei shiwentep shinnaikat iyeunu wa an na:
aige, shinuma po shikore gusu, hekatu gusu an ikururu gusu hawe ashte ruwe ne.
Orowa, naa shine shirosh kando oshiketa anukara; awa, ingarʼan, arawan sapaha newa wan kirawe koro shine poro fure kinashutunguru an, aige, koro sapaha kata arawan inaoru aunu wa an ruwe ne.

Orowa, shinuma koro saraha anak ne kando o nochiu re sereke nimba wa moshiri kata osurupa nisa ruwe ne; aige, nei kinashutumbe anak tane po shikore kushki shiwentep kotchaketa ash; awa, hekatu yakun koro aiai ibe wa isamka kuni gusu ne na.

Aine, nei shiwentep anak ne yaiyan-kani kan-ni ani obitta no okai moshiri uirup epungine kuni gusu an okkai poho, ainu poho, shikore nisa: awa, koro aiai Kamui orun, Kamui koro amset rikna ehekem nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei shiwentep anak ne iwan shine wan hotne to ikashima ine hotne to uturu aioreshpa kuni ne, nup oshiketa Kamui shipini okere ushike orun kokira nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, kando oshiketa tumi an: Mikaeru newa koro uitek utara kinashutunguru tura ukotumikoro gusu paye; awa, kinashutunguru anak ne koro uitek utara tura tumikon nisa ruwe ne;
aige, ash eaikap, samata, nei i wano kando oshiketa nei ambe okai kuni ushiketa ka isam ruwe ne na.

Orowa, nei poro kinashutunguru, nei fushko okokko, nei Satan hene nitne kamui hene ari an reihei ani aporose ingi-moshiri uirup kokandama ambe anak ne aetopara; moshiri shirikata pakno aetopara, koro uitek utara ukotura aetopan nisa ruwe ne na.

Orowa, kando oshiketa poro hawe ku nu, aige, ene itak-hi:—Tane anak ne kashiobiuki ambe newa, kiroro newa, chikoro Kamui moshiri newa, Shinuma koro Kiristo koro mondum newa ek wa an ruwe ne: inambe gusu ne yakun, tokap-to ta hene, kunne-to ta hene chikoro Kamui tek-samata chikoro iriwak utara eiyonnupba ki iyon-nupbap anak ne aetopan nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, shinuma utara nei Pon-hitsuji koro kem ankushkerai gusu, orowa, koro paweteshu ki itak an gusu nei ambe annokan nisa ruwe ne: orowa, rai oro pakno ne yakka koro inotu shomo omap ruwe ne.

Tambe gusu, aa kando newa kando otta okai utara, nupetne yan. Moshiri newa atui newa yaisambepokash humi! Inambe gusu ne yakun, nitne kamui anak ne irukai patek okai kuni ambe eraman wa shi no irushka hine echi orota san wa an ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, moshiri eun aetopara wa an kunak nei kinashutunguru nukara chiki, nei ainu poho shikore shiwentep keshke nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, shiwentep anak ne nei kinashutunguru koro nan wano kira wa shine pakihi newa inne pakihi newa pakihi nimaraha newa uturuta otta aioreshpa kuni gusu an nup orun hopumba kuni ne poro kapachiri tekkup tuppish akore nisa ruwe ne.
Awa, shiwentep nai chiwe gusu amomka wa aisamka kuni ne, nei kinashutunguru anak ne koro paroho orowa no pet korachi wakka shinuma oshmake oashinge nisa ruwe ne.
Awa, toitoi nei shiwentep ikashiu, aige, toitoi anak koro paro maka hine kinashutunguru yaikota koro paro orowa no oashinge pet ruki nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, kinashutunguru anak ne nei shiwentep epeka irushka, aige, Kamui ikashpaotte shikkashima wa Yesu iki paweteshu ambe koro moshima okai nei shiwentep koro san-ikiri epeka kotumikoro gusu arapa nisa ruwe ne: orowa, nei ambe atui-sam kata ash kane an na.
Orowa, wan kirawe newa arawan sapaha koro shine chikoikip atui orowa no oashin ambe ku uukara, awa, koro kirawe kata wan inaoru okai, samata, koro sapa kata Kamui koatcha reihei oka ruwe ne.

Aine ku nukara chikoikip anak ne hyo chikoikip nepkoro ambe ne, chikiri anak chiramantep korobe ukoheraye, koro paro anak ne shishi koro paro korachi nep: orowa, nei kinashutunguru anak ne yaikota koro kiroro newa amset newa poro mondum newa shinuma otta koropare nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, shine sapaha anak ne ekot kuni pakno araige nepkorʼan, awa, araige kuni gusu an akoshirikik ushike tuk nisa: aige,

moshiri uirup ebitta nei chikoikip koenushkari; orowa, utara anak ne kinashutunguru koongami, nei chikoikip orun koro mondum kore nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na; aine, utara anak ne chikoikip koongami wa ene itak-hi:—Chikoikip ukoheraye guru inan guru ne ya? Shinuma epeka kotumi-koro eashkai guru nen ne ya? ari itak.
Orowa, porobe newa Kamui koatcha ambe newa ye kuni paroho shinuma otta akore; orosama, shinuma tu chup ikashima tu hotne chup uturu pakno an kuni mondum akore nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, shinuma anak ne Kamui epeka hemhem, Kamui kon reihei epeka hemhem, Kamui koro kash epeka hemhem, kando oshiketa oshiroma utara epeka hemhem koatcha ambe ye gusu koro paro maka ruwe ne.

Orowa, shinuma anak ne ashkanne utara epeka kotumi-koro wa annokara kuni gusu akore nisa: samata, pishno okai ainu ikiri newa utara newa parumbe newa moshiri uirup newa koro okkeu kashi mondum akore nisa ruwe ne na.
Orowa, moshiri asamaha aande i otta araige Pon-hitsuji chikoikip koro inotu oma kambi-sosh kata kon reihei shomo anuye wa an moshiri kata oshiroma utara obitta shinuma koongami kusu ne.
Kisara koro guru an chiki, nei guru anak nu yan.
Teke pashte guru an yakun, teke apashte kusu ne: rangetam ani raige guru an yakun, rangetam ani araige kusu ne. Tata otta ashkanne utara iki yaiyupupu ambe newa eishokor-i an ruwe ne.
Orowa, toitoi orowa no oashin shiriki naa shine chikoikip ku nukara; awa, pon hitsuji chikoikip nepkorʼan tu kirawe koro, aige, kinashutunguru korachi itak nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, shinuma anak nei atpake an chikoikip koro mondum shinuma kotchake ta eiwange ruwe ne. Orowa, moshiri newa moshiri kata oshiroma utara nei a raige kuni pakno koshirikik an ushike tuk atpake an chikoikip koongamire nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, shinuma poro shirosh iki, utara kotchaketa kando orowa no toi kata eun abe rapte pakno poka iki kuni kusu ne.

Aige, nei chikoikip kotchaketa akire kuni gusu an shirosh ankushkerai shinuma anak ne moshiri kata oshiroma utara kokandama; nei a rangetam eshirikik piri koro wa shiknu chikoikip gusu nokaha kara kuni ne moshiri kata oshiroma utara otta ye ruwe ne.

Orowa, nei chikoikip koro nokaha anak ne itak sange hemhem ki, chikoikip nokaha shomo koongami utara obitta aronnu hemhem ki kuni ne, otta inotu akore, chikoikip nokaha otta poka inotu akore nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, obitta no okai utara, pon guru ne yakka, poro guru ne yakka, oteknu guru ne yakka, otek-sak guru ne yakka, rengaine an mondum koro guru ne yakka, ausshiunere guru ne yakka, koro shimon tek kata hene koro keputuru kata hene shirosh aomare kuni ne shinuma iki ruwe ne;
orowa, nei shirosh, nei chikoikip kon reihei hene kon reihei koro pishki shirosh hene koro guru moshima, inan guru ne yakka hok hemhem ki eiyok hemhem ki eaikap kuni ne kan ruwe ne.

Teda wayashnu ambe an na. Eramush guru anak ne nei chikoikip koro pishki shirosh pishki yan; nei ambe anak ne ainu koro pishki ne ruwe ne gusu ne na: aige, nei ainu koro pishki shirosh anak ne re shine wan hot newa iwanbe ikashima re hotne ne ruwe ne.

Orowa, ku nukara, awa, ingarʼan, Zion nupuri kata nei Pon-hitsuji ash shiriki, orowa, koro keputuru ta Shinuma kon reihei hemhem, koro Michi kon reihei hemhem anuye wa an ju-shi-man nin ne ainu ikashi-ma shi-sen nin ne ainu Shinuma tura roshki wa okai shiri.
Orowa, inne wakka humihi korachi, poro kamui-hum korachi, kando wano san hawe ku nu: ku nu hawe anak ne koto rekte utara koro koto rekte wa humi ashte hawehe nei no an ruwe ne:

orowa, nei utara anak ne ashiripe noine an yairap nei amset kotchaketa newa ine shiknu okaibe newa nei ekashi kotchaketa newa ki ruwe ne: aige, moshiri orowa no ahok nei ju-shi-man nin ne ainu ikashima shi-sen nin ne ainu moshima nei yairap eyaihannokkara eashkai guru isam ruwe ne.

Tan okai utara anak ne shiwentep tura shomo yaituru-ushte ruwe ne: shiwentep eramushkare utara ne ruwe ne gusu ne na. Tan utara anak nei Pon-hitsuji inanta oman yakka nei osh paye utara ne. Tan utara anak Kamui gusu hemhem, Pon-hitsuji gusu hemhem, aro hoshiki no okai kunip ne kuni gusu ainu tumuge orowa no ahok utara ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei utara koro paroho oshiketa shunge shomo anukara; turu-sak utara ne ruwe ne na.

Orowa, otusashuishiri pakno an pirika shongo koro hine moshiri kata oshiroma utara otta, obitta no okai moshiri uirup otta hemhem, ainu ikiri otta hemhem, parumbe otta hemhem, utara otta hemhem eupaskuma kuni gusu an kando tumugeta hopumba naa shine hauturumbe ku nukara; awa, shinuma anak ne poro hawe ani ene itak-hi:—

Kamui koishitoma wa Shinuma reika yan; Shinuma koipishi ambe iki kuni pakihi ek an ruwe ne gusu ne na; orowa, kando newa toitoi newa atui newa wakka purupuruge-i newa kara Kamui koongami yan, ari itak.

Orowa, naa shine, naa otutanu an hauturumbe nei okaibe okake ek wa ene itak-hi:—Hokush okere, koro hoiyo gusu an irushka ambe oma tonoto orowa no obitta no okai moshiri uirup ikure nei poro Babironia anak hokush okere an na, ari itak.

Orowa, naa shine hauturumbe, nei re ikinne an ap anak ne, nei utara okake ek wa poro hawe ani ene itak-hi:—Inan guru ne yakka nei a chikoikip newa koro nokaha newa koongami hene ki, koro keputuru ta hene koro tekehe ta hene chikoikip koro shiroshi aomare yakun,

nei guru anak chiukopoye shomoki no etoko-a-oiki wa an okere Shinuma irushka ambe oma itangi, Kamui kinrakarape oma tonoto iku ne yakka iki kusu ne; orowa, ashkanne hauturumbe shik-samata newa nei Pon-hitsuji shik-samata newa abe newa iwau ani apanakte kusu ne:
