orowa, akore panakte ambe gusu an shupuya anak ne otusashuishiri pakno rikin kusu ne; aige, nei chikoikip newa koro noka newa koongami utara, kon reihei ne shirosh akore utara anak ne, nei utara anak tokap to ta ne yakka kunne to ta ne yakka shini eaikap ruwe ne.
Kamui ikashpaotte newa Yesu gusu an eishokor-i newa shikkashima utara otta, tata otta yaiyupupu ambe an na.

Orowa, kando orowa no an ene itak hawe ku inu:—Nuye yan, tewa no Utarapa oshiketa ekot wa rai an utara anak ne shinnunuke ne: ruwe un, ari Ramat itak, nei utara anak koro monraige-i otta eshini kuni gusu ne na; koro iki ikip nei utara oshi arapa ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Orowa, ku nukara, awa, ingarʼan, shine retara nishkuru an; aige, nei nishkuru kata ainu poho nepkoro an kat koro shine guru a kane an ambe an, koro sapa kata kongani sapa-umbe an, koro tekehe ta een iyopbe kon ruwe ne.

Orowa, naa shine hauturumbe Kamui kora kenru wano soine hine nei nishkuru kata o kane an ambe orun poro hawe ashte wa ene itak-hi:—E koro iyopbe omare wa nange yan: nange kuni gusu an pakihi ek an; moshiri kata an an ange kunip chi kashpa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, nei nishkuru kata o ambe anak ne moshiri kata koro iyopbe omare; aige, moshiri anange.
Orowa, naa moshima an hauturumbe kando oshiketa an Kamui kora kenru orowa no soine nisa, shinuma ne yakka een iyopbe koro.

Orowa, naa shine hauturumbe yange-set orowa no oashin, shinuma anak abe epeka mondum kon ruwe ne; awa, shinuma anak ne poro hawe ani nei een iyopbe koro guru otta ene itak-hi:—E koro een iyopbe omande wa moshiri pungara oma push uina yan; koro hatchi okere ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, nei hauturumbe moshiri eun koro iyopbe omare, aine, moshiri pungara op icha hine Kamui kinrakara hat nishu, nei poro nishu otta omare nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei hat nishu anak ne machiya soigeta aotereke-numba, awa, nei hat nishu orowa no kemihi oashin, umma omonkai epa poka iki, shichi ju go ichi ri pakno epa nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, kando oshiketa naa shine shirosh ku nukara, porope ne, iyokunnurep ne, arawan shirikikbe koro arawan hauturumbe an, nei ambe anak okese an okaibe ne, nei okaibe gusu Kamui kinrakarape aokere ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Orowa, abe ukopoye wa an pindoro nepkorʼan atui ku nukara; samata, nei chikoikip newa chikoikip koro nokaha newa chikoikip kon reihei pishkihi newa orowa no araki annokara iki utara nei pindoro-ush atui kata Kamui koto koro wa roshki ambe ku nukara.

Orowa, nei utara anak ne Kamui usshiune guru Mose koro shinotcha-ibehe newa nei Pon-hitsuji koro shinotcha-ibehe shinotcha ki wa ene itak-hi:—Aa Utarapa ne Kamui, Nep ne yakka ki eashkaibe, E iki ikip anak ne poro wa iyokunnurep ne; Otusashuishiri wano okai utara esapanep E ne wa E iki ambe anak ne oupeka newa sonep ne ruwe ne.

Aa Utarapa, shomo E kooripak, shomo E koiramye guru inan guru ne ya? Ouse Aokai patek ashkanne ruwe ne gusu ne na: E iki oupeka ikip anukara wa okai gusu obitta no okai moshiri uirup araki wa E kotchaketa ongami ki kusu ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, tap okaibe okaketa ku nukara, awa, kando oshike un Kamui kora kenru ta an paweteshu ambe koro kash makke:
aige, nei arawan panakte ambe koro nei arawan hauturumbe Kamui kora kenru orowa no soyumba, awa, turu-sak no an pekashnu shuma ani yaitomchiure, orowa, kongani kut ani tumam-koshaye ruwe ne.
Aige, nei ine shiknu okaibe un shinep anak ne otusashuishiri wano otusashuishiri pakno ishu Kamui iki kinrakarape ani eshik wa an arawan kongani patchi nei arawan hauturumbe eun kore nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, Kamui kora kenru anak ne Kamui araguru newa Shinuma koro kiroro gusu an shupuya ani aeshik; awa, nei arawan hauturumbe koro arawan panakte ambe aokere pakno inan guru ne yakka nei kenru orun ahun eaikap ruwe ne na.
Orowa, Kamui kora kenru wano an poro hawe nei arawan hauturumbe otta ene ye ambe ku nu; Echi paye wa Kamui kinrakarape iyo nei arawan patchi moshiri kata echikiki yan, ari itak.
Orowa, nei atpake an ap arapa hine moshiri kata koro patchi echikiki; aige, nei chikoikip koro shirosh aomare wa shinuma koro nokaha koongami utara kata wen newa iuninka hup hetukure nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei tu ikinne an ap anak ne atui kata koro patchi echikiki; aige, rai guru koro kemihi nei no akan na; aine, obitta no okai shiknu okaibe, atui oshiketa okaibe, raipa nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei re ikinne an ap anak ne pet kata hemhem wakka purupuruge-i kata hemhem koro patchi echikiki; aige, nei okaibe anak ne kem ne akara.
Orowa, wakka koro hauturumbe ene ye hawe ku inu:—Aokai anak ne an wa an, an nisa, aine, tap korachi E esanniyo ruwe ne gusu, oupeka ambe E ne ruwe ne na:

inambe gusu ne yakun, nei utara anak ne ashkanne utara newa uweingara utara koro kem echikiki nisa, aige, Aokai anak ne ikire kuni gusu nei utara otta kemihi koropare nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na: nei utara nei ambe gusu oupakbe ne ruwe ne, ari itak.
Orowa, yange-set ene itak hawe ku inu:—Ruwe un, Aa nep ne yakka ki eashkai Utarapa ne Kamui, E iki esanniyop anak ne sonep newa oupeka ambe ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei ine ikinne an ap anak ne tokap chup kata koro patchi echikiki; aige, abe ani ainu utara chire kuni akore nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, ainu utara anak ne shiri seisek-i ani shukus-chire: awa, tap okai panakte ambe esapane kuni mondum akore Kamui kon reihei ainu utara anak ne koatcha nisa ruwe ne; aine, utara anak ne Shinuma iramye kuni gusu yaikokatpak shomoki nisa ruwe ne na.
Orowa, nei ashikne ikinne an ap anak ne nei chikoikip koro amset kata koro patchi echikiki; aine, koro moshiri akunnere; awa, utara anak ne iunin gusu koro parumbe kuikui,
orowa, koro ikoni newa hup gusu kando un Kamui koatcha; aige, koro iki ikip gusu shomo eyaikokatpak nisa ruwe ne na.
Orowa, nei iwan ikinne an ap anak ne nei poro pet, Euprates pet kata koro patchi echikiki; aige, chup hetuku ushike wano araki moshiri esapane utara gusu etokooiki kuni ne, nei wakka sat ruwe ne.

Orowa, nei kinashutunguru koro paro orowa no hemhem, nei chikoikip koro paroho orowa no hemhem, nei shunge uweingara guru koro paroho orowa no hemhem, otereke-ibe nepkoro an ichakkere ramat reppish oaship shiriki ambe ku nukara:

nei utara anak ne shirosh iki nitnep kon ramat ruwe ne gusu ne na; aige, nep ne yakka ki eashkai Kamui koro poro toho ta an kusu ne tumi gusu auwekarapare kuni ne, ingi-moshirʼun shikkashima utara kata paye utara ne ruwe ne.
(Ingarʼan, ikka guru koracki Ku ek na. Ika atusa no apkash hine utara nei atusa ambe nukara kuni ne, shiure wa koro mipihi shikkashima gurʼanak ne shinnunuke an ruwe ne).
Orowa, nei utara anak ne Hebrai un itak ani Harmagedon ari an itak ani aporose ushike ta yaiuwekarapare nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei arawan ikinne an ap anak ne rera-mau kata koro patchi echikiki; aige, Kamui kora kenru ta an amset wano poro hawe ek hine ene itak-hi:—

Aki okere an na, ari itak. Orowa, imeru hemhem an, hawe hemhem an, Kamui hum hemhem an ruwe ne; samata, poro shiri-shimoye an, moshiri kata ainu hetuku orowa no tane pakno naa shomo anukara ene poro shiri-shimoye, ene yupkep isam ruwe ne na.

Orowa, nei poro machiya anak ne re sereke ne aeukopi, awa, moshiri uirup koro machiya hachiripa: aige, koro niwen kinrakarape ne tonoto o itangi akore kuni ne, nei a poro Babironia anak Kamui tek-samata aeshkarun nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, obitta no okai repunshiri pishno kira wa isam, nupuri ka anukara shomoki.
Orowa, shine taranton pakno pase kaukau numi kando orowa no ainu utara kata rap: awa, nei kaukau ipak an gusu ainu utara Kamui koatcha nisa ruwe ne; nei ipak ambe shi no porobe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Orowa, nei arawan patchi koro nei arawan hauturumbe un shine hauturumbe ek hine en tura itak wa ene ye-hi:—Eteun ek yan, yakun, inne wakka kata a nei poro hoiyo iki guru gusu an esanniyo ambe e nukare ash kusu ne;
shinuma tura moshiri shikkashima utara anak ne hoiyo iki, orowa, moshiri kata oshiroma utara anak shinuma hoiyo iki ambe oma tonoto gusu aihoshkire nisa ruwe ne na, ari itak.

Orowa, nei hauturumbe anak ne Ramat oshiketa shine nup orun en ani nisa ruwe ne: awa, ku nukarʼhike fure iroho an chikoikip kata a shine shiwentep ku nukara, koatcha reihei eshik, orowa, arawan sapaha newa wan kirawe koro.

Orowa, nei shiwentep murasaki newa fure amip ani yaitomchiure wa an, samata, kongani newa oro an shuma newa ikani ani aeyaitomtere wa an, orosama, aetunne kuni ambe ani eshik kongani itangi koro teke ta kon ruwe ne, nei ambe anak shinuma iki hoiyo turu-ushbe ne ruwe ne; orowa, shinuma koro keputuruta reihei anuye wa an na:—
ne ruwe ne.

Orowa, ku nukarʼhike nei shiwentep anak ne ashkanne utara koro kemihi newa Yesu gusu paweteshu iki utara koro kemihi ani ihoshki ambe ku nukara. Aige, nei shiwentep ku nukara chiki, poro iyokunnure ambe ani ku iyokunnure nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, hauturumbe anak ne en orun ene itak-hi:—Hemanda gusu aokai iyokunnure ruwe he an? Nei shiwentep gusu an mukke ambe hemhem nei arawan sapaha newa wan kirawe koro shiwentep aore chikoikip gusu an mukke ambe hemhem e nure ash kusu ne.

E nukara chikoikip anak ne an nisa, aine, isam; awa, tane asamasak ushike wa oashin hine aisamka kuni ushike orun arapa kuni etokooiki korʼan ruwe ne. Orowa, moshiri kata oshiroma wa, moshiri asamaha aande i orowa no inotu oma kambi-sosh kata kon reihei shomo chieshinnuye wa okai utara anak ne nei chikoikip an nisa ambe, isam ambe, an kusu ne ambe nukara chiki iyokunnure kusu ne.
Ibehe koro wayashnu ambe anak ne teda an na. Nei arawan sapaha anak ne kata nei shiwentep a shiri an arawan nupuri ne ruwe ne:
aige, arawan moshiri shikkashima guru okai; ashiknen anak ne hachiripa okere, shinen an, naa moshima an shinen anak ne naa ek isam ruwe ne; shinuma ek chiki irukai an kusu ne kunip ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei a an nisa, tane isam chikoikip anak ne shinuma yai beko ta ne yakka tupesambe an ap ne, aige, nei arawanbe orowa no an ap ne ruwe ne; aine, shinuma aisamka kuni ushike orun arapa ruwe ne.

Orowa, e nukara okere wan kirawe anak ne wan moshiri shikkashima utara ne, nei utara naa shomo esapane kuni moshiri uina; koroka, shine ichi ji kan pakihi uturuta nei chikoikip tura moshiri shikkashima utara korachi mondum akore na.
Tan utara anak ne shine keutum koro, orowa, koro kiroro newa mondum nei chikoikip otta kore ruwe ne.

Tan utara anak ne nei Pon-hitsuji chikoikip epeka tumi-koro kusu ne, aige, Pon-hitsuji chikoikip anak nei utara anrapokikara wa annokara kusu ne, Shinuma anak ne Utarapa utara koro Utarapa ne, moshiri shikkashima utara koro Moshiri Shikkashima Kamui ne ruwe ne gusu ne na; orowa, Shinuma tura no okai utara anak ne anishuk wa an, anumge an, ikipniukesh utara ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, en orun nei hauturumbe ene itakhi:—Otta hoiyo guru a shiri an wakka utara anak ne utara ikiri ne, inne topaha utara ne, moshiri uirup utara ne, parumbe utara ne ruwe ne.

Orowa, e nukara wan kirawe newa nei chikoikip anak ne, tap utara anak nei hoiyo guru etunne kusu ne, aige, shinuma koisamka wa atusare kusu ne, samata, shinuma koro kam ibe, orowa, isam pakno abe ani uhuyeka kusu ne na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui irenga nei no iki kuni ne shine keutum koro hemhem ki, Kamui itak auweomare pakno koro moshiri nei chikoikip otta akore hemhem ki kuni ne Kamui anak ne nei utara koro sambe ta iki nisa ruwe ne na.
E nukara shiwentep anak ne moshiri kata okai Moshiri shikkashima utara esapane shiriki an nei poro machiya ne ruwe ne.
Tap okaibe okaketa poro mondum koro wa an kando orowa no ran shiri naa shine hauturumbe ku nukara; aige, shinuma koro araguru gusu moshiri apekereka nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, shinuma rui hau ani hawe ashte wa ene itak-hi:—Hokush okere, nei poro Babironia hokush wa an wa nitne kamui koro oshiroma-i ne akara, nep ichakkere ramat ne yakka, nep turu-sak wa aetunne kuni gusu an chikap ne yakka okai kuni pakashnu ushike ne akan na.

Inambe gusu ne yakun, obitta no okai moshiri uirup utara anak ne shinuma koro hoiyo gusu an kinrakarape oma tonoto ankushkerai hachiripa nisa ruwe ne; orowa, moshiri shikkashima utara anak ne shinuma tura hoiyo iki, aine, moshiri ta okai ihok utara anak ne shinuma iki yaiomonnure ambe kiroro gusu yaioteknure okere ruwe ne gusu ne na, ari itak.

Orowa, kando orowa no an naa shine hawe ku inu, ene itak-hi:—Shinuma iki chikokatpak tura iteki iki kuni ne, samata, shinuma akore ipak ambe ani shomo utura apanakte kuni ne, Ku goro utara, nei shiwentep orowa no soyumba yan:
inambe gusu ne yakun, shinuma koro chikokatpak anak ne kando pakno epa okere, orowa, Kamui anak ne shinuma koro wen-buri eshkarun nisa ruwe ne.
Shinuma moshima utara epeka no iki korachi shinuma epeka ne yakka iki yan, shinuma iki ikip tup ukotamge pakno kore yan: shinuma ukopoye itange tup ne pakno ukopoye wa kore yan.

Shinuma anak ne yaikota yairiknare wa yaiomonnure pakno, nei oro pakno shinuma panakte wa yaituwashkarapte wa kore yan: inambe gusu ne yakun, moshiri shikkashima shiwentep ku ne wa shiyompiyara shomo ne, orowa, oara yaituwashkarap shomo ku ki kusu ne na, ari keutum ta itak ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Tambe gusu, shine toho ututta shinuma akore ipak ambe araki kusu ne, rai ambe an, yaituwashkarap an, keme an ambe an; orowa, shinuma anak ne isam pakno abe ani auhuyeka kusu ne: shinuma koipishi wa esanniyo Utarapa ne Kamui anak kiroroashnu Kamui ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, shinuma tura no yaiomonnure no ishu hine tura no hoiyo iki moshiri shikkashima utara anak ne

shinuma ipak ambe ishitoma gusu ukattuima no roshki wa nei guru uhuye shupuya nukara chiki echish erayaise wa ene itak kusu ne-hi:—Eyaisambepokash, Eyaisambepokash, nei poro machiya, Babironia, nei tumashnu machiya! shine ichi ji kan pakihi ututta eani gusu an aesanniyo ipak ek an na.
Orowa, moshiri kata okai ihok utara anak ne shinuma echish wa yaituwashkarap, shinuma ihokbe tewa no hok guru isam ruwe ne gusu ne na;

aihok kuni kongani an, shirokani an, oro an no an shuma an, ikani an, ane senkaki an, murasaki an, fure ambe an; usa okai kaorigi chikuni, zo kite-nimaki ani akara usa okai op, iyotta aoshkoro chikuni ani akara op, shiunin-kani op,

yaiyan-kani op, roseki shuma op; samata, nikkei chikuni kapu an, rataskep an, senko an, hura pirika shum an, motsuyaku an, tonoto an, pene shum an, nokan no akara koho an, mungi an, beko an, hitsuji chikoikip an; orowa, umma hemhem nishinda hemhem tumama hemhem ainu ramat hemhem an ruwe ne.

Orowa, e kon ramat ibeshikashure wa uina rusui ambe anak ne oyakta paye wa isam, aige, nep ne yakka shisakbe newa chitomte okaibe obitta eoyake un paye wa isama, aine, naa oara apa shomoki kusu ne na.
Orowa, tapan okaibe ehok wa shinuma gusu yaioteknure utara anak ne shinuma iki ipak ambe koishitoma hine ehangeko no roshki wa chish hemhem ki yaituwashkarap hemhem ki kusu ne;

aine, ene itak-hi:—Eyaisambepokash, eyaisambepokash, nei poro machiya, shinuma anak ne ane senkaki newa murasaki newa fure ambe newa ani yaitomchiure nisa, samata, kongani newa oro an no an shuma newa ikani newa ani yaitomtere nisa!

awa, shine ichi ji kan pakihi uturuta ene poro aeoteknu ambe aisamka ruwe ne gusu ne na. Orowa, pishno an chip esapane guru hemhem, nei oro ne yakka atuitomotuye pishno an guru hemhem, chip o utara hemhem ne yakka, samata, atui gusu yaireshpa obitta no okai utara ne yakka
ehangeko no roshki hine shinuma uhuye shupuya orun ingara wa hawe ashte, aige, ene itak-hi:—Nei poro machiya ukoheraye ambe inambe ne ruwe?

Orowa, nei utara anak ne yaikota koro sapaha kata koponchi kashi-ota hine chish wa yaituwashkarap, aige, ene itak-hi:—Eyaisambepokash, eyaisambepokash, nei poro machiya, koro aeoteknup ankushkerai atui kata koro chip koro obitta no okai utara anak shinuma oshiketa yaioteknure nisa ruwe ne! shine ichi ji kan uturuta korobe aisamka ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Kando ne Aokai hemhem, ashkanne utara ne echi utara hemhem, Apostoro utara ne echi utara hemhem, uweingara utara ne echi utara hemhem shinuma okkeukashi nupetne yan; inambe gusu ne yakka aokai utara gusu an esanniyo ambe Kamui esanniyo nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Orowa, shine okirashnu hauturumbe anak ne shine poro nishu nepkorʼan shuma uk, aige, atui oshiketa eyapkire wa ene itak-hi:—Tap korachi an shiri yupke hokush ambe ani Babironia machiya, nei a poro machiya ahokushte kusu ne, aine, naa oara anukara shomoki kusu ne.

Orowa, koto rekte utara koro hawe hene, usa okai arektep rekte utara koro hawe hene, top rekte utara koro hawe hene, rappa rekte utara koro hawe hene tewa no oara e onnaigeta anu shomoki kusu ne; samata, nep monraige iki guru ne a yakka oara e onnaigeta anukara shomoki kusu ne;

orowa, nishu humi oara e onnaigeta anu shomoki kusu ne; orosama, ratchako pekere oara e onnaigeta at shomoki kusu ne; samata, mat akore guru hawe hoku akore guru hawe oara e onnaigeta anu shomoki kusu ne na: inambe gusu ne yakun, e tura iki ihok utara anak ne moshiri esapane utara ne ruwe ne gusu ne na; awa, obitta no okai moshiri uirup anak ne e iki aesaman ambe ankushkerai akokandama ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, nei machiya oshiketa uweingara utara kemihi, ashkanne utara kemihi, samata, moshiri kata aronnu obitta no okai utara koro kemihi anukan nisa ruwe ne.
Tap okaibe okaketa kando oshiketa an poro inne utara koro poro hawehe nepkorʼambe ku inu, aige, ene itak-hi:—Arrerouya; Kashiobiuki ambe hemhem, arakuru hemhem, kiroro hemhem, akoro Kamui korobe ne:

Shinuma esanniyop anak ne sonep newa oupeka ambe ne ruwe ne gusu ne na; inambe gusu ne yakun, koro hoiyop ani moshiri muninka nei poro hoiyo guru Kamui anak ne koipishi wa panakte nisa, samata, Shinuma usshiunere utara koro kemihi gusu nei shiwentep epeka ikemnu nisa ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, kanna-shui, Arrerouya ari nei utara ye. Aine, ramma-ramma otusashuishiri pakno nei shiwentep koro shupuya rikin ruwe ne Orowa,
nei inen ikashima hotne ekashi newa nei ine shiknu okaibe anak ne yaihachire wa nei amset kata rok Kamui koongami hine ene itak-hi;
Amen; Arrerouya. Orowa, nei amset orowa no shine hawe hetuku wa ene itak-hi:—Kamui orowa no ausshiunere obitta no okai echi utara, Shinuma kooripak echi utara, ponbe ne yakka porobe ne yakka,

akoro Kamui koiramye yan. Orowa, poro inne utara ashte hau nei no an hawe korachi; inne wakka ashte hau nei no an hawe korachi, yupke kamui hum ashte hau nei no an hawe korachi an humi ku inu, awa, ene itak-hi:—Arrerouya: Obitta no okai kiroro koro chikoro Kamui ne Utarapa anak ne esapane korʼan ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Nupetne wa shiri yainuchattek yanro, Shinuma pasere yanro: nei Pon-hitsuji mat-akore kuni pakihi ek an wa akore kuni machihi yaietokooikire an ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, Shinuma anak ne ane senkaki, hereat wa turusak senkaki ani yaitomchiure kuni ne akore nisa: nei a ane senkaki anak ashkanne utara iki oupeka buri ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Orowa, shinuma en orun ene itak-hi:—Nei a Pon-hitsuji mat-akore gusu an iwai otta iyahupte utara anak ne shinnunuke ne, ari nuye yan, sekoro itak. Orowa en orota ene itak-hi:—Tap itak anak ne Kamui sonep ne an itak ne ruwe ne.

Aige, otta koongami gusu shinuma kotchaketa ku yaihachire nisa ruwe ne. Awa, en orun shinuma ene itak-hi:—Iteki en koongami yan: Kuani ne yakka Yesu paweteshu ambe koro e tura no ne yakka e koro iriwak utara tura no ne yakka iki auitekbe ku ne ruwe ne: Kamui koongami yan: Yesu gusu an paweteshu ambe ikip anak ne uweingara ramat ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Orowa, kando makke ambe ku nukara; awa, ingarʼan, shine retara umma an, aige, kata o guru anak ne Ikipniukesh newa Sonep ani aporose; orowa, shinuma oupeka no koipishi hemhem ki tumi hemhem kon ruwe ne.
Shinuma koro shikihi anak ne abe-nui nepkorʼambe ne, koro sapa kata inne inaoru aunu; samata, yaikota moshima nen nen ne yakka erampeutek anuye reihei kon ruwe ne.
Orowa, kemi otta aomare mipihi yaitomchiure: kon reihei anak—Kamui Itak—ani ayep ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, kando oshiketa okai tumikoro utara ikiri anak ne ane senkaki, retara wa turu-sak senkaki aeyaimire wa retara umma kata o hine Shinuma oshi paye.

Aige, ani Shinuma anak ne moshiri uirup shirikik kuni ne Shinuma paroho wano een rangetam oashin ruwe ne: orowa, Shinuma anak yaiyan-kani kanni ani nei utara epungine kusu ne na: samata, Shinuma obitta no okai kiroro koro Kamui irushka ambe oma kinrakara tonoto nishu otereke ruwe ne.
Koro mipihi newa koro om kata shine reihei chieshinnuye wa an, — moshiri shikkashima
Orowa, tokap-chup onnaigeta ash wa an shine hauturumbe ku nukara; aige, shinuma rui hawe ani hawe ashte wa kando kotoro noshke hopumba obitta no okai chikap otta ene itak-hi:—Kamui etokooiki

poro marapto orun yaiuwekarapare yan; yakun, moshiri shikkashima utara koro kam hemhem, tumi-koro utara esapane utara koro kam hemhem kiroro-ashnu utara koro kam hemhem, umma newa umma opa utara koro kam hemhem, obitta no okai utara, rengaine an mondum koro utara ne yakka ausshiunere utara ne yakka, ponbe ne yakka porobe ne yakka koro kam echi ibe kusu ne na.

Orowa, ku ingarʼnike, nei a chikoikip hemhem, moshiri shikkashima utara hemhem, koro tumi-koro utara tura, nei umma kata o guru newa Shinuma koro tumi-koro utara epeka kotumi-koro kuni gusu uwekarapa ambe ku nukara.

Orowa, nei a chikoikip akishima, samata, ani nei chikoikip koro shirosh aomare utara newa shinuma koro nokaha koongami utara kokandama shinuma shik-samata shirosh iki shunge uweingara guru nei chikoikip tura no akishima nisa ruwe ne: tan tun anak ne shiknu wa an wa iwau ani paraparase abe oma to orun aeyapkiri nisa ruwe ne:
orowa, nei umma kata o guru paroho wano oashin rangetam ani moshima okai utara anak aronnu nisa: aige, obitta no okai chikap anak ne nei utara koro kam gusu aeyai-kironnure nisa ruwe ne na.
Orowa, asam-sak-i gusu an kangi koro, tekehe ta poro kani-shinkop ani wa an shine hauturumbe kando orowa no ran ambe ku nukara.
Awa, shinuma anak ne Nitnep newa Satan ani aporose nei a kinashutunguru, nei a fushko okokko, kishima wa ashikne shine wan hotne pa uturu pakno gusu tupetupe hine nei a asam-sak-i orun eyapkire,

aige, nei ambe seshke wa shinuma kashita numpe ani kotukka nisa; tambe anak ne nei ashikne shine wan hotne pa aokere pakno tewa no moshiri uirup iteki kokandama kuni gusu an ambe ne: nei okaketa irukai uturuta apita kusu ne na.

Orowa, inne amset newa kashita rok shiri okai utara ku nukara, awa, nei utara koipishi iki kuni mondum akore nisa ruwe ne: samata. Yesu gusu an paweteshu iki ambe gusu hemhem, Kamui itak gusu hemhem, nei a chikoikip newa chikoikip koro noka shomo koongami ambe gusu hemhem, koro keputuru kata hene koro teke kata hene chikoikip koro shirosh shomo aomare ambe gusu hemhem sapa otuye utara kon ramat ku nukan nisa ruwe ne; aige, nei utara ishu wa ashikne shine wan hotne pa uturuta Kiristo tura epungine ruwe ne.
Orowa, moshima okai rai an utara anak ne nei ashikne shine wan hotne pa aokere shomoki pakno ishu shomoki ruwe ne. Tambe anak ne atpake an hetopo-a-shiknure ambe ne ruwe ne.

Nei atpake an hetopo-a-shiknure-hi ta aomare gurʼanak ne shinnunuke newa ash kan nep ne ruwe ne: tan utara okkeu kashi tu ikinne an rai-ambe anak mondum isama; koroka, nei utara Kamui newa Kiristo gusu yaishieiwangere utara ne wa ashikne shine wan hotne pa uturuta Shinuma tura epungine kusu ne na.
Orowa, nei ashikne shine wan hotne pa aokere chiki, Satan anak ne apita wa koro pakashnu chisei wano soine,
aige, moshiri ine shikkeu ta okai uirup kokandama wa Gog newa Magog tumi-koro iki kuni ne uwekarapare kuni gusu shinuma oashin kusu ne: nei utara pishkihi anak ne a tu isam ota korachi ne ruwe ne.

Orowa, nei utara anak ne moshirʼebitta kamu pakno hemeshpa, aige, ashkanne utara koro oshiroma kash newa nei omap an machiya nikkotama: aine, kando orowa no abe rap hine nei utara isamka nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, nei utara kokandama nitne kamui anak ne nei a abe newa iwau to oshike un aeyapkiri nisa, nei ushiketa nei a chikoikip newa shunge uweingara guru ne yakka okai ruwe ne; awa, tokap to ta ne yakka, kunne to ta ne yakka ramma otusashuishiri pakno aiuninkare kusu ne na.
Orowa, poro retara amset, samata, nei kashiketa rokbe ku nukara, awa, Shinuma koro nanuhu wano toitoi newa kando newa kira nisa ruwe ne, aige, okai kuni ushike shomo anukan ruwe ne na.

Orowa, nei amset kotpokita porobe rai utara ne yakka ponbe rai utara ne yakka roshki shiriki-hi ku nukan nisa; orowa, nei kambi-sosh apirasa: shui moshima an kambi-sosh ne yakka apirasa ruwe ne, nei ambe anak inotu oma kambi-sosh ne ruwe ne na: orowa, rai utara anak ne nei kambi-sosh kata chieshinnuye wa an korachi, ki ikip an nei no, akoipishi nisa ruwe ne.
Orowa, atui anak ne oshiketi okai rai utara sange; rai-i newa Hedes kane koro oshiketa okai rai utara sange nisa ruwe ne: orowa, nei utara pishno-pishno ki ikip an korachi akoipishi nisa ruwe ne na.
Orowa, rai-i newa Hedes anak ne abe to orota aeyapkiri. Tambe anak, tan abe to anak ne, tutanu an rai ambe ne ruwe ne.
Orowa inan guru ne yakka nei inotu oma kambi-sosh kata reihei shomo anuye wa an sekoro anukara chiki, nei abe to orota aeyapkiri nisa ruwe ne na.
Orowa, ashiri kando newa ashiri moshiri newa ku nukan nisa: inambe gusu ne yakun, nei atpake an kando newa moshiri anak ne isam wa isama; samata, atui ne yakka isam ruwe ne.
Orowa, ku nukarʼhike, nei ashkanne machiya, ashiri Yerusarem machiya, koro hoku gusu shipini wa yaitomtere okere tane akore kusu ne mat nei no an wa Kamui orowa no kando wano ran ap ku nukara.

Orowa no, nei a amset wano oashin hawe ku inu, ene itak-hi:—Ingarʼan, Kamui koro kash anak ne ainu utara tura no an, aige, Shinuma nei utara tura no kash koro kusu ne, orowa, nei utara anak ne Shinuma koro uirup utara ne kusu ne, aine, Kamui yaihekota anak nei utara tura no rok wa koro Kamui ne kusu ne na:

orowa, Shinuma anak ne nei utara koro shikihi otta pishno an nupe piruba wa isamka kusu ne; samata, rai-ambe naa isam; orowa, tewa no poka yaituwashkarap isam, chish ambe isam, aiuninka ambe isam kusu ne: atpake an ambe isam wa okere ruwe ne na.

Orowa, nei a amset kata rokbe ene itak-hi:—Ingarʼan, obitta no okaibe ashin no Ku kara. Samata, Nuye yan: tapan itak ambe anak ne oupekap ne sonep ne ruwe ne gusu ne na, ani an itak ani Shinuma ye nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, en orun Shinuma ene itakhi:—Auweomare an na. Kuani anak ne Arupa ne Omega ne, atpake an ap Ku ne, okake an ap Ku ne ruwe ne. Aige, iku rusui guru otta inotu oma wakka purupuruge-i wano an ap oro isam no Ku kore kusu ne na.
Annokara iki guru anak ne tap okaibe eikeshkoro kusu ne; orowa, Kuani anak ne nei guru koro Kamui Ku ne, aige, nei guru anak ne Ku poho ne kusu ne na.

Koroka, ashitoma utara hemhem, eumbupka iki utara hemhem, aetunne utara hemhem, kewe-uk utara hemhem, hoiyo utara hemhem, ponitak-hi utara hemhem, nokaha koongami utara hemhem, orowa obitta no okai shunge ki utara hemhem abe newa iwau ani paraparase to oshiketa akore kunip uk kusu ne: tambe anak ne tutanu an rai-ambe ne ruwe ne.

Orowa, iyotta okake an nei arawan shirikikbe o arawan domburi koro hauturumbe un shinen anak ne en orun ek wa ukoitak hine ene itak-hi:—Eteun ek yan, yakun, nei Pon-hitsuji koro machi ne a akore kuni shiwentep e nukare ash kusu ne, ari itak. Aige,
shinuma anak ne Ramat oma hine poro newa ri nupuri orun en ani, aine, Kamui arakuru koro, kando

oshke wa Kamui orowa no san shiri an nei a ashkanne Yerusarem machiya en nukare: koro chup anak ne shiri nupuru shuma ukoheraye, kongoseki shuma nepkorʼan wa konrushuma korachi pekashnu: poro newa ri chashi an;

samata, tu ikashima wan ahun apa an, orowa, nei apa samta tu ikashima wan hauturumbe okai ruwe ne; orosama, nei ambe kata reihei chieshinnuye wa an, nei ambe anak ne Israeru un utara koro tu ikashima wan ikiri kon reihei ne ruwe ne na:
moshiri pa samba ta re apa okai, menashtoro samba ta re apa okai; pikata samba ta re apa okai, orowa, moshirigesh samba ta re apa okai ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei machiya koro ekashi otta tu ikashima wan asamaha okai, aige, kashita nei Pon-hitsuji koro Apostoro tu ikashima wan reihei an ruwe ne na.
Orowa, en orun itak guru anak ne nei machiya hemhem, machiya koro apa hemhem, koro ekashi hemhem pakari kuni gusu kongami rapembe pakarip kon ruwe ne.

Nei machiya anak ine samba no an, epesh anak ne tomotuye ambe pakno poro ruwe ne: awa, shinuma nei rapembe ani machiya pakari, aige, rophiyaku shine ichi ri an: epesh newa tomotuye ambe newa ri-hi anak ne ukorachi ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, shinuma nei chashi pakari, aige, ainu pakari ambe nei no, nei hauturumbe pakari ambe nei no chiki hiyaku shi ju shi shine ichi kubit nei ruwe ne.
Orowa, ani nei ekashi akara shuma anak ne kongo-seki ne; aige, nei machiya anak turu-sak pindoro nepkorʼan turu-sak kongani ne ruwe ne.

Machiya ekashi koro asamaha anak ne obitta no an usa okai nupuru shuma ani atomtere an na Atpake an asama anak ne kongoseki ne; tu ikinne an ap anak ne shiunin-shuma ne; re ikinne an ap anak ne fure-shuma ne; ine ikinne an ap anak ne midori-shuma ne; ashikne ikinne an ap anak ne kurenai meno-shuma ne;

iwan ikinne an ap anak ne chunchube-shuma ne; arawan ikinne an ap anak ne kapara chunchube ush-shuma ne; tupesan ikinne an ap anak ne mizu-iro-shnma ne; shinepe-sambe an ap anak ne kurenai-shuma ne; wan ikinne an ap anak ne midori-shuma ne; shine ikashima wan ikinne an ap anak ne koki-kurenai-shuma ne; tu ikashima wan ap anak ne murasaki-shuma ne ruwe ne.

Orowa, nei tu ikashima wan ahun apa anak ne tu ikashima wan ikani ne ruwe ne; nei apa-ushta pishno range shine ikani ne; aige, nei machiya un para-ru anak ne turu-sak kongani ne kushna aoingara nepkoro ambe ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, nei oshiketa Kamui kora kenru shomo ku nukara: inambe gusu ne yakun, nep kiroro ne yakka koro Utarapa ne Kamui newa nei Pon-hitsuji anak ne nei kenru ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.

Orowa, kashita tomka kuni tokap-chup hene kunne-chup hene akore rusuibe kunip isam: inambe gusu ne yakun, Kamui arakuru nei ambe pekereka nisa, aine, gusu an ratchako anak ne nei a Pon-hitsuji ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Orowa, moshiri uirup anak ne nei pekere tumta apkash kusu ne: orowa, moshiri shikkashima utara anak ne nei ambe orun koro arakuru koro wa araki shiri an ruwe ne.
Koro apa anak ne tokap to uturuta oara aseshke shomoki kusu ne (nei ushiketa kunne to isama):
orowa, moshiri uirup koro arakuru newa aeoripakbe kunip otta koro wa araki an kusu ne:

orowa, nep ne yakka turu-ushbe hene, nep ne yakka aetunne ambe newa shunge newa karape hene, oara nei ushiketa ahun shomoki kusu ne: koroka, ouse nei Pon-hitsuji koro inotu oma kambi-sosh kata chieshinnuye wa an utara patek ahup kusu ne na.
Orowa, shinuma anak ne nei nachiya onnaigeta,

Kamui newa nei Pon-hitsuji koro amset wano hetuku komu shuma korachi pekashnu inotu oma san pet en nukare nisa. Awa, nei pet otamba un toshka ta hemhem, okushun toshka ta hemhem, kesh chup range tu ikashima wan shuine nikaop hetukure inotu oma chikuni an: orowa, nei chikuni ham anak ne moshiri uirup iwangere kuni gusu an ambe ne ruwe ne.
Orowa, tewa no aiyoitakushi ambe isam kusu ne: samata, nei onnaigeta Kamui newa Pon-hitsuji koro amset an kusu ne: orowa, Shinuma koro usshiune utara anak ne Shinuma otta yaishieiwangere kusu ne na;
aige, nei utara anak ne Shinuma koro nanuhu nukara kusu ne; shui, Shinuma kon reihei nei utara koro keputuru ta an kusu ne na.

Nei ushiketa anchikara isam; ratchako pekere newa chup pekere eishiramne shomoki; Utarapa ne Kamui anak ne nei utara otta pekere atte kusu ne gusu ne na: orowa, nei utara otusashuishiri pakno epungine kusu ne.

Orowa, en orun shinuma ene itak-hi:—Tapan itak anak ne oupekap ne sonep ne ruwe ne: aige, Utarapa anak ne, uweingara utara oma ramat koro Kamui anak, naa pon no okaketa hetuku kuni gusu an okaibe koro uitek utara nure gusu koro hauturumbe teshkan nisa ruwe ne.
Ingarʼan, Tunashi no Ku ek kushki. Tan kambi kata okai uweingara itak shikkashima gurʼanak ne shinunuke an ruwe ne na.

Orowa, Yoannes ne kuani anak ne tap okaibe nu hemhem ki nukara hemhem ki guru ku ne ruwe ne. Aige, ku nu hemhem nukara hemhem ki chiki, tap okaibe en nukare hauturumbe chikiri kotchaketa koongami gusu ku yaihachire nisa ruwe ne.

Orowa, en orun shinuma ene itak-hi:—Iteki nei no ki yan: e tura no ne yakka, uweingara utara ne e koro iriwak utara tura no ne yakka, tan kambi oma itak ambe shikkashima utara tura no ne yakka iki uitek guru ku ne ruwe ne: Kamui koongami yan.
Orowa, en orun shinuma ene itak-hi:—Tan kambi oma uweingara itak ambe iteki ko-seshke yan; pakihi ehange no an ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Oupeka-sak no an gurʼanak ne naa oupeka sak no iki yan: oupeka gurʼanak ne naa oupeka no iki yan: ashkanne gurʼanak ne naa aashkannere no an yan.
Ingarʼan, tunashi no Ku ek na; aige, koro iki ikip an nei no pishno an guru orun Ku koropare kuni gusu an pummaha Ku kon ruwe ne.
Kuani anak ne nei Arupa newa Omeka Ku ne ruwe ne, hoshike an ap ne, iyoshi an ap Ku ne, atpake an ap ne, okake an ap Ku ne ruwe ne.
Koro mipihi furaye utara shinnunuke an; nei utara anak ne nei inotu oma chikuni epeka mondum akore, shui, ahunapa kari nei machiya orun ahup kuni gusu an ap ne ruwe ne gusu ne na.
Soigeta anak seta okai, pon-itak ki utara okai, hoiyo utara okai, keuk utara okai, potoki-koongami utara okai, orowa, shunge omap wa shungep iki ambe koomap obitta no okai utara pishno an ruwe ne na.

Yesu ne Kuani anak ne karisia utara gusu tap okaibe echi orun paweteshu iki kuni ne Ku hauturumbe Ku arapare nisa ruwe ne. Kuani anak ne Dabid koro shinrit newa santek Ku ne, nei heriat kunne-nisat-nochiu Ku ne ruwe ne.

Orowa, Ramat newa nei hoku akore kuni mat anak ne “Araki yan,” ari itak. Orowa, nu gurʼanak ne, shinuma anak “Araki yan,” ari ye yan. Samata iku rusui guru, araki yan: kon rusui guru anak ne rengaine oro isam no nei inotu oma wakka uk yan.

Tan kambi-sosh oma uweingara itak nu obitta no okai pishno an guru otta tapne Ku ye-hi:—Inan guru ne yakka tap okai itak ambe eun nepka kashi-iyo chiki, Kamui anak ne tan kambi-sosh kata chieshinnuye wa okai shirikikbe nei guru eun kashi-iyo kusu ne:

orowa, tan kambi-sosh oma uweingara itak orowa no uk wa isamka inan guru ne yakka an chiki, Kamui anak ne tan kambi kata chieshinnuye wa okai nei guru akore kuni gusu an nei inotu oma chikuni orushpe hemhem, nei ashkanne machiya orushpe hemhem shinuma orowa no uk kusu ne.
Tap okaibe ye guru anak ne:—Ruwe ne wa: tunashi no Ku ek kusu ne, ari itak. Amen: ek wa en kore yan, Utarapa ne Yesu.
Utarapa ne Yesu korʼirenga ashkanne utara tura no an kuni ku koramkon na. Amen.
